college_info.college_name: Aditya University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placement, Scholarship

highlights.summary:
Aditya University was established in 2001 and is located in Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh. It is a private college and was established under the aegis of Aditya Academy. The college has been accredited by NBA and NAAC with an A++ grade. Further, Aditya University is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kakinada (JNTUK) with an intake of 180 in three UG Courses in Engineering & Technology.
The university offers a wide range of programmes at UG, PG, and diploma levels under various departments such as Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Petroleum Technology, Mining Engineering, etc. Aditya University courses are AICTE-approved and are offered to students full-time. Apart from this, the university has a sprawling campus of around 180 acres and is situated in an eco-friendly area. For more details, candidates can check out the table given below:
Aditya University Highlights 2025

college_info_program.intro: The flagship programmes offered at Aditya University are BTech and MBA. The college offers these programmes to students at UG and PG levels. Further, the college offers these programmes for a duration of 4 and 2 years, respectively with a comprehensive curriculum. Aditya University courses strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. Aditya University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Petroleum Technology
reviews.review_title: I don't know about placements that happened in 2015.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 40 % to 45% students are selected in campus placements. The highest package is around 10 LPA to 12 LPA, and the lowest package is around 4.5 LPA to 5.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Lasern, Turbo, Halliburton, Tech Mahindra, Infosys, and GAIL.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in this college is good, I like it, but we don't get a mobile signal in this college. The labs are good, and the equipment is available. There is a big library in this college, but the college's hostel food is really bad. I left the college hostel and joined an outside private hostel because of the worst food in the college hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are average, they just come and scroll through the PPT. I always feel like why did I choose this course. Semester exams are not that difficult, we can pass by studying for 1 week before exams. The pass percentage is 40%, but the only thing I don't like is the faculty's teaching.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It is a truly exceptional college.

detailed_review.Placements: 83.8 percent of students get placed in my branch. The highest package offered in this branch ranges from 35-36 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are IBM, Wipro, Amazon, etc. Nearly 70 percent of students got internships in companies like Walmart, Flipkart, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have the best classrooms and labs with the best systems and AC rooms. We have almost 3 libraries, each for a couple of blocks. Our hostel food menu changes when students get bored with eating it. They ask for reviews of food every day and change according to them. We have a very active team in sports where students are encouraged to participate in every event. There are also athletic coaches, especially for hostellers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members teach well. Some of them are not actually that knowledgeable, and they just read PPTs. The course curriculum is relevant, I think so. It makes students industry-ready. Exams are not that difficult if we prepare well. The pass percentage is above 80 percent.
detailed_review.Other: Fests organised are not that many on our campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with the faculty members and fees. It has a good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 75% of students get placed. The highest package offered is 9 LPA and the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA. Japanese companies visit the college for placements. Above 80% of students got internships. They concentrate on only very good-performance students. They only share any project ideas with the highest percentage and the highest CGPA students. They do not take on average students with the lowest percentage.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no good Wi-Fi facility in the hostel. It has good infrastructure with many buildings and a beautiful canteen named Ball canteen and Pencil canteens. Food in the canteens is okay with high rates. But the library is very good. It has a very good atmosphere in the library. There are many libraries in my college with many books.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are no good knowledgeable faculty members in my department. They are very coordinator. It has even very bad lab technicians. The course curriculum is not relevant. Exams are very difficult, with very strict evaluation. They do not want to solve the problems which we are facing in subjects. They only teach what they know, except that if we ask any question to them like solve this sum they are not capable of providing solutions to that particular question.
detailed_review.Other: There is a fest named Colors. It is a huge fest and many people come across the country.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I said my college is good for studies and the other activities like sports, fests, events, etc.

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent are placed at Sagility, Infosys, Fractal, and internships got a few people in Deloitte, Accenture. Now, many companies are waiting to be a part of the placement. Recently, Accenture came to my college to hire MCA and B.Tech students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, free Wi-Fi is available in every classroom, and lab facilities are also available. There is a large library where we can find every book to read. In my college canteen, the food is good, and all the facilities are awesome. In my college, more facilities are available, like a ground.
detailed_review.Faculty: Highly qualified teachers are in my college. They are teaching well and extraordinarily. The course curriculum is too relevant to the industry base. My semester exams are sometimes tougher and sometimes moderate, and the pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose MCA to start my career with a big opportunity in tech jobs. The best thing I learn from this course is good communication and coding skills. Colour fest was done at my college last year pongal, campus surroundings are peaceful.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I will suggest my college to my relatives.

detailed_review.Placements: The top companies are Tata Motors, NFCL, Coromandel Fertilizers Limited, and Ashok Leyland. All the students are more knowledgeable and score high percentages of marks. The companies that come to hire us are good companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facility is the best. The food is very tasty and yummy. They provide milk and curd daily. They also provide non-veg to the students. The sleeping beds in the hostel are really good. The hostel also has a Wi-Fi facility. It is too good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The professors are highly professional. All the teachers are M. Tech and Ph.D. qualified. They are very knowledgeable and friendly. They are very experienced and good in all perspectives. They teach lessons in a friendly way, which is a very impressive way to guide us.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course based on my interest. I don’t think I need anything better than this. They are already providing much better compared to others. Events and fests occur occasionally.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Moderately satisfied infrastructure and faculty. Expectable placements in 2024.

detailed_review.Placements: I am not placed yet. The passing rate is at 76 percent. The highest package offered is 22 LPA and the lowest package offered is 7.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Virtusa Hitachi Hyundai Tech Mahindra and some of the software companies that select that side instead of hardware like Wipro. The top roles offered are VLSI engineer roles maybe I am not sure about that.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, especially nowadays it is increasing. They are more focused on it. The Wi-Fi signal strength is very good to use for students. The labs are decent, and the apparatuses are not sufficient for every student, but they can manage it by dividing into groups. The library is very good, almost every section is present, and quality books are available. Sports and games are interesting, but if you show it to the faculty or someone on campus, they do not encourage you. If you show interest, then okay, it will be good. Food and medical facilities are decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is above average, that’s it, you cannot expect more from them. The course is curriculum relevant. I do not think the industry is changing day to day; the curriculum in colleges changes only after 4 to 5 years minimum. The semester exams are very easy, you just put an effort of 10 percent, you can pass them. The pass percentage is 86 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I am more interested in exploring electronic devices, so I chose it. I wish I could be better at improving my practical knowledge too along with theoretical knowledge. Events are more to participate in if you are interested, but not so good. Other than that, all are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I like my college and hostel, which I will tell everyone about.

detailed_review.Placements: Aditya College of Engineering. In my college, all the students are placed almost 89 percent of students are placed. Many companies came to our college, and the highest package of the decade is 22 LPA, and the least is 4.6 LPA. All the students were placed last year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college infrastructure is very good to see and the college is so green and clean. My course is mechanical engineering, and it has special labs, and exams are conducted by our college management. My college hostels are all well-maintained and kept very clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: My college faculty is they teach very well and very well-talented and experienced. All of them come from many other states. All the students got good marks, and all the students can easily understand the subject. Exams are conducted by our college management.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because I am interested in it. I wish the companies that are hiring us would give a decent package. Events and fests occur occasionally.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: I like this college and the hostel.

detailed_review.Placements: In CSE, the placement rate in our college is currently 83.8 percent. The highest package is 33 LPA. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA. The average package is 5 LPA. Top recruiters are ServiceNow and Autodesk. Recently, a student got an internship at Google, and another student got an internship at Flipkart.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college Wi-Fi speed is 300 Mbps. We have many libraries, computer labs, and every classroom has its own Wi-Fi. We have good places like canteens with the names Ball Canteen and Pencil Canteen, shaped like a ball and a pencil. Our hostels are secure. There is 24-hour security, and the boys' hostel has the advantage of library access till 10:00 PM – 11:00 PM. It has a 24/7 medical facility at Apollo Shine. We also have a gym in the boys' hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are well-qualified for the first year. From the second year, teachers are not knowledgeable about the academics, where the T-Hub comes into light. We have very knowledgeable teachers for CSE and computer science-related students in T-Hub. But in academics, the staff is not well-qualified. For the first year, it is okay.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because of my interest in AI. I hope second-year teachers improve when I go to the second year. Occasionally, events occur, and we enjoy them.

college_info.college_name: Aditya University Course Admission 2025: Eligibility, Selection, Application Process

faqs.question: Are admissions open at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Aditya University admission is open. The university offers BTech, MTech, BBA, etc., courses at the UG and PG level. Apart from the UG and PG courses, the university also offers diploma and PhD courses.  The application process at Aditya University is an offline procedure.

faqs.question: What is the fee for various courses at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: The university offers BTech, MTech, BBA, etc., courses at the UG and PG level. Students can check the table below to know some of the course-wise total tuition fee from the table presented below: Course Name Total Tuition Fee BTech INR 2 lakh-INR 11 lakh MTech INR 1.1 lakh-INR 2 lakh MBA INR 2 lakh-INR 5 lakh This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for various courses at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission at Aditya University, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the university. For UG courses, candidates must complete Class 12. For PG courses, aspirants must pass graduation. Students can check the table below to know some of the course-wise selection criteria: Course Name Eligibility BTech Class 12 with a 45% aggregate with Physics & Mathematics as compulsory subjects MTech Graduation with a 50%-60% aggregate MBA Graduation with a 60% aggregate MCA Graduation with a 60% aggregate

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to B.Tech at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: No, candidates are not allowed for direct admission at Aditya University. For BTech course admission, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the university. Aspiarnts should pass Class 12 with a 45% aggregate with Physics & Mathematics as compulsory subjects. The admission criteria for the course is AP EAMCET + Counselling/Merit.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission to B.Tech at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: Yes, to enrol for an BTech course at Aditya University, candidates must sit and appear for the entrance exam. The selection criteria for the BTech course is AP EAMCET + counselling/Merit. Apart from the selection criteria, candidates must complete Class 12 with a 45% aggregate with Physics & Mathematics as compulsory subjects.

faqs.question: Is M.Tech available at Aditya University?
faqs.answer: Yes, MTech course is available at Aditya University. Aditya University offers a two-year MTech course at the PG level. To be eligible for the award of the degree, candidates shall complete the course in a maximum period of two years from the date of enrolment for the first semester of the course. Candidates must pass graduation (common eligibility) to apply for the MTech course.

rows: A Business Analyst is a professional who works within an organisation to analyze, understand, and document the business processes and systems.

An Investment Banker is a finance professional who works within an investment bank or a financial institution, specializing in providing financial advisory services and raising capital for corporations, governments, and other entities.
The CFO is a high-level executive responsible for managing an organization's financial actions, strategies, and operations.

college_info.college_name: Ajeenkya DY Patil University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
Ajeenkya DY Patil University (ADYPU) is a private university located in Lohegaon, Pune, Maharashtra. It belongs to the DY Patil Group. It is officially certified by the University Grants Commission. Founded in 2015 under Maharashtra Government Act, ADYPU was founded by the former governor of Bihar Padmashree Dr DY Patil. Courses like undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral levels are offered.
ADYPU provides these courses through its various schools, such as the School of Management, School of Information Technology, DYPDC School of Design, School of Hotel Management, School of Engineering, School of Film and Media, School of Liberal Arts, School of Law and School of Architecture. The highest and average packages offered were INR 1.20 crore per annum and INR 6.50 LPA, respectively. See the key highlights about Ajeenkya DY Patil University Lohegaon:
ACET, GATE, CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ ATMA/ CMAT
Collaborations (EdX Partnerships)
- Massachusetts Institute of Technology
- University of Central Lancashire
Pushpalata DY Patil Scholarship Program

college_info_program.intro:
The flagship programmes offered at Ajeenkya DY Patil University include BDes, BTech and MBA, among others. For BDes, students must have passed Class 12 in any stream or 3-year full-time diploma. On the other hand, for the BTech admissions, students must have passed Class 12 or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects & Chemistry/ Biotechnology/ Biology or any technical vocational subjects as optional with a minimum of 50% aggregate (45% reserved category and a person with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only).
Students seeking to get into any of the offered courses are required to fulfil the eligibility requirements before applying. Candidates can check the popular programmes offered at Ajeenkya DY Patil University in the table provided below:

Ajeenkya DY Patil University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is decent, but if you have a good score, find better options.

detailed_review.Placements: I am doing a BE in mechanical engineering at Ajeenkya Dy Patil School of Engineering in Pune. This is a decent college, according to the cut-off. College is average according to the package. The average package here in mechanical engineering is about 3-4 LPA. Many average and some good companies visit the campus, but not all students get a good package on campus, it is decent according to the cut-off. Nestled, Wipro, Tata Motors, TCS, and HDFC Life companies like this have picked students from our college with a good package, but it can also be off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good, classrooms are also decent, but the auditorium hall is small, according to the college and the number of students. The hostel is very good, security and cleanliness are good in the hostel, but the mess is not that good. For events and sports, the college hosts many cultural events, sports tournaments of BGMI, like game downloads, that happen on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are not that good, but some teachers are really good and passionate about their job. The college conducts many exhibitions for students to make some creative projects and gives prizes to those who participate. The course curriculum is relevant, and students get ready. The difficulty of the semester is not that hard, but if you have some knowledge and are decent students, you can easily score well on the exam just by smart studying 2-3 days before the exam.
detailed_review.Other: I am pursuing a BE in mechanical engineering, and I chose this course because I love robotics and automation. Actually, this college is not good for core branches like mechanical, civil, and electrical, but it is slowly getting better in that. CS aids like branches are better in this college. Many events, festivals, and extracurricular activities happen in large numbers. Scholarship is also good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: The curly tables of ADYPU.

detailed_review.Placements: As of now, the college placement doesn't seem good to me, like the placement rates are very low, to be honest. Mostly, the company doesn't take mass recruitment from the college. The highest package that I know is somewhere around 50 LPA. The good thing is that college provides placement preparation. The lowest I would say was around 5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has good infrastructure, but it doesn't seem to work every time. For example, we have Wi-Fi everywhere in college, but it doesn't give the desired speed for completing your work. The classrooms and library are good. The hostel infrastructure is good, but guests have the same problem of not having good facilities. Even the mess food is not included in the hostel, so you have to buy it. Medical facilities are not that good, but they will work.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are the best assets of the institution. They are all highly qualified, supportive, and readily available to help students succeed. The coursework is also effective, preparing you well for the relevant industry. While the exams are difficult and require significant effort, you SEE this rigour as a positive challenge that motivates hard work. The unique passing criteria, which require you to pass all three individual semester exams, ensure high standards are maintained.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course by looking into the future, as I say, in the coming time, there will be a vast demand for this. The things that colleges need to improve are their internet connectivity. Then come the college events, which ensure that there is a good amount of events and other activities around the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering (System Engineering)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of faculty members, excellent placements in 2024, and really good.

detailed_review.Placements: College placements for my course are about 65%, and the university assured us about the placements. The highest package is 55 LPA, and the lowest is around 12 LPA. Internship opportunities are pushed, the seniors say there are many internship programs. Companies such as Tata, Infosys, Wipro, Google, Amazon, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities of the university have been top-notch. It has excellent campus. We have simple and clean classrooms. There is a spacious library. A lot of indoor facilities are also provided. Hostel is 4/5, there are a lot of cafes around the campus so it has become a hangout spot in leisure time. Sports facilities have been solid, good coaches, separate grounds for every sport, such as basketball court, pickleball court, football ground, and cricket ground.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and staff have been friendly and extremely helpful. They guide every step. They are competent and have a lot of experience. Teaching quality is excellent. Every lecture is not only teaching-related, but they also makes it more eventful and fun. The exams are not as difficult as I expected them to be. Teachers provide notes and question banks before the exam to give us an idea about how the exam will look.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering (Information Systems)
reviews.review_title: If you are seeking a decent placement and good faculty members, you can go with ADYPU.

detailed_review.Placements: ADYPU offers impressive infrastructure, supportive faculty members, and good placement. Apart from the job, ADYPU also ensures to build and boost your skills and to make you industry-ready. In 2025, many of my seniors grabbed high-paying jobs and internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides good infrastructure, and also study environment is pretty much happening. As of 2025, the classrooms and study environment are also very good. Hostel facility is also nice, and rooms are big enough for you not to have any trouble. If you are well-skilled to make a good company around you, then the years of hostel life will also be fun.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum that ADYPU provides is well-structured and designed to balance our practical and theoretical knowledge in our course. Exams are conducted semester-wise in which internals, practical exam marks, assessment marks, and assignment marks are included.

reviews.course: B.Com (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Strong placements and a great place to learn.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement cell at our university is quite proactive. It starts preparing us from the third year itself with aptitude training, mock interviews, and resume-building workshops. For our course 85 percent of students who opt for placements get placed successfully. The highest package offered is around 18 LPA from a major product-based company while the lowest is 3.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has modern classrooms equipped with smart boards and projectors. The entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled with decent speed, which is a great help for research and project work. Labs are excellent. We have specialized labs for various domains, including an Apple Lab for iOS development, a Data Science lab with high-end systems, and robotics labs. The central library is huge and well-stocked with a vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most professors are highly qualified, with many holding PhDs from reputed institutions and possessing significant industry experience. They are approachable and always willing to clear our doubts, even outside lecture hours. The teaching quality is generally excellent, with a good balance between theoretical concepts and practical application.
detailed_review.Other: Placements are good. I wish the university would bring in more top-tier product-based companies for campus recruitment. Also, more frequent industrial visits to major tech hubs would be a great addition to the curriculum with better real-world exposure.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering (Information Systems)
reviews.review_title: Strong placements, supportive faculty, and a modern campus for tech enthusiasts.

detailed_review.Placements: I am satisfied with the placement opportunities in the B.Tech computer science course at Ajeenkya DY Patil University. About 70-97 percent of us got placed with the highest package reaching 1.2 crore per annum and average offers in the 4.5 LPA - 6.5 LPA range. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Amazon, Accenture and Wipro. Around 70-90 percent of students also secured internships at leading organizations like ISRO, DRDO, Google and Microsoft. The main roles offered are software engineer, data analyst and full stack developer. Overall the course offers good industry exposure and career growth opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities for my B.Tech computer science course at Ajeenkya DY Patil University is modern and comfortable. We have campus-wide Wi-Fi, well-equipped computer labs, spacious digital classrooms and a library with extensive print and online resources. Hostel rooms are clean and have basic amenities. The mess food is decent offering veg and non-veg options, though sometimes repetitive. The canteen serves a variety of snacks. Medical facilities are available on campus for emergencies. There are also good sports facilities like cricket and football grounds and courts for basketball and badminton, allowing a good balance between academics and extracurricular activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in the B.Tech computer science course at Ajeenkya DY Patil University are helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable, often providing personal guidance and support. The teaching quality is good, with an emphasis on both theoretical knowledge and practical skills. The curriculum is updated and industry-oriented, covering relevant areas like data science, AI, and cloud computing, which helps in making students job-ready. Semester exams are moderate difficult and test our conceptual understanding as well as application skills. The minimum passing marks are around 35%, but most students clear exams comfortably, resulting in a high overall pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the B.Tech computer science course at Ajeenkya DY Patil University because of my passion for technology and the course's focus on both core and emerging fields like AI and data science. The best things about my course are the industry-relevant curriculum, supportive faculty, hands-on learning through labs and projects, and strong placement opportunities. However, I wish the course had more elective options and updated some lab equipment. The campus is lively with diverse events, fests, and extracurricular activities. The atmosphere is friendly, the connectivity to Pune is good, and scholarship opportunities are available for deserving students.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: Law student life at DY Patil Law College.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements here are decent; we have many top-tier firms and companies like Infosys, Wiksate Solutions hiring law students and offering roles like legal researcher, contracts, and emerging manager etc. They also offer good CTC of up to 8 LPA, and the lowest being 3 LPA. Every year, almost 70% of the batch gets placements, and others go for higher studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is great for law students here; we have a moot court hall, a seminar hall, and even classrooms that are quite spacious. We have projectors in each classroom, and the library is also well-stocked with the latest books. It consists of many national and international journals, Supreme Court cases, bare facts, etc. Hostels are also clean; some rooms have attached washrooms as well, but we are provided with fans in them, not ACs. The food is also good in the hostel, and both veg and non-veg options are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are great. They are from top NLUs and have great knowledge and understanding of their topics. They also hold many Ph.D. degrees in their fields, yet they are friendly and always easy to approach in case of doubt. The curriculum also covers all the major laws being taught, like institutional law, family law, etc. Additionally, we have electives that cover topics that are most usable in the practical world, like cyber law, human rights law, and along with all this, we have separate training for moots, drafting, ADR, etc.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd is mixed. Students are mostly local Maharashtrians, and others are from across India, like one of my friends from Bengaluru and some from Tamil Nadu as well. We have events throughout our college semester with college fest, extra law fest being held, and other events such as legal campus, moot competitions, workshops, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering (Information Systems)
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is a nice college to get admission.

detailed_review.Placements: About 30% of students get placed. The highest package offered is 2 LPA. Tech Mahindra, Infosys, and Accenture are some of the top recruiting companies. Roles offered are Data Analyst, Web Developer, and Full Stack Developer. Almost 70% of students get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, there are separate hostels for boys and girls. Wi-Fi facility are available. The mess is located near the hostel, and hygiene is maintained while preparing the food. We also have labs and a library on campus. There are separate coaches for different sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at our college are very helpful and well-qualified. The curriculum of our course is relevant and covers almost all topics related to the subject. The passing criteria for the semester is 45 marks out of 150. Exams are quite difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I get this college based on my JEE marks. I think there is a little lack in management, which can be improved. They conduct two main fests annually, and they attract a great crowd.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: ADYPU - Law faculty members are really good.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, not much of students get campus placements but university has internship faculty members. They try to give internship opportunities to few students. Internship opportunities are given mostly under district advocates. Top roles that can be offered are that you can prepare for UPSC or judiciary exams for which there is a separate mentorship program free of cost.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is top-notch. We have smart classes, classrooms are clean with proper lighting and Wi-Fi. Library doesn't have much books but online soft copy will be provided. Lexis Nexis is available for all law students free of cost. Computer facility is also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Law faculty members are very helpful, knowledgeable, and approachable. Semester exams are not too difficult as you are provided with options for each essay type of questions which make it easy. Internal exams are also easy. The average pass percentage is 70%.
detailed_review.Other: For law course, there are very less events and no freshers' party.

reviews.course: BCA in Cloud Technology and Information Security
reviews.review_title: My experience as a first year student at ADYPU.

detailed_review.Placements: There are a total of 60 students in our batch. The minimum eligibility for this course is more than 50% above in 12th grade. BCA AIML is an IT course involving new and relevant topics and concepts according to industry standards, mainly focusing on coding and programming.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in some places is really impressive. However, it is lacking in some places. Also, there is a network problem in our area, and the Wi-Fi is not up to the mark. The canteens and mess are available. There are a few games like 8-ball pool and punching bags available for students. The fans and computer are not performing well in the dental building.
detailed_review.Faculty: I don't think the exams conducted are very well, they seem traditional and not very impressive. However, the course is fairly good. Not every teacher is equipped with every necessary skill, and lack in many places.

reviews.course: BCA in Mobile Application and Cloud Technology
reviews.review_title: Students here learn mobile application development.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students got placed in my course. The highest package is 20 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. As of now, I don't remember the companies. 50-60% of students got internships in small startups in Pune. Top role offered in my course is mobile application developed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, there are several facilities. They are excellent like good Wi-Fi, neat and clean labs, classrooms, and library. Hostel are also good and hygienic. Mess food is also good in taste. There are medical facilities provided in the college. Sports and games are also conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are also helpful and well-qualified. They know about the industry. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is also relevant, and the syllabus is up to date for the industry. Semester exam difficulty is easy to medium. All the students in my course pass all the exams.

reviews.course: BBA in Sales and Marketing
reviews.review_title: Ajeenkya DY Patil University.

detailed_review.Placements: This is a nice college with good infrastructure. The management of the colleges is very good. Placements of this college are about 70%. The highest package is 18 LPA. The minimum is 4 or 5 LPA. The average package is around 7 or 8 LPA. A good part is that you can get your internship in the summer and winter. You can also do part-time jobs. They will support you. 90% of students get internships and 70% placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very nice. The availability of courses is vast. The hostel is also quite student-friendly like Rs. 1,70,000 per semester. You will not get food included and not get laundry included so it is on a costly side. They have those facilities. You can avail and there are many like food stalls and restaurants in the college. There is stationary and everything a student needs in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are Ph.D. in the subject they are teaching. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students interested. Exams are mid-level and very professionally conducted. The quality of teachers is very good. 99% of students pass the semester exam. Latest knowledge is provided.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering (Information Systems)
reviews.review_title: Fine faculty members, average placements, below average hostel, and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In CSE, more than 60% of students are placed and top package around 26 LPA on campus. Mostly students are placed and some are not in the placement sessions. The lowest package is 3.6 LPA, and average package ranges from 5 LPA - 6 LPA. Recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Accenture, and AWS. 40% of the seniors got internships in 3rd year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The students say the hostel is average and too much messed up. They prefer a flat or PG/hostel outside the campus because it is cheap and has a good return on investment. Also, the charge for college hostel is too high and they don't even provide food at that price. The food on the campus canteen is too expensive. You will get laundry service of Rs 26,000 just for some 30+ laundry in an academic year, which is the worst price return.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and qualified. The guidance provided by them is also fine. In my case, it surely makes the students industry-ready. Many co-curricular courses and clubs are there for such things. The exam difficulty level is from upper moderate to tougher level. The passing is 34% for every exam but it depends on written and practical papers so it deviated drastically.

reviews.course: MBA in Marketing
reviews.review_title: Most admiring envy with a lot of memories.

detailed_review.Placements: Training for placements was conducted thrice a week, usually at the end of the week, sometimes they conduct training at the weekends. Most students are graduated from college and few of them got chance to work as interns abroad. It was one of the top-ranked colleges, especially for its placement works. (Specialized for MBA).
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Approximately it's very nearer to the center of the city so students from various locations can do their courses. Some safety measures and emergency equipment were set up in a college as a precautionary measure. Also, some students from the other states were studying here, and they were helped with the required needs.
detailed_review.Faculty: To score higher grades in the exams was very simple and easier when we studied every lesson without any delay. I am amazed with grading systems that were introduced, also teachers had arranged the feedback portals for collecting students' feedback.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure but weak management .

detailed_review.Placements: The average package of our college might range from 7 to 8 lakhs. Companies like Mahindra have visited our college and offered job opportunities. 30 to 40% of students have been placed from our college. The internship is usually off-campus, which we have to do in the last year of our college, and it also has marks.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure of our college are quite nice. The buildings are posh. The surroundings are clean and green. The facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are adequate for students. The quality of facilities in the hostels is good but quite expensive. The quality of food is also nice, but it is not included in the fees for a hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The difficulty of the semester depends on the exams. From unit tests to end term, it gradually increases in difficulty from moderate and easy to somewhat difficult criteria. The teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready as they provide the training program in the last year of college before the placement and interviews.
detailed_review.Other: I've always been interested in biology; that's why I have opted for this course in biotechnology. The placements can be improved for our field. Events and fests are amazing. There are no scholarships available, but extracurricular activities are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Software Engineering
reviews.review_title: We have a personal hilltop.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has a decent placement rate, the average package last year was from somewhere around 4.5 LPA to 6.5 LPA and the highest placement was around 21 LPA. There is some criteria for eligibility to seat for campus placements. Companies like Capgemini, ITC, Infosys, TCS offer jobs in their companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every class has a projector and Wi-Fi extender, there are common libraries, Apple labs, computer labs, digital classrooms, etc. The infrastructure seems fresh and new and decent for students. There is a canteen named D'cafe which is decent, not that good, but there are options outside the college and pocket-friendly too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are either Ph.D. holders or pursuing Ph.D. They are masters in their respective fields and they are very supportive. Some of them are just extra strict, which makes students dicey towards them, but quite decent faculty. Exams are held by the university itself and checked also by the university. The difficulty level of end semester is 3/5, which means moderately difficult, but still many students are unaware and have failed the exams.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd here is also decent as the college is located near the outskirts of Pune city, but still, it is able to provide all the necessary facilities like Wi-Fi, drinkable water, etc. I chose this course as I was attracted to the courses they offered, some of them being exclusive only to this college in Pune. The campus social life is awesome as there are fests and events happening every month.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Faculty members are supportive, good facilities for students, placements are average.

detailed_review.Placements: In ADYPU, I am doing my course in B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. Around 81% of students got their placement. The rest either went for higher studies, went for start-ups, or failed. The highest package offered was Rs. 1.2 Cr LPA, and the average package was 6.5 LPA. Over 500 companies visited, such as HCL Technologies, XL Dynamics, TCS, Wipro, etc. Talking about internships, they are only offered in the final year of the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: ADYPU has almost every facility you can think of, including hostels, canteen, mess, medical facilities, and sports ground for each sport. Our university has smart classes, Wi-Fi, moot court area, jamming area, elevator, canteens, library, and everything important for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: This university has amazing faculty members and professors who are ready to help and encourage at every stage for the development of the student during the course. The whole plan of the course and curriculum is to make the student industry-ready; they only and only focus on skill development.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because in the future AI is going to be in demand. And there will be a need for a good and skilled AI Engineer. The professors and teachers who are there to help at any time is the best thing about this course in my opinion. This course provides us with a lot of good things and resources so a better course than this wasn't possible. Cultural fests and events take place regularly on our campus which de-stresses the students and they are really good. The campus is located near the hills, so connectivity from one place to another will require you to go through hill areas and muddy roads, but the municipal corporation is trying to improve the connectivity. The campus surroundings are really beautiful and become requisite especially in the monsoon season.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering Design
reviews.review_title: ADYPU has great campus and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has a decent placement and provides around 75% placements with 700+ companies visiting here. The top recruiting companies are Tata, TCS and Infosys. The average salary offered here is 5 to 6 Lacs. We have better opportunities to shape our career. The top roles offered here are that of Managers. Higher posts are also offered based on skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a huge campus and infrastructure is also good. The Wi-Fi is always working and we can access it directly without any authentication. The college has 3-4 labs for students. It also has a huge library for students. Hostel facilities are also good and the members are also supportive. It has good canteen facilities. Hot water is also available.  Cleaning staff is there for daily cleaning. We have a separate ground for each sport and also have hall for indoor games. We have a big medical room for medical emergency and also buses are well maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: We have very good faculty members. They are highly qualified and knowledgeable. They share their experience with us to make our task easier. Also, they are supportive. The course is relevant to open different career paths. and have good scope in future. The course provides practical knowledge and make us industry ready. The semester exams are conducted by the university so obviously it is hard. The pass percentage is good ranging between 80 to 90%.
detailed_review.Other: I had an amazing interest in practical knowledge. The best thing about the course is that it makes us industry ready. However, the course needs improvement in terms of assignments and projects.  We get to participate in many extra-curricular activities and clubs. I got government scholarship here. The environment is decent and does not have rush.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A college with good infrastructure and campus, and I am satisfied because of good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of the students got placed. Around 90% of our batch got placed in companies like Pinnacle Industries, TVS, BMW, Kyance, and Veritas. Most of them got a good CTC ranging from 3 LPA - 18 LPA. Our college arranges internship programs for the batch. I had done it from Mahagenco.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is great. All machines and the apparatus required are available for practicals. Wi-Fi is available across the campus. The library is quite huge with all available books and journals. All sports are available. There are separate grounds. The swimming pool is available. Students can play indoor games. Medical facilities are available. Our canteen provides delicious food. There is an open cafe inside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very experienced and knowledgeable. The course helped me relevantly as a mechanical engineer should be. Semester exams are quite easy. The passing percentage is 40%. The faculty in the college is very supportive. Moreover, they focus on practical knowledge that is useful in your future industrial work.
detailed_review.Other: I think mechanical engineering is the best and evergreen branch, no matter what goes around the world. There are regular events, fests, and other curricular activities held on the campus. The campus is open for any branch students where you can showcase your talent. The thing I like the most is the campus full of greenery and between the mountains surrounded by the pride-world city. The campus is close to the Pune International Airport.

reviews.course: MBA in Business Innovation and Strategy
reviews.review_title: The campus is around the mountains which creates a great atmosphere.

detailed_review.Placements: Many companies like TCS, Infosys, Accenture, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, Amazon, Skoda, etc., visit the college for placements. Companies offer various roles to the students in placements. Students should maintain a minimum of 7 CGPA for placements. From 3rd year students are eligible for internships. The training and placement cell works very hard to bring the placements up to mark.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has a great campus life as we see the sunrise and sunset in the mountains. The climate is very nice in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: My faculty members are new and great. The course was launched this year, so students may not find any issues regarding the teaching faculty members. All the faculty members are very helpful so we can discuss our doubts regarding the topics very easily. Students gather and discuss the problems.
detailed_review.Other: Many clubs are there, such as GDSC, AWS Cloud, a Robotics club, etc. There are two major fests one is Impetus a sports event and another is Ablaze a cultural event.

college_info.college_name: Ajeenkya DY Patil University Admissions 2025: Eligibility, Process, Fee, Dates, Selections

faqs.question: How can I get admission to Ajeenkya DY Patil University?
faqs.answer: To get admission into any of the courses offered at Ajeenkya DY Patil University, students must satisfy the criteria of the desired course. Eligible students can proceed with the admission process of the university by registering for the ACET exam. Those who clear the entrance are contacted by the admission counsellors to schedule the PI round. Students looking to apply for the MBA/ Design courses need to appear for the other selection rounds as well. The next step involves counselling for seat allotment. Selected students need to accept the Admission Offer Letter provided by the university to get into the course of choice.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is conducted for admission to Ajeenkya DY Patil University?
faqs.answer: Ajeenkya DY Patil University conducts ADYPU Common Entrance Test (ACET) to shortlist students for admission to various courses. It is a computer-based test conducted online across various centres. Students looking to get into any of the courses offered at the university need to appear and clear the test. This test is valid for the programmes offered by any of the constituent schools of the university. Interested students can visit the official website of the university to apply for the exam.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MBA at ADYPU?
faqs.answer: To get admission in the MBA programme offered by Ajeenkya DY Patil University, students must have passed graduation from a recognised university. The next step is to appear for the ACET test conducted by the university. Those who qualify the entrance exam must appear for the GDPI round conducted by the university. Selected students must participate in counselling for seat allotment. The final step is to pay the admission fee as prescribed by the university.

faqs.question: What all MBA specialisations does ADYPU offer?
faqs.answer: Ajeenkya DY Patil University offers several MBA programmes across a wide range of specialisations. The eligibility is same across all of the offered courses. Find below the list of MBA specialisations offered at ADYPU :

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for admission to MBA at ADYPU?
faqs.answer: To get admission in the MBA programme offered at Ajeenkya DY Patil University, students must have passed graduation in the relevant field with a minimum aggregate of 50% from a recognised university. The minimum aggregate for reserved candidates is 45%. Further, students must appear and clear the ACET exam for MBA conducted by the university followed by Group Discussion and Personal Interview rounds for final selection. Eligible students can visit the official website of the university and apply for the MBA programme by providing the required information.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for MBA at Ajeenkya DY Patil University?
faqs.answer: The eligibility criteria for MBA at Ajeenkya DY Patil University is a Bachelor's degree in any discipline from a recognised university with a minimum of 50% marks (45% in case of candidate belonging to the reserved category and person with disability belonging to Maharashtra State only), ACET for MBA, Group Discussion, and Personal Interview.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in BDes at ADYPU?
faqs.answer: Students seeking to enrol in the BDes course offered at ADYPU must satisfy the admission requirements as specified by the university to be eligible for admission. The basic eligibility is to pass Class 12 or equivalent with a minimum aggregate of 45% (minimum aggregate of 40% for reserved candidates) from a recognised board. Further, students need to clear the ADYPU ADAT (Design Aptitude Test) followed by appearing for the Studio Test and Personal Interview round conducted by the university. Students who meet the Ajeenkya DY Patil University BDes eligibility can visit the official website of the university and apply for the course.

faqs.question: How to apply for BDes at Ajeenkya DY Patil University?
faqs.answer: The application to Ajeenkya DY Patil University BDes is online. Aspirants, need to apply for the course at the official website by paying an application fee. Students can check the steps below to know the step-wise ADYPU BDes application process : Step one: Visit the official website. Step two: Go to the admission tab. Step three: Click on “Apply for Admission." Step four: Register with basic details to get application credentials. Step five: Login to fill out and complete the application form. Step six: Pay the application and complete the form.

faqs.question: What all BDes courses does ADYPU offer?
faqs.answer: Ajeenkya DY Patil University provides several BDes courses to its students. Those who clear the selection rounds of the course can visit the official website of the university to apply for the programme. ADYPU offers the following BDes specialisations to its students:

faqs.question: Can I get into ADYPU for LLB without CLAT?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can get into the LLB programme offered at Ajeenkya DY Patil University without appearing for the CLAT exam. The university accepts students on the basis of their entrance exam (ACET for Law) conducted by the university. Those who clear then entrance exam are then called for personal interview for final shortlisting. Hence, there is no need to appear for the CLAT exam. Eligible students can apply for the LLB course by visiting the official website of the university.

faqs.question: Does ADYPU offer any seat reservations?
faqs.answer: Yes, Ajeenkya DY Patil University (ADYPU) does reserve seats for certain categories. The reservation policy is valid only for domiciles of Maharashtra. Students who are either from or outside Maharashtra belonging to SC/ ST/ DTNT/ OBC must submit the caste and validity certificate to avail of the reservations. The certificate must not be older than six months from the date of submission. Eligible students will get a relaxation of 5% in the minimum percentage required for the course to which the reservation is applicable. Find below details regarding ADYPU seat reservation : Note: This information is taken from official sources and is subject to change.

faqs.question: Does Ajeenkya DY Patil University offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes, Ajeenkya DY Patil University does offer scholarships to economically weaker students who are permanent residents of Maharashtra. These schemes are provided to financially aid students who are meritorious. To avail of these schemes, students are advised to visit the official website of the university. It is important that the students fulfil the eligibility criteria before applying for the scheme. The university follows the guidelines of the Government of Maharashtra.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The university library has the collection of books, periodicals and visual resources on a variety of subjects. The library has a subscription to electronic resources from across the world including networked databases and electronic journals.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The university provides accommodation on campus for students wishing to stay on campus. Well-appointed, shared accommodation grouped in clusters with common bathrooms and kitchens are available. It is also combined with facilities for the cafeteria and medical assistance for the students.

The scholarship programs of ADYPU intend to encourage students from different socio-cultural and economic backgrounds and help them pursue their educational goals. The university offers various types of scholarships, which are merit based as well as need based.

ADYPU offers many scholarships and one of them is Police Scholarship Program. This scholarship is exclusively offered to the wards of in-service Maharashtra Police Personnel. The scholarship criteria for the Police Scholarship Program is presented below:

In order to apply for Ajeenkya DY Patil University Police Scholarship Program candidates need to fill a google application form that will be available on the official website. For more details, candidates can write to policescholarships@adypu.edu.in.

college_info.college_name: Amity University Patna: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Rankings

highlights.summary:
Established in 2017, Amity University Patna is a core part of the Amity Education Group. Amity Patna is recognised by the University Grants Commission and, operates in a similar manner as the other campuses of the Amity Group. Amity Patna offers more than 50 courses at UG and PG levels. The flagship course offered at Aminty Patna are BTech, BSc, and MBA. Amity Patna is based on 110 acres and operates with the colleges as under:
Amity Patna offers UG and PG courses across various streams, including Engineering, Science, Arts, Commerce, Management, Design, Law and many more. Amity Patna admissions are offered entrance based. Admission for MBA is based on a valid score of entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/ GMAT other than that all direct admission is offered based on the merit performance of candidates. Amity University Patna also offers scholarships to meritorious students. Candidates can check the highlights of Amity University, Patna in the following table:
Amity University Patna Highlights 2026

college_info_program.intro:
Some of the popular programmes of Amity University Patna are MBA, BSc, BTech among others. Amity Patna conducts the application process for various courses in both online and offline modes. Students get the application form from any Amity information centre and submit it after filling it with the relevant information. The university offers BTech specialisation in various fields such as CSE, Electronics Engineering, Civil Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, and others.
