reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Amazing! The best time of my life in this college with my friends and teachers and somebody special.

detailed_review.Placements: Total 100 students in my batch from 2022 to 2025, the reach of the youth is very high for this college. The average package offered to students in this course is 14 LPA. Tech Mahindra and TCS are the top recruiting companies for this course, with a placement rate of 100% for software development and data analysis positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classroom is big and beautiful, and the lab is equipped with the most advanced computers and software. Everything is good here, along with the environment, faculty members, and facilities. Activities are held over a short period of time. The staff is good, very cooperative, and supportive. Studies and activities are very well organized without any nuisance, and tests are held.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are very supportive, and reliable sources are provided. They give us time-to-time motivation and inspiration. They make every session interactive, and without hampering us, they clear all the doubts very nicely. I personally feel very good to be here.
detailed_review.Other: Hi, my name is Aniket Kumar. I love computers and coding, so I think I will pursue a career in computer science. However, I did not have good marks, so I did not enter any big engineering college. Then I found a short-term computer course that has everything I like, such as computers and coding. After that, I searched for the best BCA college near me and found out that a big brand was coming to Bihar, and that name is Amity University. It is one of the top universities in the world. I went to the college, completed my Bachelor's degree, and got placed.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the college is really nice.

detailed_review.Placements: We have 40 students in our class. The highest package is 5 LPA and the lowest is 2.5 LPA. Companies like TCS come for recruitment, and nearly all students get internships from our batch. The roles being offered depend on the personal skills of each student and the requirements of the company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available in our course are good.  We have very large classrooms, which are really good, and have AC installed in every classroom. Additionally, there are many extracurricular activities in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are nice and helpful. They are well-qualified and take care of us very well. They are always ready to help and are highly knowledgeable. Instead of being bookish, they teach us in a way that will be more helpful in our upcoming careers. We have really good professors, and other languages, such as French, are also being taught.
detailed_review.Other: I chose MCA because I have an interest in that field. The best things about my course are that we have really nice teachers, and the college is also very good.

reviews.course: B.A. in Administration
reviews.review_title: My own life college experience.

detailed_review.Placements: I'm currently enrolled in the B.A. Administration program at the Amity School of Civil Services in Patna. This unique course is extremely helpful in preparing for the UPSC and other government exams. It is a well-designed course that is very useful for government job aspirants.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms at this school are well-structured with comfortable seating, good lighting, and a proper Wi-Fi system. Each classroom also has a smart board and whiteboard. The labs are well-maintained, and the school has good air conditioning and facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members at Amity University, Patna are very good. They are well-qualified and professional teachers, and most of them are from DU or BHU. We won't find any issues with their professionalism or personality. Semester exams are held strictly under two invigilators and a pen.
detailed_review.Other: Small campus.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.com. Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Got a very good college with the best faculty members, really good infrastructure, and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 60-70% of students got placed at reputed companies from our college across every course. The highest package for our course is 5-6 lakh p/a, and the lowest is 2-3 lakh p/a. Apart from placement opportunities, our college also provides internship opportunities to students in every course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have good facilities in our college, including fully centralized AC classrooms, smart boards, and projectors; the infrastructure is quite good. We enjoy a pleasing atmosphere in our college as well as a quiet environment in our library, which helps us concentrate more on our studies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are very helpful and friendly. Our course curriculum is also very relevant to our practical experiences. The semester exams in our college are of moderate level, neither too easy nor too tough, and the pass percentage is almost 70-80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a great interest in the field of commerce and I also like accounts very much. The best thing about my course is that it provides me with a basic to advanced level of knowledge in the field of accounts.

reviews.course: BBA LL.B.(Hons)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the campus life and faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements:
200 students join this college every year, and apart from this, the reach of the youth is very high for this college.
The average package offered to students in this course is 14 LPA.
Mahindra is the top recruiting company for this course, with a placement rate of 100% for manager and HR positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good here, along with the environment, faculty members, and facilities. Activities are held over a short period of time. The staff is good, very cooperative, and supportive. Studies and activities are very well done without any nuisance, and tests are held.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very supportive, and reliable sources are provided. They give us time-to-time motivation and inspiration. They make every session interactive, and without hampering us, they clear all the doubts very nicely. I personally feel very good to be here.
detailed_review.Other: To become HR. More studies than extra curriculum.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Amity University Patna is a reputed educational organization providing various educational courses.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 10 students from my course got placed. The highest package was around 5 lacs per annum and the lowest package were around 2 lacs with an average package of 3 lacs. The only companies providing recruitments were sales companies. None of our students got internships. Top roles were of sales associate and manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The course offered is fully organized and has a systematic order. The content along with the syllabus is well explained and prescribed to the students. The college also provides Wi-Fi services to the students which is paid. The classrooms are fully furnished and eco friendly. It also provides ACs in all the classrooms. It also provides the facility of a library. It provides hostel facilities upon contacting the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful and also the graduates having Ph.Ds in their respective fields. The course curriculum is relevant to the students and also helps in industrial growth. Semester exams are held according to their respective schedules and are conducted in a fair way. The passing percentage is around 30%.
detailed_review.Other: I am quite interested in technology so I chose BCA. The campus crowd is from around the area. Many extra curricular activities are being conducted by the college.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Is Amity University Patna Worth It?

detailed_review.Placements: Around 15 to 20% students were placed in my batch. The highest package offered was around 6-7 Lacs per annum, the lowest package was around 1.5-2 Lacs per annum, and the average package was 3.5-4 Lacs. Top Recruiting companies were like Wipro, IDFC First Bank, Mahindra, etc. I don't think anyone got internship from my batch. Top roles offered was software engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They provides all the basic facilities like Wi-Fi, Labs, etc. There's also canteen available with varieties of food available with good quality. Whole college have A/C. The condition of the classroom, library and the labs were also good. Sports, Games, and Events keeps happening in a period of time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. The teachers came prepared for the topic which they were going to teach and they also provide proper notes and resources. The course cirrulum was relevant. I would say if students study properly then the exams are not that hard. The pass percentage was around 85-90% .
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was interested in computer and wanted to continue in that field. I think overall everything was good with the course, I only had the problem with the extra language subject which was French in my case. Events, Fest, Extracurricular Activities, etc. Keeps happening regularly so you will be engaged.

reviews.course: B.A.LLB (Hons)
reviews.review_title: Review of Amity University, Patna.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college started law in 2018. The salary package offered for the first batch of our branch was 6 LPA to 10 LPA. Our batch will get placements. Internships are provided in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college can be rated 4 stars because of its library. Hostels are not good. Its infrastructure is not great. Our college runs in 2 shifts, one is from 8 AM to 12:30 PM, and the other is from 1 PM to 6 PM because of the small building. Our campus has Wi-Fi, labs, and good classrooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our college are helpful and knowledgeable. The quality of teaching is very good and smooth.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as it is a professional course.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Our college has good faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 75% of students got placed in our college. Top recruiting companies are Kotak Mahindra, Flipkart, Amazon, Wipro, and Cisco. The highest salary package is 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is average. Our college provides many facilities. The hostel facility is available in our college. Around 100-150 students can accommodate in the canteen. Classrooms are equipped with air-conditioners. Lab facilities are available for students who want to learn some extra skills.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are well-qualified and helpful. Semester exams are difficult. The pass percentage is 95%.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this college because it is situated near my house and the academic curriculum is best. I opted for this course because it would improve my problem-solving skills. Students in Bihar acquire the Bihar students' credit card scheme.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for higher education.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Almost all students got internships in many companies like Amazon, Airtel, etc. Our college is good in terms of education. It has good environment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides us with all facilities. Classrooms are spacious and clean. The library has peaceful environment. Our college is Wi-Fi enabled. Our college has labs. The hostel is good, spacious, and clean. The food served in the hostel is good. They provide medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are qualified and helpful. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry-ready. Exams are not much difficult for students who prepare well. The pass percentage is 35%. The exam level is good.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course to become a software engineer. Our college has good value for money. Many events and fests are held in our college. Our college has good connectivity and surroundings. Many extracurricular activities are conducted in our college. The college crowd is good. Our course fee is affordable.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good college with average placement support and fees seems to be very high.

detailed_review.Placements: They offer placements in good companies like TCS, Infosys, Nagarro, etc. But most of them are looking for Software Developer Roles as a Fresher and student who has a keen interest in another domain have to go for Off Campus to start their career. Off campus jobs are very hard to find. So, they need to help their students who have a keen interest in another domain.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I had spend almost 2 years in the College. They have a good infrastructure but not in area wise. It's a only 5 floor building with a basement for parking, a cafeteria, etc. Classes are very good but the building is the main drawback. It is not like other campus, it's only a building.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are of above average quality. Some faculty members are great but some of them are burdened with the subject to teach to the students, that they never learnt in their entire life and they have to prepare for a subject, and then they need to teach the students. So, this is the major drawback of this campus.
detailed_review.Other: I have been a technical student since my school days. That's why I opt for Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering course in this College.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: A good faculty, facilities and a good learning environment make it a decent college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides a variety of placements for students. It has an almost 80–85% placement rate. The highest salary package offered for the BBA programme was 8 to 9 LPA. Almost 100% of students got internships from our courses. Top recruiting companies were Apple, Microsoft and Google.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, Classrooms, library all these are best in my college and other facilities like mess, sports, canteen, Medical all are top notch and there is a good clean surface where hygiene is mandatory. They follow the guidelines for corona precurction and they provide a good medical care .
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were helpful, qualified and knowledgable and their teaching quality was good. Courses are curriculum-relevant. It makes students industry-ready and the passout students are best among themselves. Exams are not too difficult, not easy and the pass percentage is 99%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have an interest in business. This degree has a lot of potential and can lead to fulfilling and satisfying careers in management. I wish I could improve campus of this course.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.com. Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Review about B. Com placements and college life.

detailed_review.Placements: There are average placements in B.Com. If you are joining, please enroll in the BBA course because it has very good placements than B.Com. In B.Com, the average salary package offered is 2 LPA - 3 LPA and in BBA, the average salary package offered is 4 LPA - 5 LPA. In B.Com, the highest salary package offered is 4 LPA - 5 LPA and in BBA, it is 10 LPA - 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All are good in our college. Wi-Fi and computer labs are good. Overall, the college infrastructure is very good. There are many events and activities conducted in our college which will help you to improve your CV. It is a small campus and there is no ground.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are from the best colleges and backgrounds. Maximum teachers are from BHU and they are very helpful. The semester exams are partially hard and partially easy. Its depends on your way of preparation. But overall, this college is good than other colleges in Patna.
detailed_review.Other: It is a good college.

reviews.course: BBA LL.B.(Hons)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely dissatisfied because of the infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: My batch is yet to graduate, so we have no idea about placements. But we heard from other departments that good companies such as Havels, etc., come to the college and hire students. Recently, a B.Tech graduate got placed with a package of 18 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has no infrastructure. The campus is very small. It has a small library. There are no sports facilities but a small seminar hall. A very small basement is available, and we come earlier to college to find a place for parking.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the teachers recently passed out of LL.M. degree. They lack experience, but they are helpful. The course curriculum is theoretical and doesn't make students industry-ready. The semester exams held in our college are direct questions and are very easy. The acceptable marks are anything more than zero, so the faculty members bar students due to attendance shortage.
detailed_review.Other: I am very passionate about social services, and I love speaking and writing. This course will let me pursue my passion. But our course doesn't provide any practical knowledge. The outside legal world is very different from the bookish knowledge. Therefore, practical knowledge should also be provided. The college organizes many events, but due to the lack of infrastructure, we don't enjoy very much.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Our college offers good infrastructure, facilities, faculty, and decent placements record.

detailed_review.Placements: The salary package offered is 8 LPA. Placements are not quite good. Very less companies come for placements with low salary packages for MBA students. The role of the job was also not worth it. Not everyone gets the relevant jobs worth studying. Only a few people get decent jobs with decent packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have good Wi-Fi and environment on the campus. There is a neat and clean canteen with hygiene food. Infrastructure is decent and it has a small space with limited classes but is neat and tidy. The labs are quite decent. Library is quite good with limited books. Food items are quite less as compared to other canteens.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are helpful knowledgeable and talented teachers. The exams are difficult as difficult question papers are set by the faculty. The pass percentage is 65%, but if someone fails in the examination, they get one or two chances for passing with decent numbers.
detailed_review.Other: More practical learnings should be given to students rather than theoretical knowledge.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Truth about amity university Patna .

detailed_review.Placements: There are vartioua types of roles that has been offered by various, companies big and small. Be it in the different sectors and various positions, but the package was not that handsome average was around 3lpa and maximum went to 8lpa, but overall it was good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are no college hostels, the university has tieups with private hostels. The food and lodging is also not that good. But if one has to move out of village then there is no other option and hasto somehow accommodate. The college does not have its own campus also.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exams are very easy one can easily pass. Students easily secure 7 to 8 CGPA and the passing CGPA is around 4. The exams are easy and people can easily get internal marks for that matter. And if one studies the PPT and other materials one can easily pass.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: It is an awesome college to make your life better.

detailed_review.Placements: The college was overall awesome. There are some positive and negative points of this college. The education department is very good, and placements are increasing day by day.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is much expensive for its infrastructure and facilities, but it doesn't have a good campus as there is only one building. If you want good infrastructure, then I suggest not to consider this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college mainly focuses on studies and practical knowledge, and it helps even after you pass out. The college provides a lot of good facilities for students. It provides the latest technologies and makes students technically strong. We got many well-qualified faculty members for our studies.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I am much interested in this course, and I like to work on computers. Overall, the course provided was awesome. Faculty members were very friendly that made learning everything with fun. I miss those days. Everything, including cultural programs, was awesome. All types of fests are conducted here.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: The best B-School in Patna, Bihar.

detailed_review.Placements: In my batch 2017-2020, the number of students placed was quite low because of covid. Somehow, the college managed to place 50% of the BBA batch. The average package offered was 3-3.5 LPA, The recruiting companies were Federal Bank, Vedantu, BYJU's and Asian Paints.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I don't think any other B-School in Bihar would be capable of providing such ambiance to their students as Amity, Patna, provides. We do have a big canteen, library, serval labs, and a huge parking area. For safety measures, every classroom is under CCTV surveillance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Almost every faculty here holds a PhD, and every single faculty will always be there to help you out instead of scolding you. They will help you in whatever situation you're in, and irrespective of whatever problems you face. You'll love the way they teach in the class.
detailed_review.Other: The college is very strict about attendance (75%) and uniform (Friday is an exception).

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Good college located in Patna.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are fine. Approximately 70% students are placed but few students prefer to study further. The highest package offered for BBA is around 8 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, IndusInd Bank and various other companies. The companies which come are generally from banking, automobiles and FMCG sector.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of college and hostel are very good. There is an auditorium which is fully centrally air-conditioned and there is Wi-Fi facility throughout the campus. The college has a proper facility and a good canteen on the campus. Some classes are also converted into smart classes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite good, helpful and easily accessible. They are qualified and knowledgeable too. Guest lectures are also organised by the college. Class schedules are strict and there is also lot of other activities organized to boost self confidence.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.com. Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Review of Amity University, Patna.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are very good. About 95,000 students get selected at the college. Companies like Infosys, etc., visit our college for placements. The average salary package offered to the students ranges from 5-10 LPA. Our college provides very good summer internship programs for the students. Most of the students get placement and internship at the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is quite small and not huge as compared to other Amity colleges. Labs and classrooms are very spacious. The hostel facility is provided for both boys and girls, and it is very convenient. Food served in the hostel mess is delicious and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has about 40-50 faculty members. Each teacher has done its PhD and MBA from reputed colleges. It is very convenient for the students to meet and talk with the faculty and discuss their problems. Faculty members are highly knowledgeable. They share their personal experience with the students for a better understanding. The course curriculum is good, and every course is divided into semesters. Every semester students have about 10-12 subjects based on credit.
detailed_review.Other: Our college organises many events and workshops like a marathon, candle march, etc. Every year fests are also organised, and the top celebrities visit our college for the performance. Our college also conducts a DJ night. Our college has a scholarship programme, and if a student scores more than 70% in the senior secondary exam, and the scholarship is provided on the basis of first-year marks of college.

admission.title: Amity University Patna Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: Amity Patna admissions are mainly entrance-based . The university offers over 12 programmes under several streams, including Engineering, Science, Arts, Commerce, Management, Design, Law and many more. The university offers various specialisations such as Applied Psychology, English, Information Technology, etc. However, admission for the BTech course is through Amity Joint Entrance Examination . Amity University Patna admission for MBA is based on a valid score of entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/GMAT. Interested candidates can visit the official website to apply for the course of their choice. Read the following article to get the details around the Amity University admission process for the Patna campus.

faqs.question: Can I join Amity University Patna directly?
faqs.answer: Amity University, Patna Campus also offers direct admission to its own graduates in all Master's programs subject to meeting the minimum eligibility criteria for the program. Aspirants who want to join Amity University Patna directly, but there are certain eligibility criteria that you must meet.The eligibility criteria for direct admission to Amity University, Patna vary depending on the programme you are applying for. faqs.question: Is the MAT admit card released session wise?
faqs.answer: Yes, the MAT admit card is released for each session. The dates for admit card download for each session Computer Based Test (CBT), Paper Based Test (PBT) and Internet Based Test (IBT) is different. However, the process is same. Candidates have to download the admit card for the session they have registered for. If a candidate has registered for more than one session, then they will have to download the admit cards for each session that they have registered for. The MAT admit card is exclusive for every session and cannot be used for different session. It has exam date, time, mode and slot mentioned on it, and is not valid for only that session. Thus candidate must be very careful in using the specific MAT admit card for a particular session. They must ensure that they are carrying the correct admit card for a given MAT session. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Which documents are required for filling CAT application form?
faqs.answer: Candidates need the following documents while filling the CAT application form: A recent passport size photo (color against white background) Scanned signature with black pen on white paper Any photo ID card like PAN card, Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Passport Class 10 marksheet Class 12 marksheet Graduation marksheet Permanent address proof Work experience documents Reserved category students need to upload Category Certificate along with the CAT application form. The Certificate is available on the CAT website. Candidates can download, fill it, get it attested by competent authority and upload it as PDF with the CAT application form. The PwD category students also have to fill the PwD form and Scribe affidavit along with the exam application form. This is necessary for getting scribe facility and PwD facility at the test centre. The CAT application form is same for students from all categories. Those belonging to a particular category (SC/ST/PwD) will be required to mention it in the relevant field of the CAT form. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: Amity University Gwalior: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Infrastructure

highlights.summary:
Amity University was established in 2010 and is located in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh. The university was established by the Ritnand Balved Education Foundation (RBEF) with the view to promote industry-oriented education in the state of Madhya Pradesh. Amity University Madhya Pradesh (AUMP) has been accredited as a “Premier University” by the Accreditation Service for International Colleges (ASIC) and is recognised by the UGC. Further, the university has also been approved by the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI), the Bar Council of India (BCI), the Council of Architecture (CA), the Rehabilitation Council of India (RCI), and the National Cadet Corps.
Amity University, Gwalior courses are offered to students at UG, PG, and PhD levels, mainly in fields such as Management, Engineering, Architecture, Biotechnology, Law, Journalism & Mass Communication, Psychology, Fashion, Pharmacy, etc. BTech, BDes and MBA are the popular programmes offered at the university. Amity University Bhopal courses are offered to students in full-time mode. The university provides meritorious and deserving candidates with 100% merit-based scholarships.
Amity Gwalior has a panel of guest lecturers to inspire students in their respective careers and to give them tips and invaluable insights in every course. Amity University Gwalior admission based on merit and entrance exams. The university accepts national entrance exams like MAT, CAT, JEE Main, NMAT, CMAT, etc. The college also offers an excellent infrastructure to students which includes classrooms, labs, librray, medical facility, hostel, and others. . For more details, candidates can check out the table given below:
- 201-250 by NIRF 2024 (Engineering)

college_info_program.intro: Amity University Gwalior popular programmes are BTech, BSc and MBA. The university offers a full-time, four-year BTech programme at the UG level. The Btech programme offered at the university cover core courses in the areas of Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, CSE, and others. The MBA programme offered by the Amity Gwalior is a two-year programme. It is offered in several specilisations, including International Business, Human Resource Management, Advertising, and others. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with what is happening.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 per cent are placed.  24 LPA is the highest package, 2 LPA is the lowest, and the average is 2.5 LPA. MuSigma is the highest recruiting company in the State. 30% of students got an internship at Wipro and TCS. Sales and Software engineer interns are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's available in the course/department. Wi-Fi, Labs, classrooms and the library are present. I am not a hosteller, so I can't tell much about that, but my friends are, so the food is average for everyday purposes, else the mess, canteen and medical facilities are there.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are doctoral and they are qualified enough to teach. Courses are relevant and make students industry-ready because they are similar to IIT and NIT. Passing in the exam is quite easy and passable. The pass percentage is high enough, which is 90%.
detailed_review.Other: I know this course will help me get better opportunities as a software engineer and others. The old-style curriculum should be improved. Various events and festivals happen.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great campus with excellent facilities and strict attendance.

detailed_review.Placements: 65 to 60 percent of students got placed last year. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA, the average is 6 LPA-10 LPA, and the highest is 35 LPA. Recruiting companies are Palo Alto, Infosys, and Ishan Technologies. 20 to 30 percent of students got internships from my course in TCS and Wipro. Software developer, cloud engineer, and data analyst are roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is quite good. Labs are not that good. Classrooms are fully air-conditioned, libraries are big, the quality of food is great, top medical facilities, and big grounds for each sport and game. Sometimes Wi-Fi stops working for 2 or 3 days. Labs are mainly considered as a free period.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable, providing good teaching with professionalism. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. Exams are easy, 33 percent is needed to pass the exams. Teachers are well-trained and refined. Teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is up to date. You can pass the exam in 1 day of study.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is in high demand and provides better job roles. Reduce the class hours. Not many activities are conducted for B.Tech CSE students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of campus life, which is exciting and amazing.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 95% of students get placed. The average package is 7 LPA. Students get placed in companies like Palo Alto, etc. Roles offered are awesome. The internship thing is also good on this campus. We get amazing opportunities. There is a good environment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of the campus are awesome. We have a library, labs, an auditorium, etc. Medical facilities are also there. All facilities are good. It has an amazing mess.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are so helpful and very qualified. Semester exams are not so difficult, but are at a good standard level. The course curriculum is good. Exams level is good. NIT-qualified teachers are teaching in our college. The book authors are also, and we are extremely honored there. Faculty members are very supportive, and they give us direction for our lives and also for placements.
detailed_review.Other: The course is awesome, so I chose it. The campus surroundings are good. It has very much greenery and scholarships.

reviews.course: MBA in International Business
reviews.review_title: I am really blessed to be in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: On average, more than 83% of students get placed in our course. The highest package offered is 33 LPA, and the lowest package offered ranges from 6-10 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Genpact, Cognizant, IBM, etc. The percentage of students who got internships is 83%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are top-notch. There is a Wi-Fi facility in all classrooms with a comfortable branch and library. The infrastructure is amazing, and each building has a library. The quality of facilities is available, and labs are well-equipped. Hostel facilities are good. There is good food in the hostel mess. Medical facilities are available. The quality of education is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are more helpful. Their teaching quality is very good. They have good knowledge in many ways. Teachers have more than 25 years of experience in our course. The course curriculum is relevant to the industry. Students should study hard because semester exams are hard to pass. The pass percentage is 72%.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: It is the best university in India with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who get placed in our Amity University is 98%. In our course, almost 93% of students got placed. The highest package offered is 52 LPA and the lowest package is 2.4 LPA. Companies like Bioneeds, BiOZEEN, Mankind, and GH visit the college and hire students. Internship opportunities are offered to students at Cipla and most of the students get jobs here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It provides facilities like Wi-Fi, parking, RO water, a sports room, and a library. We can only enter the library if we have a library ID card. It is easy to get a library ID card as we have to just fill form and attach the fee receipt. Classrooms are so clean. The infrastructure is amazing and I love it. Each department has different blocks with all facilities. Medical facilities are provided. The food in the canteen is very tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching faculty members are helpful. They clear our doubts in all fields. Their quality of teaching is the best. Teachers are qualified from top rankers college. The course curriculum is relevant to BT and they will teach from basics. They make us ready for industry. Semester exams are hard to pass. The pass percentage is 73%. Exams are very strictly conducted.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: My college life in short.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary is 15 LPA. The lowest salary is 6 LPA, and the average salary is 8 LPA. Recruiting companies are Amazon and MNCs. 100% of students get internships also in MNCs. Manager is the role offered. All the students who are willing to work and achieve something are placed and currently working with many big companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is available. Staff and all are so good. Also, wardens are very supportive. Food is really tasty. All sports are available and coaches are also allotted. We have Wi-Fi and classes are very comfortable. Our campus has best environment for learning. Library has all the necessary resources. The campus is also very beautiful and we are allowed to walk freely.
detailed_review.Faculty: They are very intelligent and also supportive. They are highly knowledgeable and skilled. They allow learning through practical which builds a high knowledge of practical ground. The average passing is 3 CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I want to learn management in my life so I chose BBA. The best thing is that you will know the value of time by learning the timeline of bookish knowledge rather than practical knowledge. Events, fests, and everything are so good here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, helpful faculty, and decent placements, but more industry exposure is needed.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 50% of students were placed through on-campus placements. Most of them were placed in sales roles. The highest package was 32 LPA, the lowest was 2 LPA, and the average was 5 LPA. The top recruiting companies were TCS and other sales companies. 20% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity University Gwalior offered good Wi-Fi, modern labs, smart classrooms, and a well-stocked library. Hostels were clean with decent rooms, the mess food was average, the canteen had a variety, medical help was available, and sports facilities were well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at Amity University Gwalior were quite helpful and well-qualified. Most of them were knowledgeable and taught in a way that was easy to understand. The teaching quality was good overall. The course content was updated and aimed to match industry needs, though students still needed to do some extra learning to be fully industry-ready. The semester exams were not too hard if you studied regularly, and most students passed if they put in decent effort.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: It is one of the best universities in our state.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of the previous batch students got placed. The highest package of B.Com is approximately 14 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. The roles offered are finance and investment banking analyst (with CFA financial modeling skills), financial analyst (with knowledge of Excel), financial statements and evaluation, equity research analyst, risk analyst, and portfolio manager. We get accounting & taxation roles like an accountant (Tally, QuickBooks, SAP), tax consultant (with GST and income tax knowledge), auditor (requires CA CMA or CPA for better roles), and cost accountant. In banking and insurance, we get roles as bank probationary officers (PO) (via exams like IBPS and SBI PO), credit analysts, loan officers, and insurance advisers. Students get corporate jobs like business analysts, HR executives, marketing executives, and operation managers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The university offers separate hostels for male and female students, with options for single, double, or triple occupancy. Rooms are fully furnished with beds, study tables, wardrobes, and chairs. It is equipped with 24x7 high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some students have expressed satisfaction with the faculty members. They are knowledgeable and supportive. Faculty members are approachable and are always willing to help students.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: It has very good infrastructure, has Ph.D. qualified teachers', and placements are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Amity University has good placements for business school and fashion designing students from various famous companies such as Zara, Infosys, etc. Two students get placed in Zara. There are good placements in engineering and media.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity University has a very good and attractive infrastructure, which is comfortable for students to survive in various places. They have digital classrooms and a fully air-conditioned campus, which is very comfortable for students. They also have a lift facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college has a very good and experienced faculty, who help students and motivate them for their careers. They are very experienced in their specialized subjects, which helps in accurate knowledge for the student's future. The faculty members train their students for placement intervention and to build their confidence.
detailed_review.Other: Amity University is known for its discipline, and it has a very systematic way of education.

reviews.course: B.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: I will recommend this college to all the people who want some good opportunities.

detailed_review.Placements: Amity University Gwalior is the biggest college in Gwalior. It gives very good placement many big companies come to Amity University for placement like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, etc. The last the highest place some got is about 1.3 crores and the lowest package I know is about 3 lacs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity University Gwalior has incredible infrastructure on all campuses. The hostel facilities are also good. The food tastes amazing. Labs have all-new equipment. The Wi-Fi speed is amazing it connects all around. On campus, every area is covered with Wi-Fi. The library is also good and all the spots have fast access of Wi-Fi.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members here are very good. They are very knowledgeable. They are ready to solve your all queries and doubts. They don't judge you or compare you with others everyone is unique and different from others they follow this mindset. Exams are not hard that much you just need 5 CGPA to pass.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: The infrastructure is good, and the hostel and mess are average.

detailed_review.Placements: It was good that they provided sufficient opportunities for everyone to get placed at some point with a really good package. Even I, as an average student, got placed with a 15 LPA package. There were so many companies that came to the college for placements, and in my stream, there were many opportunities. But, you just couldn't expect too much at the start. You would get a bit less, but you had to adjust to that.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels were good but a bit costly for everyone, I guess. The food was usually average, not that good, not that bad, but it was just sufficient for you to live. Then we came to the infrastructure, which was really good. They provided great surroundings to live in. We have too many activities that keep going around which will help you to find your space anyhow.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty was really supportive. They helped us with guidance, led our projects, and gave us sufficient time to get into the charts. All faculty members were really highly qualified from good universities. But there were teachers whose teaching style was really bad. They couldn’t even understand what they were trying to teach.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because it is the nearest to my home and provides this course at that price with such good opportunities. There was only one thing I didn’t like about the college, and that was the fees, which kept increasing every time.

reviews.course: M.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication
reviews.review_title: Amity is a synonym of success.

detailed_review.Placements: The batch is dense and engaging. The course is designed according to the present requirements. The highest package is Rs. 6,00,000 LPA. The average package offered is 4 LPA. The package depends on the work done by you only. Amity University Madhya Pradesh provides scholarships as well.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has Wi-Fi, labs, etc. I love it. Classrooms are structured. The library is very good. Classrooms are AC. We have an ambulance. Doctors are available for contingency. The college has a photo lab, TV lab,  cinema lab, and editing lab. They have cameras and lights.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are intelligent and well-qualified. The course curriculum is relevant. Exams are up to the mark. They have completed their Ph.D. from the University of Reputation. They are always ready to help. Teachers use ICT-enabled classrooms with great teaching pedagogy. Love it. I love the campus.
detailed_review.Other: Our course is useful in almost every industry.

reviews.course: M.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication
reviews.review_title: We have a great campus and life.

detailed_review.Placements: Good opportunities and support systems are available in our college. Good companies visit the university. Faculty members share their connections as well for placements. Top recruiting companies are Aaj Tak, Radio Mirchi, Network 18, and Bhaskar. Students go for the government of India work and internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has studio labs, a photos lab, an editing lab, an animation lab, a fact check lab, a library, a Wi-Fi, lab, ICT-enabled classes, an AC campus, and a well-equipped gym. The quality of the mess is good and the hostel cab opted with and without AC. The college provides 24x7 power supply. Doctors are available throughout the year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Almost all teachers are Ph.D. holders from a good and reputed organisation. The course is relevant and as per industry requirements. Exams are not tough if you study. Practical orientation is there in the course. Industrial visits are organised every sem.
detailed_review.Other: The college has good sports complex.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: It is the best place to grow and study.

detailed_review.Placements: Particularly for engineering, MBA, IT, and BBA students, this college has a respectable placement record with recruiters like Infosys, TCS, cognizant, and other big companies. The package typically varies from 3-5 LPA. Non-technical course placements, however, may be less rewarding and more competitive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good and positive. It has anticipated and sophisticated classrooms, spacious sports facilities, and well-equipped labs. Campuses are frequently large and kept up nicely. Although opinions differ, many emphasize good Wi-Fi and sufficient facilities. The environment is very positive there.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are excellent. The pattern of the exam is good. There is no difficulty in understanding the exam pattern and course. Faculty members are good in nature, very polite, and positive in character. Exams are not very difficult. They focus on the application.
detailed_review.Other: College fests are very good and we are enjoying it very much. The campus crowd is positive and polite in nature as well as the character.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and good campus.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students get placements every year, and 10% of students opt for higher studies. Companies like Amazon, Wipro, ICICI Bank, ICICI Lombard, etc., visit the college to hire students. 50% of students get internships. It has good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: On the campus, Wi-Fi is available. The library is available. Classrooms are fully furnished, and labs are good. The hostel infrastructure is good. Medical facilities are good. The mess food is good. Rules in the hostel are just like jail, which is only one negative thing in the hostel. The infrastructure is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful and knowledgeable. The teaching quality of faculty members in the Amity is very good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams depend on students. If students do not study, they will fail, and if they study, they will pass. The pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to run my family business.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: Amity is good for infrastructure, faculty members, etc.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students get placements every year and 10% of students opt for higher studies. Companies like Amazon, Wipro, ICICI Bank, ICICI Lombard, etc., hire students from the college. 50% of students get summer internships. It provides good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: On the campus, Wi-Fi is available. The library is available. Classrooms are fully furnished and labs are good. The hostel infrastructure is good. Medical facilities are good. The mess food is not good. Rules are just like jail and there are only two negative things in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful and very knowledgeable. The teaching quality of faculty members in the Amity is very good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams depend on students' studies. If a student does not study then they fail, and if they study, they will pass. The pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my family business. I can learn some business ideas from BBA and run my family business.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA) (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: Review of Amity University, Gwalior.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80- 90% of students got placed. The highest package is 35 LPA. The lowest package is 3.3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Google, Mahindra, Wipro, Jobbaj, and many more companies. Top roles offered are HR, trainee, interest, market head, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. The college has a good environment. Some of the garden areas and the beauty of the grass are very good. There are 5 to 6 blocks in the college. Every block is very high level. The college and hostel have food and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good. Some of them are very rude. The course curriculum is good and easy. Fresher students are not ready for the industry area. The exam levels are very tough. Last year they have changed all patterns of authority.

reviews.course: B.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: One of the best colleges in Madhya Pradesh.

detailed_review.Placements: Amity University Gwalior gives the best placements among all colleges in Madhya Pradesh. The highest package someone received in my course is 60 LPA. Many companies, such as Clickmemom, NDTV, and other news channels, come to Amity for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi speed at Amity University Gwalior is awesome. I never have to wait to download my stuff because the internet speed is so fast. I think it may be more than 200 Mbps. Sports area is also the best place. I believe the college provides everything that you want.
detailed_review.Faculty: The semester exams are not very difficult, and a minimum of 5 CGPA is required to pass the semester. Just focus on the notes and syllabus, and you can pass very easily. Basically, Amity focuses more on practical knowledge than theoretical knowledge. I would prefer to choose Amity.

reviews.course: B.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication (Honours/Research)
reviews.review_title: I have a great experience here.

detailed_review.Placements: This year placements have truly set a benchmark for our university. The highest package offered is INR 45 LPA, offered by Palo Alto Network. I feel that what's really impressive is the sheer number of companies that come to our campus for the placements. Top recruiters include Accenture, Infosys, Upgrade, Rakuten, and many more. I believe that there are numerous placement opportunities for students at this university.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The university infrastructure is exceptionally good. Hostel accommodations are well-maintained, offering a high standard of living. All the academic blocks are equipped with modern facilities like high-speed Wi-Fi, specialized labs, a well-stocked library, medical facilities, canteen, and many more. The campus has air-conditioned smart classrooms. We also have a great sports infrastructure with both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: From my perspective, the course structure is undeniably well-designed. One can ask questions even outside the scope of the syllabus. The teaching faculty members are very helpful and qualified. The curriculum is designed to be highly relevant and aligned with the rapidly changing industry. Semester exams are not very difficult. If you have a thorough understanding of the topic, they are manageable.
detailed_review.Other: I wanted to pursue a degree in Journalism and Mass Communication. After clear consideration of every aspect, I realised Amity University Gwalior is the only best decision to pursue this course. It had everything I wished for be it infrastructure, facilities, practical learning, events, and many more.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Overall, Amity is good not bad but in placements, it is not that much better.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students got placed in the B.A. LL.B. course. The highest package is 6 LPA. The lowest package is 3.4 LPA. Law firms like Quislex Legal Services Pvt. Ltd. 80% of students got internships in high courts and private law firms. Roles offered in B.A. LL.B. is a senior advocate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity Law School has pretty good infrastructure and facilities for students like good working conditions Wi-Fi and labs, classrooms with good space for students, and a library with different types of books by different authors. Hostel facilities are much better than nowadays. The quality of food is also better. Amity has good canteen food. Medical support is also good. Sports and games are always at the top of the world in Amity.
detailed_review.Faculty: Amity law department has the best teachers. They're very supportive and kind. They help us to understand everything. Apart from studies, they also help us in our personal life. Amity University has the best teachers. They're well-qualified and knowledgeable. They have the best teaching qualities. The course curriculum is so good and relevant. Semester exams are moderate. The pass percentage is 90%.
detailed_review.Other: Being a lawyer is the best feeling so I decided to become a lawyer. The best part of being an advocate is you get respect, money, and power. Amity University has different types of events, fests, and extra curricular activities. They are very fun.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Besides a huge Central Library, the University also has five Departmental Libraries for Engineering, Management, Law, Architecture and Psychology. The libraries have a rich stock of books, digital database, on line journals (E – Resource), National / International journals with hard and soft copies, Magazines and National / Regional newspapers in Hindi and English are available for Students / Research Scholars. In addition all libraries have adequate number of computer terminals to access the Internet. The library has over 20,000 online journals. Amity has the membership of MANUPATRA, DELNET, Sodh Ganga, National Digital Library (NDL), All India Reporter, Supreme Court Cases online. All Amity students are members of Amizone-Amity Intranet Zone which allows them easy access to these journals & papers. Amity students also have the rights to access of Ebsco Host ,Taylor & Francis, IEEE, ACM Digital library etc.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: All rooms are well lit & well ventilated, with geysers in bathrooms & television in the common rooms. Each student is provided with a separate bed, mattress, pillow, pillow covers and sheets, almirah and study table with chair.All the hostels are Wi-Fi enabled and the student can access the net 24/7 from their rooms. The students are also provided free laundry services.

college_info.college_name: Amity University Ranchi: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Rankings, Scholarships

highlights.summary:
Established in 2016, Amity University Ranchi is a core part of the Amity Education Group. Amity Ranchi is recognised by the UGC and operates in a similar manner to the other campuses of the Amity Group. Amity University Jharkhand offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses across streams such as Engineering, Management, Commerce, Computers, and Law. The admission to all courses is done based on academic record, score in the Amity written test, and performance in the personal interview. Amity University Ranchi also offers scholarships to meritorious students.
Many top recruiters visited the campus, such as Indigo, Flipkart, EY, MXPlayer, Federal Bank, Amazon, etc. Amity University, Ranchi is known for its world-class infrastructure and provides all necessary facilities to students, such as an accommodation facility, sports complex, air-conditioned classrooms, auditorium and well-equipped labs. Check the Amity University Jharkhand highlights in the table provided below:

college_info_program.intro:
Amity University Ranchi offers a variety of programmes, including graduate, postgraduate, and diploma courses. The School of Engineering is one of the schools of Amity University Ranchi that offers programmes in different domains, including Electrical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering.
Amity University Ranchi is famous for its popular programmes, namely BE/ BTech and BSc. Mechanical Engineering students are taught construction testing, design, and operation of machines & automobiles, and others. Amity University Ranchi BSc students are taught to express and enhance the core analytical, technical, and conceptual skills that are appropriate for the hospitality industry. Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by Amity University Ranchi and their respective eligibility, and Amity University Ranchi fee structure:
