Amity University Ranchi Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Don't come on the basis of college or any data i.e. available on internet or website of college.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80 percent students got placed last year from campus. 47 LPA is the highest, and 4–5 LPA is the lowest while average is 7–8 LPA. TCS, Wipro or HCL visit college for placement. There is no internship provided by college, you should do yourself. Software engineer frontend or backend developed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel is new building and from last year students can get room. All facilities are given to students such as Wi-Fi, library etc. Food is decent, Canteen is also good, medical facilities are also available. There is no playground so you cannot play outdoor game.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teacher is helpful when you ask then only; no care on average or poor students. Most teachers are Ph.D. holder and knowledgeable in their field. They are only focusing on theory, not practical, and it is not good for ready for industry. Exams are simple and strict, and questions come from syllabus only. Most students are passed in exam.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty. Placements were good in 2023. It has a beautiful campus.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered is 46.9 LPA for the B.Tech CSE student in 2023. In 2023, 86 percent of students got placements. In biotechnology, the package offered is 47 LPA. In 2025, the highest package offered is 24 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Amazon, TCS, Flipkart, and Cognizant. The university offers a 100% internship rate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are very comfortable and big. Chairs, desks, and everything are comfortable. Labs have all facilities. The library is quite huge, and it has comfortable chairs. We can issue books anytime. It's pretty nice. The hostel rooms are nice. The only problem is that sometimes it comes with poor water management. Hot water is sometimes not available for bathing. But overall, everything is good. Wardens are helpful.
detailed_review.Faculty: In the biotechnology department, teachers are very good. Professors are above average. Exams are quite difficult, but teachers help us a lot with them. Notes provided by teachers are enough to ace an exam. The course curriculum is quite relevant. Teachers explain the topic quite nicely and help the slow students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am interested in research. Our professors help us a lot with it. They involve students in research programs and help them with their papers. It is all very helpful for students. The thing that could get better is that the class timings are quite long. Many events and fests are organised. It's a good opportunity to participate and increase our experience and networking.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good all over, depending on how you utilize the resources available.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a chance to get a placement. The highest package offered is 47 LPA, the average package offered is 7 to 9 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 4 to 5 LPA. Top Recruiting companies for B.Tech CSE are Wipro, HCL, and TCS. More than 80 percent got placed. The Top Role for B.Tech is a software engineer. All Over Placement depends on the student, not the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is good.  Classroom, labs, and library are good. Wi-Fi is fast, and the quality of food is the best. All necessary items required by students are available. There is no playground, and the college is outside the city.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are useful, most teachers hold a Ph.D. degree, and they are good in their field. Course is not relevant for industry ready. You need to go yourself if you have any doubt you can solve with teacher. Exam is not so hard, all the questions have come from the syllabus. There is a chance that you will get important question also.
detailed_review.Other: In Ranchi, if you did not get good marks in JEE Main/Advanced, then you can choose this college. I want to improve the syllabus because there are so many topics that are outdated. Event always happens. Connectivity from Ranchi Station is around 15 km. Scholarship is provided on the basis of CGPA.

reviews.course: B.Tech in CSE (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and environment.

detailed_review.Placements: So at this time our placements are on going and many of the companies comes for hiring but the placements just started, so it is still going but in previous batch has low placement rate and many of them not got the placement and opt for off-campus placement and many for masters and the companies which came to hire are TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Human, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, like all necessary items are provided on campus and hostel, like good purified water, and for summer, it is chilled, then the whole campus is air-conditioned, and the labs which are given to us are well-updated with current technologies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of Amity is good enough, like many of them studied from NITs and IITs, and they have also done some jobs in the real industry and have experience of that too, so they know what and how to teach a student to make them industry-ready. They also support us to grow more and do events like hackathons, Ideaspark, and more.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: In our batch, placement has not started yet, but in our senior batch, the placement rate was low only a few students got placed while pursuing the course. As much as I know, it was under 15 out of 60 students, and top recruitment companies are Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Human, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity provides us with good classes with updated labs with current technologies and library, smart classes, air-conditioned campus, and high-speed Wi-Fi. For a hostel, all necessary facilities are given, and a mess too. There are not many sports given, but they do some tournaments like Samarthan.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are average in Amity, everyone passes by just studying 1 week before the exam. Faculty are good and supportive with industrial experience. The course that they teach us are really helpful, like blockchain, data mining, big data, etc.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Nice place for learning new things.

detailed_review.Placements: In my batch (2022–2025), only 12 students out of 60 have been placed, as far as I know. This year, the placement is low, and I have no idea about the highest and lowest CTC. The companies that come to hire freshers are TCS, Yandex, Infosys, Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities given to us include a library with books from all domains, labs with up-to-date technologies and specifications, Wi-Fi in the whole campus, smart classrooms for live coding or demonstrations, air-conditioned rooms, and many more. I don't have any idea about the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified, educated, and have industrial experience too. The course curriculum is well updated with current requirements like blockchain, data mining, web development, advanced Java, and many more. Semester exams are not very tough, and an average student can score well by studying just one week before the exam.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Good for those who can't go outside of Jharkhand or Ranchi.

detailed_review.Placements: So, in my batch, only a few students get placed that's why the placement ratio is low for the BCA and other courses like B.Tech CSE too. In my batch, many of them went for masters and are looking for off-campus placement and to be hired at Amity University Ranchi. Companies that come are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college offers a good library for a better environment for studying in free period and books for study resources, and a class projector is provided for digital class or to show a live example. On campus, we get air conditioners, good coverage of Wi-Fi, and organized labs for every stream.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course curriculum at Amity is not very difficult, any average student can score a good CGPA by just studying 1 or 2 days before the exam. Courses are well structured with the company requirements, as they include blockchains, data mining, big data, Unix, app Development, and many more.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and good quality of teaching.

detailed_review.Placements: In Amity this year, placements are not good, as our course has ended, and only 12 students have been placed yet, and many of them pursue higher studies. Many are looking to get off-campus placements. Top companies that hire students are TCS, Infosys, Human Resources, Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: At our time, Amity gives us good speed Wi-Fi on the whole campus. It has well-equipped computer labs with new technologies, a library for study materials, and digital classrooms with a projector. For our batch, the hostel is not provided because of the underdevelopment of the university and hostels. So I don't have an idea about that, but as far as I know, they charge Rs. 60,000 yearly. The mess charges are Rs. 5,000 every month.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They have good teaching skills. They are supportive, and they help every single student. If any student has any doubt, then after the class, they can reach the teacher in their cabins or their personal chamber. They organise competitive programs or hackathons where student deliver their idea, and if their idea works, they get funding for implementation.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: It is a nice place to get a good environment and skill development.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2022-25 batch, and our course is over now. If I talk about placements, only 12 students get placed from a batch of 60 students. Many students go for a master's, and many of them opt for off-campus placement. This year, placements are low. Companies that visit the college to hire students are Infosys, Wipro, TCS, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good in Amity. It provides air-conditioned classrooms with a projector for live examples. There are well-updated labs with current technology. It has good Wi-Fi speed and a good number of classrooms. The library has all the required books, facilities, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of Amity are good and educated. They have experience in real industries, so they know what to teach students so that they grow more and get a good package or CTC. They organise hackathons and some competitions. There is an environment of coding and other curriculum to check the capabilities of students.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Good environment for learning skills.

detailed_review.Placements: In my batch, about 12 students got placed through on-campus placements out of 60. Many others opt for a Master's, and many go for off-campus placements. Top recruiting companies include Infosys, Deloitte, TCS, Wipro, Human Resources, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities that Amity offers include a good environment, air-conditioned classrooms with Wi-Fi coverage, a library for study materials, and computer labs with updated specifications. In the hostel, all necessary items are provided, such as beds, fans, and AC if opted for.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty in our college are well-educated and skilled, with industrial knowledge. They know how to teach students so that they become market-ready. They also organize hackathons and other competitive programs to help students learn and grow.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, nice faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate of last year was average, as many of them got placed, but the offered package was very low, and many students opted for off-campus placements. The main companies that came for hiring are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Human, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good, with Wi-Fi, air-conditioned classrooms, and digital classrooms provided throughout the campus, along with well-updated labs and a library facility. The classroom sizes are really good, and for hostels, boys and girls get different buildings, and everyone gets sufficient and necessary facilities in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers or faculty are well-educated and supportive, and they support us to grow and learn more for better skills. The course curriculum is updated and relevant to industrial needs, as it fulfills all major and required knowledge of the subject.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Review for future ones.

detailed_review.Placements: So if I take past placement rate which is average like most of the students get placed. Many of them opt for further studies but the packages that are given are a little low. Many of them get off-campus placement. If I talk about top companies that came for the placement, they are human resource, a Japanese company, then TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Cognizant, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities that are given are like fully centralized AC in whole campus then Wi-Fi, well updated multiple labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful, educated, and supportive too like they always help to grow more and organise hackathons and similar kinds of competitive and self-improvement workshops so that students don't lag. Exams are average, kind of little bit of study and anyone can pass. Course is well updated and according to the current requirements like data mining, blockchain, and many more.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Brief idea about Amity University, Ranchi.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are generally high in management, mass communication, and IT courses. Placements in other courses are generally less compared to these courses otherwise, placements are not that bad. Amity University Ranchi generally reports high placement rates, with figures ranging from 60% to 80% depending on the course and student performance.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Whole campus has centralized AC. Library, classroom, and labs are well-equipped. Whiteboards are present in the class along with a projector and a microphone for giving presentation. Library is present on 2nd floor and it's huge with all the books you need for your course. I have never bought a single book because I can issue any book I want from the library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course curriculum is excellent. Teachers are knowledgeable and helpful, except for few but that depends on your personal experience and learning capability. Course curriculum is not very hard, and it gives students knowledge about industry and physical world. Semester exams are easy and conceptual. Teachers give marks not for filling the pages but for writing short and brief conceptual answers.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was always very interested in biotechnology field. I think biotech is a rising field and it will be of huge value in the future. This course is fun and learning intensive. This college only lacks one thing, and that is playground. There is no huge playground for football, cricket, and other outdoor games. There are 2 badminton and 2 basketball courts on campus which are not very big but it's okay. There are more than 7-8 fests in a year at the college done by different departments.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and bad placement.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 30% of students got placed. The average package is 3 LPA. IBM, Tech Mahindra, etc., are top recruiters. 4%-5% of students got internships. The top roles offered in the college are mostly in junior posts. Placements are very bad they should do something about it and internship offers are 0.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good. AC, Wi-Fi, lab, library, and classrooms are available. They provide almost everything and they conduct mentor meet to check upon every facility once a month. The hostel is not that good as it's very small and the food is also very average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified but only some are helpful most of them are very biased and some are good and helpful. The college does not make us ready for anything they expect us to do everything on our own. Semester exams depend on how much you study. Passing percentage is above 40%.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Law (LL.B.)
reviews.review_title: Review of my Amity Law School.

detailed_review.Placements: Since I am in 3 years LL.B. program, there are only 10 students as of now. But the current admission has invited many applications. Unfortunately, there are no placements in LL.B. It depends on your practice, knowledge, and experience, you have gained under high-class advocates or law firms.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are good. Library is really good. There is availability of Wi-Fi and projectors in classrooms. Every classroom has AC. The food in the canteen is also good. One can have food from a variety of options. Regarding sports, the infrastructure is not so good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very student-friendly and quite knowledgeable. They are always ready to help and answer all the doubts even though not regarding academics. The exams are moderate to difficult depending on teachers. However, one can easily pass if they attend classes.
detailed_review.Other: The campus organizes various fests, competitions, and extra-curricular activities which makes it fun and engaging environment for the students.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Good placements and advanced technology in the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Overall, 98% of students get placed. The highest package is 44 LPA, and average package is 9 LPA. Recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro, and Deloitte. Almost 99% of students get internships at TCS. Top roles offered are front-end developer and back-end developer. It also depends on students' skills to get good jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are good and Wi-Fi also works smoothly. Classrooms are so advanced and good. Library has almost all types of books available. Facilities are very good. Hostel rooms are clean. The food is also healthy and really good. All types of sports are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching skills are very good and understanding for the students. Semester exams are very difficult and questions are very difficult set by the teachers. All students have passed in semester exam but some students have backlogs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Faculty and placement are good in college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our batch had a 90 percent placement rate with the highest package being 45 lakhs from Amazon. In the 4th or 5th semester the college arranged internships for us. Many companies including Infosys TCS and Amazon came to the college for recruitment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Amity University has good infrastructure and a good environment. All the facilities are available including Wi Fi labs classrooms and a library that is open 24/7. The food provided in the canteen is good and medical facilities are available for students. Additionally the university provides sports and games facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are fully qualified and very helpful. The semester exams are not too difficult. Our teacher will give us a set of questions that are similar to what will be on the exam. If we study those questions we should be able to pass the exam. The passing percentage is 33 percent and we need a GPA of at least 5 to move on to the next semester.
detailed_review.Other: I am a student at Amity University Ranchi. I am majoring in Computer Science and Engineering. I chose this major because I want to be a software engineer at a good company. Our college has a very large event called "Mitti Ka Poria."

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Timing is not good but everything else is nice.

detailed_review.Placements: In Amity University Ranchi, from BCA, above 60% of students get placed with a good package, where in 2023 a BCA student had the highest package of 44 LPA, but in 2024 they haven't told us what the highest package is, but 30+ out of 60 students got placed, and many of them have gone for further studies like MCA or MBA. There are many companies which came to provide on-campus placement, which are Amazon, TCS, Wipro, Yandex, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities which are provided by Amity University Ranchi are really worthwhile according to the fees, which are like fast Wi-Fi in the whole campus, well-updated labs for all departments, smart classes with projectors in every single class, and a fully air-conditioned campus with a library with skillful books and research papers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and educated to teach us, and they have industrial experience too, so that they teach us accordingly. Course curriculums are relevant to the current time, like they teach us with real-time example case studies and skillful subjects. Semester exams are a little bit harder, but an average student can get good marks by studying 1 week before the exam.

reviews.course: B.A. in Journalism and Mass Communication
reviews.review_title: Amity University - overall honest.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 65% of students got placed. Top recruiting companies are Flipkart, Kotak, Zee Media, Aaj Tak, etc. Internships are for everyone, but they are not in very good companies. Reporter and anchor are some top roles offered in our course. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is not very big. There are labs and different practical rooms for different programs and departments. We have a studio for practicals. Other than that everything is okay. The canteen is based on the tender. They give yearly tenders to different restaurants and brands.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are very helpful and qualified. Exams are very difficult. Our course curriculum is relatable. We got a lot of exposure there. This college makes students industry-ready by providing them with internships on a regular basis but you will get to do internships in the 2nd year.
detailed_review.Other: Our batch is very good. I wanted to do journalism but now I am into PR. Many events are held on campus.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Faculty and infrastructure are well good.

detailed_review.Placements: So, in 2023, the highest placement was 44 LPA by Human Company, which is a Japanese-based company, and in 2024, placement is ongoing. About 28 students got placed out of 60 in BCA, and many of them are going for further studies or starting/continuing their business. So, according to that, the placement rate is good. Many companies like Amazon, Yandex, Infosys, TCS, and many more came to hire in Amity University Ranchi.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are given in the campus, such as well-updated labs with new technology and Wi-Fi all over the campus. Currently, the campus is under construction, so there are some limitations. If the campus is completed, the facilities will increase. Currently, the new campus is only given to the new batch, which is from 2024, so I have no idea about that.
detailed_review.Faculty: Amity University Ranchi teachers are well-qualified, and there is no shortage of teachers. They are currently hiring more teachers for teaching, and every teacher has prior experience in the industry or MNCs, so they know how to teach and how to crack any interview. They teach according to that. Exams in Amity are not very hard, but you have to study.

faqs.question: What is the admission process of Amity Ranchi?
faqs.answer: Amity University, Ranchi is a prestige private University. As per NIRF rankings the University is ranked amongst the top 50 . The university invites students for about 8 streams and 24 courses for admissions in the institute. Majorly the admissions are based on CUET score of the students. There are multiple various specific criterias for different courses. The application for admissions can be submitted online. Certain courses do conduct personal interviews and group discussions for the students . The entire admission process is user and student friendly.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted by Amity Ranchi?
faqs.answer: For admission in the Amity Ranchi University, the student must studied the related subjects like PCM, PCBM, etc. in the intermediate. For studying BE, B.Tech in Amity Ranchi University the student have to scored 70% in PCM and must have obtain a good rank in JEE exam. The Amity Ranchi provides different courses like BSC, BTech, BBA, LLB, MBA etc. The student must need a higher marks in intermediate grade and score good in JEE board for getting admitted here.

faqs.question: Is Amity Ranchi best for engineering or not?
faqs.answer: Amity University institution has managed to secure its spot in the top 50 colleges in NIRF Ranking framework. It is one of the best colleges for Engineering courses. It is also the most choosen universities among the students for B.Tech and other engineering courses. For admissions to B.Tech courses, Amity JEE/JEE Mains score is considered. It offers multiple specializations for the engineering courses like Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical & Automation Engineering, Mining etc. The highest package from the institute is around 30 LPA.

faqs.question: How many marks are necessary for B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering at Amity University, Ranchi?
faqs.answer: The eligibility criteria for admission in Bachelor of Technology in computer Science and engineering  at Amity University, Ranchi is 10+2 with a minimum of 55 percent from a recognized board/Institution or the student must have participated in Amity Joint Engineering Entrance.

faqs.question: Are Amity University Ranchi BTech admissions 2026 open?
faqs.answer: No, Amity University Ranchi BTech admissions 2026 are not currently open. The university usually starts accepting applications for BTech admissions in January or February. Candidates willing to take admission to the course can apply in online or offline mode. The university has not yet announced the last date to apply. Before applying, candidates must ensure that they meet the eligibility requirements specified by the university. For more information, candidates must visit the university's official website.

faqs.question: What is the BTech fee at the Amity University, Ranchi and how can I pay it?
faqs.answer: The Amity University Ranchi BTech fee varies across the BTech specialisations/ streams offered at the university. The total tuition fee payable over the course duration of various specialisations ranges between INR 5.2 lakh and INR 7.6 lakh . Selected candidates must pay the first instalment of the total fee to confirm their admission. In addition to the tuition fee, they may have to pay certain one-time charges. The fees can be paid using online modes of payment or a DD. Cash and cheques are not accepted by the university. The mentioned fee information is sourced from the official website of the university/ sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for MBA at Amity University Ranchi?
faqs.answer: At Amity University, Ranchi, students are offered a two-year MBA programme. Admission to the programme is subject to the fulfilment of the eligibility criteria specified by the university. According to the Amity Ranchi MBA eligibility criteria , candidates must completed a recognised Bachelor's degree with a minimum aggregate of 50%. Further, they must have passed Class 12 with a minimum aggregate of 50%. Candidates must present the documents and certificates proving their eligibility at the time of admission or the latest by Oct 30 of the year of admission.

college_info.college_name: Annamalai University: Courses, Admission 2025, Fees, Rankings, Placements

highlights.summary:
The university named Annamalai University was set up in the year 1929 by the Act 1928 called Annamalai University Act. On the continuation, the university is accredited with an A+ Grade by NAAC. The university covers almost 1000 acres of land.
Approvals: The university is one of the oldest universities in South India, and it has accreditation from the NBA and ICAR.
Rankings: Annamalai University is ranked within the rank band of 101-150 under the University category of the NIRF ranking 2025.
Departments and Affiliations: Chidambaram Annamalai University courses are offered through 50 departments with 8 faculties and 81 affiliated colleges, offering UG, PG, value-added courses, certificates, and various other courses to students.
Distance Education: Annamalai University, Chidambaram, offers distance education for students through the Directorate of Distance Education. Courses offered are accredited and approved by the Distance Education Board (DEB). Annamalai University Distance Education is provided in various specialisations.
Academic Programmes: Annamalai University Chidambaram courses are provided across the Botany, Arts, Science, and various other streams. Offering more than 500 courses through distance education, Annamalai University admissions are based on merit and through TANCET MBA. The University has various MoUs and collaborations with institutes and associations to provide the same.
Notable Features: Annamalai University, Tamil Nadu, encourages financially and categorically backwards students with several scholarships along with the intent to promote equal opportunities. Annamalai University Placements are handled by its internal authorities.

college_info_program.intro:
Annamalai University Cuddalore popular programmes are MBA and BTech/ B.E. BTech students can look for career opportunities such as Web Designer, Software Developer, Testing Engineer, System Engineer, and others. B.E./BTech is offered in 12 specialiations. The B.E. in Chemical Engineering department aims to provide research-based education to students. The labs are adequately equipped with modern pieces of equipment.
Annamalai University Chidambaram's MBA faculty has received various awards in recognition of their contributions to the knowledge. The MBA department has produced around 290 PhDs and 190 MPhils. 1,131 research papers have been published in international and national journals. In addition to this, the department has signed MoUs with four Indian and various foreign institutes and organisations. Overall, Annamalai University in Chennai is ranked among the best universities for its flagship programmes. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Place for placement VSB Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Each student gets 2-4 offers from various companies, and the placement is 100 percent. There are many companies that take students from our college, and last time the company Capgemini took over more than 700 students from VSB Engineering College located in Karur.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a good infrastructure in hostels. They provide routers for students to use free Wi-Fi. In the hostel, they provide a bed with bedsheets for each student and cupboards with blocks, and the routine is different from other colleges. There are strict rules for the hostel that everyone should follow.
detailed_review.Faculty: Each teacher is expected to teach their subjects, and they also offer NPTEL. Every teacher has good experience, and their teaching methods are easily understandable. VSB college offers both undergraduate courses and postgraduate courses, and they have good teachers.
detailed_review.Other: In this college, the crowd is low because the faculty can see us and they can easily correct our errors or mistakes we make.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Annamalai University review.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement was good, but not with very big companies. You can't get a good job with a decent package. I'm just studying in third year, so I don't know much about placements. But our college has good placements. The faculty members provide hands-on practice instead of just theories a lot, so it helps you upgrade your skills and get placed easily.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure in college, old but in good condition. Nice architecture and a good environment for study. Hostel quality is poor, not so hygienic and clean. If you want to join the hostel, think twice before joining. Most of the students get skin problems because of the bad water and unhygienic environment in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams will be easy, all the questions will come from what the staff teach you during class time. So don't worry about the exams; you can easily get good scores, there will be two mid exams before the semester, so it will help you get ready for the semester exams with full potential.
detailed_review.Other: This college is old and well-recognized. This college has a good name.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent academy support with a good campus, but needs more practical exposure.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 60%-70% of students from the B.E. Civil course got placed. The highest package offered is around 6 LPA, the lowest is around 2 LPA, and the average is about 3.5 LPA. Top recruiters include NGOs, media houses, and educational firms. Around 50% of students got internships in companies like Tech for India, Times Group, and local startups. Common roles include content writers, research assistants, and HR trainees.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides good facilities for our department, including smart classrooms, fast Wi-Fi, and well-equipped computer labs. The library is quiet and stocked with useful study material. Hostels are clean and have basic amenities. The food in the mess is average, while the canteen offers a better variety. Medical help is available on campus with a health center. Sports facilities, such as a playground and indoor games, are provided to encourage student recreation. Overall, the infrastructure is decent and supports both academics and student life well.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified, supportive, and knowledgeable in their subjects. The teaching quality is good, with practical examples and regular doubt-solving sessions. The course curriculum is up-to-date and industry-relevant, which helps in preparing students for real-world challenges. Semester exams are moderately difficult but manageable with regular study. The pass percentage is decent, with most students clearing their exams on time.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the B.E. Civil Engineering course for its broad subject options and scope for learning. The best part is the supportive faculty and flexible curriculum. I wish there were more practical activities. The campus crowd is friendly, events are lively, and the college is well-connected. Scholarships are also available.

reviews.course: Ph. D in English
reviews.review_title: Annamalai University for Ph.D. and M.Ed course admission.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, there are various courses available in this field. This course has a total of 5 batches, and each batch has 40 students admitted. In this college, every year, there is a large number of students admitted to this course. In this course, the highest package is 5 LPA and the lowest package is 2 LPA, as a career in teaching.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good, but there are limited facilities available because it does not provide many courses, so there are fewer facilities. In this college, hostel facilities are available, but an extra charge is taken to use the facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, teachers are very intelligent, and good quality teaching is provided. In this course, teachers are Ph.D. scholars. The college teachers teaching knowledge is also good and can solve complicated questions. This course has a total of years of course duration, and this course is difficult to pass the exam.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Well qualified faculty members and encouraging.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are L&T, Tata Projects, and NCC Limited. Top roles offered are site engineer, project manager, and structural engineer. 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has provided facilities and infrastructure. Everyone can use the internet. It has a huge central library. Classrooms are good, clean, and hygienic. The labs are good. Hostel facilities for both girls and boys are good, and the food served is good. The canteen is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-trained and well-educated. Faculty members here are well-disciplined. Faculty members in our college are friendly. They clarify our doubts. The curriculum is relevant to the subject. Semester exams are easy to pass, and 70% is passing percentage.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: VSB Engineering College has good placements and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: VSB Engineering College has good placements. This college placement training staff conducts more campus interviews every year. More reputed companies like Amazon, Zoho, Accenture, and Wipro visit the college campus for interviews. The salary package offered for students ranges from 2-7 LPA. Almost 90-95% of students get placed in reputed companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: VSB Engineering College's infrastructure and facilities are excellent. This college has more departments. All classrooms are more comfortable for all students. Multiple computer laboratories are available in this college. This college provides good hostel facilities. The hostel food quality is very good. Multiple sports grounds are also there in this college. Emergency medical facilities are available here. There is a well-stocked library in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: VSB Engineering College teachers are more experienced and qualified professionals. They conduct more lectures every week. They teach some additional computer courses, which are very helpful for our placements. 95% of our batch students passed in all semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: VSB Engineering College's infrastructure, facilities, and placements are excellent, so I chose this college. This college management conducts more festival events. This college has more than 15 courses. This college management conducts more extracurricular activities. The college transportation facilities are also very good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: This college has very good infrastructure and friendly faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is good, but not many core companies are there for placement. But Infosys, Tech Mahindra, IBM, and TCS are coming for recruitment activities, not only in the IT department but also in the core sector, with a good LPA. This is completely based on seniors who are placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college has very well-equipped workshops, a library, and labs, but the hostel is not recommended because of the hostel's food and room facilities. The campus is liberal for studies and extracurricular activities. There is a well-organized central library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly knowledgeable about the subject and helpful to us. Their curriculum is not similar to other colleges, but it gives in-depth knowledge about engineering or any other course you study.
detailed_review.Other: It offers a wide range of UG and PG programs.  The campus is liberal for studies and extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has a peaceful and friendly environment with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a coding club that teaches various problem-solving and other technical skills. The college is good throughout every aspect, looking for placements. The placement cell in this college is extremely good. We have packages in 50 LPA and above.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a good hostel with faculty members on each floor and separate janitors on each floor, which makes it clean. They are very good without any disappointments. They make sure to meet every aspect of students and make sure students are comfortable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is great at explaining various tips and tricks to crack any interview. Especially with the placement training, they do a very good job so that the skills we learn are helpful in our interviews, which helps us easily crack the interview.
detailed_review.Other: There are no ragging reports ever since in this college. They are excellent at this, as they separate first-year from other years and make sure that everyone is friendly.

reviews.course: Doctor of Pharmacy (Pharm.D.)
reviews.review_title: Rollercoaster course and life.

detailed_review.Placements: The course will be chosen through counseling, and students getting above 90 percent can apply for the counseling. There is no placement or campus interview for this course. Clinical pharmacists, CRC, CRA, pharmacological, and many other roles are offered here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the Department of Pharmacy is good, with all labs for the subjects that are taught there. When it comes to the hostel, the fee is only 50,000 for a year. Food at the mess is okay, and the university has its own hospital and a big pavilion for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff is well-experienced and more knowledgeable, and their teaching quality is also good. The course structure is more relevant, with all subjects included to gain in-depth knowledge of the field we choose, and this course has an annual semester pattern.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to explore a lot about both the medical and research fields.

reviews.course: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A place for placement, good infrastructure, green campus.

detailed_review.Placements: I am in the 2021 to 2025 batch, and 80% of students were placed. The highest package offered in our college is Amazon (47 LPA). The average package was 5 to 7 LPA (Capgemini, Cognizant, ZOHO), and the lowest package was 2 to 3 LPA. Top roles in data analysis, software, and networking.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Yes, the Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are very neat and spacious. Hostel facilities are also good, and the mess has tasty food and good water facilities. The canteen is also neat and has good food facilities. Sports and games are also happening nicely, with many competitions taking place at both state and national levels.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, the teachers are very kind and helpful. Teaching is excellent and in an understandable language. The course curriculum is relevant, and students are also ready for the industry environment. Semester exams are easy, and the pass percentage in our department is 100%.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Statistics
reviews.review_title: M.Sc. Statistics at Annamalai University.

detailed_review.Placements: Statistics is an emerging and successful course with many job vacancies in the fields of marketing and finance. Many corporate companies like Cipla, Novartis, and Accenture hire students from our college, with the maximum package being 3.6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Non-vegetarian food is served three times a week. The college provides good medical facilities and regular health checkups for students and faculty members. This initiative demonstrates the college management's concern for students' physical health.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are good listeners, accepting of students' personalities, and treat everyone equally. They are also good at problem-solving and multitasking. Semester exams approach quickly, leaving less time for academics.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Teachers are friendly and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 85% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, Reliance, and Crompton Greaves. The top roles are service engineer and electronics engineer. Around 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Very good infrastructure. The labs are well-equipped with air conditioning. The classrooms look very beautiful with AC. The library is good, and many books are available. We have a tennis court at our college. The college provides good hostel facilities. The canteen food is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our college is good. They are friendly. The teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They help us a lot in understanding the concepts. They are fabulous and clarify our doubts. The course curriculum is good. The semester exams are difficult. The pass percentage is 70%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: VSB Engineering College is the place for placement.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% of students got placed in my course. The minimum package is 3 LPA and the maximum package is 15 LPA. TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, Accenture, and Infosys are the companies recruiting for my course. 95% of students got internships in Capgemini, Accenture, and TCS. Manufacturing and software roles were offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the classrooms have smart boards with 75-inch displays. In my college surroundings, both the hostel and classrooms have high-speed internet Wi-Fi. Different dishes are available in the canteen every day. The hostel food has different varieties based on the days, with non-veg provided twice a week.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers have completed a doctorate in their specific courses. By using staff guidelines, students can easily get placed and increase their knowledge. They teach very clearly and explain with scenario-based examples. They have teaching experience, so they know how to handle the students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose mechanical engineering because it has created a great impact on the future.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, there are many percentages from the 195 cutoff to the 100 cut-off. The average salary package offered is 2 LPA. Most of the students got internships at our college. The stipend offered is Rs. 1,00,000 per annum. Our college teaches placement classes before placements and interviews.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our department, every classroom is neat and has a smart mirror and high-speed Wi-Fi. The department helps to learn without any distractions. Our college consists of a library where there are more than 70,000 books. It has high-speed Wi-Fi. Its speed is 10 Kbs.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, teachers help us in many ways. We can approach it in a friendly manner. They help us in all ways they can. Semester exams are difficult. If we write the correct answers, we will pass. The pass percentage is 45%.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Good university with a strong reputation. One can gain knowledge and secure placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 90% of students are placed in many companies and have passed their government exams. They are mostly selected in banking sector. Around 89% of students are placed in this course. The highest salary package offered is 1.2 lakh for month and the lowest salary is Rs. 52,000 per month. Banking companies are the top recruiters. About 98% of students are placed in internships. Students are placed in agriculture, horticulture, medicine, arts, engineering, fisheries, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities in both hostel and college are excellent. Infrastructure is very neat, and free Wi-Fi is provided to all. Projectors are available in every classroom. There are two main libraries in our college. Food in the mess is tasty. Medical support is available 24 hours. Recreational activities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers do their job the right way and are well-experienced. Course is relevant and creates interest among all. It prepares everyone to face upcoming life situations. Semester exams are really tough sometimes, but they can be faced easily by students. About 65% is the pass mark.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Botany
reviews.review_title: Good ambience, easy transport, and good teachers available.

detailed_review.Placements: In 7th semester, you will be eligible for placement. If there is no campus, our teachers will prepare you to be a brilliant and talented candidate so you can easily crack off-campus placement for any job. 60% of students get placements. From 7th semester, students are eligible for campus placement. The placement companies are Royal Enfield, TCS, INDUSTRY, etc. Students with no arrears are eligible for placement. After completing my degree, I am going to study for government exams.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Techofes is the annual cultural festival of the college, held in mid-February. The range of books and journals is available in the library. Medical library and university library are available in Annamalai University, Chidambaram. Nice environment, eco-friendly hostels, RO water, indoor games, outdoor games, and gym facilities are available. Good food and tasty meals, with non-veg served twice a week. The registration process is very easy, and online registration is also available, with fees ranging from 10,000 to 20,000 for three months.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very honorable, and they are also friendly with every student. Our teachers guide each student like friends. I like all our faculty members. There are a total of 8 semesters, and each semester has four CA exams and lab exams. Those who do not attend classes will definitely not clear the exams.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.)
reviews.review_title: It is a good college to learn practically at an affordable fee.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, placement programs are conducted. Around 60% of students got placed. The average salary package offered is around 1.5 LPA - 2 LPA. In the 3rd year, we went for internships in industries like Madras Pharmaceuticals, Medopharm, Axon, and Wellous Pharma. Roles offered are clinical pharmacist and hospital pharmacist.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides excellent infrastructure. Lab facilities are excellent in our college. It is a government college. These facilities are incredible. There is a peaceful and wide library including all standard books and journals. Classrooms are sufficient for students. The hostel is near the college, so travel is convenient. Within 5 minutes of walking, we can reach the college. The food is average. Rooms are sufficient. It is a university, so sports events are excellent. Our university has a Pavilion for all sports. We can also get courses offered by the physical education department. Every year they conduct sports day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our department staff members are well-qualified and doctorates. They teach wonderfully in both theory and practical. We have 8 semesters in 4 years. Exams are not very difficult. Syllabus questions are asked in exams. We can pass by reading well.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in pharmacy. It is a wonderful course. It provides a good future in many departments like research, medical shops, marketing, etc. It provides government jobs as drug inspector and hospital pharmacist. Our college develops our skills.

reviews.course: MBA in Human Resource Management
reviews.review_title: Overall best University for MBA in Human Resource Management Course.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 79% percent of students achieve placement. The highest salary offered was 25 lacks and the minimum salary offered was 6 Lacs. Top recruiting companies are Accenture, Myntra, Flipkart, Amazon, Tata Consultancy Services etc. Top roles are Data Analyst, Manager etc. Around 75% students received internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Lab facilities are available when required for students in any department. There are 55 classrooms and they are amazing. There are many libraries including normal libraries and digital libraries. The Wi-Fi connection is good. The hotel restaurant has good quality of food. The university offers education in a friendly atmosphere.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very good. They support us. Students are also supported in extracurricular activities like sports and games like cricket, volleyball, and basketball. They have high-value degrees and years of teaching experience. Yes, they are Industry ready. The tests are easy to score and the pass rate is 76%.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.)
reviews.review_title: Department of Pharmacy, Annamalai University.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in my classes is about 75%. The highest package would be 50,000, and the lowest package would be 20,000 rupees. Apollo Pharmacy is one of the top recruiting companies. Every student will get an internship in their 4th year, and placements will be awarded in the final year after the semesters. The minimum percentage for students should be 7.5 CGPA out of 10. The roles offered are clinical pharmacist positions in pharmacies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are average. The pharmacy department has well-equipped machinery and apparatus for lab practicals, which are conducted in batches. There are no Wi-Fi facilities in college, but Wi-Fi is available in the hostel. Classrooms are overall good, with many benches available, and the stage is nearby the blackboard, making classes clearly visible to everyone. The library is equipped with international books and many subject-specific texts. Every year, there is an annual sports meet, and the hospital nearby ensures good medical facilities. There is no canteen on the college campus, but there is a cooperative store in every department.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are supportive and guide students effectively. Every student is assigned a mentor. The faculty members are well qualified, holding higher degrees such as PhDs, and they are experienced professors with more than 15 to 19 years in the field. Teaching quality is good, and students are encouraged to refer to the library for additional skills. The courses strictly follow the Pharmacy Council of India syllabus, and students are prepared for internships in their third year. Semester exams are a bit difficult, with a pass percentage of 50%.
detailed_review.Other: The main reason for choosing this course is a passion for medicine. The best aspect of the course is the extensive knowledge and skills related to the pharmaceutical industry and its strict regulations learned from professors. The course should improve its materials to incorporate the latest technology, as the syllabus is good, but some of the content is outdated. There is a Pongal celebration every year along with the annual sports meet. Various scholarships are available, including the first graduate scholarship, post-matric scholarship, Pudhumaipen scholarship, and Tamil Puthalvan scholarship. The campus is very wide, with a neat atmosphere.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Botany
reviews.review_title: Faculty was good. Good environment to study.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities from our university are really good. Most of our seniors are getting jobs. It is an institution where students compete for studying, and those few who get admission in this university and study hard are truly fortunate for getting a job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's a well-accomplished room with an attached bathroom. The room is comfortable for three students. The hostel mess has a special menu for each of the seven days, and they also provide snacks during the evening time. The registration process is very simple; we can register in the hostel office within 30 minutes. My native district is Dharmapuri, and the college is located in Chidambaram, so I stay in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is very detailed and structured in a way to give maximum benefits to the students. There are a total of eight electives spread over two years, with two electives per semester: 1. Mushroom Biology, 2. Ecology Diversity, 3. Forestry Ecology, 4. Fungal Bio Systematics, 5. Plant Protection, 6. Applied Algal Microbiology, 7. Limnology, and 8. Forestry Seed Technology.

college_info.college_name: Annamalai University Admission 2025: UG, PG, PhD, Courses, Eligibility, Application Form, Dates

admission.title: Annamalai University Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Read on to learn more about Annamalai University course admissions. Annamalai University offers UG, PG, PG diploma, diploma, certificate, and PhD programmes. It also provides courses through distance learning, which are approved by the Distance Education Council (DEC). In addition to the regular programmes, value-added courses in all the departments of Annamalai University are conducted every day after the class timings. Additionally, Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) conducted through the SWAYAM portal of the UGC are also offered at Annamalai University free of cost.

faqs.question: When are Annamalai University Distance Education application forms out?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University DDE offers BFA at the undergraduate (UG) level and MA, MBA, MCom, MFA, MSc, and MSW courses at the Postgraduate (PG) level. Candidates who are interested in getting admission to UG or PG courses offered by this university can apply by visiting the official website. Students can apply for UG admission program-level courses if they have a 10+2 degree in the relevant subject from a university that is known to be good. Admission to courses in UG programs is based only on merit. For PG-level courses, applicants must have a Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field from a university that is recognized. To get into the PG Diploma program, students must have a Bachelor’s degree from a recognised university with at least a 50% mark.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for BSc in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Only those candidates who fulfill the requirements are eligible to apply for the preferred course. Thus, students seeking BSc admission at Annamalai University must check the below-mentioned eligibility requirements: Category Eligibility Status Candidates who have completed their Classes eight to 12 education in Tamil Nadu Eligible and do not need to provide a ‘Nativity Certificate’ Tamil Nadu native candidates who have passed any of the Classes from eight to 12 from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu Eligible if they enclose a copy of the 'Nativity Certificate' while applying

faqs.question: What is the fee structure of Annamalai University for the B.Sc. Programme?
faqs.answer: The total course fee for the BSc at Annamalai University ranges around INR 10,300 - INR 4.5 lakh. Candidates willing to seek admission to any of the BSc courses are shortlisted on the basis of their marks in Science subjects in previous qualifying degree/ exam. Shortlisted candidates are further called for a counselling-cum-seat allotment round. Annamalai University offers a BSc (Hons) programme across three specialisations. The programme comprises four years of academic curriculum divided in a semester pattern. The annual fee for BSc (Hons) Agriculture/ Horticulture is around INR 56,030 while for B.Sc. (Hons) Agriculture: Self-Supporting, it is around INR 1.21 LPA. This fee keeps on changing. Hence visit the official website for complete information.

faqs.question: How can I take admission to the Annamalai University BCom course?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University admission process for the BCom course starts with the submission of the application form. The form is available on the official website of the university. To fill out the form, students would be required to submit basic details such as name, contact details, education qualification, etc. After completion of the application stage, the admission committee constitutes a rank list based on students’ scores in the qualifying examination. Based on this list, students are shortlisted. These students must report to the institute for verification of documents and payment of fees. Successful fee payment completes the admission process.

faqs.question: How much rank should I score to get Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: To get a seat at Annamalai University for MBBS course, candidates must score upto 11005 in the Round 1 Seat allotment of NEET UG Counselling. The MCC conducted NEET UG Counselling upto Round 3, where, candidates who scored upto 14384 i n R2 and upto 17596 in R3 for the General category All India Quota were eligible. Annamalai University accepts NEET UG scores for admission to the MBBS course. Candidates who have appeared for the NEET exam are eligible for the final admissions. To know more about Annamalai University cutoff, stay tune to this page.

faqs.question: How can students join Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: The UG degree admission process entails the basic eligibility criteria of maintaining a minimum aggregate of 40% to 50% in Class 12. For PG level programmes, candidates must secure a minimum aggregate of 50% in graduation and secure a valid score in suggested entrance exams, depending on the course opted for. The University considers valid scores of entrance exams such as NEET UG/ PG, CEETA, TANCET, TNEA and others.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure of Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Offering courses at the UG, PG, PhD, and Diploma levels, Annamalai University offers courses at the total tuition fee ranging from INR 2.8 K to INR 29.4 Lakh. Annamalai University offers more than 500 courses through distance education, Annamalai University admissions are both merit-based and entrance-based.  Students can check with the admission office if the university allows payment through both online and offline modes.

faqs.question: How many courses are offered at Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University offers nearly 445 courses at UG, PG, doctoral, Diploma and certificate levels. These courses are offered across the streams of Engineering, Science, Arts, Commerce, Management, Fine Arts, Architecture & Planning, Aviation, etc. The courses are full-time, part-time, distance, and online. Moreover, the university and its affiliated colleges offer the courses. Some of the Annamalai University-affiliated colleges are AIHM Institute of Tourism and Hotel Management, Aleesha Institute of Fashion Designing, Allied College of Hospitality, Culinary Arts and Management, Annamalai University DDE, Aquariuss Animations Pvt Ltd, etc. Click Here for eligibility, fee, and selection details about offered courses.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for BPharm in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University has prescribed the eligibility criteria based on the nativity of students. Candidates seeking admission must check out the below-mentioned eligibility criteria before applying: Category Eligibility Status Candidates who have completed their Class Eight to Class 12 education in Tamil Nadu Eligible and do not need to provide a ‘Nativity Certificate’ Tamil Nadu native candidates who have passed any of the Classes from eight to 12 from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu Eligible if they enclose a copy of the "Nativity Certificate" while applying

faqs.question: What are the minimum marks required to get a seat at Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: You must secure a minimum aggregate ranging from 40% to 60%, differing as per the chosen course to get in Annamalai University UG and PhD courses. However, for PG level course admissions, candidates must secure a minimum aggregate of 40% to 50% in graduation.

faqs.question: How can I take admission to B.Pharm at Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University inducts students to its BPharm course based on fulfillment of eligibility and selection criteria. Students who fulfill the eligibility criteria can begin the admission process by applying for the preferred BPharm course. The application forms can be found on the official website of the university. After the application stage, the university begins with the selection process. Students are selected based on the merits obtained in the last qualifying exam. At last, the selected candidates must make the payment of the Annamalai University BPharm fee to secure admission.

faqs.question: Is there BTech in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: The university offers four-year full-time BE/BTech courses in various specialisations on-campus and through affiliated colleges. In addition, apart from the regular BE degree, Annamalai University also offers part-time BE courses covering four specialisations. BE Lateral entry courses are also available. Admission to the UG courses is based on merit, seats are further allotted to the shortlisted candidates through TNEA counselling . Some of the specialisations in which the course is offered are Chemical Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering and Electrical & Electronics Engineering, which have been accredited by the NBA with an ‘A’ Grade.

faqs.question: Is BTech available at Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Annamalai University offers four-year full-time BE/BTech courses across multiple specialisations on-campus and through its affiliated colleges. Apart from the regular BE degree, the University also offers part-time BE courses covering four specialisations. It also offers BE lateral entry admission for the course. Annamalai University BTech admission is based on TNEA counselling . Annamalai University Chennai BE degree courses in Chemical Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering and Electrical & Electronics Engineering have been accredited by the NBA with an ‘A’ Grade.

faqs.question: In which specialisations does Annamalai University offer BE/BTech?
faqs.answer: Over 30 BE/BTech courses are offered by Annamalai University. The courses are offered in full-time and part-time modes. Lateral entry to a few courses is also offered. Check the table given below for BE/BTech specialisations:

faqs.question: Can I get into Annamalai University with a TNEA cutoff rank of 52000? I belong to General category.
faqs.answer: In General category under the AI quota, the TNEA 2025 cutoff ranks ranged between 372 and 131755 for BE admission covering multiple specialisations. So, considering the cutoff range, there are chances that candidates with a TNEA rank of 52000 can get admission at Annamalai University. However, the cutoff ranks ranged varied across diffrent rounds. Therefore, it is not compulsory that the students will get a seat in the first round and they might have to wait until the last round. BE admission at this university is based on valid JEE Main/ Class 12 score, follwed by TNEA counselling.

faqs.question: I have scored less than 50% in graduation. Can I get admission for MBA in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: With less than 50% in graduation it is difficult to get admission in Annamalai University for MBA course. The minimum marks required for the same is 50%. You can contact the admission office for more details.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for MBA in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: The university does not conduct any in-house entrance test for MBA in Annamalai University. However, the aspirants are selected based on merit in TANCET followed by a counselling round. Candidates seeking admission need to take the entrance test and apply by completing the TANCET application process. There is no other provision for admission to an MBA. Hence, aspirants must take the exam and secure a valid score.

faqs.question: Can I do MBA in Annamalai University?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking admission to the Annamalai University MBA course admission need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria. The applications are accepted by only the candidates fulfilling the eligibility criteria. To be eligible for MBA admission, students must have passed a graduation degree (10+2+3 pattern) in any stream with a minimum of 50% aggregate (SC/ST candidates need to qualify for the graduation degree with pass marks only). Further, candidates must also hold the relevant documents at the time of admission for verification purposes.

faqs.question: I have scored less than 60% in graduation. Can I get admission for M.Tech at Annamalai University?

placement_faqs.answer: Yes, students completing their DPharm degrees from AU can explore various job opportunities in the government sector. After graduation, they can apply for job titles such as Pharmacists in the Indian Armed Forces, government hospitals , and such. Students can also find vacancies in government-run drug manufacturing units, or regulatory bodies like the Central Drugs Standard Control Organisation (CDSCO). The below table contains a list of different government jobs available after completing DPharm: Job Title Starting Salary Range (Per Annum) Junior Scientific Assistant INR 4 - 6 lakhs Medical Representative in PSU INR 3 - 5 lakhs Pharmacy Assistant in Indian Armed Forces, ESIC Hospitals INR 2 - 3.5 lakhs Pharmacists in Government Hospitals (e.g., AIIMS, State Hospitals) INR 2.5 - 4 lakhs

placement_faqs.question: How much is the fee for the Annamalai University BTech course?
placement_faqs.answer: Annamalai University BTech fees range between INR 1.5 Lacs - INR 7 lakh. The fee mentioned here is the total tuition fee with some other components and is taken from an unofficial source, hence is indicative. For the detailed fee structure, candidates are advised to contact the admission department of the University. Moreover, the total course fee includes several fee components, including the caution deposit, alumni fee, hostel charges (if applicable), etc. At the time of form filling, candidates must also pay the application fee.

placement_faqs.question: What is the fee structure of Annamalai University for the B.Sc. Programme?
placement_faqs.answer: The total course fee for the BSc at Annamalai University ranges around INR 10,300 - INR 4.5 lakh. Candidates willing to seek admission to any of the BSc courses are shortlisted on the basis of their marks in Science subjects in previous qualifying degree/ exam. Shortlisted candidates are further called for a counselling-cum-seat allotment round. Annamalai University offers a BSc (Hons) programme across three specialisations. The programme comprises four years of academic curriculum divided in a semester pattern. The annual fee for BSc (Hons) Agriculture/ Horticulture is around INR 56,030 while for B.Sc. (Hons) Agriculture: Self-Supporting, it is around INR 1.21 LPA. This fee keeps on changing. Hence visit the official website for complete information.

placement_faqs.question: How many students were placed during Annamalai University MBA placements?
placement_faqs.answer: The institute has not released its course wise data yet. However, NIRF Report for 2025 is out. According to the NIRF report 91 PG 2-year students were placed during Annamalai University placements. placement_faqs.question: What is the application fees for the MBA programme at DDE Annamalai University?
placement_faqs.answer: Candidates who are interested in pursuing any programme at DDE Annamalai University can apply online or offline at their convenience. Candidates who want to apply for the MBA programme must pay an application fee of INR 250 for offline applications and INR 325 for online applications. For all other remaining programmes application fees is INR 100 and INR 175 for offline and online applications respectively.

ranking_section.title: Annamalai UniversityNIRF Ranking 2025
ranking_section.description: According to the rankings from NIRF, Annamalai University Chidambaram outperformed various other institutes, securing a higher position for its achievements in Teaching, Graduation Success Rates, Research, and creating an inclusive, quality learning environment. Annamalai University Chidambaram's rankings in 'University' category have shown stability in trend as per the rankings of the previous years. In 2025, Annamalai University Chidambaram's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the ' According to the rankings from NIRF, Annamalai University Chidambaram outperformed various other institutes, securing a higher position for its achievements in Teaching, Graduation Success Rates, Research, and creating an inclusive, quality learning environment. Annamalai University Chidambaram's rankings in 'University' category have shown stability in trend as per the rankings of the previous years. In 2025, Annamalai University Chidambaram's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. The ranks granted to the institute in the 'Engineering' category have shown a fluctuating trend when compared to last year's rankings. In 2025, Annamalai University Chidambaram fell 50 ranks to #201 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. The 'Pharmacy' category rankings of the institute have shown a decreasing trend when compared to last year's rankings. In 2025, Annamalai University Chidambaram fell 15 ranks to #42 rank in the 'Pharmacy' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has slipped in the rankings. It is noticeable that in the 'State Public University' category, the institute's ranks have shown a decreasing trend when evaluated against the ranking of the past year. In 2025, Annamalai University Chidambaram fell 3 ranks to #34 rank in the 'State Public University' category by the NIRF ranking. Check out the updated rankings and category details from different ranking bodies below. Annamalai University Chidambaram secured #101-150 rank in the 'University' category of NIRF 2025 rankings. Its status is comparable to top institutions such as Annamalai University Chidambaram and Ashoka University Sonipat. sections.heading: Introduction
text: Annamalai University, Chidambaram, is spread across around 1,000 acres of land. Annamalai University has various computer and research labs that are equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and various advanced technologies comparable to any top college or university in the country. There is also a general library available for students that provides access to JSTOR and offers several other facilities to students.

sections.heading: Annamalai University Campus Highlights
text: Annamalai University is one of the largest and oldest universities in South India. The university has 50 departments of study under eight faculties. Founded by the legendary philanthropist and farsighted visionary, Rajah Sir Annamalai Chettiar in 1929, Annamalai University has played a key role in the social, cultural, and economic uplift of the people across the rungs of society for nearly a century. Annamalainagar, the University Town, is located just to the east of Chidambaram, the Abode of the Cosmic Dancer, Lord Nataraja. A few infrastructure highlights of the campus are given in the table below:
Campus Building:

sections.heading: Annamalai University Hostel and Residential Facilities
text: Annamalai University provides separate hostels for male and female students, as well as dedicated accommodation for international students, ensuring safety and comfort for all. Life in the hostels promotes independence, cooperation, and lasting friendships, as students share living spaces, meals, and academic journeys. With regular cultural and recreational activities, as well as access to sports and study facilities, hostel life plays an important role in the personal and social development of the students.

sections.heading: Annamalai University Academic and Research Facilities
text: Annamalai University is known for academic excellence. The institute offers well-developed and well-maintained academic and research infrastructure. The classrooms are fully equipped with the latest technology. The university offers diverse courses such as engineering, arts, science, and other fields. Therefore, the university has a huge variety of classrooms suitable for these diverse courses. The infrastructure of the institute promotes student-to-student and student-to-faculty interaction.

sections.heading: Annamalai University Library
text: Annamalai University has a vast library to meet the needs of students, faculty and other staff. The main library was started in 1920 with a token deposit of 200 books when Sri Meenakshi College was founded. Then, the main library was initially housed in the eastern wing of the Administrative building. It moved into its present abode in 1959, opening a new chapter in its history. The library has a collection of :
