reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The 2024, B.Tech batch reality.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, around 80% students were placed last year. The highest package is around 33 LPA and the average is 10.4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Deloitte, HCL Technologies, and Hero Group. 73% of students got internships last year, and the companies were the same as mentioned above. Top roles offered are full-stack software developer, game developer, IoT engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are various facilities available in my course. We have Wi-Fi all over the campus and a 72GB weekly limit per student. Classrooms are fine and have a decent amount of space. We have a huge and very informative library. The quality of hostel rooms is nice, and they are cleaned regularly. Mess serves decent food that is edible and we have a variety of stalls and shops on our campus. We have 24-hour availability in medical services, and there are a lot of sports that you can indulge yourself in, like basketball, cricket, football, archery, badminton, chess, billiards, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, and we have some faculty members who have a Ph.D. degree from abroad, and they have a lot of knowledge that they share with us. All teachers are good at what they teach. This course not only serves us with normal theoretical knowledge but also helps with practical skills and makes us ready for the industry, as it provides industry visits too. Semester exams have a relevant amount of difficulty that assesses your skills and knowledge. The pass percentage is approximately 91%, which is quite good.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was enthusiastic about computers and software, which is why I wanted to do something that is related to my interests. The best thing about this course is that they not only provide theoretical knowledge but also teach hands-on skills that are required for a student of this course. The only thing I think needs to be better is proper distribution of evaluation all over the semester, and not only forcing all of them in the end before the end-semester exams. A lot of events take place regularly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Do not come here unless it is the last option one have.

detailed_review.Placements: I have not yet sat down for placements, but the placements shown in marketing and in real life do not match. The numbers are low and they include off-campus placements as well. They calim to have placement with a salary package of 40 LPA, but in reality someone got it on their own off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are no smart desktops, Wi-Fi is slow, and hostels are not clean. Overall, the infrastructure is not amazing. Classrooms are not small, but they are not well maintained especially when compared to the classrooms MBA and BBA students get. Washrooms are always unclean and overall, it is a nightmare.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is sometimes good, but most of the time it is not helpful. Corse curriculum is stressful and gives me nightmares with so many evaluations together. All of them require grades above 20% and teaching quality is below average.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is nice, but only for students who didn’t get into colleges like DTU.

detailed_review.Placements: We have 7 to 8 subjects and have more than 500 students in CSE batch and around 10 students in ECE branch. Around 13 students in mechanical branch. Some companies visit for placements, but most of them are associated with Hero and primarily recruit mechanical students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, there are many labs, classrooms, and big library. College and hostel are Wi-Fi enabled. There are that offer three-seater and two-seater rooms, along with apartments. Mess food is good, but it's not like home-cooked food.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified, but they teach in a way like school teachers. They also conduct extra classes when needed and spend time focusing on the practical learning experiences of students. There are more than 72 teachers for 8 sections of CSC branch, as well as for mechanical and ECE branches.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the B.Tech in CSE because the number of placements in this course is good, and the intake for B.Tech in CSE and BML is lower, that's why I chose this course. There is a decent crowd on campus.  I got a 10% scholarship at this college. Some students got 34% to 90% scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, according to me, college is decent.

detailed_review.Placements: Somewhere around 80% of students get placed every year. The average salary package was around 11 LPA, which is better than many private colleges. Top recruiting companies are ServiceNow, Deloitte, etc. Placements are improving with each year but also not regressing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the campus is very nice. All classrooms are digital with centralised air-conditioners. Wi-Fi speed is decent sometimes and sometimes great. There are many labs for each course separately with fully functioning tools. The environment of our college is very nice, full of greenery.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very knowledgeable, but only a few teachers know how to teach. In 1st sem, courses related to my course are very few, but that is the same in every college. Exams are a little difficult for particular subjects. There are many assignments and presentations.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements are decent and the campus is less crowded

detailed_review.Placements: In the last placements season, about 80% of students got placed, which is a good number compared to other colleges during the recession. The highest salary package offered is 35 LPA, and the lowest salary offered is 6 LPA (on campus). Top recruiting company is OYO Rooms. Only about 20% of students secured internships. Top role offered is a software developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of campus is quite good. Wi-Fi provides a good speed of 70 Mbps. Classrooms are well-equipped and fully air-conditioned. Library is quite good with a decent number of books. Hostel is quite nice compared to other colleges. Campus is clean and well-maintained. All sports are available on campus but they do not provide equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are not at all knowledgeable. The teaching quality is also very bad. Some teachers present a slideshow on a topic and leave, while others provide brief information about the topic and expect students to research the topic themselves. The course curriculum is not relevant and doesn't make students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: There is no campus life at all. Only one fest is conducted in a year, which is also not great.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: BML Munjal University review.

detailed_review.Placements: A good number of students were placed in the last term better than many private colleges. The highest package was around 40 LPA, the average was around 9 LPA and the lowest was around 4-5 LPA. Decent placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The institute offers pretty good facilities overall with solid infrastructure supporting the academic environment. There are numerous well-equipped labs available for Computer Science students where classes are frequently held to ensure hands-on learning. These labs provide access to the latest tools and technologies. While the Wi-Fi can be somewhat inconsistent at times, it is still decent enough for general academic use. The classrooms are also well-maintained providing a comfortable and conducive environment for learning. Overall, the facilities contribute positively to the student experience helping ensure that resources are available to meet academic and practical needs.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in the BTech program are generally supportive and well-qualified for their roles. They have good knowledge of the subjects they teach making the learning process easy. The quality of teaching is decent with some educators excelling at explaining complex concepts while a few can be a bit challenging to work with. Overall, the faculty makes sure students get the necessary guidance to succeed. The course curriculum is nicely planned and relevant to industry needs providing a comprehensive education that prepares students for the professional world. This balance of theory and application makes the program useful.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: BML Munjal University review .

detailed_review.Placements: Placements haven't happened yet for my course but my seniors have received below average placements for now, with a lot of them not getting placed as well. Currently the package they are getting is average of 5 Lacs and most below 10 with the exception of a select few who are even able to try for 10+ Lacs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms and library are all pretty good, Wi-Fi can go out sometimes but otherwise it's pretty decent. Labs, classrooms and library are fully air-conditioned and good. Mess food is mostly bad with some exceptions and medical facilities are awful. Sports and games are pretty good with an air-conditioned badminton court and a plethora of sports to choose from.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaches are decent. Curriculum is generally easy to get by and exams are not too hard to pass especially with internal grading being good. Difficulty is there in getting good marks but to pass by it's super easy. Curriculum definitely does not help in becoming industry ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A review about BML Munjal University .

detailed_review.Placements: A decent amount of students were placed in the last term so as to say that it was better than a lot of private colleges. As for package, the highest package was around 40 lacs, the average was around 9 lacs, and the lowest was around 4-5 lacs. Decent placements are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Pretty good facilities overall, as there is good infrastructure. There are numerous labs for computer science students, and classes are held in those labs frequently as well. Wi-fi is somewhat consistent but still pretty decent. Classrooms are good as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good and supportive as well. All of them are adequately qualified for their jobs. All of them are knowledgeable as well. The quality of teaching is decent. Some teachers are really good, but some can be difficult ones as well. Course curriculum is definitely relevant.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed is 76.8%. The highest package was 32.99 Lacs and the current average is 8.5 Lacs. Companies such as Yotta, Compliance, Starten Systems and Care Health Insurance hire from this college. 100 percent of students from my batch secured internships with companies like Coding Bits, DataFlair, BobbleAi, and Techno Geekz participating.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is excellent, with almost everything easily available and well-maintained. Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the campus. The library is open from 8 AM to 1:30 AM, making it very accessible. The labs are regularly maintained and cleaned. The library offers a range of course books, fictional novels, newspapers, and magazines. The hostel facilities are very good, with quality mess food. Some sports facilities, like cricket, could be improved, but the hostel includes everything a student needs, from AC to laundry services.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is well-educated and very helpful. Most faculty members hold Ph.D. degrees in their respective fields, which enhances their respectability and knowledge. The teaching methods are practical and applicable to real-life problems. The course curriculum is relevant and prepares students for the industry. Semester exams are of medium difficulty, with a passing mark of 40 out of 100 in each course.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is highly relevant for the future and offers more job opportunities compared to other courses. It is interesting and addresses real-world problems, although it could include more coding components. An annual fest is held in March. The campus crowd is very good, though connectivity is an issue. Various scholarships are available, including Haryana Domicile Certificate, Dean’s Scholarship, Defense Award Scholarship, and Alumni Scholarship. There are 23 student-run clubs on campus, making life very vibrant.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: BML Munjal University students lives.

detailed_review.Placements: BML Munjal University (BMU) Placement Overview: BMU witnessed a placement rate of 97% for the 2022–23 batch. The highest package was ₹60 LPA, with an average package of ₹8.51 LPA and a median package of ₹8.51 LPA. Major recruiters included Google, Amazon, Wipro, Axis Bank, Deloitte, KPMG, Samsung, Mahindra, Hero, TVS, and Hyundai. BMU's internship programme, known as the "Practice School," ensures extensive industry exposure, with students spending around 28 weeks interning with various companies like Mahindra, JCB Ltd., Maruti Udyog Ltd., and Hero FinCorp.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College in the first structure is very nice, and the campus is approximately 50 acres large. Wi-Fi is available throughout the whole campus, 24 hours a day. Classrooms are really big and diverse. The food quality of the mess and canteen is really nice; you get a variety of foods every week.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are really highly qualified; most of them are Ph.D. scholars. The course curriculum is relevant for the industrial requirement. 72 to 80% of students pass the semester exams. Semester exams are like mid-to-difficult levels. If a student has any problems, they can contact the professor.
detailed_review.Other: I choose B.Teach CSE because it's highly demandable nowadays, and the best thing about my course is the faculty of our college. Teach CSE is really skilled and highly qualified. Regular cultural events first happen in our college. Scholarships are given on a merit basis. All types of extracurricular activities are available in college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good Facilities, Strong Academics and good campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: Many students of our university have been successfully placed. Some of the companies that recruited this year include Amazon, Deloitte, and KPMG. The highest package so far is around 40 LPA, with the average being around 8LPA. Our university does help in securing good job opportunities for the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: High-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus, and laboratories and classrooms are well equipped. The university library is spacious and provides a good environment for studying. Hostels are nice as well and are equipped with all the necessary amenities. Mess food is good, and the campus provides 24/7 medical assistance.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is good and some of them are really helpful. Our curriculum is designed in such a way that it includes both theoretical and practical knowledge. As our curriculum emphasize a lot on practical learning, our course includes numerous projects and practice school visits to different companies. Like this year we went to Honda, Yakult and Hero plants etc., which provided us with valuable insights about industrial operations.
detailed_review.Other: A lot of events happen in our college as we have around 23-25 different societies which students can join. Also our university is quite diverse when it comes to the student community as we have students from all over the country. The crowd is good as well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the facilities provided by the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Recently many of the students got placed and the college plays a good role in connection us with the companies. Top companies- Google, KPMG, Deloitte and many others. There is a whole process for placement selection and hence benefits the capable students .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The mess provides really nice food on most of the days for example 5/7 and the other days it is just fine. The library is really big and has a high-speed Wi-Fi and is a really good environment to study. Taking about the sports, we have many sports for example football, tennis, cricket and many more.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty is extremely qualified and is really helpful towards us. They are dedicated in fostering a healthy environment for us and hence the curriculum is student friendly. The curriculum is dynamic and contains practical application. Electives are also offered.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty members, good placements in 2023, good infrastructure, and good campus li

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75 percent were placed this year. The previous year, 100 percent of students were placed. This year, the highest package was 40 LPA, the average was 9 LPA, and the lowest was 4 LPA. Our top recruiting companies were Federal Bank, Starten Systems, Yotta, and Compliance Cart.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: BML Munjal University offers top-notch amenities like Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, modern classrooms, and a vast library. Hostel amenities are comfortable, and the food quality of the mess and canteen is good. Medical facilities are available 24 hours a day, and all sports facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is high. The curriculum is relevant and makes the student industry-ready. Semester exams are a bit challenging, with a respectable pass percentage, but there is relatively good grading that helps students score well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good platform for the students to achieve good placements through learning.

detailed_review.Placements: Earlier, due to less job availability, the placements were less in number. But now, all the students in the batch get placed. The average package of this college was around 8 Lacs this year. The highest package of this college was around 32 Lacs and with this, all the students got placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are very nice. Wi-Fi is good along with the library being great. The hostels are decent and the infrastructure is very good. There are several cafes and chilling places along with various clubs for the students to participate and enjoy. Various activities are conducted for the students to do in their free time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good, kind, helpful, and are always ready to help their students. They teach very nicely. Their way of teaching is very good. They try to take the performances of their students to an approachable level. They work hard for their students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Due to the recession, most universities, even grade A universities, are facing difficulties in placement. Even in those hard times, BML Munjal University has 33 lacs of the highest package. So I would say joining the university is worth the money. Thankyou.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is worth the price you pay. Students will have full access to all the possible facilities and will have time to use them as well. The course curriculum is designed this way. I personally live a very happy life with no stress here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Very friendly and encouraging faculty members in any domain. Nice superiors and mentors. I love the classroom, buddy system, and mentor system. Attendance is mandatory at a minimum of 75%. The grading would be relatively through the JEE-Main grading system.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Undervalued university, in terms of everything.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 85% students get placed, with an average package of above 12 lacs. The highest is approximately 32 lacs and the lowest is 7 lacs, with no entry to mass recruiters. To checkout top recruiting companies, you can visit the official website of the university.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are excellent including food, library, and classrooms. Wi-Fi is a bit slower. So it is above average. Library is filled with thousands of books from all aspects of business, law, engineering, mathematics etc. Hostels are excellent in terms of cleanliness, and game zone.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are excellent. They are helpful and knowledgeable. They know how to deliver their knowledge. Course makes you industry ready. Annually updated curriculum for the betterment of students, and good placements.
detailed_review.Other: Its connectivity with industry hub i.e, Gurgaon makes it even better to join. Everything is good in terms of education, knowledge, and sports. If you are good enough, you will definitely get scholarship too.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college in terms of teaching, knowledge, and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 75% of students got placed in our university. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Microsoft, IBM, and TCS. The highest salary package offered is 47 LPA. The average salary package offered is 9 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. Almost 55% of students got internships from all courses. Top roles offered are web developer and full stack developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college and hostel is well-maintained. Our college provides all facilities like Wi-Fi, digital projectors, etc. The quality of the hostel facilities is good. The quality of the food is good. Our college provides medical facilities and various camping for covid vaccines. Multiple sports are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are quite helpful. They understand students' problems. The quality of the teaching is the best. The course is well-structured and makes us industry-ready. The difficulty of exams is based on students' caliber and is moderate. The pass percentage is 33.3%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has very helpful teachers who guide you all time.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are a bit average in our college compared to other colleges. The highest salary package offered is more than 35 LPA. The average salary package offered for our course is 8.50 LPA. The lowest salary package offered ranges between 4 LPA - 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are KMPG, Deloitte, Hero, ServiceNow, etc. More than 90% of students got placed in our college. There are two internship processes conducted throughout the course. One is for two months, and another is for 6 months time period. Our college provides good companies for internships but not much great stipends.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus life is great. Our college provides very good infrastructure and facilities. The campus is Wi-Fi-enabled. It is available 24X7 on campus. All classrooms are great. The library is one of the best places on campus to study with all its facilities. There are a wide variety of clubs on campus and added according to current trends. The quality of the hostel and the food in the mess is very great. There are good medical facilities and good facilities for sports with coaches. There are options for accommodation in a hostel like single, double, triple, and apartments.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are very helpful and qualified. The student-teacher ratio is 8:1. The quality of the teaching is good and mainly focused on practical-based knowledge. The subjects also change according to current trends. The pass percentage is 40%. It is not much difficult to pass exams. You can score very good marks. The system is practical-based. The course curriculum is very relevant compared to other colleges. We have a credit system in our college. There are different weightage of credits for different subjects. Our college focuses to make students-industry ready by putting in a lot of effort.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because of my great interest in computer science. The teaching is practically based. The number of faculty members can be improved, and well-experienced faculty members should be brought to our college. There are a lot of events being organised on campus, and there are events based on everything. The fest conducted is the 67th milestone BMU and mini-fest BMU including sports in it. Our college provides scholarships to students based on their JEE percentile, class 12th board results, merit, sports, etc. Scholarships vary from 25% to 100% according to merit in different fields, and students have to maintain it by scoring good grades every year. There are more than 30 clubs present on campus. A lot of extracurricular activities are conducted in our college. The campus life is one of the best in our college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty and the curriculum and the management of the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 75 percent of the students were placed with a median of 8L and average of 13L PA. The highest package was 33 Lacs by service now and the lowest package was 8 Lacs. Computer eng and MBA graduate are the top roles offered by our college and the management.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is awesome but still it needs some changes in it somewhere but overall it's good. The new hostels and new classrooms are designed very well. Library is very well designed and is very creative. The environment in the college is also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Curriculum is also good in our college and is revised again and again so that no student faces any issue with it and helps us to complete our course easily and effictively and increase our knowledge in the topics which would help to get us placed in top companies.
detailed_review.Other: They should increase more courses in B.Tech like civil engineering and other courses. Everything else is good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great placements, good infrastructure and helpful faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: 97% of students were placed with an average of 8.77 LPA in 2021-22, the lowest was 4lpa and the highest was 32.3LPA. The highest package was 40 LPA. The placement recent for 2022-23 is unknown, but the average until now is 12LPA for B.Tech CSE. There is a total of 9 months internship, the first 3 months in the 3rd semester and 6 months in the 7th semester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The whole campus is Wi-Fi enable, there is a decent medical room with 24/7 access and a doctor from 9 AM to 10 PM. There is every kind of sport including table tennis and pool. There are 2 tennis courts, a cabbage, a MAT, a basketball court,  2 indoor badminton courts, and well-equipped labs. Mess food is managed by a student-run mess committee and the food is decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and helpful. The curriculum is one of the best in India, according to me for a private institute. All the learning is practically based and the curriculum keeps changing according to the current trends. The pass percentage is 40% and the grading is relative. There is a very good credit system in the university, so each subject has a different weightage in the CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd here is really good and there are insane opportunities for anything you want to do. There is a very big fest named "67th Milestone", and the famous rapper "King" has come to perform this year. Its 52KMs away from the airport. Every weekend there is a shuttle from campus to IFFCO chowk metro station.

college_info.college_name: SOET BML Munjal University Admission 2025: Application Process, Eligibility, Courses & Fee

faqs.question: Are admissions open at School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University?
faqs.answer: Yes, School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University admissions are currently open. Candidates need to apply for the preferred course online. The selection for BTech course is based on SAT, CUET, JEE Main or BMU Aptitude Test. Aspirants need to submit the scores while filling out the application form. The school accepts the application form of the candidates fulfiling the eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: Are admissions at School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University entrance-based or merit-based?
faqs.answer: School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University admissions are entrance-based. The school considers national-level entrance exam score for admission. Candidates with a valid JEE Main, SAT or CUET score can apply. Aspirants can also appear for BMU Aptitude Test. Once selected candidates are also required to provide the documents proving their merit in the entrance exam and last qualifying exam for admission.

faqs.question: Can I join School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University directly?
faqs.answer: School of Engineering and Technology, BML Munjal University offers admission to BTech course based on CUET, SAT or JEE Main score. highlights.summary:
BMS Institute of Technology is a 25-acre institution in Bengaluru, Karnataka, which was developed in the year 2002. BMSIT Bangalore is A NAAC-accredited institution of grade A and AICTE-recognized. It is a privately held institute that is associated with VTU, Belagavi. According to the ranking of NIRF-ranked colleges in 2022, BMSIT Bangalore has been ranked 11 as the best college offering BTech.Simultaneously, as per the rankings of Outlook 2023, BMSIT ranks 103 in the ‘Engineering (Private)’ category. Within 12 departments, BMSIT offers UG and PG-level courses with specializations such as Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Chemistry, Civil Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, and many more. It offers 10+ UG and PG level courses for the span of 2 to 4 years such as BE, MTech, MCA, MSc, and PhD. BMSIT Yelahanka successfully got 93% of students placed according to the year 2023, with the jobs offered around 1100 and 768 students getting placements. The Institute marked the arrival of 272 companies with 28 first-time recruiters. BMSIT Bangalore owns 55+ MoUs with industries and research centres such as EC Council Academic Partner, Vidyashilp Community Trust (VCT), Co-Create Ventures, and many more. Check the BMSIT Bangalore highlights in the following table.

college_info_program.intro:
BMSIT Bangalore offers 10+ UG and PG-level courses with BE as their flagship course and NIRF ranking of 151-200. BMSIT BE course offers 10 specializations with a total of 1920 seats for a 4-year program. The admission eligibility involves 45% of the aggregated score after Class 12 and 60% aggregate through management quota, respectively. Apart from that, the eligibility criteria involve entrance results of KCET/ COMED-K/ Diploma CET. The SC/ST/OBC category aspirants receive a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for admission.

BMSITM Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, average placements and good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75 per cent got placed, the highest is 22 LPA CTC, the lowest package is 3.2 LPA, average package offered is 8 LPA. Companies that visit are Infosys, Cognizant, AWS, and almost all got internships from this course and the roles that are offered in this course is Ai intern, ML intern, and software developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They have a good Wi-Fi facility, classrooms have digital ports and a good library facility. I have no idea about the hostel because I am a day scholar. I have heard that it is decent and manageable, and they have a good medical facility, sports and games are included.
detailed_review.Faculty: The fact that our college is very helpful and the teachers are highly qualified, knowledgeable and the course curriculum is relevant, but it does not make you industry ready, but placement shall help you with that. Semester exams are easy if you study but manageable to pass in the pass percentage is standard.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good and competitive environment for growth, good college.

detailed_review.Placements: 75 percent of students got placed in the CSE Department in 2025. The lowest package offered is 3.5 LPA, the highest package offered is 46.4 LPA and the average is about 9 LPA. Companies for placement are Oracle, Deloitte, Siemens, Rapid, and Atlassian. The percentage of students who got placement either from college or by themselves is around 70 to 80 percent in companies like Phonepe, Nokia, AWS, Google, etc. Roles offered by companies are Consultant, SDE, Dev-Ops, Full Stack Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure offered by department blocks are good. Many more buildings are being built with advanced infrastructure. The quality of the facility offered by the hostel be it for boys or girls, is good. Mess food and canteen food quality are good and tasty. Medical Facilities are available 24 hours in both boys and girls hostel. Hostels also have a gymnasium and indoor sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is good and they cover most of the fundamental concepts for proper understanding. I will not say that the course curriculum is up to the mark but some topics are relevant for the industry, and you mostly have to study on your own. The semester exam is not too difficult if you just study the syllabus, you will pass. Passing percentage is quite good, approximately 93 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement and has a green campus.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college 75 percent of students got placed. The highest package is around 26 LPA, the lowest package offered is 3 LPA and the average package offered is around 9 LPA. The top Recruiting companies for our college are Amazon, Flipkart, Cognizant, Phonepay, IBM etc. 75 to 80 percent of students got internships from your college in Google, Samsung, Deloitte etc. Top roles that are offered are SDE, web developer, full stack developer etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is spread over 24 acres, and the infrastructure is quite good with a vast library having sources from all departments. Our classrooms are fully spacious with one wall of glass to get proper sunlight. They provide full speed Wi-Fi for hostellers and in college also. The quality of our hostel is sometimes good but sometimes it is not hygienic. Sports facilities provided by the hostel are quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful towards students in their studies and projects but some teachers discriminate based on their state. Teachers are highly qualified & knowledgeable in their respective subjects. The teaching quality offered by them is good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it helps the students to be prepared at the industry level too. Semester exams of BMSIT&M CSE depth are quite easy to moderate level while the checking is sometimes strict. It is easy to score if we study for 2 weeks. Pass percentage is 85 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of BMSIT&M placements, campus, and hostel by a 2nd-year student.

detailed_review.Placements: Students who got placed in CSE are around 75 percent. The highest package offered is 46 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.25 LPA. The average package offered is 9 LPA. Companies that visited the college for recruiting are Oracle, Rapid, Infosys, Microsoft, Junglee Rummy, etc. 70-80 percent of students got internships in companies like IBM, Cisco, Microsoft, Google, Atlassian, etc. Roles offered for students are SDE, full-stack developer, SWE, data engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure offered by department blocks is good. They have spacious classrooms, full-speed Wi-Fi, modern labs with the latest equipment, and a vast library that consists of various books and journals from all departments. The quality of facilities offered by the hostel, be it for boys or girls, is good. Mess food and canteen food quality are good and tasty. Medical facilities are available 24 hours in the hostels. It has a sports facility, a chill area, and vending machines.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are surely very helpful and reachable to students. They have immense knowledge and experience in their fields. They are highly qualified, too. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant to today's industry era. The course curriculum helps us get trained for industry-level skills. The difficulty level of semester-end exams is moderate and can be easily passed by just studying for a week or two prior. The pass percentage is around 80-85 percent.

The average package offered is 9 LPA. Top companies that visit the college for recruitment include Microsoft, Oracle, Rapid, Siemens, and West Pharmaceuticals. Around 80 percent of students got internships in companies like Google, Microsoft, AWS, Deloitte, Atlassian, IBM, etc. Roles offered to students are SDE, data analyst, full-stack developer, and SWE.

The quality of the facilities offered by the hostel, be it for boys or girls, is good. Mess and canteen food quality is good. Medical facilities are available 24x7 in both hostels. It also has indoor sports facilities.

The course curriculum is also quite relevant, and helps students to be prepared for the industry level. Semester exams of the CSE Department are easy to moderate. But it is easy to score if we study 1 to 2 weeks prior. The pass percentage is around 85 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of BMS Institute of Technology & Management.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in my course, CSE, is around 78%. The majority are selected in big product-based companies. The highest package is 46.4 LPA. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA, while the average package is around 9 LPA. Top companies that visit are Oracle, Siemens, Deloitte, Microsoft, Rapid, etc. Approximately 75% of students get internships at various tech companies such as Microsoft, Amazon, Google, Oracle, and Tiger Analytics. Top roles grabbed by students are DevOps, Data Engineer, SDE, and Full Stack Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is quite modern and well-established. Lab blocks have big and spacious classrooms with projectors and blackboards. Every class has two CCTV cameras installed. The library is very large with a variety of books. Labs contain all the latest and modern equipment. Hostel facilities are also quite good, but the mess food is of average quality, though sometimes it is good. Medical facilities are always available in the hostel. Wi-Fi in the hostel is good, but it sometimes slows down due to technical issues.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. They have immense knowledge in their subjects and are highly qualified. Teaching quality is very good here. The course curriculum is relevant according to today’s market needs. It helps students become industry-ready by gaining various modern-day skills like AI-ML, Cloud, and Cybersecurity. The difficulty of semester-end exams is moderate, but the evaluation of answer sheets is tougher, so it is not very easy to score marks. In some subjects, one can score marks easily by studying one week prior. The pass percentage is around 70%.

The course curriculum is relevant and helps us become industry-ready. The difficulty level of semester-end exams is moderate, one can score marks easily by studying 1–2 weeks prior. The pass percentage is around 70 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Electrical life in a college of good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Electrical branch has a placement rate of about 80–90 percent, with the highest around 20 LPA, the average around 6–7 LPA, and the lowest around 2–3 LPA. Top companies that visited here are Tata, Amazon, TCS, and more. About 75–80 percent get internship offers from companies like BHEL, BEL, and ISRO also. Roles are technical assistant, power engineer, assistant engineer, and many more. There is stipend also provided on the basis of their work. So maintain your CGPA and learn some basic coding also for a better job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The class takes place in the academic block of our college, which has fans, good tables, as well as a good amount of light in the whole class. The speed of Wi-Fi within the campus is very good anywhere you go. Labs are within the academic block as well as in the BSN block of our college. The library is also in our college, which is in very good shape for study purposes. There is a variety of food for each day of the week in both the mess and canteen. Medical facilities are also there for anyone, and you can play some sports in the college ground in free time.
detailed_review.Faculty: The semester exams are a little bit hard compared to other streams as it is one of the toughest branches, but they can be scored well if you have studied almost all the topics very well. The pass percentage is around 70–80 percent. The course is very nice for the upcoming years as it has very good scope. Students will get everything they want from this college and also they will build themselves. The teachers here have very good command in each and every subject, with some of them holding and also getting higher salaries upon their skills too. So the level is okay.
detailed_review.Other: I have a good interest in the electrical department, that’s why I chose this course in BMSIT, and I think the resources this college provides are the best in the top 10 COMEDK colleges. The things which need to be improved here are that some more qualified teachers should come under this stream and have some input in coding subjects as well. There are two events happening in our college which are Kalarva and Utsaha Vaibhav every year. Every day there is an event going on, the crowd here is very big, but connectivity is very poor, and the whole campus is very green.

college_info.college_name: BMSITM Course Admissions 2025: Eligibility, Fees & Selection Criteria

admission.title: BMSIT Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: BMSIT admission 2025 is entrance-based for some courses while merit-based for others. It accepts scores of certain entrance exams such as PGCET, KCET, etc. BMSIT offers various courses at the UG and PG levels in affiliation with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) , Belagavi. The institute also offers PhD and MSc (Engineering) courses. Interested candidates can apply for admission on the official website.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management offers admission based on entrance exam score of the candidates. The institute accepts state-level entrance exams such as KCET, Karnataka PGCET, etc. for admission to specific programmes. BMSIT also offers admission under the Management Quota to candidates who fulfil the specified requirements. Once the selection is over, the institute releases a merit list announcing the names of the shortlisted candidates.

faqs.question: What is the management fees for BE at BMSIT?
faqs.answer: The total Management annual fee for BE ranges between INR 6 lakh and INR 22 lakh . Candidates who are shortlisted for admission under the Management category have to pay some amount to confirm their seat. The fee varies specialisation-wise for BE. Aspirants can pay the fee in the mode specified by the institute.

faqs.question: How many seats are there for PG courses at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management offers seats to PG courses based on entrance exam score. The institute offers MBA, MCA and MTech at the PG level. Below is course-wise intake for PG courses offered at BMSIT:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management offers courses at UG, PG and doctoral levels. The eligibility varies course-wise and aspirants need to fulfil the requirement specific to their programme. Below is eligibility criteria for BMSIT courses: Class 12 or equivalent exam with at least 45% aggregate or 60% aggregate for admission through Management Quota Bachelor's degree with at least 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for SC/ ST) BE/ BTech with at least 50% aggregate Bachelor's degree with at least 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for SC/ ST) Master's degree in relevant discipline BE/ BTech with at least 60% aggregate (50% aggregate for SC/ ST)

faqs.question: Who can apply for BE course offered at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: A pass in second-year pre-university or Class 12 or equivalent examination held preceding the entrance test with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with Chemistry or Biotechnology or Computer Science or Biology or Electronics with at least 45% aggregate in optional subjects. Candidates must also have English as one of the languages for admission to the Engineering course.

faqs.question: Is COMEDK accepted at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: Yes, BMS Institute of Technology and Management accepts COMEDK score for admission to BE courses. COMEDK UGET exam is a common entrance test held at the national level for admission to BE programmes. The undergraduate entrance test (UGET) is a computer-based test conducted for a duration of three-years. Besides, the institute also accepts Diploma CET or KCET score for admission to BE.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: The selection for most of the BMS Institute of Technology and Management courses is entrance-based. The institute accepts KCET and COMEDK for admission to BE and MTech programme. Besides, GATE and Karnataka PGCET scores are considered for MTech programmes. The institute conducts a written exam for PhD admission. Shortlisted candidates may be called for a personal interview round.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted by BMSIT?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management accepts national or state-level entrance exams for admission. The institute accepts KCET, COMEDK and Diploma CET for BE programme whereas, KMAT and Karnataka PGCET scores are considered for MBA admission. BMSIT also accepts GATE, PGCET (KEA), etc. for admission to specific courses. Besides, the institute conducts a written exam for PhD course.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for BE at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: The BMS Institute of Technology and Management BE eligibility criteria differ based on the mode of admission. Check below to know the mode-specific eligibility requirements: KCET/COMEDK Quota : Management Quota : Candidates must have passed Class 12 examinations with at least 60% aggregate

faqs.question: What is the cutoff for BTech at BMS Institute of Technology and Management for OBC category?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management BTech cutoff 2023 for Computer Science Engineering was 3691 for OBC category. While the admissions are based on the scores/rank obtained in COMEDK, the last cut offs also change a lot depending on All India quota or Home State. It also varies if the applicant is a female.

faqs.question: Can I get admission at BMS Institute of Technology and Management in BTech if my rank is between 42000 and 43000?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management COMEDK Round 2 cutoff for Civil Engineering is 42483 which is very close to this range. This was for general category under All India quota. Unless the candidate belongs to some other category or domicile, one can not afford to score less than this. With this rank, there is a probability of getting admission however since, the cut offs keep changing from round to round, better ranks definitely increases your chances of getting admission in BMS Institute of Technology and Management.

faqs.question: How many seats are there in BMS Institute of Technology and Management for BTech?
faqs.answer: BMS Institute of Technology and Management has a high number of seats available for the BE programme. The institute offers 1980 seats under its BE programme. In order to get a seat, students must apply for the preferred BE course and also appear for one of the accepted entrance exams—KCET and COMEDK. Note: The above seat information is taken from various official sources. However, it is subject to change.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at BMS Institute of Technology and Management?

highlights.summary:
Centurion University Paralakhemundi is approved by UGC and AICTE. Centurion University is accredited with A Grade by NAAC, Ministry of HRD. Some of its courses are accredited by ICAR. Centurion University of Technology and Management (CUTM), through eight schools of study, offers UG, PG, and other courses to students across Engineering, Management, Science, and other streams. Centurion University Odisha is known as the only technical university in South Odisha. The CUTM Paralakhemundi is ranked 201-250 by the NIRF 2022 for BTech. summary.college_name: Centurion University of Technology and Management, Paralakhemundi

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college gives the best education and skills.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently in my 3rd year. My super seniors got normal jobs in companies. But still, our college management is trying to give the best jobs to the students. 40 percent of students were placed in my college. The highest package is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The best thing about my college is the hostel. They provide two different types of food, like northern and southern style food. I have tried both types of food, but North-style food is better than South-style. I can give 4 stars out of 5 stars to my college hostel facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The main thing is that some faculty members of our college behave badly because they don't respect students. But some faculty members encourage, motivate, and are friendly with us. Faculty members give very good marks in the examination and take the viva very strictly to give more confidence to the students.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering because in this technological generation, it is very useful for students. The best thing is that any student can easily crack a job in the course. I would like to improve my communication skills.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Colorful campus and opportunity to grow

detailed_review.Placements: I joined in September. In our class there are 60 students and many other sections. I have heard from seniors that the average package is around 3 to 4 LPA. Mostly small and midfirm companies are coming and intership is not so mandatory. It mostly will depend on our skills and our willingness to learn.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-fi is available and a full network. Computer labs are there for learning communication and presentation. Classrooms have AC and best seats to attend classes. I am not a hosteler but I have eaten once. I did not like it so much. Good enough to live. Sports facilities are the best. You can play basketball cricket tennis and coaches are there. A small hospital is there for small health issues.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified. The more experienced teachers are the best as they are very knowledgeable and explain very nicely. The course curriculum is not up to date. Whatever has been taught in the previous years is what we are also learning. Semester exams are conducted strictly and pass percentage has been 90 percent.
detailed_review.Other: Events happen regularly. Every department hosts its own events and they are conducted with efficiency. Cultural events and a chance to express your art are provided.  The best event is Gajajyoti event that happens every year for 3 to 4 days. The campus is colorful and skill courses are also available in various domains.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My experience at CUTM - Paralakhemundi.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are not up to the mark, don't expect very much from the college, it is better if you prepare for off-campus too, and the same goes for internship opportunities also. The average salary is Rs. 4,00,000. Nearly 60% of students get placed. The rest of them do higher studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is very good, especially the library, which is very large and consists of 1000s of books, and it is environmentally friendly. The hostel is pretty decent, and can adjust. Food quality is also okay. Sports infrastructure is very good, but they will get very little time to play.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is very much industry-relevant. Teachers are also highly qualified. Semester-end exams are not that tough. You can pass easily if you study at a normal pace from the start of the semester, or else you have to struggle during the exams. Every semester, there will be one end-of-semester exam and one mid-term exam.

reviews.course: B.Sc.(Hons.) in Agriculture Science
reviews.review_title: Sneak peak into Agriculture.

detailed_review.Placements: For the latest batch, approximately 90% of students were successfully placed, reflecting a strong industry-academia interface. The highest package offered was around INR 16 LPA, while the average salary stood at approximately INR 4.65 LPA, and the median salary hovered around INR 4 LPA. Although the lowest package wasn't officially disclosed, student reviews suggest it ranged between INR 3-4 LPA, especially in non-technical or core branches.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Centurion University has a well-developed academic infrastructure. Lecture halls and classrooms are spacious, with many being smart classrooms, equipped with projectors, digital boards, and high-speed Wi-Fi covering nearly the entire campus. The university has separate hostels for boys and girls, including AC hostels, with multiple mess halls. Rooms are shared (often 3-5 students), with attached bathroom in many hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Most students say that the teachers are qualified, knowledgeable, and helpful. Many faculty have advanced degrees and are approachable.
The curriculum is generally viewed as relevant and industry-oriented.
On examinations, the difficulty is described by most as moderate.
detailed_review.Other:
It has a strong focus on practical learning and industry readiness. 
However, I wish there could be more frequent industry interaction sessions and guest lectures to stay updated with the latest trends.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm dissatisfied with the placement cell in 2024-2025.

detailed_review.Placements: Less than 10% of students got placed. The highest package is around 8 LPA and the lowest is up to 2.5 LPA. Top recruiters are Cognizant, Dassault Systèmes, and TCS. Internships are mostly unpaid. The maximum students who get placed are for sales or marketing roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has good buildings and infrastructure, but class have no Wi-Fi facilities. There is a central library that has Wi-Fi support. There is a dispenser for first aid support. Facilities to play cricket, basketball, volleyball, and football are available. Hostel rooms are decent, but the mess food is not worth it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified, but most of the time they assign only assignments and written work rather than giving real knowledge about the course. Teaching quality is decent, I would say. Course quality is good compared to other colleges. Semester exams are easy to medium level. 6.5 CGPA is a passing mark.
detailed_review.Other: Courses for ECE branch are good but the college should focus on more real-world related projects rather than only on written assignments. College should focus on AI/ML cources. Scholarships are given for 1 year only after the college halt is without any reason. Fest on campus is celebrated every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and a nice environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Different roles are offered in our course. The college provides different jobs based on skills and technical knowledge of students. Many roles offered by the course are software engineer, and by companies like TCS, Deloitte, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The quality of the faculty members in our hostel and the quality of the food available in the mess and canteen are good. Medical facilities, sports, and games are good. They are of nice quality and are maintained in a hygienic way. Staff members maintain the quality of food and hostel facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The difficulty level of semester exams in our college is average. Many students will get a nice pass percentage and, above that, with nice semester grade points. But few students may get a low pass percentage due to their lack of understanding of subjects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college and skilled university.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 90% of students got placed from my course. The highest package is 5.5 LPA, and the lowest is 1.2 LPA. The average is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our courses are Infosys, Cognizant, Tech Mahindra, etc. Around 50% of students got placed from our courses in different industries like Microsoft and Cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of college are very good. Wi-Fi is available for everyone. Labs are well-maintained and required components like PCs, keyboards, mouse, and smart boards are available. Smartboards are available in our classroom and library for candid books and can textbooks for one week. Facility of hostel is well-managed and maintained. The food quality is good, not very bad. I don't like mess. Medical facility is available 24/7. Sports such as Kabaddi, Kho-Kho, Throwball, Basketball, etc., are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful to students and knowledgeable. They have Ph.D. in their course. Course curriculum is relevant. Semester exams are very difficult. Pass percentage is 35%. Teachers guide students to develop their projects, etc., in our courses.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it offers great opportunities for future development. One thing I need to improve in my course is AI for a better future. College organizes fests like Gaja Jyoti, freshers', and connectivity at the Bhubaneswar campus, and intra-college competitions.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: There is a vast difference in infrastructure at our university.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 70% of students secured placements in the 2023-24 academic year. The highest package offered is 13.6 LPA, while the median package stood at 4 LPA. Top recruiters included Infosys, TCS, Accenture, Tata, and Tech Mahindra. Around 80% of students secured internships in reputed companies. Top roles offered are software developer and frontend developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is always available at the university. Classroom infrastructure is excellent with smart techniques. Highly experienced faculty members are available. Hostel facilities are very good in providing food with hygiene. We have good medical facilities and a good sports complex. The university conducts intra and inter-department sports every year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very interactive. Their teaching quarter is also good. The difficulty level is medium. The pass percentage is 60%. Attendance plays a crucial role in semester examinations. We will be having a mid-semester exam so that it becomes easy for semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as it offers more placements. Courses like Nptel, Codethantra, etc., are provided. There are many events that are frequently conducted at our university like Gajajyothi, Manjadar, etc. The percentage of scholarships is high.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a well-management college for students willing to pursue their courses.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, mostly students, around 90%, get placed on campus. The highest package is 10 LPA, the lowest is 4.5 LPA, and the average is 5.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Cognizant, Infosys, and Microsoft. Additionally, 50% of students placed in our course have internships at Microsoft and Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are excellent. Wi-Fi is available 24 hours a day for everyone, including faculty and students. Labs are well-equipped with advanced technology. Classrooms have smart boards, comfortable seating, and air conditioning. The food quality is very good, though the best food is not as good. The canteen is also available. A doctor is available 24 hours a day, and sports like annual sports, track games, kabaddi, basketball, and various other games are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful to students and are well-known, with many holding Ph. D.s in computer science. They help clarify our doubts and provide support. The semester exams are very difficult, with a total of 100 marks, and the passing percentage is 35-50%.
detailed_review.Other: It is helpful for both hardware and software. It is also beneficial for government jobs. It is a great opportunity for me to improve myself in different areas, such as mathematics, hardware, software, and mainly in coding. Events like Jyoti and fests, which connect with many campuses in our college, are provided. The CRAs are active to this less than single.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Fully satisfied with the fees and the library.

detailed_review.Placements: I have gathered the information from my seniors that the placements are very good in our college. All students are placed with good packages and roles in the organisations coming to the companies, I have known that the company Rinex in Bangalore and like-wise.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of my course like the practical labs will be very good for the students because we can use the desktops provided in the labs. There will be built-in Wi-Fi all over the campus wherever we go classrooms will be digital classrooms. The library will be on three floors where we can gather information about the use amount. I am newly joined here so my experience up to now is very good regarding canteen and the games I have participated in.
detailed_review.Faculty: My major issue with the faculty members is language problems. I won't be able to speak their mother tongue fluently, so some understanding will be created in US like a bad impression on the students but somehow at present, I am managing things with my speaking skills in English. They will be providing some of the materials for the semester examinations which will be helpful for us to read for the exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Worth the price. Teachers are very impressive.

detailed_review.Placements: According to our branch, the students are placed this year are low number of ratio. Although, the average package of the students seems to be 4.5 LPA. The percentage of students who got internships means the students should find internships for their own interests only. College will not provide any type of internship. The internships which will be through email require some amount to be paid, which means we should get registered to that particular company with some amount for the certificate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facilities are available all over the campus. It is very good idea for every student because they can use it anywhere anytime when it is needed. Classrooms are digital classrooms. Coming to the hostel, I am and day scholar so I don't know much about hostel things. Canteen is the great part of college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of our department are very knowledgeable and even if we have any doubts, they give the solution in practical. I can say our whole department of electronics is very good and productive in our field. Semester exams in the college are not very difficult, so faculty members give the materials that are helpful for exams and GATE exam too.

reviews.course: B.Sc.(Hons.) in Agriculture Science
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied with hostel and placement, good infrastructure and students council.

detailed_review.Placements: You will get placed no matter what. Companies come regularly for hiring. Internships are campus-based and company-based too. 90% of students do get placed in this course. The highest package would be up to 6 LPA and the lowest is 1.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TATA Rallis, ITC, Akshaykalpa Farms, Tech Mahindra, and other agriculture sector companies. The top roles are field officer, sales, and marketing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is completely under the radar of Wi-Fi and most of the time it works pretty good. The infrastructure of academics is excellent—smart classrooms, ERP, well-equipped laboratories, and a library with a wide range of important books. The hostel is quite disappointing. During summers, it becomes very difficult to live in non-AC hostels. There is a geyser installed on every floor for hot water during winter. The rooms are congested since 5 students live together in the Indravati hostel. The quality of the food is below average, and there's no consistency in the food quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good, helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is average. The course curriculum is very relevant and follows the 5th Dean Committee. It does make students industry-ready. The semester exams aren't difficult. A student can score well with an all-nighter preparation since the questions are quite predictable. We follow the previous year's questions for preparation.
detailed_review.Other: What can be improved are: better hostels and food quality, not overburdening students with random non-relevant work, and more practical-based assignments rather than just copy-pasting from the internet. Events are pretty good, and you will be busy catching up with the events. There is a student activity center taking care of it. Plus, it's a very beautiful campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

college_info.college_name: Centurion University of Technology and Management, Paralakhemundi Course Admissions 2025: Eligibility, Selection Process & Dates

faqs.question: Can I take direct admission in Centurion University Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: No, admission to all the courses at the university is entrance-based. To get admission to any courses, aspirants are required to complete the eligiblity and selection criteria set by the college. The bsic eligiblity criteria is pass Class 12 for admission to UG courses and pass gradution for admission to PG courses. Aditionally, candidates are required to apply and appear for CUEE entrance exam, followed by counselling for admission to any courses at Centurion University Paralakhemundi.

faqs.question: How to get admission in Centurion University Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: Admission to various courses at Centurion University is based on merit in Centurion University Entrance Exam. For MTech, GATE scores are accepted. Aspirants can apply online or offline for the university entrance test. After the exam, selected students are called for counselling. Further, based on academic records, entrance test scores, and performance in counselling, the final seat allotment process is carried out.

faqs.question: Which are the popular courses in Centurion University of Technology and Management, Paralakhemund?
faqs.answer: At Centurion University Paralakhemundi campus, candidates can pursue courses such as BTech, BSc, MBA, MSc, After Class 10 Diploma and others. The  programmes are offered across several specialisations. Admissions to all of the courses offered at CUTM Paralakhemundi are done on the basis of score obtained by the applicants in the entrance exam conducted by the university i.e. CUEE.

faqs.question: Can I take direct admission in B.Tech at Centurion University, Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: No, admission to BTech at the university is entrance-based. To be eligible for admission candidates are required to fill out the eligiblity and selection criteria. The basic eligiblity is pass Class 12 from a recognised board. Additionally, candidates must appear and apply for CUEE from the official website of university to grab admission to BTech at Centurion University Paralakhemundi. Hence, aspirants must take the entrance examination in order to be eligible to take admission.  Yes, candidates can get direct admission to Moople Institute of Animation and Design, Jodhpur Park in certificate courses. The college offers direct admission to the candidates based on the merit on the last qualifying exam. The candidates are required to pass Class 10 from a recognised board to get admission to certificate courses.

faqs.question: What is the admission process for Centurion University Paralakhemundi BTech course?
faqs.answer: Aspirants shall first check the eligibility criteria, i.e., Class 12 (Physics, Chemistry, Maths) pass students with 50% aggregate (5% relaxation for reserved category) are eligible to apply. These students can further apply for the university entrance test, CUEE. Based on scores in the entrance exam, the university calls for a counselling round and allot seats.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria for B.Tech admission at Centurion University, Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for BTech courses in any specialisations, candidates are required to pass Class 10 from a recognised board with a good aggregate score. The candidates who have completed Class 10 and Class 12 with Physics, Chemistry, and Maths 50% and 5% relaxation for reserved category from a recognised board are eligible for admission. The college offers CUEE based admission followed by counselling round, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria and simply apply online or visit the college campus to apply for admission.

faqs.question: Is MBA offered at Centurion University, Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: MBA is available at Centurion University Paralakhemundi.The college offers direct admission to MBA based on CUEE exam score conducted by the university. Adittionally, candidates are required to pass Bachelor's degree from a recognised university to apply for admission.

faqs.question: How do I get a seat for MBA in Centurion University Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: Centurion University Paralakhemundi conducts a common Entrance Exam for MBA. The minimum fee of INR 600. To get admission in Centurion University candidates are required to follow the mentioned below steps: Step 1: Apply for the entrance exam CUEE through the official website. The mode of examination will be Online/Offline. Step 2: Candidates will be informed about the exam time, link, credentials, etc. via E-mail. Step 3: Result Declaration, Reporting for Counselling and admission. Step 4: Documentation process Step 5: Reporting details (date, time, schedule, etc.)

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for an MBA at Centurion University Paralakhemundi?
faqs.answer: To get admission to Centurion University Paralakhemundi candidates are required to meet the eligiblity set by the university. The eligibility criteria for MBA is, graduation in ay discipline with CUEE score/rank. Centurion University BBSR offers many specialisation in MBA with the duration of two years in full time mode. Refer the below table for MBA fee at Centurion University Paralakhemundi: SPECIALISATION (MBA) FEES MBA INR 4.4 lakh MBA in Agri Business Management INR 10 lakh MBA in Healthcare Management INR 4.4 lakh MBA IN Development Management INR 15 lakh MBA in Pharmaceutical Management INR 4.4 lakh

faqs.question: Does Centurion University Paralakhemundi offers scholarships?
faqs.answer: The University provides scholarships to students based on their prior academic records during admission and also based on their semester-wise performance during the course of their studies. For the BTech programme at CUTM Paralakhemundi, candidates who have studied under different boards of education are offered a predefined percentage of scholarship in their tuition fee. Starting from the second year, students are required to obtain a minimum of 8.0 CGPA in their semester exams along with a minimum of 80% attendance to continue receiving their scholarship. Additionally, there are a number of scholarships available to students belonging to the reserved category and minority groups, as listed below: - PRERANA post-matric scholarship for SC/ST/OBC & SEBC District Welfare Office (Odisha) - Minority scholarship from District Welfare Office (Odisha) - National Scholarship - Jindal Foundation Scholarship (Sitaram Jindal) - Times of India Scholarship - Ministry of Human Development (DHE) New Delhi - Bihar Welfare (Post-Matric) SC/ST/OBC & Minority - BEML Scholarship (SC & ST) - FAEA Scholarship (SC & ST) - Bihar Welfare (Technical Stipend) - E_KALYAN Scholarship offered by Jharkhand State Welfare Department - Departmental/Official scholarship from East Coast Railway/ CRPF/ Central Schools/ SBI/ Coal India/ Daitari Mines/OMC for their wards who are studying Engineering/MBA For PhD, shortlisted candidates are awarded a fellowship of INR 20,000 for three years. NET/ICAR/GATE qualified candidates will receive a stipend according to UGC rules. In addition to their own research work, PhD candidates are expected to engage in teaching, training, and research projects of the University. Furthermore, a special scholarship of 5% is offered to all CUEE applicants.

data.title: Centurion University of Technology and Management Placement Report 2025
summary: In 2025, Centurion University of Technology and Management had 2013 job offers from 253 companies. Overall, 68% of eligible engineering students, 78% of eligible agriculture students, and 70% of eligible management students secured placements. Major recruiters include Tech Mahindra, Med Plus, and Bajaj, among others.The placement package details are yet to be out for season 2024 and 2025, once the official website publishes the data, it will be updated here.

Earlier, in 2023, the Centurion University of Technology and Management placements offered a highest package of INR 13.6 LPA . The median package offered stood at INR 4 LPA . The season saw a total of 348 recruiters and the placement rate was 90%. The number of placement offers increased by 72% from the previous year. Additionally, 48 students achieved packages over INR 9 LPA .

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The 120 acres sprawling campus of Centurian university of technology and management at Parlakhemundi has a well-equipped library with 74708 Textbooks, 19537 reference books, 6000 ebooks, 204 journals, and digital database DELNET.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Centurion University has 6 boys hostel and 3 girls hostel. Students staying at hostels are provided with considerable options for food, for there are many mess halls in the campus. Students can choose the North Indian or South Indian menu. CUTM has recently introduced AC Hostel.

facilities.name: Gym
facilities.description: Centurion University has the well-equipped gymnasium having the latest machines and equipment to ensure better health and fitness facilities for the students, faculty, and staff. Trainers are available throughout the day to train the gym enthusiasts.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: Campus consist 14 buses which provide comfortable and smooth journey for staff and students commuting from nearby areas such as Palasa, Pathpatnam, Srikakulam, Tekkali. It provides transportation facilities for days scholar students and staff members.

available_facilities: Fluid Mechanics and Hydraulic Machines Lab
