college_info.college_name: CGC University: Courses, Fees, Admissions 2026, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
CGC University (formely known as Chandigarh Group of Colleges, Jhanjeri) is situated in Mohali. It was known as CGC Jhanjeri and has now evolved into a full-fledged university. The university has gotten a number of accolades and has been rated by several ranking organisations. It has been listed as the top 10 private business schools in India's North Zone by the Outlook 2025. CGC University has ranked between 101–125 in the Management category by the NIRF 2025 ranking.
India Today 2025 has ranked the university 174th in the Engineering (Private colleges) sector, while NIRF 2025 has placed it between 201 and 300 in the BTech category. The university has collaborated with 300+ international partners in 70+ countries and 5 continents and has also received a NAAC accreditation with an A+ rating. The curriculum is industry-oriented, giving students the skills they need to seek a world full of prospects. The practical-based learning approach at CGC University encourages students to acquire practical skills, which helps them and fosters a comprehensive perspective among them.
It provides a wide range of UG and PG programs. The majority of the courses are offered in the areas of Engineering, Management, Law, Paramedical Sciences, Medicine and Health Sciences, Design, Physical Education, etc. BTech, BSc and MBA are the popular programmes. Students are invited to have firsthand exposure to industry trends and challenges by a number of international experts and industrial professionals from prestigious universities.
CGC University offers 100+ courses to students at reasonable fees, enabling them to acquire knowledge and skills in their preferred area of interest. The college also offers an excellent infrastructure which inclues classrooms, library, transport, security, clubs, socities, bank, salon, food-court, etc. The college has even signed various MoUs with premier international universities such as Birmingham City University, Niels Brock, Fontys, Hogeschool Rotterdam, University of the Fraser Valley, Thomas More University, Arkansas State University, etc.
Students can check the highlights of CGC University, Mohali in the table provided below:

The university cover core courses in the areas of HR, Marketing, Finance, Operation Management, Business Analytics and Digital Marketing.
CGC University offers a four-year programme. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is very good, and I recommend it to my friends and juniors for enrollment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70–80 percent of students from my domain, Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering, get placed. The average package offered is 6–7 LPA. The college provides one job offer per student, and most students are successfully placed. The environment is very supportive and conducive for career growth.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is very good. Food is tasty. Safety and security are provided. Four meals are provided daily. Food is on time without delay. Rooms are clean and well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very supportive and helpful. All faculty members are highly educated, with Ph.D. qualifications. The semester exams are of moderate difficulty. Questions are mostly based on what is taught by faculty.
detailed_review.Other: Since I am interested in Computer Science Engineering, I decided to choose Chandigarh Engineering College as my college.

reviews.course: BCA in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Overall college is very good, safe, secure, and educational institution.

detailed_review.Placements: About the placement in our college, in our department of BCA department the average package is 10 LPA to 12 LPA. The highest package is 25 LPA, and it may be increased in future years. The companies are frequently visited in Tech Mahindra, TCS, and Infosys like that.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library in our college is very big and spacious and it is well-ventilated. There are more than 5000 physical books available, and digital libraries also level a part from that. There is a day and night facility for Wi-Fi but sometimes it goes very slow due to the use of students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified in their specialisation in their field. More than 80% of students are doctors and are pursuing a doctorate. They have very good knowledge of their own field. Apart from that, they are giving us extra activities and boot camps. Apart from that, the guest lecturers are also provided.
detailed_review.Other: College is very good and neat and clean. But there is some adverse impact on some students sometimes. There are more frequently renovated floors that create dust pollution, and it is harmful for some students who suffer from the disease.

reviews.course: MBA in Human Resource Management
reviews.review_title: It provides better career opportunities with overall development from sports to practical skills.

detailed_review.Placements: I'm currently a student of this university, and I've enrolled in an MBA with HRM & Business Analytics. From my seniors' point of view, we have many placement options to choose from, and we have our university's own placement department that helps us to apply from start to end. The college also provides us with practical knowledge and makes us interact with HR from all companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a smart classroom with Wi-Fi available to us by the university, and our department provides us with labs that have proper software to work with. We also have a library where we can get every type of book, as well as an online facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are experienced and have practical skills, and they help us with all kinds of materials and provide us with practical learning tools. All Management courses are well structured, which provide us with practical knowledge and leadership skills for our future. Every student has their own mentor. We also have new career opportunities as we went on many industrial visits on our college side.
detailed_review.Other: We have all sorts of events on our campus, from ghagra night to a fest attended by different celebrities, and we also have a proper sports council. We also have a scholarship available to us.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and partially dissatisfied with a few of the faculty though the majority are.

detailed_review.Placements: International student we are not given much information on this particular topic so we are clueless and are in need of more information on how this works as well but I did notice that a lot of my seniors got placements this year and they obviously are not international students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms and labs are very good they have the best conditioning and the equipment in the labs is awesome and really enjoyable while maintaining a proper study environment. The libraries offer a great number of study materials that really help a lot.
detailed_review.Faculty: The learning experience is great which is simply that the curriculum is good and for the exams they are not that bad so long as you study you will pass but also it depends on the students dedication to their studies and education to pass the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Some lecturers are more understanding of students' circumstances especially international students.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: CGC University Mohali review.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from B.A. LL.B. course. Around 40–50 percent of students in my batch received placement support from the college. The average package offered was 3–4 LPA, with the highest going up to 6 LPA. Major recruiters included local law firms, litigation chambers, and corporate legal departments.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for B.A. LL.B. is satisfactory. Classrooms are spacious and maintained, with basic teaching facilities. The library has useful law books. Hostel facility is decent, with clean rooms, regular water and electricity supply, and a good environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty for B.A. LL.B. course is supportive, knowledgeable, and helpful in clearing concepts. The curriculum is well structured and covers both theoretical and practical aspects of law. Exams are conducted regularly and are moderately difficult, focusing on understanding of concepts.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd on campus is diverse and friendly, which helps in creating a positive learning environment. Students are supportive and actively participate in academic and cultural activities. Campus life is engaging with seminars and moot court events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Faculty members are good and campus life is fun.

detailed_review.Placements: 70 to 80 percent placement. 1 Crore is the highest package offered and the lowest is around 2 to 3 LPA. 40 to 50 percent got internship. Roles as a Web Developer are offered. Although college is good and you should consider it if you live in Punjab. I also recommend my friends to join this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Sometimes Wi-Fi does not work, Hostel and food are good. College life is good here, the infrastructure is also great and modern. Auditoriums are big and sports arenas are huge too. There is a variety of sports available here and combat sports too. You can join any of them you like.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful here they try to help as much as possible, and they are friendly too. The course curriculum is relevant and it makes the students industry ready but in some scenarios it lacks too but overall its good. The difficulty of semester exam is hard and not that easy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure, a technology-friendly environment, and young faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 10 percent of students are placed here, which means 1,000 students are placed out of 10,000. The highest package is 1 crore per annum, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiters are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Deloitte, and IBM. The top roles offered in my course are software engineer, data analyst, and AI engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available for our course include a Wi-Fi-enabled campus, a proper lab, and air-conditioned classrooms for students' comfort. The quality of food in the mess and canteen is excellent, but the price is high in the canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified. They are the best because they are so young and talented, so they connect with us very easily. The course curriculum is relevant, but it does not totally prepare students for the industry properly. The semester exams in this college are of a medium level.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the university.

detailed_review.Placements: Just a few days ago, the university celebrated Placement Day 2025, with 80-90% placements of B.Tech. and MBA students in top companies like Microsoft, Accenture, Capgemini, with additional companies like Amazon, TCS, Infosys, in roles such as Software Engineering, Data Analyst for B.Tech. And for MBA, a consultant and full-stack developer. Till now, the highest package in B.Tech. is 1 CPA and in MBA is around 27 LPA, with an average package of 7-8 LPA, and the lowest is 3-4 LPA. Many summer internships are also done by students at companies like Amazon.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As the institution has transitioned to university, much expansion is in progress. Many basic good facilities are given to students, like each block is Wi-Fi equipped, AI labs with the latest software and Chemistry labs with proper regulations and rules. Also, the central library provides proper educational and digital facilities. As a day scholar, I can't tell about hostel facilities, but it has a canteen and more quick bite places with hygienic conditions and good food. It also focuses on medical and sports facilities like large courts and grounds, a 24/7 medical dispensary, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Here, the professors are really helpful and attentive towards the studies of students. They are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is also excellent as they help students with every problem, just like mentors and motivate them towards studies. Like its first batch of University, the course is similar to that of IKGPTU for the first semester, and we know the first semester builds the basics of Maths and programming. End-of-semester exams are currently happening, and in my view, the level of difficulty in exams is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B Tech. CSE, as this institution is very good in placements in the North India region. Also, it focuses on financially weak students by providing them with scholarships, like this year, the Institute itself provides scholarships worth 25 crores. As the first semester follows the syllabus similar to that of IKGPTU, I think that they should make their own, the latest, industry-related syllabus, so that students get easily placed by gaining industry-related skills. Events here are also very awesome, like Saviskar'25 happened just a few months ago, with both cultural and technical events, and also celebrity performances. Green surroundings make it good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is budget-friendly and has a good placement record.

detailed_review.Placements: At our college, a total of 95 percent of students get placed, according to my information. In 2025, the highest package is 1 crore per annum. The lowest package is 4 LPA. The average is usually 7 LPA. This information is for 2024-2025.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel food is average, not very good, and the rooms are cleaned every day. The hostel's washrooms are cleaned every day. Their infrastructure is also very good. Classrooms and labs are well-maintained with high-spec systems. One of our classrooms has a capacity of around 72 students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of our college is good and supportive in nature. They always support and cooperate with students who face problems in their studies. They also support us in our personal problems. But our exams are difficult as the syllabus is complete. Teachers are very strict during exams.
detailed_review.Other: This Computer Science Engineering course helps me to achieve and understand technology and how internet things work. My course is a core branch in Computer Science. It helps me develop and create new things by using coding with AI. It is also helpful to turn our ideas into execution, where I earn fame, money, and help people.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: All faculty members are very supportive. College provides good placement packages to students.

detailed_review.Placements: CGC University provides the best placements to students. It provides a good package of placements. In our course, a lot of opportunities are provided, such as moot court competition on a national or state level, where students can learn how to debate in court.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are a lot of facilities available in university, such as a library in each block, the best classrooms with smart classes. Hostels are also provided in good condition. Hostel food provided to students is also healthy. Mess food for non-veg and veg is provided separately.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in universities are of high quality. All have very good knowledge about their subjects. Faculty members and teachers help students overcome every obstacle in every field. Teachers help students to enhance their knowledge of their course. Also, notes are provided by teachers to students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it provides good knowledge about the law and the Constitution. It has a large scope.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: A college with good opportunities and with good facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: I am studying here and yes, Opportunities are for everyone who will work on skills. More than 90 percent students are getting placed from CSE. Average package is around 4-5 LPA. Roles like software developer and data analytics are getting hired.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi available, classrooms are good, Library is so good. Facilities provided by college are so good, labs are well maintained. Hostel is also good with good facilities such as canteen, medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are so good and helpful as well as qualified too. They taught so good. They are making ready for industry level by curriculum. Semester exams are little difficult, but if you will study you will get passed with good marks. Attendance criteria is 75 percent.

reviews.course: B.Com. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good here as last year, one student of B.Tech got 1 crore per annum package. The faculty also helps a lot to enhance the skills, and all the top recruiting companies are TCS, Jio, etc. Many students got the internship, and many roles are offered too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities available in the department are great, labs are there, and the library is also very good. The quality of hostel facilities is average. The food in the mess is okay, and the canteen is good. Medical and sports facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are always ready to help the students, and the curriculum is also relevant. The semester exams are at an average level, and the pass percentage, I think, is 90 percent, which makes students industry-ready.

reviews.course: BBA LL.B.
reviews.review_title: CGC~ Hub of cultural genzs.

detailed_review.Placements: If you are serious about your studies, the placement rate is 100%. The highest package is 1 crore. The lowest was 6 LPA, while the average range was 8-12 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Khaitan, Google, and Flipkart visit here. The roles and packages are awesome at CGC.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are projector-based classrooms, and the libraries are fully Wi-Fi and AC-accessible. Along with books, there is a computer facility as well. The hostel facility is an A grade here, and a balanced diet is provided with full hygiene. Many sports grounds are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are UGC NET qualified. They have abundant knowledge with high-grade teaching skills. The curriculum makes the students industry-ready with a relevant syllabus. The exams are of an average range, and the pass percentage is 80% to 90% every year.
detailed_review.Other: This course was my childhood dream, and the best thing about this course is that it provides you with a reputation along with a bank balance. The only improvement that I can suggest here is that there must be more industrial and court visits planned for the students. Talking about the events, fests, all the events are too good. The festivals hosted here are excellent. The campus is green and very beautiful. There is a scholarship given by a test named CGCUET. I am also studying on an 85% scholarship.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the college is very good. It is a very good support for students to get placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, the highest package in the computer department is 1 crore, and the BBA department gets 10 to 20 LPA. Apart from that, an internship is compulsory for every student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides very good facilities for students. It includes transport facilities, day and night support, and ventilated classrooms, though the seats are not comfortable for sitting for more than 8 hours. The library has very good facilities with both digital and manual books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are supportive and very knowledgeable in their own fields. Apart from that, students also get personal and professional guidance. Teachers’ education is very good. Many have doctorates. They also provide mental support and counseling.
detailed_review.Other: The course provides very good exposure to the business environment and teaches how to work and handle situations. Apart from that, it has much more scope than other courses. I joined this course in the BBA department because it is highly in demand.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Dec 2025) - B.Tech. CSE Cyber Security (LEET)
reviews.review_title: It has good placements, supportive faculty, and decent facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: I am part of the B.Tech cybersecurity batch of 2024-28, and placements in our course are overall quite encouraging. Around 70-75 percent of students from our batch received placements through campus drives. The highest package offered in our course ranges from 12-14 LPA, and the average package ranges from 4-5 LPA. The lowest package ranges from 2-3 LPA for support and analyst roles. Top recruiting companies for our course include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college offers decent infrastructure for the cybersecurity department. Classrooms are very good, and all the equipment is available. Hostel facilities are comfortable with spacious rooms and regular cleaning. Wi-Fi is available throughout the hostel. The mess food is available on campus. There is a sports ground along with indoor games, which provide a good break from studies. Overall, the infrastructure and hostel environment are good for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our cybersecurity department is supportive, knowledgeable, and genuinely helpful. Most teachers explain concepts clearly and use practical examples during classes and labs, which makes the learning process easier. They also guide us with extra materials, doubt-clearing sessions, and projects. The college is good for higher studies.

reviews.course: BBA LL.B.
reviews.review_title: Good placements, nice infrastructure, and excellent faculties.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements at CGC University have been excellent. On average, students are getting well-paying packages in good companies. Most people in the batch got placed. Amazon and Adobe are among the top recruiters. The average package is around 6 LPA, and the highest package is 40 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at CGC University is very good. The classrooms are tidy and spacious. There are a lot of labs and workshops, and they are up to date with the necessary equipment. All the required facilities are available on campus itself. The library is great. The quality of food in the hostel is acceptable, and medical facilities are available 24/7.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculties are the best part of CGC University. All of them are qualified and knowledgeable in their domain. They are easy to approach, and you can always go to them with your academic and non-academic problems. The curriculum is up to date with industry standards. The exams are neither super easy nor super difficult, but moderate.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am currently satisfied because of the infrastructure and good placement in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: A total of 97% students got placed in this college, according to my information. The highest package provided was of 1 crore per annum. The lowest package provided was of 4 lacs per annum. The average is usually around 7 lacs per annum. This data is according to the previous year, 2024.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel food is not good, and the rooms are cleaned every day, and the hostel's washrooms are also cleaned every day. Labs of the college are also good, and the systems are of high specs. Classrooms are pretty spacious, with a holding capacity of around 70 students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the college is very cooperative. They provide support for every problem we usually get about our studies, and they also support us in our personal problems. The exams are difficult as the syllabus gets completed at the last moment at this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college gives us a good experience and provides us with placements.

detailed_review.Placements: I chose the B.Tech course because it is a technology-based program. The computer plays a very important role these days. B.Tech is the platform to get high packages, which lowers efforts. The B.Tech students get higher packages of rupees 1 crore, and the average is 10 to 15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure includes day and night Wi-Fi facilities, and the college provides us with a digital lab and a classroom library with more than 10,000 physical books available. The college has hostel facilities that are cheap and economical.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college faculty members are very good. They give us knowledgeable skills in various topics and support us in every aspect of life in college. They are well qualified according to their specialisation. Most teachers are doctors. The college has a separate department for placement called DCPD.
detailed_review.Other: All in all, the college campus is surrounded by green gardens. There is a cafeteria and Nescafé, and the college also provides industrial visits, which give us a boost in practical life. The campus provides a scholarship scheme for deserving candidates. They conduct extra activities like NCC, music, and fashion.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied, and the college has good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, there is a high rate of placements every year, even in big companies like Capgemini and many others. Around 70 percent of students get internships at various companies. Top roles include Python developer, tester, and many other positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is very good Wi‑Fi on campus. Classrooms are newly designed with many AI labs. They provide proper knowledge about AI, and a good infrastructure increases comfort and supports effective study. The campus offers games and cultural events, but the hostel food quality is very bad, so I prefer to live off-campus. Medical facilities are good. The ambulance service is available 24/7.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and faculty are very helpful. We can contact them anytime, and they assist a lot. They teach well. The curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are easy for those who study and difficult for those who do not. The pass percentage is 33%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because there is a huge demand for engineers. I want to improve documentation facilities because students face problems when higher authorities are unavailable. Events are frequent in the college, sometimes even daily, and while they are important, they can irritate students as duties during events reduce study time.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Dec 2025) - Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the college is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are probably good. The highest package offered by the college is 1 crore, and the average package is around 15 LPA. The MBA course is in high demand as it is applicable in both private and public sectors.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college hostel infrastructure is overall good, with Wi‑Fi. Hostel mess food is good. The canteen is also good. Sports, games, and medical facilities are very good. Wi‑Fi and sports facilities are available day and night.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members provide important questions and have very good behavior. The college has very good faculty who are experts in their fields and knowledgeable about their subjects. Their teaching quality is also very good.
detailed_review.Other: The college conducts multiple events and speeches, which are helpful for extracurricular activities. These provide valuable experience and help build confidence.

college_info.college_name: CGC University Course Admissions 2026: Fees, Eligibility, Dates & Selection Process

admission.title: CGC University Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text:
CGC University admission 2026 is both merit and entrance-based depending on the programme. The applications at the university are conducted in both online and offline modes.. CGC University offers over 100+ courses at UG and PG levels in streams, such as Animation, Law, Design etc. through its various institutes. CGC University offers full-time courses across various specialisations, such as Biotechnology and HR among others.

Read below to know more about the eligibility and admission process for CGC University.

CGC University Admissions Open

Download : CGC University Brochure

faqs.question: How can I get admission in CGC University?
faqs.answer: To get admission in CGC University, students need to meet the admission requirements of the desired programme. Applicants aftering registering at the university's site need to appear for the CGCUET exam. Selected students must pay the fees and get the documents verified.

faqs.question: Are CGC University admissions open?
faqs.answer: Yes, CGC University admissions are open now. The university is accepting application for various courses and interested students can apply online for the course of choice. The CGC University form has to be filled online.

faqs.question: When does CGC University admission start?
faqs.answer: CGC University admissions are ongoing. The admissions start with the posting of notification released by the university at its official site. The application form can be purchased/ submitted with a payment of INR 1000. For any questions, students can call the CGC University counsellors.

faqs.question: How much does it cost to pursue the BCom (H) programme offered by CGC University?
faqs.answer: Total cost of BCom (H) programme offered by CGC University includes several charges like fee components, tuition fees, hostel charges, and one-time payment. As per the official website, total tuition fee for BCom (H) is around INR 93,000. Students who choose on-campus accommodation must pay hostel fees that depends on their room type. Hostel charges ranges between INR 1.18 lakh and INR 1.85 lakh per annum. It also depends on whether the room is Non-AC or AC and the seater type. Students must pay a one-time fee of INR 1,000. For more information about fee structure, check below: Note: The above-mentioned fee is as per the official sources. However, it is subject to change.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for CGC University admission?
faqs.answer: CGC University eligibility require students to complete the last qualifying exam. The general eligibility is as follows:

faqs.question: How does CGC University shortlist students?
faqs.answer: CGC University shortlists students based on academic merit, entrance exam scores (if applicable), and the number of seats available for each course. The university conducts CGCUET as an entrance-cum-scholarship test. The selection process for each course can be found at the CGC University website.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in CGC University?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidate who are looking for admission at CGC University can directly enrol for the respective course. The admissions is merit-based but for BTech and MBA programme, the university accept entrance exam such as JEE Main, CGCUET, etc. The students need to meet the last educational qualifications as per course requirement.

faqs.question: How can students join CGC University?
faqs.answer: CGC University admissions are both merit and entrance-based. Candidates are shortlisted based on their past academic merit of Class 12 and graduation for UG and PG courses, respectively. Check below the step-wise CGC University admission process:

faqs.question: Are there any courses for which CGCUET is compulsory for scholarship and admission at CGC University?
faqs.answer: Yes, CGC University accepts CGCUET exam to offer admission and scholarship. Given below are courses for which CGCUET is compulsory for scholarship and admission:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for the MBA course at CGC University?
faqs.answer: As per the official website of the university, students should have bachelor's degree of a minimum three-year duration with 50% marks, 45% marks in case of reserved category students, in any discipline from a UGC approved university.

faqs.question: How many BTech Seats are available CGC University?
faqs.answer: A total of 582 seats are available for BTech students at CGC University. Mojority of seats are available  for CSE branch which is 180. For BTech civil engineering Lateral Entry, a total of 12 seats are available.

faqs.question: What is CGC University cutoff for BTech for All India?
faqs.answer: Apart from JEE Main CGC University cutoff for BTech is based on PTU BTech as well. The institute offers two BTech specialisations based on PTU BTech scores followed by counselling. For cutpff 2022, the closing rank for B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering stood at 1001 and for B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science it stood at 1263 for the General category All India candidates. The counselling ranks are released category-wise and round-wise. In 2023, the counselling was ended after Round 1 Seat Allotment. Tbaulated below is the closing rank for CGC University cutoff 2022 based on PTU BTech:

faqs.question: Can I apply now for BA LLB Integrated at CGC University?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates who are looking for BA LLB Integrated admission at CGC University can apply now at the official website. The student have to pass class 12 in any stream . The selection criteria for the course is merit-based.

faqs.question: How many BA LLB Integrated Seats are available CGC University?
faqs.answer: A total of 120 seats are available for BA LLB Integrated students at CGC University. For clarity, students can check the table presented below:

faqs.question: Who can apply to BCA at CGC University?
faqs.answer: For admission to BCA at CGC University, students are required to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria in the first place. Those who are interested to apply for this course must pass Class 12 in any stream by an accredited board/ university/ council or they can also pass High School Diploma and a three-year trade Diploma from the Punjab State Board of Technical Education & Industrial Training in Chandigarh/ any State board of technical education/ Sant Longowal Institute of Engineering & Technology in Longowal.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to BJMC at CGC University?
faqs.answer: For admission to BJMC at CGC University, there is a minimum eligibility criteria that needs to be fulfilled before applying for this course. Interested students must pass Class 12 or High School Diploma to become eligible for this course. The admission to BJMC is merit-based. Candidates are selected based on their performance in the previous qualifying exam. Once, students qualify the selection process they are allocated seats for this course. Get the full details about the CGC University BJMC course here.

faqs.question: Who are eligible for BJMC course at CGC University?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to BJMC course at CGC University, students need to pass Class 12 in any stream by an accredited board/ university/ council. Else, they can also pass High School Diploma and a three-year trade Diploma from the Punjab State Board of Technical Education & Industrial Training in Chandigarh/ any State board of technical education/ Sant Longowal Institute of Engineering & Technology in Longowal.

faqs.question: What are the documents required for admission at CGC University?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission, students need to furnish multiple documents for the applied course. Students are advised to visit the official website to learn more about document submission. Furthermore, candidates can check the points mentioned below for document requirements to get admission at CGC University admission:

faqs.question: Can I apply in offline mode at CGC University?
faqs.answer: Yes, CGC University accepts application in offline mode also. To fill the offline application form, candidates can get the form and buy prospectus by paying INR 1,000 from the college's admission office. After filling the admission form with all the relevant details, candidates must submit the form with required documents. Moreover, applicants must also pay a registration fee at the time of form submission.? After submitting the form, collect acknowledgment or receipt for the submitted admission form.

faqs.question: What is the hostel fees for BCom students at CGC University?
faqs.answer: CGC University provides hostel facilities for students enrolled in the BCom programme. The total fees to be paid for hostel facilities depends on the type of accommodation. Students can check the below table to know the accommodations-wise hostel fees: Note: The above-mentioned fee is as per the official sources. However, it is indicative and subject to change.

faqs.question: Are CGC University application forms out?
faqs.answer: Yes, CGC University application forms are out. The forms can be obtained both online and offline. Students can go to the university's site for online submission or visit the university campus for offline process.

faqs.question: Does CGC University offers educational loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, CGC University offers schoalrship. The institute has set up a dedicated loan assistance cell. Here studnet scan find the one-stop solution for students to obtain loans from bank with which the colleges has tie-ups. Students can apply through Vijaylakshmi Portal and Grayquest.

faqs.question: How can I get BSc seat at CGC University?
faqs.answer: To get a BSc seat at CGC University, students should apply for the course in online or offline mode. Students should check their registered email IDs as the admission offers are sent on mail. Those who receive the admission offers must pay the admission fees to secure the seat.

faqs.answer: CGC University admissions are ongoing. The admissions start with the posting of notification released by the university at its official site. faqs.question: How much does it cost to pursue the BCom (H) programme offered by CGC University?
faqs.answer: Total cost of BCom (H) programme offered by CGC University includes several charges like fee components, tuition fees, hostel charges, and one-time payment. As per the official website, total tuition fee for BCom (H) is around INR 93,000. Students who choose on-campus accommodation must pay hostel fees that depends on their room type. Hostel charges ranges between INR 1.18 lakh and INR 1.85 lakh per annum. It also depends on whether the room is Non-AC or AC and the seater type. Students must pay a one-time fee of INR 1,000. For more information about fee structure, check below: Fee components Amount Tuition fee INR 93,000 Hostel fee INR 1.18 lakh - INR 1.85 lakh (per annum) One-time Payment INR 1,000 Total fee Varies as per hostel type Note: The above-mentioned fee is as per the official sources. However, it is subject to change. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

data.title: CGC University Placement Report 2025
summary: This year, the highest package has seen an impressive growth from INR 53 LPA in 2024 to INR 1 Cr per annum in 2025. A student from the BTech CSE Class of 2025 has received this package. Earlier, CGC Mohali recorded 86% placements in the academic year 2023-2024. More than 650 recruiters participated at CGC Mohali in 2024 and presented over 1,600 job offers to the students of the batch 2024. The highest and average packages offered to the batch 2024 was INR 53 LPA and INR 6.20 LPA. Over 1,200 summer internship opportunities were provided to the students during the placement drive. sections.heading: Introduction
text: CGC University Mohali is located in Mohali, Punjab. The college offers all the essential facilities for students, like academic blocks, a library, clubs and societies, a café, a convenience store, etc.The Chandigarh Group of Colleges University Mohali is a Wi-Fi facility enabled campus, which offers a modern infrastructure and caters to all the needs of students. Students get access to separate hostels for both boys and girls with transport facility provided. Further, it has excellent infrastructure which includes classrooms, gym, 24/7 computer labs and a huge auditorium, etc.

CGC Mohali campus library has a collection of over 14,787 books, 25+ journals, and 29,762+ E-Books & E-Journals. The library remain opens from 8:30 a.m to 8:00 p.m , with the circulation timings being, 9:30 a.m to 4:30 p.m . The library is also opened on Sundays and holidays from 9:30 am to 4:30 pm . Students can access the Koha OPAC online 24/7 facility. The library also orgranises various events, like National Librarians Day, Hindi Diwas, National Books Lovers Day, etc. All in all, the students at this University get access to the state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the needed facilites.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The institute has a computerized library with well-set equipment and modern day technology to encourage research activities and advanced reading. The library is stocked with numerous books authored by experts on the subject and subscribes to national and international journals, magazines and national and regional.The library subscribes to national and international journals, magazines and national and regional dailies to keep the students in touch with their fields of interest. The library is well furnished and can seat more than 100 students at a time in the spacious reading hall. The peaceful atmosphere in the library plays a major role in helping students concentrate and study better.  Apart from books, the library has a good collection of Audio video material, NPTEL, CDs & DVDs. The library has a separate “Book Bank” exclusively for the high flyers. Institute has E-Library and Journals.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description:
The institute provides the facility of a well-structured and clean canteen.The Canteen can accommodate around 500 students at a time. It has been equipped with modern furniture and automatic cooking and storage facilities, which offers hot lunch, snacks, and beverages both to the students and staff at reasonable rates. It is well maintained with an efficient service and take away counter. It serves a variety of dishes at reasonable prices.
Institute has CGC Restaurant.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Hostels are provided with the facilities such as air cooler in each room, arrangement for 24 hours uninterrupted power supply through govt, power supply, and college generators, internet connectivity through wi-fi system, hot water in winters and RO purified drinking water, facilities for indoor and outdoor games, 24 x 7 medical dispensary with ambulance etc, 24 hours security,laundry facility (optional on payment basis),tuck shops to cater to daily needs of the students,newspapers and magazines and a well-equipped gym in each hostel.

facilities.name: Gym
facilities.description: The institute has a fully-equipped gym with the latest equipment and facilities. There are various Gym Equipments such as treadmill, Elliptical Trailer, Upright Bike, MG Series Butterfly, Cable Cross, LatPulldown, Long pull, Horizontal Leg Cult, Leg Extension, Sterling Series Leg Press, Shoulder Press, Bicep Curl, Seated Calf Raise, Multi Hyper Extension, Multi-Adjustable Inclined Bench, Dumbbell Rack, Multi Ab Bench, Olympic Flat Bench, If Series Squat Stand, Pulse Fitness TPU Olympic Plates & Dumbbells etc.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: The institute has its own fleet of luxurious transport buses which offer the comfort of a pickup and drop facility to faculty members and students from different places throughout the surrounding areas. The transport facility offered is widely spread across the areas covering Ambala, Patiala, Mandigobindgarh, Rajpura, Banur, Sirhind, Fatehgarh Sahib, Bassi Pathana etc. Transport facility is equipped with GPS system.

college_info.college_name: CMR College of Engineering and Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
CMR College of Engineering and Technology, also known as CMRCET, is a private institute. Established in 2002, it is located in Hyderabad, Telangana. The college is a UGC autonomous institute and approved by the AICTE. CMCET is affiliated with JNTUH and accredited by the NBA and NAAC A+ Grade. CMR College of Engineering and Technology comes under the aegis of CMT Technical Education Society
CMR College of Engineering and Technology offers UG and PG courses across Engineering and Management streams. The flagship courses offered are MBA and BTech. The institute offers scholarships to deserving and meritorious students. CMR College of Engineering and Technology admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts national entrance exams such as EAMCET, ICET, and GATE. The college was spread over 10 acres of area which includes classrooms, labs, a library, an auditorium, a sports complex, a cafeteria, and others. The key highlights of CMR College of Engineering and Technology have been tabulated below:
CMR College of Engineering and Technology

CMR College of Engineering and Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

summary.college_name: CMR College of  Engineering and Technology

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: CMRCET - Think placements, then think CMR.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of the students from CMR College of Engineering and Technology are placed every year among the eligible candidates. The college has seen around 75+ companies visit the campus, offering around 600+ job offers from all domains and branches. The highest package was 42 LPA last year. There are many companies like Capgemini, Accenture, Deloitte, Amazon, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is decent and not very luxurious obviously it's a tier 3 college. Mess food is manageable but not something we look forward to every day. Every classroom is equipped with projectors and some classrooms are integrated with smart screens for advanced learning. Overall, campus infrastructure is great and clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are in hold of Ph.D. or M.Tech degrees. While some of faculty teach with real examples and clarity, others rely heavily on PPTs and smart screens. Term exams are conducted 2 times every semester with an end semester examination. It also contains lab exams for respective branch students with specializations. The curriculum is fairly standard for a JNTU-affiliated college. Some subjects are outdated but are useful.
detailed_review.Other: Life on campus is fairly balanced, neither good nor bad. Our college consists few clubs like coding groups, entrepreneurship, cultural and sports clubs, etc. College management is in charge of conducting events every semester or year. I chose CSE because I have an unwavering interest in new modern web technologies, and have an aim of joining a top MNC as software developer.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The college is very good in terms of education and faculty teaching.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are not bad at all. Students with good skills definitely get placed at CMR College of Engineering and Technology. As per my knowledge, last year, around 70% of students got placed, with a CSE student receiving the highest package of 48 LPA. The average package is around 8 LPA, and companies like Capgemini visit our college every year. Therefore, CMR is very good in terms of placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is amazing. There are four blocks in our CET campus, with Block 1 completely occupied by first-year students. There are different labs for different subjects. Labs are always in working condition, which helps a lot during practical examinations. Coming to the hostels, the food is okay, and sports are given enough priority. There is a separate CMR hospital, which helps in critical situations and provides first aid.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college is an autonomous college. Teachers here are very qualified and educated. The quality of teaching differs between teachers, but it is understandable. Faculty is very helpful during examinations. Semester examinations are not very tough compared to JNTUH question papers, but these question papers help students get ready for the future. The pass percentage in the last semester is around 75%, as far as I know.
detailed_review.Other: I personally chose this course based on my interest because I like interacting with computers. As everyone says, AI is the future, and I share the same opinion and try to master it. I am currently in the 4th semester and have already started learning the required basics to excel in AI. Fests and events take place frequently in our college. They provide a friendly atmosphere for everyone. There is also a subject based on CEER, which encourages innovation among students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely dissatisfied with my college.

detailed_review.Placements: A maximum of 9 to 9.5 CGPA was needed. The highest package, according to me, was 24 LPA, and the average package was 6 LPA. Very small companies were recruiting, and only 20 to 30 percent of students got internships in those small companies. The top roles offered were in AI and ML.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available in our college were very poor. The college looked beautiful from the outside, but not really look the same when coming to labs. Only some of labs were good many were not nice, and even fans were not there. The hostel was in the same situation. We paid lakhs for it, but it was the worst.
detailed_review.Faculty: Coming to teaching, some teachers were nice and had knowledge of the subject, but many had no idea what they were teaching. In coming to the curriculum they are teaching many unwanted curriculum like unwanted subjects the pass percentage of the first semester was 50–60 out of 100.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE according to my interest in building new technology for this generation.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Teachers are the best-qualified in our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 62.5 percent of students got placed in the college placements from our course. The highest package was 5.5 LPA, the lowest package was 3 LPA, and the average package was 4 LPA. Tech Mahindra, Amazon, Google, TCS, Wipro, Accenture, Coulruyt, and Infosys were the top recruiting companies from our course. Approximately 78.6 percent of the students completed their internships at various companies. Higher roles like web development and code development were the top roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available on the campus were good infrastructure, a bigger lawn, a library, free Wi-Fi around the entire campus, project labs, an auditorium, seminar halls, AC labs, etc. There were three blocks in the hostel for both boys and girls with AC and non-AC facilities. The food was excellent in both the hostel and the canteen. Sports like cricket, basketball, volleyball, and other indoor games were played regularly on the college premises. Medical services were also great, with professional doctors and an ambulance facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were highly qualified and knowledgeable in their courses. Their teaching quality was amazing. Our course curriculum was best at making students industry-ready. Mostly, the semester exams were based on application, so understanding the concepts clearly helped. The pass percentage was around 65.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of opportunities it had in the future. Improvements like increasing industrial visits would have been great. Events like cultural activities, festivals, concerts, farewell parties, meetings, and tours were the best entertainment for students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best infrastructure and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 15 percent of students are placed in my course of ECE. The highest package is 6.75 LPA in my course. The lowest package is between 2.4 LPA and 3 LPA. The average package is 7 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Microsoft, Amazon, Cognizant, and Infosys. 30 to 40 per cent of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The best infrastructure is provided in college for both students and faculty. Computer labs are provided, and electrical and communication labs are available. Every classroom has digital boards, and a library session is separately provided. Good quality in the hostel mess. Sports and games can be played in free time. There will be a separate session for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching faculty was very helpful in clarifying subject-wise doubts. Well-knowledge faculty and every faculty member has a PhD and a doctorate. Every course provided by the college meets the industry-required knowledge and technology related to industry required. Semester exams are not too difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has a good scope of features in electrical engineering, like in many government sector services. I need to improve myself more to achieve success in this course. Events and festivals will be conducted every year, and very grandly celebrated.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It cannot be the chosen one.

detailed_review.Placements: There are placements in our college. The highest package in our college up to date is 48 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Accenture, and Capgemini visit the college for placements. Approximately 50-60% of students got placed. Internships are also provided in our college with a stipend of Rs. 20,000 per month.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is okay. The hostel is very good. Facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are arranged in a perfect way. Computer labs used for coding are a little bit lower and not every lab. The food is not worth the fees we pay in hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very average. Multiple subjects are taught by a single faculty member who does not have any connection. Exams are conducted according to the course curriculum only. The semester exam's difficulty level is rated according to the subject. The paper standard is maintained very well.
detailed_review.Other: Nowadays, there is demand for AI and it is mainly focused on the software industry, so I chose this course. Faculty members should be improved. Fests and events are very limited in our college, and they need to be improved.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: In our college, there is a 100 percent placement guarantee for the well-performing students.

detailed_review.Placements: Especially from our course, almost 70 percent of the students got SWL in the campus placements. The highest package is 6 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. The recruiting companies like BHEL, Crompton, Abb Ltd, etc., are the top ones. The internship companies in software IT Solutions Pvt Ltd, electrical engineering internship, etc. The percentage of students who got their internship certificates is about 80 percent. The higher roles are like an electrical engineer and a control engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college is widely spread over 30 acres of land with facilities like AC labs, seminar halls, library, free Wi-Fi around the entire campus, ventilated classrooms, project labs, good water facilities, etc. The quality of the food available in the mess and canteen is amazing with reasonable prices, and the hostel facilities are also great. The sports are played in the college ground every day, and the medical services, such as ambulance and treatment, are available in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers from our course are absolutely exceptional in their course, almost every teacher has done their PhDs in their field. Their quality of teaching was so amazing, with a proper way of expressing the concepts to the students. The course curriculum we are following is absolutely giving great results in the industry. The semister exams are difficult if we can't understand the concepts clearly, so practice is important to pass. The pass percentage is decent, around 53 percent of the students get passed every year.
detailed_review.Other: The best thing about the course I chose is that it allows me to learn new things and upgrade my knowledge every day. The betterments, like bringing the new ideas to make students understand the concepts, will be great. The mind refreshing activities like fests, farewells, freshers, crowd meetings, tours, concerts, etc., are available in our college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of CMR College of Engineering and Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage for these years is 85 percent. The highest package offered is 28 LPA, and the average package offered is 7 LPA. The top companies recruiting include Google, Infosys, Amazon, Flipkart, Wipro, etc. The percentage of getting an internship is 70 percent in companies like Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is looking very good. Each course has its own block. All department blocks are good. No Wi-Fi is provided in college, labs are very adequate, classrooms are good, and in the library, all books are available. The quality of the hostel facilities is like the food and rooms. Good sports and medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful to students. If students are facing any kind of doubts. Most teachers are very experienced and highly qualified. Teaching quality is good. This course is relevant to the software field. Semester exams are easy. The percentage of passing semester is 80 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of CMR College of Engineering and Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The companies attending are good, and the placement is also good, and they give good training from the basics. The packaging is good, and some students in 3rd year also got placed, and it's pretty well packaged, and also the companies are top MNCs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostels outside are more preferable, and the management hostels are expensive, and the facilities don't meet the mark. The Wi-Fi is also not good, and the signal strength is weak, there are jammers. Sports hour is also not kept, and overall, it's bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: It's good overall, but the teaching is becoming faster, and even though the faculty teaches, we should learn on our own. The teaching is good, and the curriculum is quite stressful, and the pass percentage is also good, but the question paper is tough.
detailed_review.Other: I would think that the campus life would be the worst, but friends make it good, and also, events should be conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with my knowledge. Everything is very nice.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of students are placed in my course. The highest package is 53 LPA, the average package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.6 LPA. Our top recruitment companies are Google, Microsoft, Visa, etc. 50 percent of students get internships. The top roles offered are software engineer roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are very good. Classes are very spacious. Our classrooms have digital boards. The computers are very good with many features. We have a very big library with different types of books. The hostel facilities are very nice. The food in the mess is hygienic. It has many varieties and tastes good. Our college provides several sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are skilled in their domain, interaction with students is very polite. They support students in every situation. The course is relevant to the industry. They explain with real-life examples to help students understand more clearly. The pass percentage is 95% at our college. Exams are conducted in easy way.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to gain more knowledge. The best thing about my course is that various opportunities are available in my field. Everything is very nice. There is no need for improvement. Many events and fests are conducted in our college, which help students participate in every activity. Our college provides many scholarships to help students financially.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Think placements, think CMR.

detailed_review.Placements: Many companies like Capgemini, Google, Microsoft, Wipro, and TCS visit our college. About 50 percent of students are placed. The highest package is 53 LPA from Microsoft, and the lowest is 4 LPA from TCS. Top companies like Microsoft, Google, and Capgemini visit our college. Around 35-40% of students get internships, and most roles offered are SDE positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a large library and a very big 2,000-capacity auditorium and a 500-capacity auditorium. Labs are fully Wi-Fi enabled and air-conditioned. Classes are neat and clean, and every class has a Teachmint digital board. There is a separate department for sports, and students can play for free every evening.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is good and awesome. Our college is JNTU affiliated, so there are not many holidays, and the papers are medium to hard. I am a Data Science student, so the subjects are related to my course. There is special training and placement classes once or twice a week for six hours a day. Faculty is friendly and good.
detailed_review.Other: I am very interested in AIML, but unfortunately, due to my EAMCET rank, I was not qualified, so I chose Data Science in CMT Main Campus (EAMCET code: CMRK). There are many tournaments in our college. It includes cricket, volleyball, football, Kabaddi, and esports every year. There are also many events like freshers, Dandiya Nights, and celebrations for every festival.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College has excellent facilities and placements in all courses.

detailed_review.Placements: College placements from our course in 2024 were decent, with around 53% of students getting placed. The highest package is 6 LPA, the average salary is 4 LPA, and the lowest salary is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Google, Amazon, Infosys Pvt Ltd. From our course, almost everyone has done their internship in various companies. The good roles are like web development and code decoding.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The provided facilities include good college grounds, ventilated classrooms, a library, free Wi-Fi around the entire campus, separate blocks for different branches of students, good water facilities, a pleasant lawn to relax, etc., which are provided by the college. The quality of the food and the surroundings of the hostel are quite decent, with reasonable prices in the canteen also. Sports like volleyball, cricket, and basketball are played regularly in the college. Medical facilities are available for the students every day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members from our course are doing an excellent job throughout the academics with a proper way of teaching and making every student clear with the concepts. The quality of the teaching has been great. They are well knowledgeable and highly effective in their course. Course curriculum of our course is liked by everyone because it is making many students industry-ready to go. Semester exams are not as difficult as we think. We need to understand the concepts clearly. The pass percentage is around 65%.
detailed_review.Other: The course I chose will keep me motivated every single day for my future development. The improvements, such as the well-updated computers, need to be replaced in the laboratory. The occasions in the college, like tours, fests, farewells, freshers, crowd meetings, etc., are great.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: CMR College of Engineering and Technology is always with students.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 78 to 83% of students are placed. The highest package is 28 LPA, the lowest is 4.5 LPA, and the average is 6 to 8 LPA. Top recruiters include Amazon, Microsoft, Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Capgemini, and Cognizant. Around 70 to 80% of students get placed in Amazon, Infosys, TCS, Accenture, Wipro, IBM, and Siemens. Top roles offered to seniors are Software Developer, Data Analyst, and Project Manager, with other roles such as Data Technician, Assistant Software Engineer (ASE), and specialized roles like Aerospace Engineer or Flight Engineer depending on the specific program.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a well-designed library with knowledgeable books, good computer labs, and digital classrooms with normal Wi-Fi services. We have a sports ground and sports club, a hygienic canteen and hostel food, and our CMR hospital takes care of every student.
detailed_review.Faculty: We have a CEER department to encourage students’ ideas and mentor them with great knowledge. As per the subject, they follow the syllabus. 75 to 80% of students who study can pass. It all depends on us.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, but some faculty are good. Placements are low. Focus is needed on all students.

detailed_review.Placements: I don't know the particular percentage of students placed in my course, but there are about 500 students in a single department or course. The number of placed students is less according to the college. The highest package is 50 LPA. Recruiting companies are Capgemini, TCS, etc. Around 80% of students get internships in companies like IBM, Paytm, and Honeywell, among others. The roles are Software Engineering, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good in some ways. Sometimes there is a network issue. Classrooms are okay. Labs depend on the particular lab. Some are good and some are average. Sports and games are okay, and the canteen food is good. The infrastructure is good in the first block but not the same in the second.
detailed_review.Faculty: According to the subjects, in some particular subjects teachers are good, but in other subjects it is not easy to understand. Some of the faculty are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is average. The semester exams are between hard and easy.
detailed_review.Other: The main purpose of choosing this course is to improve the development of skills and focus on every student so that I can get a chance to improve. Course events are not many, and there is not much campus crowd.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Summary of the college and basic understanding.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has very decent placements, and most of the students are getting placed on our campus. The highest package is around 24 LPA, the median is 12 LPA, and the lowest is around 4.5 LPA - 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Amazon, Capgemini, TCS, Wipro, and Paypal.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has good infrastructure and good Wi-Fi facility with well-equipped labs. We have large classrooms with projector facility, smart tv, mini auditorium, and a sports ground. The facilities available for our course include an additional digital learning platform named Knimbus and a digital library with well-organised books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and explain/share the knowledge with the students in such a way that every student can understand their teaching methodology. Their way of teaching helps to solve many real-world problems. The semester exams are rated around 8/10.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is very strict with a lot of rules and regulations.

detailed_review.Placements: The students have not yet been placed from our batch, but they are conducting training sessions and most of the students are participating in hackathons and gaining real world problem-solving skills. After the completion of training, we will be getting the internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is good. The college is well-equipped with labs, Wi-Fi, and library. Along with this, for a group of students, a mentor is allotted who takes care of their studies. There is a digital learning platform, i.e., Knimbus, where students learn online.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is around 4–4.5, in which they try to explain in many different ways to make the students better understandable and even they are more friendly, so that we can ask them any doubts freely.
detailed_review.Other: Scholarships will be provided to the students and the events and the fests in our college are less, but there are several clubs in our college where these extracurricular activities are encouraged.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of CMR College of Engineering and Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: 30 to 40% of the students are joining the ECE course. It has so many benefits. It has opportunities in software as well as hardware. Many students prefer this course. The highest package in my course is 40 LPA. Top companies like Infosys, Microsoft, Flipkart, Amazon, etc. Some of the students went into internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel infrastructure is so good. The maximum number of students is coming here for the best infrastructure. The campus is so beautiful, with nice classrooms and a library here. We have so many canteens and playgrounds. We have a medical facility available 24 hours a day.
detailed_review.Faculty: About the faculty, they are so good. Their teaching quality is amazing. They are very skilled in teaching. This course is very relevant to software companies and also to industry management. It is both useful. The semester is a very tough competition between the students. The question papers are also very tough, given by the faculty.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Supportive faculty members and life. Overall positive life.

detailed_review.Placements: It is good. There are so many companies offering placements like TCS and Microsoft. About 75% of the students are placed in the best companies. Around 15% of the students are going through the business way. 10% of the students are going through their own talent.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is good. The ethernet is only available in the labs. Mobile phones are not allowed on your bench, they should be kept in the mobile box. The classes are newly constructed, and they look good. Sports and extracurricular activities are average in college. But yearly, one happens in sports activities. Food is good and okay. Medical facilities are limited.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are supportive and knowledgeable. They are always ready to guide students. The curriculum is well planned with a mixture of theory and practical. Exams are conducted fairly, and on time which helps in maintaining discipline and academic standards. Faculty members are good and friendly. I think our batch has the best teaching faculty members.
detailed_review.Other: It's all good and above average.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College management has done an excellent job in providing good faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: I was so satisfied with the placements from our course. Around 75% of the students got placed on the campus placements drive. The highest package was 7.5 LPA, the lowest was 3 LPA, and the average was 4 LPA. Glass Pac Agi, Larsen and Toubro, and Kirloskar were the top recruiting companies from our course. Internship certificates were issued to around 80%. The top roles were offered in designing, developing, and maintaining.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure was absolutely worth the fees we paid. The facilities were available like good library, free Wi-Fi around the entire campus, AC classrooms, AC labs, seminar halls, auditorium, project labs, radio rooms, etc. The quality of the food in both hostel and canteen was also great with reasonable fees. The medical services like ambulance and treatment were available at the college. Sports and games like volleyball, cricket, basketball, and other indoor games were played regularly at the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members from our course had mostly done their PhDs and other higher studies in their course. Their teaching quality had been excellent throughout the academic year. Especially our course curriculum was really relevant, it made many students industry-ready. The pass percentage was great. Around 85% of the students will pass every year. The semester exams were not so difficult.
detailed_review.Other: This course had the best opportunities for the students so I chose this course. The betterments I wish like increasing the industrial visits will be great. Events like cultural activities, fests, farewells, freshers party, crowd meetings, tours, and concerts were the best entertainment for the students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure, but placements were okay. Events were fewer.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 30% of students got placed mostly. I think CMR considered placement as the motto of the college, but sometimes it didn’t work out. When it came to placements, a lower percentage of students were seen getting placed in some colleges, and that too mostly toppers. CGPA, of course, mattered in every college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to infrastructure, it was good but not much. The Wi-Fi password was not always shared in the college, and using phones during classes was strictly prohibited. If anyone was found using a phone in class, they might have been prohibited from attending the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers were helpful, but not all of them. Some were only available on contact, and many lab in-charges and lab faculty were not very experienced. Some of them did not know much about the subjects they taught. Not all were the same. A few of them were really good.
detailed_review.Other: Coming to college, faculty was very strict. Sometimes, CGPA mattered more than anything. There were not many events because this was CMR.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: CMR College of Engineering and Technology admissions are entrance-based. The college offers admission to BTech and BTech (LE) programmes based on TS EAMCET, TS ECET scores, respectively. Besides, aspirants with a valid score in GATE/ TS PGECET can get admission in M.Tech programme. For MBA, the selection is based on TS ICET scores. Aspirants need to participate in the exam counselling rounds to get a seat in CMRCET.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for various courses at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?

faqs.question: Can I get admission at CMR College of Engineering and Technology through TS EAMCET score?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking admission in BTech course at CMR College of Engineering and Technology can get admission based on TS EAMCET scores. Telangana State Engineering, Agriculture and Medical Common Entrance Test is a state-level entrance test is conducted once in a year in computer-based mode. In 2023, TS EAMCET cutoff for BTech CSE was 6640 and was the highest among all the BTech specialisations.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam accepted for admission at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, CMR College of Engineering and Technology considers national or state-level entrance exams for admission. The college accepts TS ICET, GATE, TS EAMCET, etc. for admission. Below is course-wise accepted entrance exams:
