faqs.answer: CMR College of Engineering and Technology offers a BTech for four years at the UG level. The course is divided into eight semesters. The college offers BTech in below specialisations:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for BTech at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates who have passed Intermediate examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Telangana with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as optional subjects, or any other examination recognised by the Government of Telangana as its equivalent are eligible to apply for BTech course at CMR College of Engineering and Technology.

faqs.question: What is the cutoff for CRM College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: CRM College of Engineering accepts TS EAMCET etnrance exam scores for admission to the BTech courses. As per the TS EAMCET cutoff 2024 for Round 1, the ranks ranged between 16201 and 38551 for the General Home State Quota. During the Round 1 cutoff, the toughest course to get into the CMR College of Engineering and Technology was BTech in Computer Science and Engineering . Candidates can refer to the table below to check out the CRM College of Engineering TS EAMCET cutoff 2024 for the General Home State quota students:

faqs.question: What is the opening and closing rank for BTech in CSE at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Opening and Closing rank depends on the category and quota of candidates. For general category under All India, opening rank was 6477 and closing rank was 6477. Cut off are different when it comes to other categories or female candidates and even domicile of home state. In All India, opening and closing rank for female candidates was 6407 and 6407. Admission to B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering at CMR College of Engineering and Technology is based on the scores obtained in the entrance exam TSEAMCET. Applicants are advised to confirm what category are they applying while checking for cut offs.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in MBA at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: CMR College of Engineering and Technology admission to MBA course is based on TS ICET score. The Convener admits 70% of the intake to the MBA course based on the ICET rank. 30% seats in the MBA course are offered under the Management Quota.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants must pass a bachelor's degree in any discipline with a minimum of 50% aggregate to apply for CMR College of Engineering and Technology MBA programme. Candidates must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: What is the qualification required to apply for M.Tech at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants must complete a bachelor's degree in Engineering/ Technology of any recognised university in the concerned discipline to apply for CMR College of Engineering and Technology M.Tech course. Aspirants who have completed AMIE/ AMIETE or similar qualifications recognised by UPSC as equivalent to BE/ BTech can also apply. Aspirants should either have secured a rank or should have secured a minimum 50% aggregate in group subjects (Maths, Physics and Chemistry) in the Intermediate Examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Telangana or any other examination recognised by the Government of Telangana as its equivalent along with bachelor's degree to apply for MTech.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for M.Tech at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: There are a total of 48 seats in M.Tech course of CMR College of Engineering and Technology. There is an intake of 12 in each M.Tech specialisation. CMRCET offers seats in M.Tech programme based on a valid score in GATE or TS PGECET. Once selected, aspirants need to confirm their seat by paying the course fee after completion of counseling.

faqs.question: Are applications open at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: CMR College of Engineering and Technology applications are filled online. Aspirants need to fill out the application form for the accepted entrance exam. Candidates also need to pay an application fee to apply for the test. In case of any doubt, aspirants can fill out the admission enquiry form.

faqs.question: How can I apply for Management Quota seats at CMR College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking admission under the Management Quota at CMR College of Engineering and Technology can download the application form from the college's website. Candidates need to fill out personal, academic and contact details in the form. Aspirants can follow the below steps to apply for admission: Step 1: Visit the official website of CMRCET. Step 2: Under the 'Academics' tab on the Home page, click on 'Admission Procedure'. Step 3: Click on 'Click Here' in front of Category-B. Step 4: Fill out the form and send it to the specified address.

data.title: CMR College of Engineering and Technology Placement Report 2024
summary: The CMRCET placement report for 2024 has been released on the official website. The report includes the list of students placed along with the companies that hired them. A total of 607 offers were made by the 75 companies that visited the campus during the 2023-24 academic year. The highest package grabbed by the batch was INR 42 LPA and the average package stood at INR 5.75 LPA.

faqs.question: How to prepare for CMR College of Engineering and Technology placement interview?
faqs.answer: Most of the companies start the placement process with a pre-placement talk that describes the job profile, the company's vision and the services provided by them. Students are advised to attend the PPT for the desired company as it is the base step of preparation for that particular company. Thereafter, prepare a decent resume highlighting your skills, academic background, and extra-curricular details. The most important step of the placement interview is the test conducted by the interviewer. Students should well prepare the Logical Reasoning, Verbal Ability, and Quantitative Awareness topics. Alongside this, prepare the basics of the core subject, depending upon the branch they are studying in. To excel in the GD round, try to initiate first and listen carefully to the point put forward by the other members. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

They are majorly involved in the Engineering and IT sectors.

college_info.college_name: CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College): Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) was established in 2009 and is located in Medchal, Hyderabad. It is a UGC Autonomous Engineering College. CMR Technical Campus comes under the aegis of CMT Technical Education Society with NBA and NAAC accreditation with an A grade. It is a well-established teaching and learning process with the best technological knowledge. The institute offers UG and PG courses across Engineering and Management streams. The flagship course offered at CMR Technical Campus is BTech.
CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) has collaboration with national and international organisations. The institute has state-of-the-art infrastructure which includes a library, auditorium, smart classrooms, labs, cafeteria, sports complex, and others. CMR Technical Campus admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts national entrance exams such as TS EAMCET, GATE, TS PGECET, and TSICET. The key highlights of CMR Technical Campus have been tabulated below:
CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) Highlights 2025
TS EAMCET, GATE, TS PGECET, TSICET

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It has good placements and a good atmosphere.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% percent of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 14 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Accenture, Google, and Microsoft. The top roles are software developers and data scientists. Around 70% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college atmosphere is good, and the infrastructure is good. The classrooms are neat with comfortable benches. The computer labs are good. The Wi-Fi facility is available. We have a huge library. The hostel facilities are good. The canteen is also available. The sports facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very friendly. All faculty are well-qualified and knowledgeable. The teachers are teaching well. They always clarify our doubts, and they have a lot of experience. The course curriculum is superb. The semester exams are difficult, and the pass percentage is 75%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of faculty and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 65 percent of students are placed in the course. The highest package offered in my course is 12 LPA. The average package offered in my course is 4 LPA. The recruiting companies are Capgemini, Cognizant, Microsoft, Accenture, Infosys, Siemens, DBS, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and the infrastructure are very good. We have visual classrooms and labs, which help the students get a better experience. The food quality in the hostel and canteen is very healthy and tasty. The college has a good library which helps to get knowledge from different books.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in college have a lot of experience, which helps the students a lot. Teachers have experience of 15 years or more, which helps give better results from students. The teachers make the students ready for the industry with real-time projects and a better experience in the industry.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in electronics projects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of faculty and placements.

Top companies recruiting for my course are Capgemini, Cognizant, Accenture, Amazon, Infosys, and Meta. 20 percent of students got internships from my course in the above companies.

The semesters exams in this college are very difficult. The pass percentage is 60 percent. Teachers play a crucial role in teaching.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I was satisfied in this college as per the subject knowledge, but they should conduct more events.

detailed_review.Placements: In this CMR Technical Campus, 30% of the students in the branch will be eligible for placement. The highest package was 40 lakhs per annum, and the lowest package was 1.5 lakhs per annum, with the average being 6 lakhs per annum. In total, around 60% of students got internships from my course, and a good company is Cognizant. Top roles offered in my course are data analyst and data manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is not available and has no access to students' devices. When we come to labs, there is high maintenance for labs, and in the classes, they are also very neat and clean. The library is also very calm. The quality of the food in the canteen is very tasty, and the medical, sports, and games facilities are okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, and the lecturers are very knowledgeable. Overall, their teaching quality is very good. The course makes the students industry-ready, but the semester exams are quite difficult in the college. The pass percentage is 67%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to gain more knowledge about the software industry. In this campus, events should be improved more because there are no events at all except 1 or 2 events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and supportive campus environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, about 70% of students are placed in the final year. The top recruiting companies are Cognizant, Capgemini, Mindtree, and Infosys. The top roles offered are Data Analyst and Software Developer. The highest package offered is 44 LPA, the lowest is around 3.6 LPA, and the average package is around 4.25 LPA. Nearly 50% of students get internships from Infosys and Cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides many good facilities. There are five blocks in total. Three blocks are for B.Tech students, one block is for MBA, library, and auditorium, and another block is for sports. In the hostel, the food is good, and the canteen is also good. The college has its own hospital.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. Every faculty member has studied M.Tech and is qualified. Their way of teaching is good. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students ready. The exams are difficult, which makes the students study more, and the pass percentage is around 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because there is high value in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. The best thing is to create new AI and technology. The course also shows practical examples for students. Many events are conducted to boost students in various activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Review of CMR Technical Campus.

detailed_review.Placements: My college has a placement training office. They offer internships and certifications with a stipend of Rs. 40,000 per month from companies like Cisco, Microsoft, and Google. I am doing a minor project on fire detection, which sends an alert to mobile phones.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good books and journals in our library, and we can read them daily. My college has a gym, a canteen, a library, and some sports grounds outside and inside. Hostel timings are from 6:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., and campus timings are from 9:20 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. In Nagar College, popular hangout places include the cafeteria.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because of the increasing competition nowadays due to AI and other technologies. In this aspect, this course will grow in the future and help us get good jobs. It will also be useful in different fields. Innova College has many clubs, such as sports and cultural clubs, which conduct various events like Anwar Live and Favourite Day. Faculty gives students the opportunity to participate in these clubs, spend time with them, and perform in different events. The clubs approach first-year students and ask them which club they want to join. Annual celebrations like Dussehra and Sankranthi are celebrated well, but now the activities have been reduced and no extra activities are going on.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: CMR Technical Campus Autonomous.

detailed_review.Placements: The students become eligible for placements during the 6th semester, and compared to other colleges, our college is good at getting students placed. The highest package till now I heard is around 40 LPA. Our college has a great choice for applying to multinational companies, like MNCs like Amazon, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, both product-based and service-based companies, and has various options in choosing jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We can participate in any clubs in our department; we have a robotics club and an innovative club. By participating in those clubs, we will get a certificate. Our college also conducts annual days and technical festivals every two years, and the library generally contains a wide range of books. Our classrooms are very large. Around 70 members can easily sit in our classroom, and our college also offers sports and other extracurricular activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty-to-student ratio is good. The student-faculty relationship is better, and faculty members are positive and approachable. The Maths faculty, I like, and the reason for it is that it’s an interesting subject. Some exams are easy, and some are difficult. I would rate the course curriculum in terms of relevance and comprehensiveness as a 10. The frequency and timing of exams, along with my perspective on their difficulty level, are fine. There is nothing for improvement in the course curriculum and teaching methods.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college education and infrastructure are good.

detailed_review.Placements: About 60% of people have been placed in our course. Top companies like Amazon, TCS, Wipro, Google, etc., and also some other companies came to our college regarding placements. Some students got internships on campus, and some students are doing internships off campus according to their goals.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. The classrooms and labs are clean. In the labs, they provide each student with a computer, and the Wi-Fi signal is also good for doing work and research. The hostel is on the college premises only, which is an advantage for students to avoid wasting time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are somewhat useful for us in order to gain knowledge. Sometimes we understand, and sometimes we don’t. The exams are also somewhat helpful for students like us. About 40% of the faculty members explain very well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: CMR technical campus is autonomous.

detailed_review.Placements: Top job roles are coming for the CSE course. So the maximum students are preferred to join in CSE course. The highest package is 50 LPA, and the lowest package is 5 LPA. Half of students are interested in doing internships in companies, like part-time jobs, to get experience.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is very beautiful and it is a very big place. We have so many classrooms and labs, and one big, well-stocked library with AC. We have Wi-Fi available at any time in the college. We have hostel facilities and bus facilities available for both hostelers and day boarders. We have so many canteens and clinics.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well educated here. Their teaching quality is so good and very understandable. They are very friendly to students while teaching. They have so many skills in teaching. This course is relevant to software companies. The semester exams are moderate. A maximum of 98 percent of students pass IB in every semester.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The happy place only in dreams.

detailed_review.Placements: Very less number of students got placed this time after the lockdown due to covid. Top recruiting companies used to visit like Deloitte, Cognizant, Wipro, TCS, Tech Mahindra, Accenture, and DXC. Top roles are software developer and web designer for those who are qualified enough. The highest package is 44 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA. The average package salary is 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We stay in boys hostel which is outside the campus within 2 KM distance. The hostel is good but very expensive like Rs 6000 per month. College has boys hostel but it cost Rs 10,000 a month so better to choose outside hostel. Food is available all day, and it can be eaten happily with no regret of fee. Chicken is provided twice a week.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are not very easy but can be cracked. But the correction of papers is very based as per my observation. Lab marks are given according to favoritism. The curriculum is totally different from what is required for real-world experience. They teach something else, and we have to qualify for something else in placement exams.
detailed_review.Other: During the time of placements, the students are divided into batches, and only a few batches are favoured by the placement cell. The placement coordinator, Ch Madhav sir is just concerned about the count of placements but he is never scared about the work role and reputation of a hiring company.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: The life of an abandoned CMRTian.

detailed_review.Placements: Generally, data science included similar subjects as computer science and artificial intelligence so most of the students prefer data science over all other branches. About 70% of students will get placements every year. Top recruiting companies were Accenture, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, IBM, and Google.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure included benches, chair, and projectors. We had systems in every computer lab and Wi-Fi over there. Library included study chair and silent background. Hostel was good but the fee was very high so most of the people chose private hostels, PG, and only those who were rich could afford those hostels. Canteen food and soft drinks were affordable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the faculty members were very bad at teaching. I feel they did not know how to teach effectively. Most of the faculty members were just aware of maintaining class. But they could not even teach proper programming in labs, if a student found an error. Teachers also could not solve it. Semester exams were the worst, they failed most of the students for money.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fests were organised but no enjoyment and no proper food to enjoy during fests. They only give the bagara price with chicken curry and nothing else, not even soft drinks. I suggest my fellow juniors, please don't choose this, the worst college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice placements and beautiful atmosphere.

detailed_review.Placements: The top recruiting companies were Infosys, Wipro, and Microsoft. Approximately 75% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered was 10 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered was 3 LPA. Top roles offered were web developer and software developer. 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus provided good facilities. Hostel facilities were good, separate hostels were available for boys and girls. The hostel food was good. The canteen was also available. Infrastructure was good. Classrooms were neat. The Wi-Fi and library were available. Computer labs were good. The sports facilities were good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum was relevant, and it made students industry-ready. Teachers were well-qualified and knowledgeable. They had 6 to 8 years of experience. They clarify our doubts. Their teaching quality was good. The semester exams were difficult, and 70% was pass percentage.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College provides best placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The 80% percent of students got placed. The top recruiting companies are Infosys, Wipro, and Microsoft. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. The top roles are project manager and software developer. Around 65% of students got an internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hotel facilities are so nice at this college. The B.Ed rooms are good with an attached bathroom. The hotel food is good. The hotel canteen provides many popular dishes. The classrooms are in good condition. The Wi-Fi facility is also available. The labs and library are available. The medical facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in our college are good. They are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They are helpful and friendly. They have a lot of experience. The teachers are more supportive. The course curriculum is relevant and it prepares students for the industry. The semester exams are difficult. 68% is the pass percentage.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: The college has provided good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 86% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Infosys, Microsoft, and Adobe. The top roles are data scientist, project manager, and database administrator. Around 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good in our college. The classrooms are big with comfortable benches. The computer labs are good. The many technical and financial books are in the library. The Wi-Fi facility is also available. The hostel facilities are good and the canteen provides many popular dishes.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified and experienced. They are very helpful to students and friendly. They have a lot of knowledge. They clarify our doubts. The course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult, and the pass percentage is 60%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I literally loved this college and the facilities provided.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, approximately 85% of the students got selected in the campus drives with highest package between 12 to 14 LPA, lowest package was 2 to 3 LPA, and average package was between 5 to 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Cognizant, Capgemini, Accenture, Wipro, and Deloitte are there. Students with internship certificates are about 80% from our course in companies like Capgemini, Accenture, Cognizant, etc., in top roles like searching, developing, and maintaining vendor relations.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi facility throughout the campus, library for different branches of students, labs, seminar halls, an auditorium, project labs, good ventilated classrooms with AC, etc. Facilities of the hostel include good and clean rooms with attached bathrooms, tasty food in mess and canteen with reasonable prices, water facilities, etc. For the students, there are medical services available 24/7 and a qualified doctor with an ambulance facility. Every weekend, there will be a sports meet for both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were really supportive of the students, many of the faculty have higher degrees, such as PhDs and M.Tech, and some of them have experience from reputed companies. Teaching quality has been excellent throughout the academics. This course curriculum is really providing great results in making students industry-ready. Final exams are not really tough to pass, they are well manageable, and pass percentage was around 92.5%.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because it provides me the best opportunities and various choices in my career so I choose this course. I wish things like improving the standards of the laboratory would be great. Entertainment activities like musical night fests, farewells, freshers crowd meetings, tours, concerts, festivals, etc., are excellent in the college.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: My honest review of my college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good in the college. The average package offered is around 3 LPA. However, some students get placed with a good package as the highest package offered is 12 LPA. Flipkart is one of the companies that visited the college for placements. Some other good product companies that visited are Deloitte, Sony, etc. The package offered is above 4.5 LPA. Mass recruiting companies also visit the college, including TCS and Infosys. Altogether, 65% of students get placed. The maximum intake is from the TCS company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel food is bad. There are no indoor games in the hostel. They close the hostel door at 8 PM for boys and 7 PM for girls. The only facility they provide is free Wi-Fi. Labs are well-equipped with all the necessary equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is good enough. The course structure is well-planned. The lab course is structured and preplanned. I won't claim that all teachers are very good, but teachers were really helpful. Senior teachers are experienced. The dean of the EC department is a PhD holder from IISC Bangalore. So it gives an edge. Extra classes are organised for students. The course curriculum is a bit outdated, but professors bring a lot of new topics for discussion. Pedagogy is also a bit outdated, considering the fact that lots of other MBA institutes have an innovative style of teaching. Some courses are offered on a specific campus, so it creates a lot of convenience for students to travel to different campuses.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Good college with excellent infrastructure!

detailed_review.Placements: Placement statistics: The placement percentage is more than 50 percent students. The highest package is 44 LPA (Amazon). The average package is 4.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies include Amazon, Capgemini, Cognizant, Accenture, Infosys, Spine Labs and UiPath. Companies like Amazon, Capgemini and others typically offer roles in software development, consulting and technology.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities are excellent. The college is equipped with spacious classrooms with projectors an informative and well maintained library, hygienic canteen with a variety of food items and huge playground on the campus. The facilities and infrastructure - We have included modern classrooms and labs with Wi-Fi connectivity. The library has digital resources. The hostel has comfortable accommodation and a variety of food options. The college has medical facilities on campus, including medical care. We have sports and games with equipment. We have a gym and fitness center.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good, featuring clear explanations and interactive sessions. The course curriculum is relevant, well-structured, and industry-focused, effectively preparing students for the workforce. Semester exams are manageable with regular study and attendance. The pass percentage varies, but is around 40% in some courses.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The college has good campus placements and good college life.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has better placement opportunities. They provide charge training sessions which will be included in our tuition fee for placements. Training will be provided for the students. They also help in securing campus placement. There are a lot of opportunities for students to secure placement. Most of the students with skills get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has good infrastructure. Allocated labs for every subject which helps us in practical sessions. Wi-Fi is provided for every lab. Students can connect to that Wi-Fi. Food will be available in the canteen. Sports classes will be there only in the first year of college.
detailed_review.Faculty: It doesn't have the best faculty, but they are supportive in some cases. The course curriculum is relevant in most of the cases but hands real-time scenario is very important. Semester exams in our college are very easy to prepare for. The pass percentage is more.
detailed_review.Other: I choose artificial intelligence and machine learning specialization. I'm a 2025 pass-out batch. There will be very few events hosted by our college.

faqs.question: Can I join CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) directly?
faqs.answer: CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) offers direct admission for 30% of its seats through the Management quota. To secure a seat via this quota, candidates must meet the specific criteria set by the college. Further, for admission to the rest of the 70% seats, the college accepts scores of various entrance exams. The college accepted TS EAMCET, GATE, TS PGECET and TSICET for admission to BTech, M.Tech and MBA, respectively. Further, candidates must fill out the basic eligibility i.e., for admission to UG courses must pass Class 12 for PG must have a graduation degree from a recognised board/university.

faqs.question: Can I join MBA directly at CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College)?
faqs.answer: CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) provides direct admission to 30% of its seats through a management quota. For the remaining 70% of seats, admissions to the MBA programme are based on entrance exams. Candidates seeking admission through the management quota must have a UG degree with an aggregate score of at least 45%.However, for admission to  Convener quota i.e. 70% of the seat, candidates are required to apply and appear in the TSICET entrance exam. After filling out the criteria, candidates must have to fill out the application form online to be eligible for admission.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College)?

Candidates having a UG degree with 45% aggregate are eligible to apply for admission. After the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria, candidates have to visit the official website of CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) to apply online.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for M.Tech admission at CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College)?

A part of the fee must be paid at the time of admission by the selected candidates to confirm their seats. data.title: CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) Placement Report 2024
summary: CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) has a placement cell whose primary goal is to help students improve their skills in opportunity evaluation and grasp the tasks, judgments, and knowledge required to turn a job chance into a solid career milestone. The Cell has an E-learning System (GEMS) to develop communication skills and aptitude. The final placements at CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) are a result of very systematic interaction with the industry and continuous career counselling of the students.

During CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) placements 2024, 652 students of the batch 2024 were placed I reputed companies. Out of the total students placed, 110 were from the MBA batch 2024. A total of 66 recruiters participated during CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) placements in 2024 and offered handsome packages to the students. Some of the top recruiters include Paypal, Amazon, Sutherland, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, HSBC, SAP, Autorabit, etc.
Earlier, CMR Technical Campus (Autonomous Engineering College) placed 605 students of the batch 2023. Out of the total students placed, 164 were from the MBA batch 2023.

college_info.college_name: College of Engineering Bhubaneswar: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: College of Engineering Bhubaneswar was founded in 1999. It is a private institute and is located in Bhubaneswar, Orissa. College of Engineering Bhubaneswar courses are offered to students at the UG, PG and After 10th levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. College of Engineering Bhubaneswar offers a total of 23 courses in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, MCA and BCA and the total seat intake for the available courses is 1398. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Automobile Engineering, Civil Engineering, Communications Engineering, Computer Science Engineering and Electrical Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 1,37,000 to 3,58,800 and the average median salary is around INR 4,21,429. Apart from this, the College of Engineering Bhubaneswar campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

college_info_program.intro: College of Engineering Bhubaneswar admissions are both merit and entrance-based. The institute offers various UG & PG courses, namely BTech, MTech, BBA, MBA, BCA & MCA along with the Diploma courses under the affiliation of Biju Patnaik University of Technology (BPUT). reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Work hard to achieve success.

detailed_review.Placements: 85% percent of students are placed in our course. The highest package is 100000, the lowest package is 50000, and the average package is 75000. Our course offers various placement packages, including companies like TCS. Additionally, 45 percent of students received internships. The top role available in our course is Manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have various facilities provided like Wi-Fi, labs, cinema halls, auditorium hall, swimming pool, park, garden, etc. Infrastructure like smart classrooms, AC, LEDs, smart libraries, lifts, and many more things are available in our college. All qualities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers were helpful, highly qualified, and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality was very good. Yes, our course curriculum is relevant, and yes, it makes the students industry-ready. No difficulty in the semester exams in the college. The pass percentage is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: To improve my future prospects, I am focusing on a course in artificial intelligence and machine learning. I aim to enhance my learning skills. Events like Republic Day, Independence Day, Teacher’s Day, and Children’s Day. Additionally, there are fests like Teach Fest, and campus celebrations include Saraswati Puja and Ganesh Puja, which attract a lively crowd. The college provides bus services. The campus is surrounded by the local community. I believe there should be scholarships available for physically challenged students as well as students from Scheduled Tribes (ST). Extracurricular activities such as dancing, singing, modeling, fancy dress competitions, etc., are held.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Student review of College of Engineering, Bhubaneswar.

detailed_review.Placements:
Placement percentage is above 70% in PCM. The highest package is of 20 Lacs per annum and the lowest is of 5 Lacs per annum.
 Top recruiters include Google, Amazon, etc.
On campus placements are a bit hard to get due to huge number of students, so you can also try off campus just to be safe.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many lab like Electronic, Electrical, Mechanical, Physics and Chemistry etc. Food quality of the hostel is not good. I did not like the food in hostels, but the rooms are great. Cleaning facilities are very good but time limit for outing is very less.
detailed_review.Faculty: To be honest not all teachers are great and helpful; a few of them are very helpful. Every teacher is good in their own field. Curriculum is relevant. Semester exams are quite difficult.
detailed_review.Other:
Computer is my favourite subject sp that's why I chose this. I would say if you'll get more project and presentation to submit then it'll boost our confidence level
Yes we have technical events and very much fun .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Before 2018-2019, our college was like an Autonomous College.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 10% of students are placed in our course. The lowest is 1.2 Lacs per annum, and the maximum is 1.7 Lacs per annum. Shree Cement & SPD Construction are the companies. No student got an internship. Junior Engineer & Site Engineer are the most preferred jobs available. This is the problem for everyone who is from a Tier 3 college. I am facing the same issue. The campus package is not more than 3 Lacs per annum. I was feeling very bad asking pass-out seniors about jobs. Then someone gave me a wise suggestion: He told me to find a good company, not a big company. Let me explain, I am a machine learning enthusiast, and he told me to find a startup that is working on data science and machine learning. Don’t worry about salary. It may be very less, but in that organization, you will get the best work experience. Your learning curve will be vertical. Believe me, you will see a wide difference in yourself after 1 year because in a startup, you have to work professionally on your own for a long time (1-1.5 years). After that, you can start applying for big corporates. Now your confidence and professional skills will help you to crack any interview. Don’t waste time or spend a year to find a high-paying job. Or else, if you have good enough skills that fulfill the requirements of big corporates, then definitely you can apply now.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Average facilities and infrastructure are available for our course. Classrooms are good, but labs are not good enough, and machines are very old, with some also not working. The hostel is below average. They take 72,000 per year but provide average quality food, and the rooms are also below average. The canteen is also average and not preferable for all.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and faculty members are good and helpful. They are cooperative and make us understand everything. Semester exams are quite tough, but still, students manage to clear the exams. The passing percentage is around 70-80%. For most of us, college is the first time you’re living away from home, and it takes a lot of getting used to. I’m beginning to wonder if it’s all just a concocted ruse to become industry specialists in the fine art of doing one’s own laundry. But when you’re delivered at the hostel doorstep, starry-eyed and full of cinematic visions of giant groups of friends, crazy nights, and all kinds of hi-jinks you’d probably be telling your kids about someday, no one tells you that not everyone enjoys college. All my life, I’d always attended private schools in cities where people were more or less similar, and you quickly found your type and settled in. Being relatively cosmopolitan, cultural or religious differences didn’t really matter because you couldn’t see how the person in front was different from you.
detailed_review.Other: Civil engineering is not my first choice, but unfortunately, I chose this stream as I had no choice. Actually, I wanted to do Automobile Engineering, but it's not available in my city.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Disappointed with finance

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate is very low in our course and specially in our whole college, only 30-50%. Highest package was 4 LPA and lowest was 1.5 LPA. TCS, Wipro, HCL, Royal Enfield, OD Tech were the top recruiting companies. No one got internship from college. Mostly sales and few IT roles are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have got simple classroom with no projectors whereas there are projectors for MCA and b-tech. We have got access to library, computer labs and access to various clubs in our college. Food is average, no medical facility in college, multiple clubs are there.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are quite experienced working here since pas 10-15 years, while as some are freshly hired. Both are cooperative and good according to their accomplishments. Curriculum only builds base, not industry ready. Passing percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: M y reason for choosing is pocket friendly, easy commuting, average facilities. Finance department really needs improvements as they charge fines over pending fee. They say that there is EMI facility available but no, it's a total false statement. They'll ask you to pay whole year fee within 1 month. After semester exam if you don't you'll be fined with 2% on remaining amount each month. Scholarship is available for SC, ST, OBC, SEBC. There are multiple events such as tech fests, multiple workshops conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

detailed_review.Other: I am a CSE student. I chose this course because of my interest in exploring technology. Our college conducts many activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good placements.

Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Tata, HCL, and Wipro. Around 50% to 60% of students get internships. Our college provides a good future for average students also.

Hostel rooms are clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are knowledgeable and good with students. The course curriculum is good. Our college is linked with Biju Patnaik University. Semester exams are conducted strictly by the university.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it provides a good future. Our campus is not big. Extracurricular activities organised in our college are less.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure without maintenance.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is good. If you are CSE student and you are interested into coding you can easily grab 4 lpa+. Every year our college gives 90-95% placement. As per the package the highest package is 12.5 lpa and average package is 3.5 lpa. Our college get us good companies like, Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Tech Mahindra and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The infrastructure is neither good nor bad. Wi-fi facility is good. Classrooms and labs are student friendly. The canteen food is average.
Hostel is very good. Every floor has a separate wi-fi connections. Which is very good for us and good for our study we can access with Internet without any problem. Food is also good and hygienic for us. We play cricket in evening time so we can refresh our minds. Also play badminton in night hostel have these equipment's for sport purpose.

Teachers are also organizing seminar and advice the students to take part. In case of industry exposure and professional growth, a lot more advancement is needed. The course curriculum was useful.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely dissatisfied with this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our branch did not have placements and no company visited our campus to hire students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi was available on campus with a data limit of 1 GB. Labs did not fulfill the requirements. Library did not contain the latest books and limited books have to be taken to study. The canteen was not good. Sports were not played because there was no playground on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams conducted in our college were very difficult. Teachers were helpful and good. They were not much qualified. Some teachers were qualified but they would not teach you whatever they know. The course curriculum was not relevant and did not make students ready for the industry.
detailed_review.Other: Our college did not organise events and fests. It should provide better placements. The hostel fee was Rs.60,000 per year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied because of faculty members, good placements, good infrastructure, facilities, etc.

detailed_review.Placements: Basically, 90% of students were placed in our course. The highest monthly salary package is Rs. 200,000 per month, the lowest is Rs. 30,000 per month, and the average is Rs. 100,000 per month. The top recruiters are Amazon, Google, Infosys, and others. About 98% of students got internships in Infosys, Capgemini, and other IT sectors. The college provides more than 50 companies to give campus selection.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides 24*7 Wi-Fi. Labs are always clean and clear. Classrooms are better for studying. The library has a study environment. The quality of facilities in our hostel is very good. The quality of food is great. Food is available in the canteen. Medical facilities are always available. In front of our hostel, fields are available for playing cricket, volleyball, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and have higher qualifications. They are knowledgeable. College is fulfilled with a study environment. During semester exams, the college is very strict and the pass percentage is 30%. The teaching quality of our teachers is excellent.
detailed_review.Other: At this time, the computer is everything, so I chose this course. In the future, this course will help us with our daily lives and improve our knowledge. Every year, the college conducts events. The connectivity, fests, campus crowd, campus surroundings, scholarship, extracurricular activities, etc., are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with its teachers, infrastructure, and good placements are there for 2021 and 2022.

detailed_review.Placements: The top recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro, and Infosys which visit our campus for placements. Our college gives PPT classes to students. So they give their best in placements. Around 40 students are selected for placements. Our college gives an internship facility also.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, the course infrastructure is very good but the hostel facility is not good. Our college gives students practical knowledge. The classrooms are clean. But in the hostel, the management is not good. In the hostel, canteen food is also not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good. Teachers clear students' doubt very easily if they have doubts. In our college, semester exams are very strict, and no one can cheat in exams.
detailed_review.Other: This course has a very good scope for the future.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is one of the best engineering colleges. I recommend students to study here.

detailed_review.Placements: From the 7th semester, the students are eligible for placements. Earlier various companies came for hiring like Ajatoa, Infosys, TCS, Paytm, and Byju's but the percentage of placed students has decreased. Earlier 80% of students get placed but now the percentage decreased to 20% of students. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA, and the average salary package offered is 4 LPA. Nowadays most students have to opt for off-campus. The training and placements cell provides training from the 6th semester onwards to prepare students for campus recruitment. If getting the B Tech degree I would like to explore more and prepare for M Tech through GATE or If students will get placed in good company during my graduation then I will join and prepare myself for higher studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a library where students issue our coursebook, and there are over 2500 books. The college has 30 classrooms including an e-classroom. The college has 2 conference halls. The classroom has tables and benches and every classroom has a CCTV installed. It has a basketball court and a badminton court, and also has a cricket ground in which the pitch is made up of cement. Every year the college make an annual function but from previous 6 years, and the college is not arranging it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members and student ratio in our college are 1:20. Each lecture is assigned approximately 20 students for their assessment and known as a proctor for them. Some faculty members are helpful and ready to help the students in all fields whenever needed. The faculty members are regular with their assigned classes and follow their duty sincerely. Many of the faculty members have an average experience of 5-6 years of teaching, and some of them also have industrial work experience especially from the computer science branch. The lectures teach ineffective and understandable processes and make good interaction with the students. Every year, students have 2 semesters, even that occurs in the month of April and odd that occurs in the month of December. The difficulty level of the exam is intermediate and students can pass easily.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course, because I belong from a computer science background as during my 11th and 12th board. I have chosen computer science as my stream and I felt very strong in this subject. Every year in February, it organised a tech fest. It conducts multiple inter-college and inter-college competitions like code guru, chess master, singing, GK, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I think our college is the best for placements. I am satisfied with it.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year almost 95% of the students get placed in our college placements. Students are recruited by top MNCs like Microsoft, Amazon, Goldman Sachs, Facebook, JP Morgan, etc. I am really grateful to the placement cell for providing me with this opportunity and supporting me during the placement interview. I was able to attend an interview for a much good marketing-based company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and the hostels are great. In the hostels, you will surely have lots of fun with friends. The food system is the best in the college. All labs are fully functional, and it has a great lecture hall. Every classroom has new digital boards, an air-conditioner, and a projector. Medical facilities are good. There are 2 ambulances for an emergency. The canteen is clean. The canteen serves the best quality food at a reasonable price.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are supporting seniors and faculty members throughout my academics. If we have any problem at any time, then teachers are ready to solve it. The semester hall is clean, and exams are conducted strictly like a central exam. The pass percentage is 30%. The course curriculum is relevant. Teachers who taught us are great. With knowledge of the subject, they also had a great skill to teach. If we find any teachers weak, then we can change them. It hired about 50% of new faculty members, and most of them are bad. The new batch is disappointed with the teachers. They prepare the students pretty well for the external exams.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I love to know about computers and devices. In this course, I love hacking. Campus life is fun as well as knowledgeable. We are provided with different opportunities each day. Fest organised is the best festival in college, and celebrities also visit our college. For ST and SC students, scholarship is the best. Our college participates in every event and inter-collegiate competition. We have a yoga department where we have a practical yoga hall and Shatkarma labs which is very useful. The college also conducts tournaments.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with the placements and infrastructure of the campus. The teaching is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good enough here, and maximum students get placed. Students are satisfied with their jobs and every aspect. Still, we need more job opportunities and a better number of companies. More than 70%-80% of students get placed in on-campus placement drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: New hostels are well maintained and good at maintaining hygiene. The hostel rooms are quite comfortable compared to other engineering colleges. They give you the choice of choosing rooms, and if you want a room with an attached bathroom, the cost is more. Our hostel has a well-maintained gym.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exams and course are well here, and the teachers are very friendly as well as helpful. The teaching quality is really competitive, and teachers are well qualified. In semester exams, maximum questions are asked from what we have taught in the classroom and some portion from outside.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: In this college, you will love to join, study and have a wonderful experience.

detailed_review.Placements: About 85% of the students were placed from our college. I think the highest salary package offered was 12 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered was 3 LPA in our course. Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, TCS and IBM are some of the companies which visit here for placements. About 95% of the students got internships in companies like TCS and Blue Prism. Coder, engineer and manager roles are offered here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our campus is completely Wi-Fi enabled. Labs are well operated with one computer to one student. There are centrally air-conditioned labs. Classrooms are old fashioned, but have huge space and are well ventilated. The library is accessible every day. The hostel is very good actually, and it is also completely Wi-Fi enabled. The food served here is nice.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers here are highly qualified and very helpful. They are knowledgeable, and there is a great learning environment in our college. The teaching quality is excellent. The course curriculum is as per the university BPUT, but they somehow teach us the practical aspect of everything. Semester exams are easy for students who study. Otherwise, they are difficult, and the pass percentage is 98%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have always been fascinated by computers. So, I think this is the best way to know about it. A lot can be improved in our course like our college should focus more on practical approach. We should study the latest technology rather than the old one which has been outdated. Every year our college organises a tech-fest named Techzuberent. Our college is well connected through the railway station, main road and airport.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent placements offered.

detailed_review.Placements: About 50% of students usually get placed in every batch among the top companies like TCS, IBM, Tech Mahindra, Accenture, etc. About 20% students are currently working as interns and this number may increase in upcoming days. They got roles like Product manager, Plant maintenance, Data Science engineering, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, laboratory, Library, Gym, Sports area like facilities are available in our campus. Talking about the food quality, ne must say it is below average. The canteen facility is good. The medical and sports facilities are decent. This is not a sports centric institute. If you are looking for a sports centric institute, then this is not for you.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are well qualified and helpful. The course curriculum needs improvement in order to make students industry ready. The semester exams are neither difficult nor easy. Have to score 30% to get passed. The examination pattern is according to BPUT (BIJU PATTNAIK UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY).
detailed_review.Other: I was in a hurry for getting a seat, so I chose this course. The campus life could have been better. The scholarship facility is very good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Because of the change of management in the college and placements, the scenario got changed.

detailed_review.Placements: A total of 4% of the students get placed every year after 2012. In the last year, the highest placements were offered as almost 46% of the students got placed. Nowadays, fake placements are going on, and internships depend on our own if interested. Our college provides an industrial visit and many others. Management and hierarchy of the department of our college are not good, which impacted the placements of our college. Due to which, students got fewer placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and infrastructure of our college are excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are average. Due to the present management strategy and hierarchy structure of each department, and most importantly, they have the departments of mechanical and civil are the most popular and demanding departments.
detailed_review.Other: In the case of extracurricular activities, it is a happening college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Laboratory needs immediate attention.

detailed_review.Placements: About seventy percent of students were placed from my course. The packages which we get are INR 7 Lacs (the highest), INR  3 Lacs (average), INR 1.5 Lacs (the lowest). The top companies who are visiting our college are Jaro, Byjus, Ajatus, Net Tantra, FCCI, Venova, Smartlink. We also get internships, but not that much. According to me 50% of students had got internships. Mainly we get software developer post.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have Wi-Fi in our campus but they are not working properly in some areas. Our campus is full of greenery. Our campus is free from ragging. The library is in seperate building and the classrooms are good with CCTV in it. The laboratory needs to be maintained as it lacks new equipment. We have grounds for football, basketball, volleyball, cricket. The canteen is there which is of good quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good and are well qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching quality of our college is good. Teachers are friendly in nature and are always ready to help us in any field. We have a very safe and healthy classroom environment. Yes, this course is curriculum relevant and it makes students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: My brother suggested me to take this course because in coming days there would be a huge demand for electronics and telecommunication students. Labs should be maintained. We have a seminar, inter and intra sports tournament, tech fest and many more.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of College of Engineering Bhubaneswar.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80% of students get placed in our course. The highest salary package offered was 7 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered was 1.5 LPA. The average salary package offered was 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies of our college are Ajatus, Jaro, Byju's, FCCI, Venova and Qspiders. Roles offered were as a software engineer, junior engineer and analyst. Around 60% of the students got internships in the current year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in our college are good. We have bus facilities also. Wi-Fi is provided to students. Classrooms are fine with CCTV cameras installed.  The library doesn't have a few required books in it. Labs need to be filled with new instruments. Hostel facilities need to be improved. We have grounds for football, basketball and cricket. The gym is also available for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are helpful. We have a very safe and healthy classroom environment. They also guide us in extra activities. Teachers are well qualified and are knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because my father suggested to me. The best thing about our course is that students get exposure to two subjects, one is electronics, and the other in computer science. The Laboratory on the campus should be improved. We have blood donation camps, planting tree events, farewell and freshers, inter and intra-sports tournament.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with faculty members and their support.

detailed_review.Placements: About 50% of the students got placed from our college. The rest 50% of the students didn't get any opportunity. The campus provides software-based jobs but not core-based jobs. The highest salary package of 12 LPA was offered by Jaro Education campus drive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Different types of facilities are available on this campus like extracurricular activities, sports and infrastructure, which are quite good. The work is also in progress for new infrastructure. It is a Wi-Fi enabled campus, and labs are average. Classrooms are also average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are quite helpful to every student and also good qualified in every section or every department of the branch. Every lecturer also has a well-knowledgeable capability. This course curriculum is relevant to every student, and it makes them industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: My batch contains the year of 2017 to 2020 lateral entry students of electrical engineering. I have interested in electricity, so I have chosen this branch.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I suggest that it is better to choose other colleges for better future and job.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in this college are the worst, and the study is also very poor. You have to opt for off-campus placements to find the job. So, don't keep hope to get placed from this college. The lowest salary package offered was 1.2 LPA, and the highest salary package offered was 10 LPA. I suggest you that it is better to prepare for TCS, Wipro, Infosys and IBM and don't take admission in this college if possible.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has a very old and non-maintained infrastructure with very less facilities. Exams are not conducted in our college because labs condition is horrible. All the computers are outdated and broken. Sports and games are not good, and the grounds are filled with bushes. They are renting their buildings to other institutes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members here are not that much efficient, and very few faculty members are above average. They conduct internal exams just for formality. They will collect fees for the training, but they don't provide, so students have to suffer afterwards. Teachers never tell you about the placement process as they focus only on completing their syllabus. But also they never complete it.

faqs.question: How to apply for admission to College of Engineering Bhubaneswar?
faqs.answer: The candidates can apply online through the College of Engineering Bhubaneswar website. The final selection of the candidates will be based on their academic performance and entrance exam score. Given below are the steps on how to apply to College of Engineering Bhubaneswar: Step 1: Go to the College of Engineering Bhubaneswar website and click on the "Admissions" tab. Step 2: Click on the "Apply Online" button. Step 3: Fill out the application form and submit it along with the required documents. Step 4: Pay the application fee and submit the form.

faqs.question: How to apply for admission to College of Engineering Bhubaneswar?
faqs.answer: The candidates can apply online through the College of Engineering Bhubaneswar website. The final selection of the candidates will be based on their academic performance and entrance exam score. Given below are the steps on how to apply to College of Engineering Bhubaneswar: Step 1: Go to the College of Engineering Bhubaneswar website and click on the "Admissions" tab. Step 2: Click on the "Apply Online" button. Step 3: Fill out the application form and submit it along with the required documents. Step 4: Pay the application fee and submit the form. faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in College of Engineering Bhubaneswar (COEB Bhubaneswar) for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer:
College of Engineering Bhubaneswar (COEB Bhubaneswar) has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility MCA Candidate must have completed BCA/ Bachelor Degree in Computer Science Engineering or equivalent Degree.
OR
Candidate must have passed B.Sc./ B.Com./ B.A. with Mathematics at 10+2 Level or at Graduation Level (with additional bridge Courses as per the norms of the concerned University).
Candidate must have secured above mentioned marks (45% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category). B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed Diploma in relevant stream from a recognised Institute. MBA/PGDM Candidate must have completed Bachelor degree of minimum 3 years duration with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute.
45% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category. M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have completed Bachelor degree or equivalent in the relevant field of engineering and technology with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute.
45% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

highlights.summary:
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering is also known as DSCE and was established in 1979. It is located in Bangalore and is a private college. The college was established under the umbrella of Mahatma Gandhi Vidya Peetha Trust and is approved by the All Indian Council for Technical Education (AICTE). DSCE Bangalore is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) and has around 18 research centers.
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering courses are offered to students at the UG, PG, and PhD levels. It is one of the leading colleges to offer Technical education. Some of the popular programmes offered at DSCE Bangalore Karnataka are BTech, MTech, MBA, and MCA. These courses are offered to students in full-time mode. The college has also been accredited by the NBA and NAAC with an A grade.
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering admissions are conducted on the basis of entrance-exam scores. Some of the popular entrance exams accepted by the college are JEE Main/ COMEDK/CAT/ KMAT/ PGCET/ MAT, etc. In addition, the college campus is spread across 7 acres of land and provides facilities such as state-of- the-art laboratories, Wi-Fi, classrooms, etc. The college also has a group of experienced faculty members to provide quality education to students in several streams, namely Engineering, Computer Application, Management, etc. The major highlights of Dayananda Sagar Engineering College are tabulated below:
Check out more on Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering in the below videos:

college_info_program.intro:
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering (DSCE Bangalore) popular programmes are BTech and MBA. BTech students are taught Data Structures and Applications, Operating Systems, Social Connect and Responsibility, and various other subjects. BTech students can join the Ace Society. Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering (DSCE) students and faculties regularly involve themselves in several research activities related to various domains.
Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering MBA students can become Managers or take up various leadership roles. DSCE Bangalore BTech students can also join non-technical fields such as Marketing, Sales, or others. Overall, Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering is one of the best colleges offering quality education to students. Candidates can check the popular programmes offered at Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering in the table provided below:
For more information about Dayananda Sagar College Of Engineering check out the below video:
