IIIT Naya Raipur Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is value for money with a good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 60-70 percent of the students studying in our branch got placed. The highest package offered in my branch in the previous year was 82 LPA. The average package offered ranges from 13 to 14 LPA. The average package offered is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our institution is pretty good because it was constructed in recent years. The institute was established in 2015. There is a separate hostel for 1st year students, and there are well-equipped laboratories. There is 24x7 Wi-Fi in hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching is good, but it needs to be improved, as per my suggestion. There are well-qualified and experienced professors. Their teaching style needs to improve. Our college follows a better curriculum than others, as I thought. Semester exams are moderate.
detailed_review.Other: A few fests are conducted in our college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Studies are manageable if you don't procrastinate.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80 percent of students got placed with an average package of 17 LPA, and top recruiting companies are Swiggy, Make My Trip, American Express, Cred, etc. Top roles offered are software developer and data scientist. Students get an internship from the first year itself, depending on their talent and coding or video editing skills, but there is no particular official data about it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are very neat and clean, having facilities like hot water for bathing and both normal and cool water for drinking, and with 2 badminton courts for playing and 1 common room which has a TV and table tennis for playing, and classrooms are good, having facilities like smart board, AC, etc. The food is decent. Don't expect food like your home, but it's edible. The quality is good, but you get bored eating similar items.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good enough, and if any concept is not clear, we refer to YouTube lectures like all other colleges. Apart from teaching, the curriculum is excellent but hectic, similar to IIIT, Hyderabad, and has minor courses like cybersecurity and quantum computing, which were included this year. But self-studying and self-discipline are very important here. There will be no spoonfeeding.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as the curriculum is good and market-relevant.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good faculty and labs, but remote location and tough IT placements for ECE students.

detailed_review.Placements: In our branch, there are 70% of students get placed with amazing packages. The recent highest package is 50 LPA, an average of 20 LPA and a minimum of 10 LPA from the ECE branch. Many of the students took the ECE branch here to get core jobs, like in VLSI designing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college provides very good facilities like a 24/7 wi-fi network, labs with good equipment, and air conditioning. Classes with digital screens. In the hostel, each room contains two beds and separate desks for each student, and we have a library. The food is so nice compared to other institutes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty are well knowledgeable. They give there 100% efforts in explaining topics they can understand us and teach according to that. They also encourage the innovative skills in students, they give us time to learn so many things, not only in the books but also practically, repeated tests make students perfect.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in VLSI chip designing. I think there will be more scope in building AI, chips are used in it, so I took this course. Sirs are just giving tasks to do, not telling how to do them.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college curriculum is excellent.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% students got placed with an average CTC of 17 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Swiggy, Make My Trip, American Express, Cred, etc. Top roles offered are software engineering and data science, and with the highest package of 1.2 crores in the last year, and this year, 2 to 4 students are placed in Google and Microsoft.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are very neat and clean, having facilities like hot water for bathing and both normal and cool water for drinking and with 2 badminton courts for playing. 1 common room which has a TV and table tennis for playing. Classrooms are good, having facilities like a smart board, AC, etc. Food is also good, like providing chicken biryani on Sunday and chicken curry on Wednesday.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good enough, and if any concept is not clear, we refer to YouTube lectures like all other colleges. Apart from teaching, the curriculum is excellent but hectic, similar to IIIT Hyderabad and has minor courses like cyber security and quantum computing, which were included this year.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it by seeing the curriculum and placements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with placements and internships.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in my college is approximately 60%. The highest package is 1.2 crores, the top recruiting companies are American Express and Swiggy. Nearly 40% students are doing internships in my college in different companies. Research and internships are offered through my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are good. The food is okay, but sometimes it is bad. Even though we have a large population, the Wi-Fi connection is good. The quality of facilities in my hostel and canteen is good. The sports culture is good at my college. They conduct several events in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. They teach very well. They are very helpful. They can clear all doubts in class and outside class also. They help in finding research on several projects. They also help in finding internships. Semester exams are not very difficult, they are moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I chose ECE because I am passionate about this course. Through the JEE Main, I got a seat in IIIT College.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: Honest review of IIIT Naya Raipur.

detailed_review.Placements: This year, only 20–30 students get placed, including both on-campus and off-campus placements. No companies visit the campus, and most recruitment happens off-campus. Atlassian and American Express are the main high-package recruiters for this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The amenities provided by the university are up to the mark. Hostel food is average, but the internet is very good. The rest of the academic infrastructure is built according to students’ needs. Sports facilities provided by the university are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum and exam structure are very good, with microcourse structures offering many courses per semester covering important aspects required in today’s tech field. Faculty members are not fully up to the mark, but are very supportive.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good college, with really low fees and a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: I feel the placements in our college are good enough, and the opportunities are there. In my course, ECE, the highest package this year is 58 LPA, while the median stands at 13 LpA and the average at 15.81. I'm a fresher, so partly I'm not that aware of internships or companies that come to our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The academic building has central AC. Wi-Fi connectivity is average, but the Ethernet facility at the hostel is pretty impressive. The hostels, food, and facilities on the campus are generally good, especially the environment and the sports complex.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors here are qualified and knowledgeable, for sure. The course curriculum is updated and is on a proper pace with industry requirements, in my opinion. The semester exams sure aren't easy, but not too tough either. With proper hard work, it's very achievable. The pass percentage is really good, almost everyone passes it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good placements and a growing campus environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80–90% of CSE students get placed every year. Students who stay active in coding clubs usually get offers easily. The highest package is around 1.5 crores per annum, the lowest is around 4–5 LPA, and the average is 10–16 LPA. Top recruiting companies for placement are Amazon, Google, TCS, Deloitte, Swiggy, Microsoft, PayPal, Deltax, DE Shaw, Media.Net, and Carl Zeiss. Nearly 70–75% of students get internships, mostly remote or hybrid roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are updated. Wi-Fi works very well. Classrooms are simple but clean. The library is small but useful for study material. Hostel rooms are decent and basic. Mess food is mixed. Some days it is good, and some days it is average. Sports facilities are available, including a multisport complex, football ground, volleyball, cricket, kabaddi, badminton, basketball, table tennis, and NSS programs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is helpful and approachable. Some teachers are really good, while a few are average. The C programming faculty is less approachable. The curriculum is updated and supports a coding culture well. It helps students stay aligned with industry needs and basic learning requirements. Exams are moderate. If you study regularly, passing is not a problem. The pass percentage is medium to high.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE here mainly because of the good placements and peer group. I hope the campus development and extracurricular activities improve over time. The crowd is mostly focused on coding and academics. Campus events are average. I joined one campus event and fest in the first semester. The campus is still developing, so the overall vibe is calm.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is not a bad college and offers good value for money.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement opportunities are decent in our college. Approximately 60–70% of students get placed. The highest package offered in the previous year was 82 LPA on campus. One student got placed with 1.5 crore in an off-campus placement. The average package is 12–15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good, as it was constructed just 10 years ago. There is a separate hostel for first-year students. The food is okay, not bad. The food in the canteen is slightly better than the mess. The hostel rooms are double sharing for first- and second-year students.
detailed_review.Faculty: There is a good and experienced faculty available in the institute. They have good knowledge. The curriculum is newly introduced. The college will introduce the NEP 2020 curriculum from this year onwards. As I am in the first year, I have not attempted semester exams, but seniors say the semester exams are easy to moderate.
detailed_review.Other: The college atmosphere is good. It is a ragging-free campus. It would be better to improve the way of teaching. There is one big event named Technovate held in March every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 97% of students get placed. The highest package is 36 LPA. Top recruiting companies are American Express and Google. Roles offered are data scientists and software engineers. 80 percent of students got internship opportunities. So the placement record is very good in my college. If one is looking for placements, then it is the best college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available everywhere on the campus, but the mobile signal is very poor inside the campus. Every room has the ethernet facility. There is a library and top-facilitated labs. The food menu in the mess is very good, but the taste of the food is average. Compared to other colleges, our mess food is much better.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers take very good care of their students. They are very helpful. The course curriculum is relevant, and the course makes us ready for jobs. Exams are very easy. If one can focus on studies, then they can easily get more than 9.5 CGPA. Here, the grading system is relatively simple.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is a booming course. Everything is very good here. It conducts very good fests, events, and other activities like NSS, yoga, etc. The relationship between junior and senior is also very good. It is a ragging-free college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good curriculum, few fests, good infrastructure and lab facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: A good percentage of students are getting placed, but the data shown on any of the websites is not based on campus placements. They are showing the combined data of both on-campus and off-campus placements. Due to the good coding culture, a good number of students are getting internships as well.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As this is a newly constructed campus, the infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi facility is available, and the campus is clean and green. All the classrooms are neat, and the lab equipment is also new and in proper condition. A library is also available. The food is not bad here, but if you are South Indian, you have to adjust to the spices.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum is really good and updated, which makes you prepared for the new trends in the market, and it is mostly skill-based. Just reading for the exams won't be enough to maintain a good CGPA. Projects will be involved, and they have a significant role in marks. Faculty is okay, but sometimes you should take help from YouTube or other sources.
detailed_review.Other: Do not expect fests like other colleges, but yes, clubs are there, and sports facilities are also good here. The campus is not so crowded, as there are only three branches, and each branch has around 80-90 people.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: The college is recommended if students need less strength and quality of education.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90 percent of students got placed in top companies. Not only on campus, but students are able to crack off-campus placements too. The highest package offered as of now is above 1 crore per annum. I am not sure about the lowest package, but the average package is 18 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are IBM, CRED, BookMyShow, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good, and classrooms have Wi-Fi. Hostels are also really good. The library is open during morning hours, and we can find it open till 10:30 PM or 11 PM sometimes. Labs are also well-equipped. It is provided with internet everywhere. We can explore sports, but college does not focus on sports much.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has well-educated and trained faculty members. We can find everyone who graduated or passed out from the National Institute of Technology, i.e., NIT, or graduated from IITs. Faculty members do teach really well. They have so much experience, and they do not pressure students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, value for money

detailed_review.Placements: In the previous year, our college got 82 LPA on campus placement and 1.5 crore off-campus placement. In our batch ECE for 2025–29, there are 102 students currently studying. The institute offers courses in B.Tech, M.Tech, and Ph.D. They guide us by giving projects to make websites and apps based on our interests with teamwork.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms are equipped with centralized air-conditioning, internet, and digital boards. The institution is fully equipped with moderate labs, computer systems, and a library with a good collection of books. Constructed in 2015, it has new buildings with basic facilities. There is a non-AC hostel with double-sharing rooms. There are separate hostels for 1st-year boys and girls. From 3rd year, single-sharing rooms are allotted. There is a football ground also used for cricket, a palm park, gym, sports complex, canteen, and a store called B-Smart. There is a temporary incubation centre while the permanent one is under construction.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty have good knowledge of their subjects and good teaching experience. Our college follows the NEP-2020 curriculum from this academic year. As I am in the first year, we don’t have mid-semester exams yet, but they conduct quizzes and give assignments. The quizzes conducted are moderate. I hope this new curriculum will make students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: As I am interested in studying core subjects to gain knowledge in VLSI and get placed in that field, I chose this college. Based on my JEE rank, this college offers a good curriculum with affordable fees. As I am in the 1st semester, I didn’t have prior knowledge. There are various clubs in our college, and the fest named Technovate usually happens between February–March. Our college also hosts a National Symposium on Semiconductor Devices with the participation of the honourable Chief Minister of Chhattisgarh.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The infrastructure and the maintenance are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: I am pursuing B.Tech first in ECE. The highest package offered so far is 1.4 crore, which is secured through an off-campus opportunity.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Personally, I like the hostel because they provide double-sharing rooms, which I like, and the hostel maintenance is good. They provide a 500 Mbps high-speed Ethernet connection. We have a medical dispensary. They do not charge any fees for medicine or doctor appointments. There is a big indoor sports complex with one basketball court and two badminton courts. We also have two badminton courts in each hostel and a common room with a TV and a table tennis room.
detailed_review.Faculty: I am a first-year student, so I don't know much, but during these three months, what I have observed is that teachers are highly trained and qualified. They make us industry-ready. The class tests are not that hard. Another thing I like is that they provide courses like Entrepreneurship and Health and Wealth.
detailed_review.Other: For me, I think in the future there will be a huge industrial revolution in semiconductors and quantum computing, so that is why I chose this course. I would like to mention that there is a college fest called Technovate. Overall, the experience here is very positive. The campus is located in a pleasant area with cool weather, convenient transportation, and several nearby malls.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: IIIT Naya Raipur is good at academics.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of placements this year is 78%. The highest package is 1 crore, and the lowest is 10 LPA. The top recruiting companies are American Express, PayPal, Amazon, Flipkart, and Deloitte. Most students will get internships from top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: On campus, students have all the facilities, including hostels, sports, academics, labs, classrooms, and a library, as well as conference rooms. There are daily needs stores and a canteen with a variety of food, along with a medical center.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty on campus are graduates who have completed their PhDs from IITs. They are well-educated and have written many research papers and projects that are helpful for today's technology. The faculty support students in every aspect and provide guidance on projects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college. If you work hard, You will succeed.

detailed_review.Placements: As this is a recession year, many did not get placements, but there is no official news from the college. American Express is the top recruiter. Internship is a personal thing, and I cannot share accurate information as it is not officially released by the college. Software development is the top role offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure for fees. Good Wi-Fi facilities, labs, and library. Quality food in the mess and canteen. But a dispensary is not available 24/7. Mess food may not be suitable for South students as the dishes are highly different, but good quality is maintained all over.
detailed_review.Faculty: Highly professional lecturers. A perfect curriculum is updated every year, and only relevant and useful subjects are taught. Semester exams in my college are very easy if you study hard. But it's difficult to get A+. However, it is possible. Low scorers can easily get good grades or pass marks if they start the preparation for exams even a week before.
detailed_review.Other: CSE is ever-green and demanding course at present.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: Excellent infrastructure and facilities. It's a great college for you overall development.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement report for the year 2022-23 is yet to be announced. Though some of our seniors got really awesome packages. Top recruiting companies are American express, Amazon, Teradata, Intel, Dell, Intuit, Adobe, Steredian, Tekion, Pharma Easy etc. Most of the students got SDE roles. Many 2nd and 3rd year students got internships as problem setter, software developer etc. For the last year, the highest package was 60 LPA, the lowest was 7 LPA and the average was around 18 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All hostels are well-equipped with high-speed LAN connections. The academic block has a high-speed Wi-Fi. The classrooms are air-conditioned with projector. Labs are well-equipped with necessary conponents. Library has a good collection of books related to the course and preparation for competitive exams. The mess food is hygienic and tastes good. The mess provides breakfast, lunch, snacks in the evening, dinner which is more than enough. The college has it's own dispensary which provides medicines for free. The campus has football ground, volleyball court, TT, badminton courts.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are well qualified and knowledgeable, though some are unable to deliver their knowledge properly. But they will definitely solve your doubts if you are really enthusiastic for the subject. The course curriculum is industry oriented, though you need to learn skills on your own. The semester exams are easy to pass but you need to work really hard to get a CGPA above 9.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because the AI era has already started. The best thing about this course is that it gives you the opportunity to learn about machine learning concepts and core CS concepts as well. The first 4 semesters are densely filled with courses, and the no. Of courses decreases in further semesters. It would be better to remove some unworthy courses like human values, environmental engineering, as it only tests how good you mug up. The college conducts decent technical as well as cultural events and fests. The campus crowd is well-balanced for healthy competition. And it's easy to get recognition if you work hard. The campus is located on the outskirts of city, though you can buy general items from the campus shops or the market located nearby.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Dr. Shyama Prasad Mukherjee International Institute of Information Technology Naya Raipur.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has excellent placements. Some students go for higher studies. The highest salary package offered is 57 LPA and the average salary package offered is 10 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Carl Zeiss, Apra Labs, TCS, R&D, Tata Power, Netweb Technologies, Deltex, Deloitte, Reliance Jio, etc., visit our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has excellent infrastructure. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus and hostel. We have various labs like VLSI, IoT, networks, etc. A library is available. The hostel rooms, gym, mess, and canteen are good. The college is spread across 40 acres. Medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well qualified. Most of them are Ph.D. holders. They are available to clear doubts and explain concepts. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it provided more job opportunities. Students can work in the core or IT industries. We have job opportunities in government organisations too. Our college has a railway station and an airport nearby.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good institute in India with good placements, infrastructure, and teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has excellent placements. In 2022, almost all students were placed. Some students go for higher studies. The highest salary package offered is 40 LPA and the lowest salary package offered is 6 LPA to 7 LPA. The average salary package offered is 9 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, R&D, Carl Zeiss, Apra Labs, L&T, Tata Power, Netweb Technologies, DelteX, Deloitte, Reliance Jio, etc., visit our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available in our classrooms and ethernet is available in our hostels. We have several labs, including a VLSI lab, an IoT lab, a network lab, a computer lab, and a 3D printing lab. We have a library that is open from 10 AM to 8:30 PM as well as an e-library. The hostel rooms are good. We have a gym. The quality of food served in the mess is good. The canteen is good. There are B-Mart, dispensaries, and college ambulances. We have badminton courts, TT courts, football courts, volleyball courts, etc. Our campus is around 40 acres.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers have pursued their Ph.D. from premier institutions. They are helping you with your doubts and clarifying concepts. Our director is from the University of Tokyo. The main reason for choosing this institute is its advanced curriculum. The course is designed in such a way that it helps you to have more practical knowledge, which makes students ready for industry. You can get a good CGPA, but you need to attend classes regularly.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to have more job opportunities. I can go for ECE core or IT jobs, and I can even go for government jobs. Our college organises Technovate, the annual Techno Cultural Fest, many cultural events, and student clubs in technical and cultural fields. This institute is connected to a railway station and an airport.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our institute is newly stabilized but it earned a decent position between all IIT, NIT, and IIT.

detailed_review.Placements: The most important and best thing about the institute is its placement. Our institute has a record of 100% placement. The average package is 7-8 LPA. Our super senior batch got the highest package of 43 LPA. Many students got selected for the GATE examination every year. Many students are selected by Amazon, Infosys, Goldman Sachs, Flipkart, and many reputed companies. Many students got an internship as well as pre-placement offers- PPO in foreign companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have 24 hours internet connection in our hostel. All classrooms, labs, and libraries are air-conditioned. I will rate mess food as 3 because sometimes they provide tasty food and sometimes they provide not eatable food. Canteen food is tasty and cost-effective. On-campus, we have a football ground, cricket ground, basketball court, volleyball court, and auditorium. In the hostel, there are badminton court and a common room for table tennis. Every year a sports fest Aarambh is organised.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of our institute are too helpful and knowledgeable. The curriculum is relevant for the preparation for higher studies as well as placements. Every semester we will do a project as well as a course project. Every year there is an academic event organised to prepare us for industrial things. Many entrepreneur events are organised by the entrepreneur cell of the institution.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I have a huge interest in computer science and technology. The specialty of our institute is its awesome curriculum and facilities. The reason behind choosing the institute is the facilities provided by the institute hostel facility, and 24 availability of internet connections, sports grounds, etc.

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

college_info.college_name: E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Founded in 1995, E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College is a private institute. It is located in Nagapattinam, Tamil Nadu. The institute is accredited with AICTE. E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College provides UG and PG courses in Full Time mode. It provides 18 courses across specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Biomedical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Communications Engineering and Computer Science Engineering. Some of the courses offered at this institute include B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College fees ranges between INR 35,000 to 2,00,000. The student intake for these courses is 1170. E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College offers these course across fields such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. The median salary offered to students is INR 3,01,000. E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College offers all the campus facilities to students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Okay, good, but some staff are in favor of someone.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 50% of students get placed in my batch. They have offered jobs to every person, but the jobs are not related to the course. The highest package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 1.5 LPA. This is very low for my course. They do not concentrate on internships for my batch.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is okay, but I do not recommend the hostel. There is no Wi-Fi available for students. Mobile phones are not allowed on campus. The sports facilities are good. The canteen food is good, but the canteen space is very small for the entire engineering campus. It is not good at all.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty members are friendly, and others seem to favor certain people. Some friendly faculty members are like brothers and sisters. They help us a lot. The course curriculum is relevant. It is difficult, but with learning, we can clear the subjects.
detailed_review.Other: Many events, such as DJ nights are conducted in the college. We can enjoy the vibe on festival days.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College is one of the best engineering colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College's placement is good. This college has a strong placement training cell. They brought more than 15 companies for campus interviews. Reliance Construction, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, etc. These companies visit this college for recruitment. 90% of students are placed in reputed companies. The highest salary package is 8 LPA. The lowest salary package is 2.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College has more laboratories and classroom facilities. This college has well-equipped library facilities. This college provides hostel facilities for boys and girls. The hostel food tastes good. Multiple sports ground facilities are also available here at this college. This college provides Wi-Fi network facilities across the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College staff are very friendly and helpful people. They are experienced and qualified professionals. They teach students using both online and offline resources. They arrange numerous industry visit programs every semester. 90% of students pass all exams.
detailed_review.Other: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College has more than 15 courses. This college management conducts more festivals and sports events in every semester. This college placement was very good. This college management gives more scholarships to all students. This college transportation facility is also very good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College For B.E. / B.Teach CSE admission in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: This college provides the best salary package for every student. The salary package offered by the companies ranges from 4-8 LPA. This course is very good to get the salary package. Students should score above 70% in academics to participate in this course placement. Companies like TCS, Wipro, etc., provide internships in the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides very high-quality products and multiple facilities like classrooms, labs, library, fast Wi-Fi, bathroom, canteen, etc. The hostel facility is available. Canteen facilities are available, and it provides the best quality of food.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, teachers are very helpful and highly qualified. The course curriculum is relevant and good. Their teaching quality is very good. This course is for 4 to 6 years, and the duration is based on the exams conducted by the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: EGS Pillay Engineering College Review

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students get placement offers. Placements are based on the branch; circuit branches offer awesome placement opportunities, while core branches have decent placements. The highest package was 53 LPA. Top recruiters are Oracle Academy, IBM, AutoCAD, TCS, Bosch, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has Wi-Fi facilities 24/7 in the hostel and college campus area. The library is also available on the campus. Separate hostels for boys and girls with all basic and essential facilities. Sports and games are also available on the campus. First aid is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good, helpful, and supportive in nature. They are well-qualified and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is very relevant to the job industry. Our college prepares students for the industry. Semester examinations are moderate to tough. Nearly 90 to 95% of students pass.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Better facilities are provided by our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good; more than 65 percent of students were placed in our college, with the highest salary package of 9.8 lakhs per annum and the lowest salary package of 3 lakhs per annum. Many MNCs and IBM companies visit. A few students got internships through our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Excellent infrastructure and facilities are available, including Wi-Fi, labs, a library, and provided books. Separate classrooms are provided for each branch. Hostel food is acceptable, medical facilities are available, and sports and games are conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty: Lecturers are very good; they are well qualified and have higher education, such as PhDs. The teaching quality is excellent, which helps us understand the concepts. Our course is curriculum-based. Exams are a bit difficult, and we have to work hard to pass. A passing percentage of 45 percent is required.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: EGS Pillay Engineering College is absolutely the best college

detailed_review.Placements: EGS Pillay Engineering College placements are good. Final-year students are eligible for campus interviews. The college placement training team conducts many placement interviews. Ninety percent of students are placed in good companies. Most students are placed in companies like Wipro, TVS, Yamaha, Hyundai, TCS, and Zoho. The highest salary package is 15 LPA, and the lowest is 2.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: EGS Pillay Engineering College has very good infrastructure facilities, such as mechanical labs, electrical labs, and multiple computer laboratories with internet facilities. The hostel facilities are very good, and the rooms are maintained in excellent condition daily. There is also a well-equipped library. The canteen food is very tasty. Sports grounds and coaching staff are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The professors at EGS Pillay Engineering College are well qualified and knowledgeable. They are very helpful to students and teach various computer courses. They arrange internship programs for students and conduct numerous extracurricular activities. More internal exams are held every month, resulting in 90 percent of students passing all exams. The course and curriculum are excellent.
detailed_review.Other: EGS Pillay Engineering College conducts many cultural events and offers more than 15 courses. The placement and infrastructure facilities are very good, which is why I chose this college. The management provides good transportation facilities and offers many scholarships to all students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College is really good Engineering College .

detailed_review.Placements: E. G. S Pillay Engineering College is one of the more reputed engineering college. Many MNC companies visit the college campus for interviews. The college placement training team brought Teach Mahindra, TCS, Infosys, Ashok Leyland, Hyundai, reliance, etc. for our placements. The highest salary package is 8 LPA. In 2021 passed out batch, 95 percentage students were placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure and facilities are very nice. Many department libraries are available in the college. Full campus has free Wi-Fi network and CCTV camera facilities are available. Nobody can move without permission in the college campus. The college library facility is very good. Boys and girls hostel are also available the college. Both veg and non veg foods also available in the college hostel. Basketball and badminton, sports grounds facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: E. G. S. Pillay Engineering College faculty members are very qualified. They are teaching very well. They conduct many internal exams in every month. They take more practical classes also. More than 90 percent  students pass in semester exams. They arrange many industry visit programs in every semester.
detailed_review.Other: The college is located at good environment place. The college provides good hostel and transportation facilities. The college conducts many social awareness events every month. They give more scholarships and certificates to all students. The college conducts many sports events every month.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements:
In my course, 80% of students are placed. 
The highest package is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA.
80% of students got internships. 
The roles offered are design motherboards, connect the wires and many others in my course. This course will be very useful in future .
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Infrastructure is decent and libraries and Wi-Fi are available. 
The hostel is available in good condition and the food is also good. Sports are conducted once a year, department-wise and canteen facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are very good in teaching. 
Yes, students are ready for the industry. 
Semesters are very easy to pass because it is an autonomous college; they frame their own syllabus so the pass percentage is good in my college. The pass rate is 95%.
detailed_review.Other:
In this course, there are more job opportunities 
Monthly events are held, such as symposiums and pooja functions.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: EGS Pillay Engineering College (autonomous).

detailed_review.Placements: 3rd SEM students are eligible for campus placement and an internship. Wipro, HCL, TCS, Infosys, Vin Fest, etc. More than 50 companies offer a 7 LPA package, with a minimum of 2 LPA. 75 percent students had some business and some higher education. The placement cell provide books and the programme learning platform for students During placement training, they teach us competitive aptitude, general English  and some important programming .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: EGS campus is well designed; we have each nearby campus. There are many functions are conducted in this college, like aksharam cultural festival, alumni meet, pongal celebration, etc. I am a cricket player, and my college supports sports people. The library has a lot of academic books and journal collections; no Wi-Fi is only for office work, not for students. My hostel accommodation rent is monthly room that is comfortable and bathroom privately used in one room. Food is good once a week, non-vegetarian; the college bus is not comfortable .
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are friendly; they provide free subscription course information to add more skills to their resumes. Teachers are very qualified; they are from the CS field. Our and BE computer teachers are the same. Our institute is autonomous and affiliated with Anna University, so the course is well structured. We have many programming, AI, and ML subjects that are useful. Semester is many exams, not very difficult, understanding needs to be good, logic building questions.
detailed_review.Other: College is very good, and my home is near. No, I think college is good, but the bus and canteen need better.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year nearly 95% percent of students are placed in our course. The recruiting companies are Accenture, Microsoft, and Facebook. The highest salary was 18 LPA. And the lowest salary was 4 LPA. Top roles are Java developer and project manager. 90% percent of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus provides separate hostels for boys and girls. The hostels are provided with all basic facilities like mineral water, bathrooms, water coolers, washing machines, and common reading rooms. The infrastructure and facilities available on campus are amongst the very best. Labs, classrooms, and the library were good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They have many good qualities like a friendly nature and good experience. They are very cooperative, and it is also helpful to learn things easily because the bond between students and teachers is quite good. The course curriculum is superb. The pass percentage is 78%.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: 60% above is required in the Bachelor of Computer Science.

detailed_review.Placements: In the fifth semester, there are companies available for placement. Various national and multinational companies come for hiring on the E. G. S. campus, including Microsoft, Google, Infosys, Tata, Reliance, Bajaj, etc. Packages start from INR 4 lacs to INR 15 lacs or above, according to your qualifications and the profile you have here. 50% or more of students definitely get placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Separate hostels for boys and girls are available at very affordable prices. Hostel admission is done on a first come, first served basis. They insist on having your parents with you at the time of admission, but it's a pretty flexible process, and still, life was pretty fun. The hostel facilities are very good. You will have access to hot and cold water around the clock. You have two options for hostel rooms: AC and non-AC rooms. The quality of the mess is good. You have 1 cafe known as Rising Cafe and 1 restaurant known as Blue Ears where you can enjoy yourself if you are bored with the food. The mess name in this university is Oval, where you will get good food. There are no rental options nearby; you have to go to a hostel on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty:
I chose this course because I have an interest in computer science. The faculty of E. G. S. College is very good in all terms. Every subject professor is highly qualified, and their teaching method is very good. There were six semesters in my course, and each semester had various types of exams. Both theory and practice. It's hard to pass because the quality of E. G. S. University is very top-class. Class size:-50
Course fees: INR 35,000 per year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good faculty and nice infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 82% percent students get placed from our course. The highest package is Rs 10 LPA, lowest package is Rs 4 Lacs per annum and average is Rs 6 Lacs per annum. Top recruiting companies are Google, microsoft, amazon, etc. 63% percent students got internship from our course. Top roles are web developer, project manager and Java developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Satisfied because of good infrastructure of the college. Extremely beautiful and good infrastructure. Classrooms, labs, library, sports ground and Wi-Fi are available. The campus provides separate hostels for boys and girls with attached bathrooms. Mineral water is provided in all the rooms. Canteen's food is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and knowledgeable. They have many good qualities like friendly nature, etc. Many teachers are Ph.D. holders. They teach in a good manner. They all are helpful for the students. The course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry ready. The exams are difficult in the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our campus is very good in terms of sports.

detailed_review.Placements: I am pursuing pre final year in CSE. The training is conducted in our college for placements. They teach us about aptitude, verbal, communication, and interpersonal skill for better recruitment. The highest salary package offered was 6 LPA. The average salary package offered was 2.4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Edveon, Namaltic, Vuram, Dhivam, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus has free Wi-Fi but Mobile phones are not allowed on campus. The laboratories are well-equipped with instruments. This college provides library cards, and we can take three books for self studies. Sports are very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college conduct two internal assessment tests. Faculty members are good but they are very strict. Two internal assessments are conducted in our college with one end semester examination. They also conducted optional tests to boost our internal marks. We should score 45 marks out of 100 in end-semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: It is a very good college. Our campus crowd is huge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very excellent in sports.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of the companies are IT companies and product companies and MNC. I got a offer in mobase electronics which is core based company but the company has heavy workload with 12hours working hours and 1 day week off. I got offer in 7th semester. The monthly salary is 23k.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The labs are enough and well-equipped. The college has free Wi-Fi but no mobile phone usage inside the campus as well as college bus. We take college books from library using library card. The sports are well good in the college. The canteen is average and restriction for sitting boys and girls together.
detailed_review.Faculty: The pass percentage is 45mark out of 100 in end semester examination in addition of we should have decent internal mark. The internal marks are boosted by scoring good marks in cycle test and summiting assignments in due time. The faculty members are good and helpful in the examination time.
detailed_review.Other:
Huge crowd
Lots of events
Sports are good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am not satisfied with the facilities at our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 40% of students are placed in our department. However, I gave it 3 stars because I got the lowest salary package. The salary package offered was 2.5 LPA to 4 LPA. All students completed internships because they were mandatory in our curriculum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities in our department are not good compared to other departments like CSE, IT, ECE, etc. There is no Wi-Fi facility for students, but the library is good. Hostel facilities are not that good in terms of food, snacks, etc., compared to other hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some professors are knowledgeable and very friendly to students. They provide valuable knowledge. It helps us to understand our lives. The quality of teaching is good enough. It is an autonomous college, so it makes the curriculum. Our curriculum includes an internship that is to be completed before or in the 7th semester. We have elective subjects from other departments. It is difficult to clear the semester exams. Questions asked in the semester exams are tricky. Overall, 20% of students passed the previous semester.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college for girls.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is average because most of the recruiting companies are software based companies. I got offer letter from mobase electronics in Chennai which has over workload like 12 hours work for 6 days in a week and the salary is 23kpm. The highest package is 6LPA and the average package is 3LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The canteen in this college is average because there is few food items and snacks. There is a restrictions for speaking with boys and girls. Also restriction for mobile phone usage. The classrooms are neat and good. The laboratories are enough for students. Gents hostel are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are qualified and supportive for studies. They provide important questions for the students. The teaching quality is good but most of the faculty members using projectors only not using blackboards. The exams are moderate. You should score 45marks out of 100 for clearing the examination.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement but strict.

detailed_review.Placements: Good placement. Recruiting companies are mobase electronics, pinnacle, cognizant, dhivam, vuram, namalatic etc.c. I am core student but I learn coding using skillrack platform. Now I have a basic knowledge in coding. They provide good aptitude, programming and communication training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a day scholar student but the hostel facilities are average and the quality of food in mess is average. The college has Wi-Fi facility but no mobile phones usage. The classrooms are medium in size that is enough for all students. The college has library, we use books by using library cards for 15 days. The sports and games are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The semester exams is very difficult for me. My course have lots of problems and equations. In 7th semester most of the papers are management papers. You should gain 45 out of 100 in semester exam with good internal marks. The staffs are good and some of the faculty members are strict but knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement training is very good. They teach aptitude, grammar, communication skills, and other interpersonal skills like dressing, speaking, etc. The training and placement staff members are good and well knowledgeable.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good, with well-equipped libraries and laboratories. The college has an ambulance for any emergency.
detailed_review.Faculty: The end-of-semester exam is average. It is easy to pass the exam when we have good internal marks. In the end-of-semester exam, you should receive 45 marks. Our faculty members are good and knowledgeable.
detailed_review.Other: Our college sports are very good. Our college organises a lot of events. I play cricket for my college team. The college promotes sports and participates in many games at the zonal and inter-zone levels.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has good value for money and time.

detailed_review.Placements: Top recruiting companies are Amphisoft, Kovai.co, Vuram, Dhivam, TCS, Whami, Namlatic, Pinnacle, Cognizant, Edveon Technologies, and Appranix. Our college provides placement training by using E-box and Skill Rack platforms. The highest salary package offered is 6 LPA, and the average salary package offered is 2.4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a day scholar, so I use a college bus. Our college bus facilities are quite good because they organise nearly 4 districts' routes. Classrooms are good and neat. Our college supports sports for both boys and girls. Laboratories and library facilities are enough for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. Most of them are very strict, but all the staff is qualified. Their teaching quality is good. The final semester exam is easy to pass, but we should maintain good internal marks by summiting assignments and scoring good marks in internal exams.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because I want to make my career in the electrical field.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 20 students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered was 5 LPA. The average salary package offered was 2.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Cognizant, TCS, Vuram, Dhivam, Pinnacle, Unacademy, and Bujys. Most of the drives are pool drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Sports are conducted like volleyball, basketball, kabaddi, kho kho, athletics, etc. Classrooms are very good. Wi-Fi is also available but the speed is not good. Laboratory is also well-equipped. The food served in the mess is average. I am a day scholar so I do not know about bus facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They are very polite. But few of them are strict and rude. Staff members are also very polite and friendly. Their teaching quality is good. They conduct 2 common assessment tests. If we score low on tests then optional tests are available to increase internal marks.
detailed_review.Other: Sports are very good in our college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to E.G.S. Pillay Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Yes, students get direct admission to E.G.S Pillay Engineering College. The college offers direct addmission only for those students who have passed the 12th class. college_info.college_name: GH Raisoni College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admissions 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
GH Raisoni College of Engineering is a private college located in Nagpur, Maharashtra. The College was established in 1996. GH RCE is affiliated with Rashtrasant Tukadoji Maharaj Nagpur University. The College offers UG, PG and PhD courses in full-time mode. The courses include BTech, MTech, and MBA. All the courses at the institute are recognised by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and ICAR. Admission to these courses may vary depending on the type of program. Accepted entrance exams include MH-CET / GATE / PET. The mode of application is online. Top recruiting companies during the GH RCE placement drive are JP Morgan Chase and Co, Deloitte, TIAA, KPMG, Capgemini, Cognizant, Accenture, and PWC.
The following are the USPs of GH Raisoni College of Engineering:
Candidates can take a look below at the GH Raisoni College of Engineering highlights:

college_info_program.intro: GH Raisoni College of Engineering offers BTech and MTech as its popular programmes. These courses are provided in affiliation with Rashtrasant Tukadoji Maharaj Nagpur University. Both the courses are provided in full-time mode.Accepted entrance exams such as MH-CET / GATE / PET area ccepted by the College. Candidates must abide by the Centralised Admission Process (CAP) set by the college. BTech is offered for the duration of 4 years whereas MTech is for the duration of 2 years.
