GIET University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Construction Technology and Management
reviews.review_title: Excellent university to study .

detailed_review.Placements: Being a master degree here is giving better opportunities for getting a degree and allows us to work with different MNCs. Top recruiting company like Accenture, Tech Mahindra and different startup companies comes for hiring our students. From our department the highest package is 7LPA. Average package securing about 3LPA. Mostly 80 percent of students get placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this university is excellent. The classroom facility is also well organised. There is also available of central library. The Wi-Fi facility is also available for free to access. The hostel accommodation also provides excellent in campus for boys and in outside for girls. The sports facility is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching faculty members are excellent and cooperative for project work. Basically teachers are focused on experiential knowledge. The semester exams are quite easy and able to pass. The pass percentage is about 35 percent. This course is quite relevant to pursue here.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of its internship opportunities and low fee to study.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Amazing 3-tier college to excel in engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: From campus placement, mostly 70 per cent of students are getting placement with an average package of 4 LPA. The highest package till now is 29 LPA, and the lowest package is 1.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Accenture, HCL, Tech Mahindra, and different startup companies also come for hiring. The top role of this course from this college is an enriching skill-based workshop.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this university is attractive for its beautiful building with a mountain view. The inside classroom facilities are acceptable. The lab facilities are also acceptable. There are 24 hours of free Wi-Fi available on campus, and each department has its own Wi-Fi. The hostel food is just mean, acceptable, not very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching faculty is not very highly qualified from a top IIT or NIT. Simple must be teachers from the locality. But have good communication with students. The teaching quality of teachers somehow makes them ready for the industry with the operation of students only. The semester exams are quite hard, but followed by PYQ and the question bank, it is easy to pass the semester.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because my cousin got a placement from here in a startup company, but now she is working at Wipro. And the price is quite low here as compared to other colleges. The enjoyable fest is happening here every year with a unique style, well known for Tech Fest Shrujan.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, the highest package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package was 30,000 The average package is 25 to 50,000. In our university, 79 percent of students get placed. TCS, Tech Mahindra, AWS, Infosys, Accenture, and IBM are the top recruiting companies for our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In labs, unlimited free Wi-Fi is provided. Our library has a well-defined infrastructure and central AC for students. In our university, Wi-Fi is available everywhere, and in our hostel, 2 GB per day free Wi-Fi is available. Those who want to study in the library can go there at any time for studies.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our university, teachers are very helpful and approachable. The teaching quality is very good for some teachers, and they are brilliant. They are all well qualified and experienced. They are knowledgeable. They teach difficult concepts in a very easy way.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overview of GIET University campus and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements of the Computer Science Engineering department are good in comparison with the other departments. The highest package of the last year is 14 LPA, the lowest package is around 4 LPA, and the average package of last year recruitment is 5 to 10 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, Infosys, Accenture, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure-wise, the Computer Science Engineering department is at no.1 position. It has the most beautiful academic block among all the departmental buildings and it has its own beauty. Maximum hostels are very old and room sizes are small. The classrooms of the CSE department are better than other departments.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of our department are good. There are a few who don't know teaching because they are freshers over here. Maximum of the professors have PhDs and are highly knowledgeable. They are more helpful to students for their academic growth. The topics and subjects are more relevant to the industries.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I feel happy to be here and be a part of GIET University.

detailed_review.Placements: At GIET University, I think 60-70 percent of students get placements in their dream companies. The lowest package ranges from 2-3 LPA, and the highest package ranges from 23-24 LPA. Some top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Infosys, Accenture, etc. Many students go to do internships in many companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in GIET University are very good, especially labs, classrooms, and the fully stocked library. We get Wi-Fi everywhere throughout the campus. Everything is fine here apart from the food, so we have to adjust because the food is not so good. In the canteen, we can pay for the food and eat. Medical facilities and sports facilities are very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: From my perspective, teachers are highly qualified, knowledgeable, and very helpful to us. They help us in every situation. Whenever we need them, they act as our proctor. They make students industry-ready for the outside world, and it is very helpful for everybody. The difficulty level of semester exams is very tough. 80 percent is the pass percentage here.
detailed_review.Other: I am from Bihar, and my family suggested that I do my graduation from this university because my elder brother also graduated from this university with a nice package. Events organised on this campus need to be improved further.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure, average faculty and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% students are placed in my course, and the maximum package is 6 LPA, and the minimum is 2.5 LPA. The recruiting companies are Mahendra, TCS, etc. 80% students get internships in many companies like Mahendra, Tata Jindal Steel. HR offered top roles in courses.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides a 24/7 library facility. Classrooms are good. All the classrooms have a projector. Our college provides a very good Wi-Fi facility. In our department, we provide all the mechanical instruments. And having all the machines like the lathe, CNC, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Evening time or any situation, our teachers help all the students. The semester exam is so difficult, and the pass percentage is 70%. All students are taking advantage.
detailed_review.Other: Our college provides extracurricular activities like sports, a swimming pool, a singing club, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good. They focus on our study.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is average. In my opinion, if I do not have skills like soft skills and hard skills, then why would a company hire me? To my knowledge, 42 LPA is the highest package, and 2 LPA is the lowest. But I don't know much about the package, and the training and placement cell is also held here for training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: 24/7 Wi-Fi facility. Hostel food is average, and the lab and classrooms are average. The hostel is good. The administration focuses on entertainment, so they watch movies in the college theatre every Saturday and Sunday. And library facilities are available where you can study for 24 hours.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helping and supporting. And clear all the doubts, but some of the teachers are rude, but they are good in nature. Classes are held from morning 7:30 to evening 8:00. They conduct 2 class tests, 2 cycle tests, 1 mid sem and 1 end sem and a lab test.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it because CSE is the leading course in the present and future. And my family members are also doing jobs in the IT sector, so I chose CSE.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement percentage for CSE is 70–90 percent. It depends on the college tier. The highest packages in top colleges can reach 50+ LPA, average packages range between 10–20 LPA, and lower-end packages start around 3–5 LPA. Top recruiters include Google, Microsoft, Amazon, TCS, Infosys, IBM, Accenture, and Cognizant. Internship participation is significant, around 60–80 percent. Internships offered by companies like Infosys, TCS, IBM, and start-ups via platforms like Internshala. Common job roles include Software Developer, Data Scientist, Cybersecurity Analyst, Cloud Engineer, and Web Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are usually spacious, and air-conditioned. They are equipped with multimedia teaching tools such as LCD projectors, audio-visual systems, and sometimes step-seating arrangements. Many institutes maintain smart classrooms supporting interactive learning experiences. Soundproofing and good ventilation are also common features for student comfort. A central library is available on campus. They always supplemented by a dedicated departmental library for CSE students. These libraries host thousands of books, reference texts, e-journals, periodicals, and digital resources. E-library facilities provide online access to national and international research papers, aiding both coursework and development.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are generally well-qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. They ensure clear concept delivery and guidance. The CSE curriculum is up-to-date with industry standards, making students job-ready with practical skills. Semester exams are of moderate difficulty. Most colleges maintain a good pass percentage, typically above 80%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice university, nice place, and very quiet, free from pollution.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement percentage for CSE is 70–90 percent. It depends on the college tier. The highest packages in top colleges can reach 50+ LPA, average packages range between 10–20 LPA, and lower-end packages start around 3–5 LPA. Top recruiters include Google, Microsoft, Amazon, TCS, Infosys, IBM, Accenture, and Cognizant. Internship participation is significant, around 60–80 percent. Internships offered by companies like Infosys, TCS, IBM, and start-ups via platforms like Internshala. Common job roles include Software Developer, Data Scientist, Cybersecurity Analyst, Cloud Engineer, and Web Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: CSE departments typically provide multiple well-equipped laboratories. It is dedicated to important domains such as Artificial Intelligence, Full-Stack Development, IoT, Mobile Application Development, Data Structures and Algorithms, Network and Operating Systems, and Big Data. Most campuses offer Wi-Fi access across the department, classrooms, laboratories, hostels, and common areas. They ensures constant connectivity for both students and faculty. Classrooms are usually spacious, air-conditioned, and equipped with multimedia teaching tools such as LCD projectors, audio-visual systems, and sometimes step-seating arrangements. A central library is available on campus, often supplemented by a dedicated departmental library for CSE students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Friendly faculty and strict examinations. Teachers are generally well-qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. They ensure clear concept delivery and guidance. The CSE curriculum is up-to-date with industry standards, making students job-ready with practical skills. Semester exams are of moderate difficulty. Most colleges maintain a good pass percentage, typically above 80%.
detailed_review.Other: The demand for Computer Science Engineering is now growing.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: All are average as I feel.

detailed_review.Placements: Many students are well set and many are not. Many companies come and give students a chance. We all see that many seniors are well placed and get good packages. Many good companies are coming and all try to give opportunities to all.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Here classrooms are old some are in poor condition. Library is excellent, very helpful to students. Wi-Fi is all good but not at hostels. In lab many systems are not working. Food is good but the taste is average. Many times in the food many insects are found. Campus is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: All are average. Many teachers are well experienced. Many are new their teaching style is not helpful. Some faculty are helpful. Teachers are actually good. Teachers teaching style & knowledge are good.
detailed_review.Other: My course is B.Tech in CSE. I love it for coding. I love coding and adapting skills. The fest is very few here so we are very excited for this. Too many classes are here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements and strong infrastructure with supportive faculty and a vibrant campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: GIET University reports 90 to 95 percent placements across most branches. The highest package reached 26.5LPA while the average is around 3.5 to 4LPA and the lowest package offered is 2LPA. Top recruiters include Zscaler Accenture TCS Wipro Deloitte HighRadius ITC Infotech Jio BP and Infosys. Many students often 70 to 100 percent depending on the branch receive internships in companies like TCS Wipro, HighRadius and Infosys. The most common roles are Software Developer Data Analyst ML/AI roles and tech consulting positions. Overall GIET offers strong placements with a few high end packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: GIET University offers strong infrastructure with campus wide Wi-Fi modern labs smart classrooms and a large 24/7 library. Departments have updated equipment for practical learning. Hostels provide Wi-Fi power backup and basic amenities. Rooms are decent though not luxurious. The mess serves hygienic food though quality is rated average by some students. The campus has multiple canteen a medical center with 24 hour ambulance service and regular health camps. Sports facilities include football cricket basketball badminton indoor games a gym and even a swimming pool. Overall infrastructure is well maintained and supportive of academic and campus life.
detailed_review.Faculty: GIET University teachers are generally qualified helpful and knowledgeable. Students rate the teaching quality as good. The curriculum is mostly industry oriented though some parts may feel theoretical. Overall it prepares students reasonably well for placements. Semester exams are moderately easy if you follow classes but tougher when set externally. The pass percentage varies by branch with students reporting anywhere from 40 to 80 percent depending on the exam and department.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it offers strong technical learning, good industry relevance and wide career opportunities. The best parts are the practical labs supportive faculty and frequent placement driven training. The course can be improved by updating certain subjects and adding more hands on industry projects. Campus life is active with fests competitions clubs and cultural events. The crowd is diverse and friendly and the surroundings are peaceful. Connectivity is decent and scholarships are available for merit and need based students. Overall the environment supports both academics and extracurricular growth.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Facilities and placements at GIET Odisha.

detailed_review.Placements: GIET is a good college in Odisha. Around 80% of students get placement from our course. In our course, the highest package is 26 LPA, and the lowest package is 4 LPA. Top companies include TCS, Wipro, Accenture, Zscaler, NXT Wave, and Cognizant. Students get a chance for internships from the 3rd year of the course. The top roles are in the software development and coding fields.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our course is good. All facilities are available here. Wi-Fi is available. Labs are equipped with all necessary equipment. Each department has access to the library. Classrooms are decent. Hostel facilities are adequate. Mess food is decent, and a canteen is available. Medical and sports facilities are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of this college is experienced and helpful to students. Their teaching quality is good. They are all qualified and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester examinations are not easy. You need to study at least 10 days before the exam. The passing ratio is 90%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: GIET University offers good courses, placements, infrastructure, and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has great placements. The placement department works hard to ensure all students get placed in top companies. Top recruiting companies such as Wipro, Infosys, Flipkart, and Microsoft visit our college for placements. We also get internship offers from big companies like Wipro and Accenture. Roles such as software developer are offered in our course. The highest package offered is 12 LPA, the minimum package is 5.5 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and classrooms are fully air-conditioned, and complete silence is maintained in the library. Teachers are available whenever you need them. The mess food is very poor. Medical facilities are limited. Sports and games are not conducted frequently.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, most teachers are Ph.D. qualified and have good experience. Their teaching is good. We have many activities, and since the college is autonomous, we get all facilities within the college itself. The course curriculum is not very relevant and does not make students industry-ready. The semester exams are very easy, and the pass rate is 90 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Honest review of placements and college infrastructure at GIET.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 80% of students in our college get placed in CSE. Many roles are offered, such as developer, tester, and more. In 2024, one of our seniors got a package of 40+ LPA. The lowest package was about 3–3.5 LPA. The average package last year was about 6–6.5 LPA, and this year it is around 6–7 LPA. Many MNCs visit our college, including Accenture, HDFC Bank, Microsoft, Google, TCS, Wipro, and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities at our college are above average. The college has a good infrastructure and buildings. Classrooms are air-conditioned. Some are equipped with smart boards. High-speed Wi-Fi is available in the library as well as the hostels. Hostel facilities are average. The mess food is not good. Medical facilities are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable, with a strong academic background. Their quality of teaching is good. The curriculum is not fully relevant and does not make students industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult because they include questions at a level not taught in class.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good as a B.Tech CSE college.

detailed_review.Placements: In the GIET University, the students who got placed through the campus is less. The highest package is 6 LPA to 7 LPA. The average package is 3.5 LPA to 4 LPA. The college is not providing an internship to all the students. The top roles offered by the company are machine learning, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are very good, with well-maintained classrooms, and a library is present. Labs are good. The hostel doesn't provide many facilities, they provide Aquaguard, Wi-Fi, and mess food, which is not very good, but can be managed. Medical facilities and sports facilities are provided by GIET.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and they are helping students. Also, teachers are knowledgeable, and the teaching quality is very good. The course that I took is Computer Science and Engineering, which is relevant to the courses that I took. That makes students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are happening only in November and December.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: GIET University placement review by me.

detailed_review.Placements: GIET is placement guarantee college in Odisha, but in reality it does not provide good placement. The highest package this year is 20 LPA, and the lowest is not mentioned till now, but average is 6 to 7 LPA. Top companies are TCS, Wipro, Accenture, Zscaler, NXT, and Weave. Students got 100 percent internship from our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of our course is good and all are correctly organized. Facilities of our course are also good. Classrooms are decent, labs are decent with all equipment present. Library is available with AC and enough books. Hostel facilities are good and all B.Ed types are available, you can choose your preferred type. Mess food is acceptable. Medical facilities are also decent. Sports facilities are good and all games are present.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of this college is decent but good. They are knowledgeable but they prefer notes for teaching and do not have much experience. Their teaching quality is good. This course is curriculum relevant, and it makes students ready for placement offers. Semester examination is better compared to other colleges. Semester students appearing ratio is 80 percent.
detailed_review.Other: Other facilities, events, and activities are held according to schedule and time. This course is well and has better placement offers.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: GIET facilities and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: GIET is good college in Odisha. It provides decent placement in our department. The highest is 15 LPA, average around 5 LPA, and the lowest is 2 LPA. Top companies are Tata, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and Birla. Students have a chance to get internship from our course in final years. It plays top role.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of our course is well and good decorated. Its facilities are also good. Infrastructure of our course is well organised. Free Wi-Fi is available for internet connection, library is open all time. Classrooms are decent. Hostel is decent and food quality is good. Medical and sports facilities are also decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of this college is helpful for students and it is educated and knowledgeable. They are also experienced. This course is not currently curriculum relevant, but it makes students industry ready. Semester examination is moderate level and students can easily appear in it. It helps students secure good score.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In our University 80 percent of students get placed. In our course the highest package is 39LPA and lowest package offered is 20 thousand per month and the average package offered is 45 to 50 thousand per month. TCS Tech Mahindra and AWS are the top recruiting companies for our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our University Wi-Fi is available everywhere and in our hostel 2 GB per day free Wi-Fi is available. In labs unlimited free Wi-Fi facility is provided. Our library has well define infrastructure and central AC for students. Those who want to study in library they can go any time.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our University teachers are very helpful and comfortable. They are all well qualified and experienced. They are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good,and for some teachers they are brilliant. They teach us the difficult concept in a very easy way.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to become a software engineer.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: ECE department of GIET University.

detailed_review.Placements: GIET has provided decent placement guarantee. The highest package is around 26 LPA and the lowest package is 2 LPA, and average is 4 LPA. Top most recruiting companies are Tech Mahindra, Wipro, Infosys, Scale. Students got 90 percent internship from our course in the 3rd year of course. Top role of job is software engineering department and coding developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this university is very good because it is placed between two mountains. The university provides facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, and smart classes with the projector setup and smart boards. The quality of mess is good and manageable but the hostel facilities are very bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is good but style of teaching is high. Course curriculum is relevant to industry. It makes students industry ready. The semester examinations are normal and the pass percentage is 80 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good as B.Tech in engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In GIET, not very many students were placed through the on-campus. Many were getting jobs outside the campus. Top recruitment companies like TCS, Accenture, and many startup companies are coming for campus drives. Top roles in the big company are machine learning and artificial intelligence.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The environment in GIET is very good, surrounded by hills and a good environment. GIET provides many courses like B.Teach Computer Science with AI and Data Science, and mechanical, electrical, civil, and many courses. Wi-Fi, a library, and well-maintained labs are present.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good, they provide materials and all the information about the courses they need. Teaching quality is very good, students understand it easily without having any problems. Some subjects are there that make industry ready for students.
detailed_review.Other: Teachers are good, they provide materials and all the information about the courses they need. Teaching quality is very good, students understand it easily without having any problems. Some subjects are there that make industry ready for students.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in GIET University?
faqs.answer: Candidates looking to apply for the programmes offered at GIET University are advised to go through the prospectus and ensure that they fulfil the eligibility. Eligible students can apply for the desired course on the university's website. Admission to most of the courses offered by the university are done through valid entrance scores. Hence, aspirants must either provide a valid scorecard of the accepted exam or appear for the GIETEE. In some cases, students need to participate in the counselling for seat allotment. Selected candidates musy pay the tuition fees to secure their seat in the university.

faqs.question: What are the exams accepted by GIET University?
faqs.answer: GIET University accepts several national and state-level entrance exams for admission to its BTech programme. Further, the university also conducts its own exam to shortlist the candidates. Some of the accepted exams are JEE Mains, OJEE, MAT, XAT, CAT, CMAT , etc. Alternatively, candidates looking to apply for the BTech, MBA, MCA, BSc courses offered at GIET University can also apply for the GIETEE exam through the university's official website.

faqs.question: What is a good percentage of MSc to get admission in GIET University
faqs.answer: There are no certain percentage requirement is fixed at GIET University for MSc course. However, students who are willing to take admission in MSc Life Science, Chemistry, Maths is from 50% to 60% aggregate. However, MSc in biotechnology, the student need to pass in BSc Biotechnology / BSc with Biochemistry / Microbiology / Botany / Zoology /Physics /Chemistry/ Environmental Sciences/ Agriculture / BVSc /BTech Biotechnology/BPharma /BAMS/BHMS/BPT and any other related discipline with not less than 45 % aggregate.

summary: The University has a Training and Placement cell that helps in turning out industry-ready students with the right blend of academic and personal skills or providing a conduit for placement of students at the end of their sojourn at the Institute or for providing an interface for the ex-students willing to suggest ways and means of adapting the curriculum or the emphasis to the ever-changing requirements of the industry.

The 2024 placements concluded with 950 students placed in total. Furryhermore, the highest and lowest packages offered during GIET Gunupur placements 2024 were INR 26.5 LPA and INR 1.20 LPA, respectively.

facilities.description: 24*7 AC Library with 81000 books.	The University boasts of having one of the best libraries in Eastern India. Spread over an area of 1649 sq. meters, the library is equipped with an unmatchable collection of books, magazines, journals, CDs, DVDs. The library regularly subscribes to premier International and national print journals, electronic journals, and full-text online journals. The library plays an important role in ensuring the learning experience of the students as well as improving their knowledge.

college_info.college_name: GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
Established in 1997, GMR Institute of Technology—GMRIT—is located in Andhra Pradesh. The institute is affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTUK). GMRIT is approved by the AICTE and recognised by the Government of Andhra Pradesh and DTE. The institute encourages collaborative learning between industry and academia to reinforce its curriculum with practical and real-world experiences.
GMR Institute of Technology – GMRIT offers UG and PG courses. The flagship course offered at GMR College is BTech. GMR Institute of Technology admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts national entrance exams such as AP EAMCET, AP CET, GATE, and AP PGECET. GMRIT has top-notch infrastructure which includes an auditorium, cafeteria, Wi-Fi campus, labs, library, gym, medical facility, and others. The key highlights of GMR Institute of Technology – GMRIT has been tabulated below:

college_info_program.intro: BTech ­is one of the popular programmes offered at the GMR Institute of Technology – GMRIT. The colleges offer full-time, four-year programmes under the guidance of experts. The institute offers BTech specialisation in Civil Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, CSE, Mechanical Engineering, Information Technology, and others. Below mentioned are the GMR Institute of Technology – GMRIT popular programmes:

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the GMRIT.

detailed_review.Placements: In our campus this year nearly 248 members selected for Infosys. The recruiting companies are Infosys, TCS, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant. Nearly 50 percent of students got placed last year. 40 LPA is the highest package till now. We have internship for one month in 3rd year starting and final year full semester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have labs available in our lab hours and we have LAN connection in labs only. We have vast library with variety of books. We have projectors in our classrooms. We have GMR Care Hospital near to our college. Hostel is not so good to the value of money but not bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Lecturers teaches only knowledge required for passing exams. Practical knowledge is provided but up to the mark of placements. Course curriculum is not so updated to technologies. Semester exams are not so tough to attempt but we need to study hard to get good marks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the GMRT College.

detailed_review.Placements: In our campus this year, nearly 248 members were selected for Infosys. The recruiting companies are Infosys, TCS, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant. Nearly 50 percent of students got placed last year. 40 LPA is the highest package till now. We have internship for one month in 3rd year starting and full semester in final year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have labs available in our lab hours, and we have LAN connection in labs only. We have a vast library with variety of books. We have projectors in our classrooms. We have GMR Care Hospital near to our college. Hostel is not so good for the value of money but not bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Lecturers teach only knowledge required for passing exams. Practical knowledge is provided but up to the mark of placements. Course curriculum is not so updated to technologies. Semester exams are not so tough to attempt, but we need to study hard to get good marks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Balanced experience, good placements, supportive faculty, and decent infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2025 batch, B.Tech CSE at GMRIT. 75 percent of students are placed. The highest package offered is 12 LPA, the lowest package offered is 3 LPA and average package offered is 4.5 LPA. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture and Capgemini. Nearly 40 percent got internships in TCS, Infosys and startups. Roles offered are Software developer, Tester and Data Analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My course at GMRIT, the infrastructure is quite good with well equipped computer labs, decent Wi-Fi, smart classrooms and a large central library with both digital and physical resources. Hostel facilities are average but manageable, rooms are clean, and food in the mess is okay. The canteen is better, and medical as well as sports facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty at GMRIT are mostly helpful, well qualified and supportive. They explain concepts clearly and are approachable after class. The curriculum is relevant and includes practical labs and projects that help with industry exposure. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty and around 85 percent of students usually pass each semester.
detailed_review.Other: I am from the 2024 CSE AI & this batch and chose this course because of my interest in coding and software careers. The best part is the practical labs, projects and coding culture. I wish there are more industry visits and hackathons. GMRIT fests and technical events are lively, the crowd is friendly, the campus surroundings are peaceful, buses connect well, and scholarships support many students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall review of my college is good.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are good at GMRIT in Electronics and Communication Engineering. The highest package was 20 LPA, and the lowest package was 2 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Infosys, Wipro, and TCS. 95 per cent of students got placed in Electronics and Communication Engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of GMRIT college is good, and the classrooms are provided with good equipment, such as projectors. It has a central library with a vast collection of books and a digital library. The hostel in GMRIT college is hygienic and clean. They encourage the students in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty here are good. They encourage students to develop new projects and help students clear their doubts. The curriculum is based on the topics required for the internship in Electronics and Communication Engineering. The semester exams are very hard.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is overall good and satisfying.

detailed_review.Placements: 95 percent of the total students were placed in the last major placement drive at GMRIT. Common recruitment companies for GMRIT Computer Science engineering students are Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, and Value Labs. The highest package is 32-34 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5-2.8 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has well-equipped classrooms with projectors and digital teaching labs, dedicated department labs for Computer Science and other branches with good computing facilities, and a large central library with a vast collection of books and new editions, as well as a digital library. Maintenance and cleanliness are generally satisfactory in the hostel, with opportunities for sports and fitness encouraged.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were invaluable and supportive towards students. They are friendly in nature. Most of the teaching staff are qualified professionals with knowledge in their respective domains. The course curriculum is relevant to our group and helps prepare students for the industry. The semester exams are very hard, and the corrections are very strict.
detailed_review.Other: There are no other events besides Stepcone and the annual day, which are often focused on academics and sports. There are many rules with no freedom.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of my college.

detailed_review.Placements: On our campus this year nearly 248 members got selected for Infosys. The recruiting companies are Infosys, TCS, Tech Mahindra, and Cognizant. Nearly 50 percent of students got placed last year. 40 LPA is the highest package till now. We have an internship for one month in the 3rd year, starting in the final year's full semester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have labs available in our labs, and we have a LAN connection in the labs only. We have a vast library with a variety of books. We have projectors in our classrooms. We have the GMR Care Hospital near our college. The hostel is not so good for the value of money, but not bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Lecturers teach only the knowledge required for passing exams. Practical knowledge is provided, but up to the mark of placements. The course curriculum is not so updated to technologies. Semester exams are not so tough to attempt, but we need to study hard to get good marks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college supports in every event. I’m satisfied. Faculty is also good, and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 45 percent of students are placed in my course. 14 LPA is the highest, 4 LPA is the lowest, and the average is 7 LPA package offered in my course. INFOSYS, TCS, and AMAZON are the top recruiting companies of my course. 80 percent of students got internships from my course, and the companies are TCS, Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are so many facilities in my course. They learn Python, Java, etc. The infrastructure is also available, like urban infrastructure that builds special investment regions and urban projects. In this course, we will do different types of projects.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are teaching very well to all students. This course is curriculum-relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. 50 percent difficult are the semester exams in this college. 60 percent is the pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: Presently, my course has full competition in society. That’s why I chose this course. From this course, we learn programming well. I would like to improve programming skills of my course. All events and fests are performed in our college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: As per my knowledge, my life is better as an average student can enhance their skills.

detailed_review.Placements: According to the reports, approximately 300 students are placed in recent placements, and the average package offered is 4.2LPA, and top companies are GMR, Infosys, JSW, LTI, MINDTREE, etc. The maximum roles offered by companies are system design engineer, and a maximum of 40 percent of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As per my knowledge, labs and classroom facilities are good and there are projectors for the current day. I am a day scholar, and my hostel friends suggest that the food is not as good as they said, and sometimes they prefer low price vegetables for that purpose. As compared to the outer hostel fee, the college fee is high.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are more helpful for enhancing my skills and academics, also they guide me for my future development as per suggested placements and also they tell me what skills are used in modern technology. They teach for that purpose only. End exams are in a moderate manner we can achieve a minimum of 75 percent, and an average student can simply pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in computer science, and it offers more opportunities in software where I can enhance my skills. In college labs and also provide internships and placement opportunities. I think some improvements can be made in hostel food and daily menu, as per my friends suggestion. Actually I am a day scholar.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Life in GMRIT College is very exciting, to build new things.

detailed_review.Placements: Students achieved a placement rate of approximately 96.89 percent. The highest package is 40.5 LPA, the lowest package is 2.40 LPA-3.50 LPA, and the average package is 4.50 LPA-6.50 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Google, ADP, and Drawinbox. 100 percent in IT services. Software Development Engineer, Data Analyst, and Full-Stack Developer are the roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is an autonomous college. Very good infrastructure, and the Wi-Fi speed is very fast and secure. The classrooms are very free to move, and the benches are comfortable. Coming to the library, it is one of the biggest libraries in our district, which consists of all types of books. The food quality is okay, and the service is good enough. Coming to sports and games is excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and highly qualified, and they have gained so much knowledge. The teaching quality is very good. The course curriculum is perfect, and it makes the students industry-ready to get placements of 100 percent. The difficulty rate is good in the semester exams. The pass percentage is between 75 and 90 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I'm interested in interacting with the computer. Doing real-time applications from the 2nd semester. Coming to the events and fests is good. The crowd is also okay. Connectivity from the campus is so much better compared to other colleges. The base regarding scholarship is very good in our college. It has separate faculty coordinators for that. More than 200 members got a scholarship. Extracurricular activities are highly encouraged in our college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: The college is actually good and students get to enjoy and experience new things.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 500 + students get placed from our college every year. The highest package offered to one of our seniors last year is 40 LPA in cybersecurity. Infosys is the top recruiting company, mostly everyone got the internship from our course. Data Scientist, Data Analysis, and many other courses are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our classrooms have a lecture capturing system, which is very useful for students who were not able to attend the college. Our Library is also very good. We also have a digital library for students to use. Labs are very good with a proper internet LAN connection. Finally, the infrastructure of our college is good with complete greenery. Our college has both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers clarify the doubts and are very helpful even when students are interested in other domains. They help the students and guide them into their dreams. The curriculum includes important foundation. It helps you prepare for basic industry jobs, but additional self learning is needed for advanced skills. The semester exams are easy as long as the students pay attention in classes and have a good foundation. The pass percentage is, maybe, 40 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Artificial Intelligence and Data Science as it is very trending, and I want to learn about this field as it looks interesting. The best thing about this course is the combination of different studies as we drive deep into the course. It is more fascinating to learn the things that work like magic. I do not think there is anything better to improve. The biggest event held in our college is step cone where people from different colleges also come and participate in the events. We conduct hackathons for students to get experience. Students also get scholarship.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall college is the best and nicest place to increase skills and have a good life for a student.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent of students are placed, the highest package this year is 16LPA, the average package offered is 3.5 LPA, and the prominent role is system engineer. Many of the students got a chance at internship and many of them have good skills, so the roles given to the students are good. So its a good college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is excellent and we also have a digital library, excellent classrooms, and a sports arena. The food in canteen is also very hygienic. Our college also provides facilities for all sports. There is also emergency medical room.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are fully qualified and have an excellent knowledge of subjects. The curriculum is very helpful with respect to industry. Exams are held very strictly and are conducted under surveillance. 80 percent of students passed in the semester.
detailed_review.Other: College is a very excellent environment, Electronics and communication engineering is going to be a big thing and has many career opportunities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has good placements. So I recommend others to join our college.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent of students get placed in our college. The highest package offered is 40.05 LPA. The average package offered is 4.5 LPA in our college. Top recruiting companies for our course are Infosys, Darwinbox, TCS, and PalTech. 60 percent of students get the same company for placements and internships. Roles like developer, debugger, and deployer are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has good infrastructure. There are AC labs and a free Wi-Fi facility in our college. We have a good hostel facility. Here we have a good mess with delicious food. It also provides good medical facilities, sports, and games facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and knowledgeable. They teach very well in our college. The course curriculum is very relevant. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are tough. The pass percentage is 80 percent in our college.
detailed_review.Other: I want to become a software engineer, so I chose computers as my subject. It should improve lab sessions, which can improve some practical knowledge of subjects. Our college is famous for fests and events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Facilities in GMRIT and placements in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage in our college is very good, and there is always a mass hiring that takes place in the placements. Recently, in our college, 248 people were placed in Infosys with a 3.6 LPA, and Cognizant recruited 55 people. Also, the mechanical, civil and EEE placements are 100 percent because we have the GMR company to recruit those people, and for CSE allied branches, our college invites reputable companies, so there is no disappointment in placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a bus student, but what I heard from my friends is that the hostel facilities are good. The food tastes are acceptable, but the quality is very good, and also the classrooms in our college are well-equipped. The transport facilities to my home are provided by the college, which provides a bus. The fee is around Rs. 24,000 per year, based on the place where you are living, but the sports facilities in our college are 5/5. Library facilities are awesome, you can prepare for any competitive exam without any worry. Canteen and mess, overall, I am very satisfied.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty and curriculum are good, but the curriculum is not updated to industry level. We can prepare for the competitive exams in college because our library support is excellent. The semester exams are moderate, we can manage them by analysing the old question papers. Teaching quality is good, we can gain knowledge about the industry from the professors who did Ph.D. overall the college is doing its best to provide the industry knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: The events are good, we have student chapters, and they conduct events around 2 or 3 times a month. Also, the student council is very helpful in conducting the college events like Stepcone and annual days, and events always contain technical events, from which you can learn a lot. I am pretty satisfied with my college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: GMRIT hostel facilities and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college, the placements are very good. 85 percent of students are placed in CSE. The average package offered in our course is 3.6 LPA by Infosys. Our college has been very good for mass hiring over the past 2 years. Our college took 147 members last year and 248 members this year. Among 70 percent of students getting internships from the startups and roles that are being offered are support engineer and development roles. For the high packages, the Darvin Box, who took 16 LPA, is in a developer role. Proud to be a GMRITian.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is excellent, and I always loved being in the hostel because the warden and management take care of students in a good manner. There is 24/7 water and current facility because of solar plants by the college, and also the hot water is always available, and wlan is 24/7. Overall, the library and infrastructure are 5/5. The food quality is excellent, but the taste is acceptable. Our college is fond of sports because the college encourages us to play sports, we have a physical director, a PET madam and a PET sir to support us.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is good, and they are helpful to us. The curriculum is old because the current market trends do not fit with this curriculum. The exams in the college are easy, and the pass percentage is very high because the old question paper analysis is quite easy, most of the questions come from those papers, so the teachers are good. The exams are moderate. Overall, our college is strict, but there is a lot of discipline we can learn.
detailed_review.Other: Stepcone is going to be one of the national events, and it consists of non-technical and technical events. We can learn a lot from it. The best things about my course are the doctoral faculty and the placement support and training. There are some improvements, like updating the curriculum. Our college is going to be a university in future. I am willing to be a part of it, the fests and events, and the knowledge that you gain from this college is valuable. Scholarships are provided for merit students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Is GMRIT college good for campus recruitment?

detailed_review.Placements: My course is Computer Science and Engineering. Our college placements are very good, and recently 248 people have been selected in Infosys, and also 55 people have been selected in Cognizant. Our college is very good for Mechanical, Civil, and EEE placements, and around 50 people got internships in reputed companies. Roles offered by companies are Support Engineer, and the student who got 16 LPA has been promoted to a developed role. The average package is 3.6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are top-notch, and the faculty is very good at teaching. Some faculty members have IIT-level knowledge. Wi-Fi is not provided, but WLAN is available. The classrooms are very well equipped, and the quality of food in hostels is good, though the taste is average. The rooms are 5/5 because of the 24/7 water and electricity facility, and if there is any problem, the wardens are very well-mannered and take responsibility for those problems.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. All faculty members have M.Tech degrees from reputed colleges, and some professors have completed their PhD, which is excellent. The curriculum is not updated, but our management is trying to update it. The semester exams in the college are moderate, but if we go with the previous year's papers, they would be easy to pass. Overall, the faculty and curriculum are rated 4/5.
detailed_review.Other: The campus life in the college is excellent. The friendships and the support from teachers are very helpful. We have good events like Stepcone, which is a national event, and campus networking is very high, as we have strong connections with reputed companies. Recently, Sudha Murthy also visited our college, and I wish this college would improve the curriculum and give students the freedom to learn the skills they want.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: GMR is a college with space and greenery.

detailed_review.Placements: At my college, about 85% of students get placed. By the end of the 4th year, almost all students are recruited. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Cognizant, and Darwinbox. The top roles are Software Engineer and Web Developer. The highest package is 45 LPA. The average is about 5–6 LPA. For the top 5 students, internships are provided abroad, while the remaining students get internships with companies like Hashtek Solutions and others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is very large and has a lot of greenery. For every department, there are different numbers of labs, and Wi-Fi is also available. The hostel is good. The food is also good. Chicken is provided twice a week, and many other dishes are provided as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and also explain real-time scenarios. Semester exams are up to the student level only, which means the pass percentage is good. Bright students get a good CGPA. We also have to do self-study, which is good for a motivated learner.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college has good infrastructure and education. Everything is based on practical learning.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 85 percent of students are placed. The highest package is 40 LPA, the lowest package is 6 LPA, and the average package is 8 LPA. Top recruiters include Dhawan Box and Infosys. Around 95 percent of students get internships, and companies like Hashtag recruit from our college. The roles offered are testing and coding.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, infrastructure is good. A LAN in every room. We have many classrooms. It is easy to study here. Library is helpful. It allows us to read all books and study comfortably. Labs are useful for doing project work and other tasks. In my hostel, food is good and has nice taste. There is also a small canteen in the hostel. It is helpful.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers freely talk with us and explain everything in a friendly way. They take care of us and give useful guidance for the future. The curriculum is helpful for our jobs and placements. Semester exams are moderately difficult as they include questions based on industry requirements. The pass percentage is 92 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in this course because I like software tools, real-time projects, and coding. Course teaches us how to do projects and learn coding. I want to improve my DSA skills for my future job and work on real-world problem-solving. The college organizes fests like Stepcone. Here we can participate in workshops, games, and stalls.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with faculty and placements at this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The maximum percentage of people are placed in our college in this course. The highest package is 45 LPA, and the lowest is 3.6 LPA. Top recruiting companies include Infosys, L& T, and Darwin Box. Students take internships from my course in institutes.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities of this college are good, but the rules are very strict. The classrooms, Wi-Fi, and labs are very good. There is nice equipment. The quality of the hostel and facilities are good. They allow sports activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful to students. They are available for students. Their teaching quality is okay. The course curriculum is relevant to our course. It does not make students fully ready for the industry. The semester examinations are okay.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to improve my knowledge in data science and settle into a data scientist job. I wish to improve our college by having more events. There are events and festivals conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: I feel good about this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The maximum percentage of students get placed in our college. The highest package is around 45 LPA, and the lowest package is around 3.6 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys and L&T. Internships are available to everyone in some institutes. The top roles are developer and tester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available for my course are very good. The department labs and classrooms are well-maintained. The quality of facilities in our hostel is hygienic. There are facilities for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and qualified. They are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good. The course curriculum is relevant to us, but it doesn’t make students fully ready for industry training. The exams are somewhat easy.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have an interest in technology. I wish they would conduct more practical sessions. Events and fests are conducted every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college is very enjoyable for studies, sports, and extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements: 50% of students are placed in my course. The highest package is 20 LPA, the lowest is 3 LPA, and the average is 8 LPA. Recruiting companies are Infosys, L&T, HCL, Accenture, and Wipro. 30% of students get internships through my course. Roles include developer and tester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available for my course include Wi-Fi, classrooms, and a library, all of which are good. The quality of facilities in my hostel is nice. The quality of food in the mess and canteen is good. Medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is wonderful and very nice. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are not very difficult, and the pass percentage is 70%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am interested in hardware-related things. The best thing is that it is integrated with electronics. I wish to improve my logical thinking skills related to my course. Events and fests are conducted yearly, 3 to 4 times. The campus has a huge crowd, the surroundings are nice, and scholarships are provided.

college_info.college_name: GMR Institute of Technology Courses Admission 2025: Fees, Eligibility, Selection Criteria & Dates

faqs.question: What are the courses offered at GMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: GMR Institute of Technology offers one UG course and one PG course UG courses include BTEch and MTech, respectively. Admission to both courses is based on entrance exam scores followed by counselling. The college accepts EAMCET entrance exam and counselling for admission to BTech and Andhra Pradesh ECET exam and counselling for admission to M.Tech course. Further, the college also offers lateral entry in BTech, admisison to lateral entry is based on score obtained in Andhra Pradesh ECET.

faqs.question: Do I need Andhra Pradesh EAMCET Score to get into GMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: GMR Institute of Technology accepts Andhra Pradesh EAMCET scores for admission to BTech courses. To be eligible for admission to BTech, candidates are required to apply and appear for the entrance exam. Further for M.Tech course admission is based on the Andhra Pradesh PGECET entrance exam score.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to GMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: No, GMR Institute of Technology offers entrance-based admission to its UG and PG courses. To be eligible for admission candidates are required to apply and appear for the accepted exam. The college accepts Andhra Pradesh EAMCET and Andhra Pradesh ECET exam followed by counselling for BTech  and Andhra Pradesh PGECET and GATE exam followed by counselling for M.Tech Additionaly, candidates are required to fulfil the basic eligibility criteria set by the college.

faqs.question: Can we join BTech at GMR Institute of Technology directly?
faqs.answer: No, GMR Institute of Technology offers entrance-based admission to BTech. Candidates are required to fulfil the eligibility criteria and apply for the Andhra Pradesh EAMCET entrance exam for admission. After all the procedures the college releases its merit list. If candidates get selected in the merit list they have to pay the admission fee to lock their final seats.

faqs.question: What is the total fee of the BTech course offered by GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT?
faqs.answer: The BTech course fee offered by GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT is Iranges between INR 2.6 Lacs - INR 3 lakh. The fees might include components other than tuition fees. The mentioned fee is as per Andhra Pradesh EAPCET. Candidates are required to pay the course fee after completion of all the selection rounds to confirm their seats. Further, candidates note that the given fee is as per the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to GMR Institute of Technology BTech programme?
faqs.answer: GMR Institute of Technology offers a total of 1320 seats in BTech programme. Candidates looking for admission to BTech can apply by visiting the official website of the entrance exam accepted by the college i.e., EAMCET for admission. Additionaly, to gain admission to BTech, candidates must have pass Class 10 and Class 12 from a recognised board.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria for M.Tech at GMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: GMR Institute of Technology offers a two-year MTech course at the PG level. As per the minimum eligibility requirements of the course, candidates must pass a UG degree in the relevant discipline. Additionaly, candidates are required to apply and appear for Andhra Pradesh PGECET and GATE entrance exam for admission.

faqs.question: Is M.Tech available in GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT?
faqs.answer: Yes, GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT offers an M.Tech course for a duration of two years. The college offers admission to M.Tech entirely entrance-based. To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to apply on the official website of APICET. Additionally, candidates must pass graduation in the relevant stream to be eligible to apply for the course.

faqs.question: What is the cut off of GMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: GMR Institute of Technology accepts AP EAMCET entrance exam scores, followed by its counselling process for admissio to BTech courses. As per the APEAMCET 2023 cutoff, the last-round closing ranks ranged between 5680 and 24083 . Among all the BTech specialisation, Computer Science and Engineering was the most in-demand BTech specialisation to get admission at GMR Institute of Technology. Candidates can refer to the table below to view the AP EAMCET last-round cutoff trends over three years.

faqs.question: Can I get into GMRIT with 70% in class 12 with Andhra Pradesh EAMCET?
faqs.answer: GMRIT offers admission to its BTech courses through Andhra Pradesh EAMCET exam scores. Candidates scoring 70% will be eligible for Andhra Pradesh EAMCET and can get admission to GMRIT. The admission are possible on the basis of Class 12th scores. The admissions are offered directly by the institute. The minimum eligibility requirements for various courses are given below: Stream and Course Eligibility Age Limit Engineering - BTech (Bio-Tech course) Passed Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry as optional subjects along with bridge course exam in Mathematics conducted by the Board of Intermediate Education, Govt, of AP/Telangana only Must have completed 17 years of age by 31 December 2025 Pharmacy Passed in Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry as an optional subject or with Biological and Natural Sciences For the PharmD course, candidates must have obtained at least 45% marks in the qualifying examination (40% if candidates belong to a reserved category i.e. SC/ST) Must have completed at least 16 years of age at the time of admissions No upper age limit Agriculture Candidates should have passed 10+2 qualifying examination with any of the subjects for the relevant course as under – For B.Sc. (Ag.) and B.Sc. (Hort) 1. Physical Sciences 2. Biological or Natural Sciences 3. Agriculture 4. Vocational Course in Agriculture For B.V.Sc. & A.H 1. Physical sciences 2. Biological or Natural Sciences 3. Vocational Courses in Veterinary Sciences For B.F.Sc. 1. Physical Sciences 2. Biological or Natural Sciences 3. Vocational Courses in Fishery Sciences For B.Tech. (FS & T) 1. Mathematics 2. Physical Sciences or 1. Physical Sciences 2. Biological or Natural sciences Must have completed 17 years as of 31st December 2025 Upper age limit is 22 years for General, OBC and other candidates For SC/ST candidates,  25 years is the upper limit

faqs.question: Will I get into GMRIT if I am getting 5680 in the Andhra Pradesh EAMCET? I am an General female candidate.
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking admission to GMRIT through Andhra Pradesh EAMCET must acquire the released cutoff. Considering the GMRIT Andhra Pradesh EAMCET cutoff 2024 , the General Home State female category candidate stood between 7416 and 52088 . For CSE course, it stood at 7416 . After glancing over the cutoff, we can say that 5680 is more than sufficient to get into GMRIT.

data.title: GMRIT Placement Report 2024
summary: GMR Institute of Technology (GMRIT) has excellent placements. In 2024 the placement rate was 95% and 664 students securing jobs. Overall 91 companies were a part of GMRIT placements 2024. The highest package offered was INR 40 LPA , while the median salary was INR 4.55 LPA.
The 2023 placement season saw 836 students participating and 99 companies involved.The highest package was INR 52.5 LPA.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Check out more on GMR Institute of Technology - GMRIT Infrastructure in below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description:
The knowledge resource center along with nine departmental libraries collectively support the teaching, research and extension programmes of the institute. It has a subscription to online journals of IEEE (ASPP), ASME, ASCE, SPRINGER, ELSEVIER (Science Direct), MC GRAW HILL, ASTM DDigital Library, J- GATE (Engineering and Technology) and DELNET. The online journals are accessed through DELTA R5 server.
Digital library also has 60457 total volumes, 16951 titles, 1241 general educational CDs, DVDs and 475 SONET CDs, 5000 E-books including 553 Pearson education publishers.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description:
The women's hostel has two blocks Nagavali and Vamsadhara and men's hostel has five blocks Vindhya, Satpura, Aravali, Nilgiri & Himalaya.
Hostels are headed by the administrative officer whose keen observation and guidance enable the staff to discharge their duties effectively.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 917 published reviews , 797 reviews are verified.

college_info.college_name: Godavari Institute of Engineering and Technology

highlights.summary: Godavari Institute of Engineering and Technology was established in 1998. Located in Rajahmundry, Andhra Pradesh, Godavari Institute of Engineering and Technology leading institute offers Degree and Diploma courses to students in full-time mode. The institute offers various After 10th, PG and UG courses such as After 10th Diploma, B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, MCA which are taught by highly experienced faculty members. The institute's trained and experienced faculty members provide education to students in 3 major streams; Business and Management Studies, Engineering, IT and Software. The total seat intake for various courses is 2046 and the institute tries to offer education that is quite affordable to all. The fee is set in such a way that there is easy accessibility to education and eligible students get the opportunity to gain suitable knowledge and skills in their chosen field of study. Overall, the institute has fixed a fee range of INR 72,000-258,280 for which it provides great educational value and good infrastructure.
