summary.college_name: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: In 2 years, you can gain much knowledge for your career because of the lab facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: 95% of students got placed in MNC companies for 12 LPA. MNC companies visit the campus for the placement. 3 to 4 LPA is the minimum package that was placed. The highest amount of placement is 45 LPA. Design engineer and machine operator are the top roles offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is good compared to other colleges. The campus is fully Wi-Fi enabled. This campus creates valuable memories of college life. The hostel life of our college is safer than that of other colleges. The food and maintenance of our college are perfect.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are knowledgeable people, and they are good at teaching. The faculty was flexible with students and mixed with students to support the achievements of the students. It's so easy for us because the only reason is the faculty's teaching experience.
detailed_review.Other: Mechanical engineering is one of the best courses in the college, so I chose the course, and in Coimbatore itself, our college has the best placement record in mechanical engineering. In our college, it is special for technical events. Our college also gives importance to sports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: Best infrastructure and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, this is the first batch of cybersecurity, but they are providing many courses and internship opportunities, and placements are assured by the college. HCL, Infosys, and Cognizant etc., are recruiting from our college. If you are really skilled, we can get placed with a high package and build the skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are good in our department. Library has a wide variety of textbooks related to our department. About the hostel, food is good. Many sports are available on our campus, like cricket, basketball, football, and cricket ground is also available. College provides many facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers in our department are qualified, and their teaching methods are also good. Curriculum also focuses on our future. Subjects are more technical, and it is really helpful for us. Semester exams are quite easy if you prepare well, and if you are prepared, you will get a good grade. In 100, we need to get 50 to pass.
detailed_review.Other: This course is actually a very demanding course in future, and we can be placed in a very demanding package. The thing I think that needs to be improved is that the syllabus could be deeper for our course. Campus is really nature-friendly and I will be in a good atmosphere. Fests will be there for every department, and every week, there will be a flash mob, a day before their symposium, a technical fest.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college campus and infrastructure. We need to walk to travel from bus stop to college.

detailed_review.Placements: 75% of students are placed in my course. 2 LPA - 3 LPA is the lowest package placed in some companies. 41 LPA - 42 LPA is the highest package placed. Some companies in the college surrounding area are the most recruiting companies. 75-80% of students got internships from my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus is fully Wi-Fi enabled. Lab facilities are very best. Classrooms are very neat, air availability, and more space. Library is very big with two floor separate building. First year is very neat and separate from senior hostel. 2nd, 3rd, and 4th year hostel is separate into three categories (normal, deluxe, and ultra-deluxe).
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are more qualified, knowledgeable, and helpful. They are friendly with students. Most of the teachers have atleast 15 years of experience. The college teaches the students more practically. The semester exams are not more difficult. 90-95% is the pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I chose mechanical engineering because of my interest in the mechanisms of machines. Events and fests are celebrated very grandly. Government and non-government scholarships are provided in our college. College is more important than sports.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology is one of the best engineering colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology was more reputed placement college. This college provided good placement results every year. Especially, 97% of students got placed in reputed companies in 2021 passed out batch. Tech Mahindra, Infosys, IBM, TVS, and Tata Electronics, these companies visited the college campus for interviews and recruitment. They offered the highest salary packages. The salary packages range from 4 LPA - 13 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology provided good infrastructure and facilities. This college had more modern laboratories and well-equipped library facilities and more spacious classrooms available. This college hostel facilities were very good. Hostel food was very healthy and tasty. More sports grounds and coaching staffs facilities were also there at this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology had more than 15 courses. So more designed staffs working at this college. They had more than 10 years of experience in teaching professions. They conduct around 5-10 lectures every week. So 97% of students passed all semester exams. Our department staffs were very friendly people. They give more guidance to all students.
detailed_review.Other: Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology placement records were excellent. This college provided good transportation facilities. This college management conducted more sports events every year. This college celebrates more festival events like Pongal, Deepavali, Christmas, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Beyond education, our college teaches not only the subjects but also the other disciplinary.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has percentage of placements. The highest package is 44 LPA by Amazon. The average package is 10 LPA. The top recruiters are Wipro, Infosys, Cognizant, Capgemini, IBM, etc. Many students got internships in companies and also placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The computer labs are so good and have high-speed internet. The classrooms are also so good. My favourite place is library it is so good and peaceful. The quality of the food in the hostel is not bad. The canteen is also good for relaxing in your free time.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching and teachers are so nice and in an understandable way. The relevant course curriculum is good and it makes students ready for the industry. Exams are so easy for the students to take and are knowledgeable for the students. So, all get pass marks.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for my career improvement. Everything is good and knowledgeable in the course. Our college is famous for its events and fests.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Food Technology
reviews.review_title: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology has a good campus and placements for the IT field.

detailed_review.Placements: A few students get placed in food technology because they started the department a few years ago. So placements are very less but some students are placed in good companies like Aavin government, Milma, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is neat and nice. The college has a food technology lab which includes many machines for practical laboratory studies. They also provide Wi-Fi. There is a common library for all departments which is a calm and peaceful place where we can read books related to our own subject.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good, highly qualified, and knowledgeable. They provide nice lectures. Students do not get practical knowledge but theoretically, they are good. The college is autonomous so they have its own quality and standards. The course is good and highly demanded in future.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because food technology is an interesting course compared to other departments because of its subject and content. The department is completely different from others. It is highly demanded in the future. The college has good surroundings and a lot of space it is crowded with a lot of students. It organises Mallu fest, a Tamil traditional fest, and campus fest itself.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college life in Hindusthan.

detailed_review.Placements: This college provides private placement for all graduate students with a minimum package of 3 to 4 lacs per annum, and last year one student got a 48 lacs per annum package. The MNC companies visit the campus for placement, and also this college provides placement classes for the placements and interviews.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is good. It is a very green campus, and the hostel is modern. The hostel bathrooms are good, and the lab also has very advanced equipment and other things. Overall, this college's good and very nice infrastructure is best for studying in 4 years, and this campus creates a valuable memory of college life.
detailed_review.Faculty: This college faculty is very nice and kind persons, and their knowledge is teaching stylishly, which is awesome. Also, this college is autonomous, so the marking system is also flexible and transparent, and the curriculum is nice and provides coaching classes for slow learners, so it is good for studying.
detailed_review.Other: This college is very popular in Coimbatore and also famous in Tamil Nadu. I chose this college only one reason: this college is autonomous and this college also provide good sports.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: NAAC and NBA approved college. Dissatisfied with the few staffs.

detailed_review.Placements: Yes, there are a lot of placements in our college, but the companies that approach placements are not reputed companies; mostly startups are hiring students. Put your own efforts through LinkedIn and other platforms to make the chance of getting into good companies. All the best.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: You will get a high-class library experience with over 10,000 books here, but no Wi-Fi facilities. Classrooms are well ventilated, and 40% have smart class facilities. All departments had their own labs. Hostel foods are average and has okay level of hygiene. Laundry facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: As it's an autonomous institution, exams and studies are easy. The quality of staff depends on each course. Very good quality and industrially experienced staffs are also available, but some are not. You can get good knowledge from the best staff. In my experience, some staff were very friendly and shared ideas to get a good job.
detailed_review.Other: You will get all scholarships from the government side. Staff encourage you to do innovation and research work. The main thing I feel bad about the college is the culture between students. Mostly students are not focused here. So think that you are the only person trying to be good in the curriculum.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good faculty, good placements, good infrastructure, and environment.

detailed_review.Placements: I am studying Electronic and Communication Engineering in this college. Around 30-40% of students are placed in this college. The highest package is 21 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The top companies recruiting from our college are Hexaware, Cognizant, TCS, IBM, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is good, with a nice environment and many labs available. The quality of education is good. The canteens in the college are satisfactory, while the hostel food is average. This college encourages all sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in this college are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are friendly toward students and very supportive. The course curriculum is relevant to the students and teachers, making students ready for the industry. The semester exams are designed according to the preparation of students; some find them easy while others feel they are hard.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to grow my career in this sector and become successful.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Faculty are friendly and the campus is very jolly.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement record of this college is not very good. Only 45% of students get placed, and the lowest salary package is 1.8 lacs per annum, with the highest being 4 LPA. Most students have to find their own internships. The top recurring company is Tata Consultancy Services. Most roles offered are in IT services and manufacturing companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms in this college are well-equipped with smart boards, which makes teaching and learning easy. The labs are well-equipped with the latest equipment. The hostels provide separate beds and bathroom facilities. Sports are an important part of college life, and the college provides excellent sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers at this college are very experienced, with most having more than 10 to 15 years of teaching experience. They use smart boards that have everything they need to teach the lessons. The curriculum is revised every four years to keep it industry-ready. The college has a pass percentage of 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose to study Electronic and Communication Engineering because it has strong features for the upcoming years. The field of chip and embedded systems is growing fast, and I want to be part of that growth. I also like that there are events and fests every month.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Overall best College for MCA Course.

detailed_review.Placements: Many students were placed in our course. The placement rate is around 75%. The minimum pay package is 5 LPA, and the maximum is 30 LPA. The average pay package is 15 LPA. Top employers include Cognizant (CTS). Depending on the field, we get internships in related companies like Cognizant, Uniq Technologies, and Vertical Teach. Recommended top roles are Software Engineer and Analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The overall infrastructure of the college is excellent, and the hostel is also clean. There is a food problem in the hostel. Otherwise, it is good, and the hostel has many facilities, like playing games, etc. The hostel is cleaned daily, so it is very clean. Medical facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They are knowledgeable and experienced. They are very friendly and highly qualified. They teach many lessons in a simple way so that all students can understand the lessons easily. More than 85% of students pass the university exam.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Agricultural Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best engineering college in Coimbatore.

detailed_review.Placements:
Our college provides placement based on the students performance and the department they are in. The top recruiting companies in my college is Zoho, HCL, TCS, Wipro, CTS, Infosys, etc. The average salary package expected in placement is 300000–800000. We need to choose internship programs based on what domain you are in.
I studied agriculture engineering so the companies for placement is Mahindra and Jain Irrigation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The infrastructure of the college is good and the college area is around 200 acres, so there is plenty of space in the campus. Canteens and cafes are also there so going out with your friends is pretty good. There is no Wi-Fi in my department, but the library is good; plenty of books are available and the library ambience is also good.
The hostel is okay, I would say and the food is bad.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The facilities are good and well-equipped. The teaching method is also very interactive. The only problem is that the lecturing is in Tamil. If you don't know Tamil, we need to clear up any doubt. But you can ask anything with teachers; they will help you in any time and they are friendly. I studied agriculture engineering because it's an emerging one; without food, there is no survival so agricultural engineering helps the farmers modernize their farming and they will get profit.
Agriculture engineering is easy compared to other engineering so it is easy to pass.
detailed_review.Other:
I chose agriculture engineering because in my home agricultural practice is there and we have agriculture machinery, so I chose this course
If they include field visits very often, then we can understand the problems of the farmers.
If you are coming to Hindustan, this is the main advantage of the festival and celebration. This year, we will have 6–8 celebrations, and it's another level. Scholarships you can absolutely get if you are SC or ST. You can submit that certificate in college and you will get scholarships.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology Review

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are very good. A minimum of 50% of students got placements in our college, with many companies visiting. Most students secured internships through the college, and many got placed on campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. The atmosphere is pleasant. Sports are emphasized, and both boys' and girls' hostels are available. The food is okay, and the college provides good lab facilities. The library is also available on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff have a minimum of 10 years of experience. The teaching quality is very good, and the faculty members are approachable and not overly strict. Industrial visits are organized by the college.
detailed_review.Other: Sports are a significant focus at the college. Free Wi-Fi is available, and scholarships are offered. Students with a 7.5 reservation get full fees waived.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Get your best career in everything.

detailed_review.Placements: In the Electronics and Communication department, most companies offer a minimum salary package of 7 LPA for skilled students. Some students seek IT fields even though they are studying in the electronics domain. Looking at the past years, the percentage of placements from the department has increased by 10%, reaching about 88%. Many multinational companies are coming to the college for placements. The highest package till now is about 15 LPA from a company named Cadence. The lowest expected package is about 4 LPA. Most core companies offer a job role of intern circuit designer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has 165 acres of green campus consisting of the College of Engineering, Institute of Technology, Architecture Campus, Polytechnic, MBA, and various hostels. The college has a separate first-year hostel, making the campus largely free from ragging. Various idea labs are inside the campus. Companies like IBM, Intel, Eicher, and Royal Enfield have separate facilitated labs here. All the labs have fully equipped Wi-Fi connections and are air-conditioned. There are many canteens inside the campus. The college hostel provides free Wi-Fi to students and offers hostel rooms in three different suites: economy, deluxe, and ultra deluxe. The college campus includes an ATM, canteens, and indoor and outdoor sports grounds, etc. Moreover, the college is NAAC accredited with a grade of A+, and the department is NBA accredited.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college is an autonomous institution, so the syllabus is designed by the faculty members of this college and approved by Anna University. The syllabus covers only the important topics a student should study, avoiding unnecessary loads. Only relevant topics are taught in the classes, allowing students to focus more on their practical knowledge. As we know, practical knowledge is crucial for engineering. The syllabus is based on real-world applications, providing students with industrial exposure while they pursue the course. Students can pass the exam with a percentage of 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the Electronics and Communication field because of my personal interest in telecommunication technologies. The college provides the best in that domain for students. College cultural programs are one of the main attractions of the college. Many cultural and technical programs are held at the college. Every department has its own tech symposiums to provide industrial exposure. Additionally, there are many scholarship schemes available for students. There are about 6,000 students on the campus, and the transportation facility is agile.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Food Technology
reviews.review_title: A college where you can enjoy your campus life without strict rules and regulations.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are lower when compared to other courses. But the job opportunities we get are vast. The course itself has some good scope. Food analyst, quality controller, and food inspector are some of the of the major roles available for our course. The scope for this course is widely available outside India. A greater number of food technologists are needed in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am not a hosteller, but I've heard my friends say that the infrastructure of the hostel is good. However, the food there is considerably less than good and needs some improvement. The hostel wardens are strict and consider timing to be an integral part.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are really amazing. Most of them have completed their Ph.D. in their respective fields. They are very friendly towards the students and interaction with the teachers is never really a problem. The staff are really cool, and you can discuss anything with them apart from your academic part. They provide guidance regarding placements and other competitive exams and also give training to crack those exams as well.
detailed_review.Other: Even though the campus life and experience are good, there are not so many festivals celebrated in our college. Only one of them is celebrated. Onam is the only festival celebrated. It would be a lot better if other festivals were also celebrated. I would suggest celebrating festivals like Diwali and Pongal, which are major Tamil festivals.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: A heaven to learn the world's things .

detailed_review.Placements: About 90 percent of students were placed at many companies and the highest package at my college is 14 LPA and the lowest package at my college is 7 LPA. My college presents top companies like Amazon, Flipkart, Infosys, IBM, etc. About 80 to 90 percent of students get internships at many companies. Based on the students skills, they hire HR and manager positions for the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, the infrastructure is so pleasant to see, and for my department, the labs have AC, the classrooms have a projector display, the Wi-Fi is too smooth and the library is very large and quiet to study in, with lots of books to learn. The foods in the hostel were too good to eat, the hostel mess was too clean and my college has the best sports compared to other colleges.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers were well trained and qualified and their teaching style is brilliant for learning, and they make the students industry-ready. The semester is not too difficult because the teachers teaching is too good to learn and understand. So the exams are easy to score.
detailed_review.Other: Because of the placement, I am attracted to join the college and the best thing personally for me is that the IT jobs are more like work from home so I chose the course and the main thing is my software knowledge. The campus is too good and pleasant to enjoy, and they provide lots of extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Review of Hindustan college of engineering and technology.

detailed_review.Placements: We are able to get a lot of internship opportunities before completing our studies. The highest, the lowest and average package offered by recruiters will be 15 lacs, 3 Lacs and 5 lacs per annum, respectively. Nearly 89% of students got placed by 2023 records.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As our college is famous for it's academic and placement performances,. There are a variety of foods that should be served regularly on a specific menu. Students are encouraged to play their interested sports with all the facilities. And our hostels are provided with facilities like water purifiers, Tv and relaxing rooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: They were very strict, and they gave on-duty to our students after several requests. They wanted everyone to clear the semester examinations with good marks, so they concentrated more on academics like completing portions on time than extracurricular activities like cultural events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: HICET review after 3 years of studying here.

detailed_review.Placements: When I joined, about 96% of students had been placed and there were many big companies that had come to the college. The average CTC was about 3.5–4.5 LPA, and the highest salary package was 15 LPA. They also provide internships with training in some of the start-up companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel has full functional Wi-Fi and good accommodation and they also provide filters for each floor. The food was really bad; you can have that type of food while you are coming from another state and the power supply won't stop and has a great power backup.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is so nice, the course curriculum is so nice and they provide a great 2019 regulation, which is the latest syllabus and they provide the latest teach update to study. The syllabus is so easy to catch and easy to understand and the faculty also make it simple to understand.
detailed_review.Other: The pass-out batch was the 2024 batch, and because of the Corona batch, they have a higher past placement percentage compared to the holder batches.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with facilities and tier behaviour. Placements can be improved.

detailed_review.Placements:
1. 70% of students were placed in EIE course.
2. The highest package is 15 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA, average package is 6 to 8 LPA.
3. Infosys, Tata Motors and Steel, Mahindra, CTS, HP, L&T, HCL, WIPRO, Mu Sigma, Payoda, etc.
4. 80% students have got their internship in PL, Technip, Lurgi, Bechtel, etc.
5. Control engineer, Instrumentation engineer, design engineer, assistant engineer, control system, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
1. They have a separate block for each course with high facilities and good infrastructure with Unlimited Wi-Fi, digital classrooms, library with 1000+ books.
2. They have a high-tech building with Wi-Fi, the quality of food is good in the canteen and mess, they have medical facilities, conduct more tournaments, and help to participate in other college sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty:
1. The teachers are always ready to help, their qualification is PG, M.A., etc. They have 10 years of teaching experience.
2. EIE curriculum is relevant to electrical, electronics, instrumentation, IT, designing, etc.
3. The exams are easy, the teachers help us to score good marks. The percentage for pass mark is above 40%.
detailed_review.Other:
1. I selected this course because it had high demand in the future. This course has limited seats in college.
2. This course is offered by few colleges. Improve this course in more colleges.
3. The events are KORSHAN, Hilaricas, KAISER, BIOTRONZ, Schockaeronz, symposiums, ELZIA, webinars, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Hindusthan college of engineering and technology is overall a good college.

detailed_review.Placements: Hindusthan college of engineering and technology is good in placement. Placement training staff gives training to all the students. 7th semester students are eligible for campus interviews. Many reputed companies offer jobs. Salary packages range from 2-12LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hindusthan college of engineering and technology has more than 15 number of courses. Many separate departments and laboratories are available. Many computer laboratories are there with internet facilities. This college has the biggest hostel. Mess and canteen facilities are also available at this college. Food quality is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They treat all the students equally. They are knowledgeable and experienced. They very friendly and highly qualified. They teach many lessons simply so that all the students easily understand the lessons. Above 90% students pass in the university exams.
detailed_review.Other: Medical facilities are also available for this college. Hostel food is very hygienic. This college conducts many events every month.

admission.title: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Hindusthan College of Engineering & Technology admission is primarily entrance-based. The college offers courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels in the fields of Engineering, Technology, and IT. Candidates seeking admission can visit the official website of the college to apply online. Hindusthan College of Engineering & Technology Coimbatore ( HICET ) provides the programmes in affiliation with Anna University . The courses are offered across several specialisations in full-time and regular modes. Interested students can read the following article to learn about the courses, fees, eligibility, and admission procedure of HICET.

faqs.question: Can I join Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology without TNEA?
faqs.answer: No Its not possible to get into Hindusthan college without TNEA. Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology does not have any such provison in which the students can get admission without going through entrance test of TNEA. One needs to attempt TNEA if he/she aims to take admission in Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology's B.Tech course. But, yes for other courses like MBA/PGDM its TANCET MBA which is required. Also, for MCA its graduation with 50 percent along with TANCET which is mandatory.

faqs.question: What is the total tuition fees for Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA course?

This tuition fee can be charged on either per semester basis or per annum basis. The model of fees is decided by the Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology fees policy. faqs.question: How do I get a seat at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology offers a large diversity of courses to students in various fields. Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology admissions are held on the basis of entrance tests. Students seeking course admissions must clear their previous qualifying examination and appear for any of the prescribed entrance exams such as TNEA, TANCET, MATE, GATE, among others. Students can visit the official website to learn more regarding the course-wise eligibility and specialisation details.

faqs.question: What percentage should we get in Class 12 to be eligible for the BTech at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for B.Tech at Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology, the following criteira is mandate.  One must be of Science background and must have physics, maths and chemistry in their 11th and 12th. Along with the specification in stream, the students must also have an aggregate percentage of 50% minimum or above in their 12th boards. After having the above mentioned scores and specifications, the student is eligible to take up the entrance test for the course of B.Tech.

faqs.question: What is the application fee for the M.Tech programme at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: The application fee for the M.Tech programme at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology is INR 1200/-The M.Tech program at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology is obtainable primarily based on the entrance examination marks conducted through Anna University & Association of Management of Coimbatore Anna University Affiliated Colleges. The eligibility standards for Indian nationals encompass a minimum of 50% marks for General Category, 45% for Backward Class, 40% for MBC & DNC, and forty% for SC/SCA/ST. The choice system for the M.Tech application entails the entrance examination marks, which include TANCET, CET, or GATE, performed by means of the relevant authorities. The software ambitions to provide enterprise-geared up schooling via a rigorous curriculum and practical schooling opportunities.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to take BTech admission at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: Admission to BTech engineering programme is granted on the base of marks in the qualifying examination followed by Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions( TNEA).The minimal eligibility for admission to BE/BTech is a pass in 10 plus 2 with Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics as main subjects. Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology( HICET), Chennai was established in 2000. It's an independent council. The council offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in different specializations. The undergraduate course isB.E for the duration of 4-years. Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology BTech Admissions will open soon for the 2024 academic session.

faqs.question: What is the admission process of Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: In order to get admitted in Hindustan College of Engineering and Technology,   the student needs to fill out the registration forms for TNEA and pass it as it's the sole entrance examination through which HICET admits it's students. These are the subject necessary for a  student to have in class 12th like maths, physics and chemistry along with and aggregate score of 50%. After clearing the TNEA , the student will take part in counselling session along with others and will be interviewed personally.

faqs.question: Does Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology refund fees?
faqs.answer: As per the official website of Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology the Fee Refund Policies: 30% of the total fees will be withheld if a registration is canceled within 15 days of the registration date. 50% of the registration fees will be subtracted if you cancel your registration after 15 days but before 30 days. After 30 days of registration, there is no return for cancellations.

faqs.question: What score is needed for admission to various courses offered at Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: These are the admission criteria : MBA : Bachelor's degree with minimum 50% aggregate MCA : Bachelor's degree with minimum 50% aggregate ME : BE/BTech with minimum 50% aggregate

faqs.question: Can we join Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology BTech without JEE?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can join Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology BTech without any JEE Main score. As per the admission guidelines sanctioned by HICET admission to the BTech course is subject to the last qualifying exam and entrance exam score. The College accepts multiple entrance exams other than the EE Main exam. Candidates with exam scores in HTSEE or TS EAMCET are eligible for the BTech course at HICET.

faqs.question: What is the Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA application fee?
faqs.answer: The Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA application fee is around INR 1,200. Further, the candidates are alsp required to pay the TANCET 2025 application fees, since candidates are required to apply for the exam. The fee for  categories and reserved categories was hiked to INR 1000 and INR 500, respectively. *This information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: Is Hindustan College good for MBA?
faqs.answer: Whether Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology (HICET) is good for MBA or not, candidates can find the answer by reading more about the college. Located in Coimbatore, Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology is an AICTE-approved College in affiliation with Anna University. Hindusthan College of Engineering is accredited with an ‘A’ Grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). It is also accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). The college offers MBA as an fulltime PG programme. The overall fee for the MBA programme is INR 35,000. As for the placement the highest package offered recently during Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA placements 2023 stood at INR 6 LPA . It can be concluded that Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology (HICET) offers a good return of investment for its MBA programme.

faqs.question: What is the validity of TANCET scores?
faqs.answer: TANCET scores are valid for a period of one year. Candidates aspiring for admission in 2023-24 exam session can only use the TANCET 2023 scores for admission. Candidates who wish for an MBA Admission in any of the TANCET participating colleges in 2024-25 batch must appear for TANCET 2024. Irrespective of the 2023 score, DTE Tamil Nadu will not consider the TANCET 2023 scores for 2024 admission. Similarly, candidates planning to apply for MBA Admission in 2025-26 batch, must apply for the TANCET 2025 exam.

faqs.question: Which BTech specialisations does Hindustan University offer?
faqs.answer: At the UG level, Hindustan University offers a four-year BTech course across 15 specialisations, including two specialisations, which are offered in collaboration with IBM. faqs.question: What are the factors affecting TANCET cutoff scores for admission to the Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA?
faqs.answer: For admission to Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA course, candidates are required to secure a valid cutoff in the TANCE exam. Admission authorities at TANCET participating colleges prepare the cutoff list for MBA Admission. TANCET cutoff is determined considering several factors. However, the cutoff scores are not released before the admission process. TANCET cutoff ranks and cutoff scores are released with the counselling details of the subsequent admission session. The factors determining the TANCET cutoff marks include - Difficulty level of exam - Previous cutoff trends - Number of test takers - Reservation criteria - Number of seat available for admission.

faqs.answer: No, its not hard to get into Hindusthan College as you'll just have to attempt their entrance test or any other specified National level test and qualify it in order to get admission in Hindustan College of engineering and Technology. The admission in Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology would be based on merit, entrance test examination scores and +2 HSC marks. The students in  Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology have to get a minimum score of 50% or above in class 12th in maths, physics and chemistry. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Which BTech specialisations does Hindustan University offer?
faqs.answer: At the UG level, Hindustan University offers a four-year BTech course across 15 specialisations, including two specialisations, which are offered in collaboration with IBM. These specialisations are Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Aeronautical Engineering, I nformation Technology, Biomedical Engineering , Aerospace Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics Engineering, Automobile Engineering, Biotechnology, Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, CSE (in collaboration with IBM), etc. These specialisations are further divided into multiple sub-specialisations. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What are the factors affecting TANCET cutoff scores for admission to the Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA?
faqs.answer: For admission to Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology MBA course, candidates are required to secure a valid cutoff in the TANCE exam. Admission authorities at TANCET participating colleges prepare the cutoff list for MBA Admission. TANCET cutoff is determined considering several factors. However, the cutoff scores are not released before the admission process. TANCET cutoff ranks and cutoff scores are released with the counselling details of the subsequent admission session. The factors determining the TANCET cutoff marks include - Difficulty level of exam - Previous cutoff trends - Number of test takers - Reservation criteria - Number of seat available for admission. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

placement_faqs.answer: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology (HICET) in Coimbatore boasts a solid MBA placement rating of 8.5/10. Reviews highlight the college's robust infrastructure and quality education, leading to a strong placement success rate of 70–80%. An 80% placement rate for MBA students, with salary packages ranging from 3.5 LPA to an impressive 15 LPA. Top recruiters like IBM and Zoho actively participate. In 2023, HICET recorded a the highest MBA placement package of INR 6 LPA, maintaining high On-Campus and Off-Campus placement rates of 92% and 75%, respectively. The college's inclusive approach accommodates students with arrears, providing opportunities with companies like Infosys, TCS, Mahindra, Dell, HP, and Citron.

college_info.college_name: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology Photos & Videos

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Check out more on Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology Infrastructure in the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: HICET library is fully automated houses a rich stock of more than 61,700 volumes of books, 179 national journals and 180 international journals, 10727-E-journals, no.of titles are 14321, 25 national magazines and has subscribed to 8 newspapers.The library has a seating capacity of 300 persons. Photocopying and networking facility is available in digital library. Library is well equipped with modern facilities and resources in the form of books, printed and electronic journals, CD-ROMs, on-line databases, audio video cassettes, and project reports etc. Open Access System is being followed to access the books and journals.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The hostels for boys and girls are separately built with all basic amenities. Wi-Fi facility is available in both the hostels. Mess facility which caters to students from all over South India and abroad is also provided to the students.

facilities.name: Sports Complex
facilities.description: The college has provided vast playing fields which includes sports apart frm the mentioned sports such as kabaddi, kho – kho, athletics.The Tennis and Basketball courts are having well tended synthetic flooring.An Indoor stadium is also available for Badminton, Table Tennis, Carom and Chess. Martial sport such as boxing, judo, taekwondo and silambam facility is also available in the campus.

college_info.college_name: IES College of Technology

highlights.summary: IES College of Technology was established in year 2007 and is located in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. It offers courses at UG, PG and After 10th levels with highly experienced faculty in Full Time mode. Approved by the AICTE, the institute offers multiple courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, MBA/PGDM, M.E./M.Tech and After 10th Diploma courses. Furthermore, it offers several specialisations in the fields of Business & Management Studies and Engineering. IES College of Technology offers these courses within the range of INR 84,000-2,40,000 with the intent to provide education at highly affordable fees. The institute offers 1512 seats, encouraging more candidates to gain knowledge and enhance their skills.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, very low cost with high quality of education and a disciplined college.

detailed_review.Placements: It has decent placements, but not too much to expect, but it allows you to give, so it's on you. You can find a lot of opportunities here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good classrooms and infrastructure, good quality of food in canteens. You can find the labs of BEEE Computer Chemistry and every needed lab. Sports facilities, NCC training, and a lot of events and seminar sessions with some of the top professionals in your field.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty member is supportive, and they are always there to help you. There are very friendly staff, well-educated, and sports coaches in every field. This college makes you ready for the industries with its programs like TCS and many more.
detailed_review.Other: Everything is good, and you have to study well because it gives you all the opportunities to achieve your goals. Events like hackathons, business ideas, and a lot of events, and also very good in sports like go-karting, bike racing, cricket, and all.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of the good placements and infrastructure in this price range.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who placed in the year 2024 is somewhat disappointing. The highest package offered in 2024 was 21 LPA, and the average package for CSE was 4–5 LPA. The top recruiting companies included HCL, Infosys, Wipro, TCS, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is pretty good. The campus is enabled with high-speed Wi-Fi. The classrooms and library are good enough. The hostel facilities are satisfying, as they provide good rooms and the mess food is satisfying to students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are helpful, as they provide good quality education and are knowledgeable. The course curriculum makes students industry-ready. When we talk about the semester exams, they can be passed with ease if studied properly. Almost 70–80% of students pass the semester exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A truth about my college .

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 60% students are placed in this college. And the highest package of this college 21 LPA and average package 6 to 10 LPA and the lowest package of this college 3 to 4 LPA. And company are tcs, juspay, capsimany, and Mahendra and so on. And. College provide internship .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College facilities is good and also infrastructure is good labs are available in this college and libraries is available and college hostel are avarage and not big hostel food is good medical facilities and sports are provide from college.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college teacher helped all students and knowledge are to good of all teachers and high professional teachers in this college. And trend all students for industries. Semester exams are held at every six months. The difficult level of exam is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because of placement. Events snd FEAT are organized periodically.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A truth about my college.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students were placed in this college. The highest package was 21 LPA, the lowest package was 3 LPA, and the average package was 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Infosys, TCS, Virtusa, and Juspay. Many students received internship opportunities from companies such as Juspay, TCS, and Microsoft.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classroom infrastructure is good. It is well-equipped with Wi-Fi in corridors and labs. The hostel facilities are of good quality. The food in the mess is of excellent quality and hygiene. Medical facilities are also available in the hostel. Sports equipment is available as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is of the best quality. Course curriculum makes the students job-ready. Semester exams are held every six months. The difficulty of the semester exam is moderate. The passing percentage is 90-94%.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because of placement. Events and festivals are organized periodically. Inforia and ignite are big events.

detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good. Classrooms have well-functioning fans, smart boards, and labs. The hostel offers facilities such as beds, self-study areas, and more. The food quality in the hostel is good. Only a boys' hostel is available in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is good enough. The course curriculum makes students job-ready. Semester exams are every six months. The difficulty of semester exams is moderate. The passing percentage is 90–94%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of placements. This course makes students job-ready. Events and fests are organized periodically. Inforia and Ignite are held every year.

college_info.college_name: IIIT Guwahati: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placement, Cutoff

highlights.summary:
IIIT Guwahati, Assam, was founded in 2013 by the Ministry of Human Resource Development. IIITG was pronounced as an "Institute of National Importance" under the Parliament Act 2017. The IIIT Guwahati campus is situated on an area of 67 acres. IIIT Guwahati offers courses in Bachelor of Technology, Master of Technology, and Doctorate in Philosophy programmes. IIIT Guwahati admission to the BTech programme is through JEE Main score.
Admission to Indian Institute of Information Technology, Guwahati, programmes is majorly entrance-based. Admission for the flagship programme, BTech, students is done by appearing for JEE Main, for which a seat allotment process is carried out by JoSAA/ CSAB. According to the official website, the highest package and average package received in placements 2025 were INR 71 LPA and INR 16.75 LPA, respectively. Around 138 students got placed, and 161 offers were made in the IIIT Guwahati placements 2025. The teaching faculty at the IIIT Silchar campus is highly experienced and qualified and has graduated from prominent institutions. Indian Institute of Information Technology Guwahati highlights have been provided below in the table:
Check out more on IIIT Guwahati Highlights in the below video:

college_info_program.intro:
The flagship programmes offered at Indian Institute of Information Technology Guwahati are BTech and MTech. The institute offers these programmes to students at the UG and PG levels. Further, the institute offers these programmes for a duration of 4 and 2 years, respectively with a comprehensive curriculum. IIIT Guwahati courses strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college in the Northeast after IIT Guwahati to join.

detailed_review.Placements: We do have a placement cell at our institute which brings many companies to the institute for placements and internships. The placement cell motivates the students to do internships so that they will get good work exposure and experience. It helps students find jobs more easily.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus totally covers an area of nearly 70 acres. The total campus is lush green. We have one administrative building where daily classes go on and are equipped with labs and the library. There are three boys hostels, two girls hostels, and one faculty member's residential building. We do find many food stalls around the campus and a student activity center.
detailed_review.Faculty: The academic curriculum here is good and updated according to present-day trends. The institute is also planning to set up an artificial intelligence and robotics lab, keeping the future in view. The entry requirement to this institute requires getting a good percentile in JEE Main, and my motive to enroll in this program is the strong academic foundation provided here.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this institute as I have an interest in doing computer science and engineering from a well-esteemed institute, which motivated me to take up this institute. My overall experience here has been good, and the academics here are good. One should compromise on too many cultural fests and an entertaining environment prevailing here. We also got opportunities to play sports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good faculty members, good placements in 2025, infrastructure, and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement cell in our institute has been working hard and is now almost at its peak. Due to COVID-19, placements have decreased, but as each year passes, it is getting an exponential curve upwards. The cell considers every student and helps each one of them. Talking about internships and placements off campus, a lot of students even is placed in companies like Google, Microsoft, Nvidia, and ISRO as well (a lot more but these were on top of my mind). Average placement is above 17 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus of the Indian Institute of Information Technology is very big. The infrastructure is also very good. There are many classrooms in college. Classrooms are equipped with AC. There is a single library. There is a town hall in which we enjoy many cultural programs. There are two canteens on our college campus and mini canteens outside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course student is computer science and engineering department at the Indian Institute of Information Technology Guwahati. My motive for choosing this institute was its good academic curriculum, its infrastructure, its facilities, the sports opportunities, etc. This is also good for playing cricket so I chose this Institute. To enter this Institute you need to score well in JEE Main and then participate in counseling. There are two exams, 1 middle semester exam and one at the end of each semester. The academy is very structured to provide you the exposure to real-life challenges.
detailed_review.Other: Overall rating Indian Information Technology Guwahati is an institute of national importance. It is situated in the heart city of Assam Guwahati. My college is a dream college of millions of students. This institute is very good and its infrastructure is just amazing which is not found in other institutions. This is one of the reasons why I chose this institute. The other reasons include coding culture, placement, intensive opportunities, etc. These factors drive my attention to this college. My branch is computer science and engineering at the Indian Institute of Information Technology Guwahati.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of its good teachers, decent placements, and super college life.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 85% of students got placed overall. More than 60% of ECE students got placed and got very high packages. The highest package is 80 LPA. The average package for the ECE branch ranges from 12 LPA - 13 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Nvidia Information, EDGE, Gamecroft, etc. Over 50% of students got internships from our course in top companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Google, and JP Morgan. Top roles offered are machine learning engineer, research and development engineer, and software analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is decent enough. There is one hostel room with an attached washroom, desk, chair, and cupboard for 2 people in the library. There is availability of journals and other books. Labs are equipped with everything. Wi-Fi is available everywhere. Classrooms have whiteboards as well as a projector for smart learning. Mess is available in the hostel itself. There is a medical shop just outside the campus and a 24/7 available ambulance in case of emergencies. Both indoor and outdoor games are available like chess, table tennis, cricket, football, carrom, etc. There is availability of gym with equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified. They have done their PhDs from prestigious colleges like IIT and Heidelberg University. Their teaching quality and methods are great and efficient. The course curriculum is very much relevant and helps with real-life industry problems. The difficulty of the exams ranges from easy to medium, and mostly all students pass the exam.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has a decent college life and is good to study in.

detailed_review.Placements: As of April 30, 2024, IIIT Guwahati placed 62.5% of CSE students in its 2024 batch. The highest salary package offered reached 52 LPA, and the average salary being offered was 15.26 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Amazon, Atlassian, Cisco, DE Shaw, Deloitte, DeltaX, and Flipkart. Roles offered are software engineer, full stack developer, DevOps engineer, product manager, and a few others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is good in the academic building but it is not reliable in the hostels. Labs are decent, and the classrooms are quite comfortable. Library has a decent seating area. The hostel is good, but the food served is not good. In terms of medical facilities, we have an ambulance. There is a gym, badminton court, table tennis, carrom, chess, cricket, and football facilities available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is quite good. We have guest lecturers from IIT Guwahati. The course design is very good. Exams are not very hard , one can pass by a one-night study. But regular classes are important. There is no such pass percentage because it is all relative grading.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A review on our campus: IIITG.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has a separate placement cell, which helps students get jobs. The percentage of students who got placed is 97 percent, with the highest package of 120 LPA and an average of 17 LPA. The companies that are recruiting are Amazon, TCS, Filpkart, Games craft, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Our campus was spread across 67 acres, including an academic block, two boys hostels, one girl hostel, 1 faculty block, a student activity center, and a lake. Facilities in our campus included 1Gbps Wi-Fi, large collections of books in library, etc.
An ambulance was available 24/7 with a medical kit. Students activity centre consists of gym, badminton court, table tennis, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty was well experienced and had completed their Ph.D. from top colleges in India like IIT and NIT, etc. They were very friendly with students, which helped to clear up any doubts. The course is very relevant and helps you get placed at a top college. The semester exam is quite difficult to get a 9+ CGPA but it can be achieved with hard work.
detailed_review.Other: Our college conducts many fests frequently and students participate very actively. Scholarships are available for students and eligible students can apply through NSP portals.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A glimpse of IIIT GUWAHATI.

detailed_review.Placements: A total of 93 percent of the students get placed on our campus and the highest package offered is 1.2 crore, the lowest is around 6 lakh, and the average package is 17.2 lakh. the top recruiting companies involve Flipkart, Walmart and Amazon, and around 60–70% get internships from Microsoft and other companies. The roles offered when they do a full-time job get recruited as HR and are offered good positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The complete campus is Wi-Fi enabled, the labs are well-equipped, the classrooms are well maintained, and they are digital classrooms. In the library, you can find all the books related to your academics and other books based on your interests. The mess food can be eaten and the hostel rooms are well maintained. In the room, we get a bed and a fan with attached washrooms. The mess food quality is okay, and we have quite a few canteens across the campus. The first-aid facility is readily available. For emergencies, you have an institute ambulance.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are highly qualified and did their PhDs at well-regarded colleges and they do teach well and have a grip over the subject they teach. The curriculum is quite relevant and gets updated according to industry trends. The semester exams in the college are of moderate level and can be cracked with good preparation.
detailed_review.Other: I had an interest in the field of computers, which motivated me to take up this course. We have two events called Yuvaan and Entropy, and the scholarships for this campus can be availed of on NSP portals for those who are eligible.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It will be an amazing college in the upcoming years.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest and average package offered during IIIT Guwahati B.Tech placements in 2023 stood at INR 120 LPA and INR 15.5 LPA, respectively, the placement rate recorded during IIITG B.Tech. placements in 2023 is 89.19%. Apart from this, 191 job offers are made.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has an air-conditioned academic building that is open 24/7 and labs are kept open for students to study in, the library at our college is well-equipped with books and materials needed by students. The college provides 5G Wi-Fi and a table connection. Labs are well-equipped too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members present on campus are all PhDs and well-trained people. They solve doubts on a regular basis and help you a lot during exam times. The curriculum, though tough, is suitable for future studies as well. Exams are held daily, dividing your eight semesters into mid-semester and end-of-semester sections.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with faculty, good placements, and simple infrastructure .

detailed_review.Placements:
91% of students were placed in my course.
The highest average was 45 lpa, while the lowest average was 11 lpa.
80% of students got internships.
There are many companies that offer the best jobs. Some of these companies are Amazon, Google, Flipkart, etc. So placement-wise, it is a very good college to join. This is the main reason I joined here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
All facilities are available: 24 hours of Wi-Fi, 18 hours of library access, etc. 
We had a canteen in the academic block and a night canteen. The food available here is mainly North Indian food, twice a week: chicken and fish. For vegetarians, they provide paneer and potatoes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, teachers are helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. They teach simply so that every student can understand, which makes the students industry-ready. Exams were very hard to crack and the pass percentage changed timely so there was no fixed value. It was really hard to crack exams .
detailed_review.Other:
The best thing about my course was that I could create my own circuits. 
There are many events, like Freshers, Entropy, Yuvaan, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good academic life but not campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: On average, 92% of total students are placed (both on campus and off campus). More than 70% of students get internships in their third year. The average package is of 17 LPA. The highest placement is 84 LPA in 2024. Companies like Amazon, Ola, and Zomato provide placements here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Since the campus is still under construction, most of these facilities are not available. But hostels are good and mess food is up to the mark. You can have a nice academic life. 24*7 Wi-Fi, electricity, and water supply are available. The sports complex is also undergoing construction.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are taken regularly here, including theory and lab practicals. The difficulty level is average and passing criteria depend on individual faculty. Also, 75% attendance is compulsory; otherwise, you are not allowed in any exams. These rules are strictly followed.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The information you should have before getting admission in iiitg.

detailed_review.Placements: I just don't know about the placements in the college since I was in first year, but as much as I have heard from seniors and others, I came to a conclusion that placements are good enough with an average package of 17 LPA.  Lots of national and multinational companies visit the campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus is new so there is still some development to be made by the college. The management of college is doing its best to make a better campus everyday. The hostel is good and the infrastructure is not as good as IIT but it is enough.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members are passed from Ph.D. course of iits. They are very knowledgeable people but still lack some study experience since they are very young. Still they are teaching very good but yes there is a lot of study pressure .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A student's opinion on IIITG.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students in my course is 92.5. The highest package offered this year is 1.2 crore. The average package offered is 17 Lacs. The top recruiting companies are tekion, gameskraft, amazon, Juspay and Jio. The top roles offered in our course are SDE roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Academic block is equipped with Wi-Fi. There are labs for CSE students as well as for ECE students. There is a library in the institute. The books in the library are sufficient for the course. The hostel rooms are good. Each room in the hostel is shared by two people. The mess food is hygienic and tasty. There are canteens in both academic block and hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are good. Most of the teachers have completed their Ph.D.  from IITs. They are always ready to help the students. The course curriculum is relevant. The course curriculum makes the students industry ready. The course syllabus is modified and updated whenever needed.
detailed_review.Other: The best things about the course is it is always suitable for the industry requirements. The annual fest is yuvaan. The annual teach fest is entropy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely very great for its curriculum and its average placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course about 70 students are there. But in fourth year, students are starting to give placement tests. They are appearing in almost all the tests and are practicing more and more from the coding platform like geeks for geeks, codeforces, as well as codechef.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Some buildings are yet to be made like there is no clubs and no gymkhana. Even the students have to go outside the campus for gym etc. There is no proper ground for football basketball. Only for cricket is present. Also the roads are full of ditches and no well furnished.
detailed_review.Faculty: Of course the faculty of our college is superb. They are all Ph.D. holders from different institutes like iits and nits. But they are too much polite and helpful. The curriculum of our college is comparable to curriculum of iits. They make too much hard question papers.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides impressive placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are awesome. They are gradually increasing year by year. For CSE, the placement percentage is above 90%, and for ECE, it is 80-90%. The highest salary package offered is 120 LPA in CSE. It can even be more now. The average salary package offered is more than 16 LPA. The average salary package offered for CSE students is more than 18 LPA. Many companies like Amazon, Gameskraft, Atlassian, etc., attend placement sessions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Library is small, but students can use CSE labs for study purposes. Labs have top-notch infrastructure. Classrooms are awesome. Wi-Fi is good enough. The entire academic block has top-notch infrastructure with centralised air-conditioning. Hostel rooms are better than some IIT hostels. Mess food is not good. Medical facilities are weak. In the coming years, sports facilities will be upgraded. Work is currently going on.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are highly qualified. They are very helpful to the students. Our college encourages student-teacher interaction. The teaching quality is top-notch. The greatest thing about our institute is the curriculum is updated every year to make it student-friendly. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are somewhat hard. If you revise the concepts every day for a minimum of 1 hour, you can easily get a CGPA of more than 9. Relative grading is encouraged.
detailed_review.Other: We cannot expect an above-average campus life like in IITs and NITs because our college is still in the developing stage. Fests are not up to the mark. In the coming years, it will be one of the best IIITs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Come to this college if you like ventures.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80 percent of the batch gets placed usually. However the placement percentage varies from time to time. The highest package which was offered was of 1 crores approximately. The top companies which come for recruitment are Microsoft and Amazon. Around half of the students get internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is not up to the mark. It is quite average and not what an Institute of national importance should be like. Anyway you should come to this college only for placement purpose and not for any other things. Extracurricular activities are a strict no go.
detailed_review.Faculty: This is the one area where IIIT Guwahati lacks in almost every way. The faculty is very well qualified and all have Ph.D. degrees but almost None of them knows how to teach a particular subject in a good manner. The thing is that if you are coming in this college then you should rely on self study rather than your professors.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a place for uncertainty and new experiences.

The average salary package offered was 35 LPA.

detailed_review.Other: This college provides scholarships under NSP for those students who belong to SC and ST categories. Two major fests such as Yuvaan and Entropy are conducted.

reviews.review_title: Overall, college provides a very good environment to learn and explore with your peers.

Amazon, Flipkart, Service Now, Media Tech, and Games Craft are among the top recruiters.

Teachers are experts in their field. We learn a lot from their lectures. The course is very new and highly oriented to the IT industry, and it helps students work in top MNCs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a growing college and, in a few years, will be one of the most successful colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements for my batch have just started for our seniors. 91% of the students got placed, with an average package of INR 17.2 LPA, the highest being INR 120 LPA, and a median of INR 14.5 LPA. The college has its own ambulance to take students to the hospital, and it has the medicine students need in their day-to-day lives. The course curriculum is up-to-date with modern technologies, and the standards for testing the students are pretty high. Semesters have hectic schedules, and exams are difficult as well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

admission.title: IIIT Guwahati Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: IIIT Guwahati admission offers various UG, PG, and PhD level courses in the field of Engineering with admissions based on entrance exam scores. Candidates must appear for JEE Main exam followed by counselling conducted by JoSAA to receive admission to their flagship BTech course. For admission to an MTech or PhD course, aspirants are required to have a valid GATE/ NET scorecard. IIIT Guwahati is one of the recently established IIITs situated in Assam. Applications for the programmes are accepted online. Students seeking IIIT Guwahati admission can read the following article to learn about the detailed admission procedure for the institute.

The Round 1 closing rank for BTech ranged between 4817 and 8428 for BTech. faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

faqs.question: How do I get a seat at IIIT Guwahati?
faqs.answer: IIIT Guwahati provides various programmes and specialisations to students. These courses are available in different streams. For obtaining IIIT Guwahati admission, candidates are selected on the basis of entrance tests. For further details, candidates may visit the official website and learn more regarding the eligibility details for their preferred course choice. Accepted exams include JEE Main and GATE.

faqs.question: What is JEE Mains 2026 exam date session 2?
faqs.answer: NTA has announced the JEE Main 2026 exam date for session 2. JEE Main 2026 session 2 exam will be held from April 2, 2026 , to April 9, 2026 . JEE Main 2026 session 2 registration will start in the last week of January 2026. The JEE Main Application Form 2026 session 2 will be available on the website jeemain.nta.nic.in. The JEE 2026 session 1 exam will be conducted from Jan 21, 2026, to Jan 30, 2026 .

faqs.question: How can I get admission in IIIT Guwahati?
faqs.answer: IIIT Guwahati admissions are held on the basis of entrance tests. For BTech, the accepted exam is the JEE Main. MTech admissions are held on the basis of GATE scoring. Students can pay the application fee and confirm their admission after the counselling round.

faqs.question: What is the fees of IIIT Guwahati JoSAA?
faqs.answer: IIIT Guwahati BTech seats are filled by the Joint Seat Allocation Seat (JoSAA) after qualifying the JEE Main exam. The counselling body doesn't have any registrtaion fee, the filling-in of choices on the online portal is free of cost. However, candidates might have pay the seat acceptance fee . The documents uploaded by the candidate will not be verified unless the candidate pays the seat acceptance fee. General/Open category candidates are required to pay a fee of INR 35,000, whereas SC, Gen-PwD, ST, OBC-NCL-PwD, ST-PwD, and SC-PwD have to pay INR15,000 through e-challan or through SBI net banking. The fees will be included in the semester fees once students confirm their admission.

Once the PI process is over, selected students are further required to complete the document verification process and pay the admission fee to secure the seat.

It is important that students appear the entrance test and clear the cut-off for the institute. Post the result declaration, students need to register for the counselling process. Selected students need to go through document verification and pay the fees for final seat allotment.

faqs.question: What is the stipend for PhD students of IIIT Guwahati?
faqs.answer: MHRD Fellowships is a financial assistance for PhD students for a maximum period of five years. PhD students will get INR 37000 as monthly stipend for the first two years at JRF level and then for the next 3 years, they will receive INR 42000 per month at SRF level. Under the Visvesvaraya PhD scheme for Electronics and IT, students will get a fellowship of INR 38,750 per month during first and second year. After that, they will get INR 43,750 per month till 5th year of PhD. They will also get research contingency grant or INR 1.20 lac per year, as per DIC MeitY, Govt. of India guidelines. Stipend related information for other programs is not clearly mentioned on the official website. Prime Minister's Research Fellowship (PMRF) is also offered to PMRF scholars from IIIT Guwahati who receive INR 70,000 per month for the first two years. During the third year, they will receive INR 75,000 rupees per month and in the fourth and fifth year, they will receive INR 80,000 per month. Along with that, PMRF scholars will get INR 2 lac per year which will mean they receive INR 10 lac in five years.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure at IIIT Guwahati PhD courses?
faqs.answer: The fee structure of IIIT Guwahati is segregated in three parts including per semester tuition fee, institute caution money and hostel fee. Hostel fee will be incurred only if you plan to stay in the hotel. Otherwise, you only need to pay tuition fee and institute caution money (one-time refundable fee). Do remember that you pay caution money only once throughout your course. From second semester, you will pay only tuition and hostel fee if you are living in hostel. Otherwise, you will only pay the tuition fee.

faqs.question: What is the fees of IIIT Guwahati JoSAA?
faqs.answer: IIIT Guwahati BTech seats are filled by the Joint Seat Allocation Seat (JoSAA) after qualifying the JEE Main exam. The documents uploaded by the candidate will not be verified unless the candidate pays the seat acceptance fee. General/Open category candidates are required to pay a fee of INR 35,000, whereas SC, Gen-PwD, ST, OBC-NCL-PwD, ST-PwD, and SC-PwD have to pay INR15,000 through e-challan or through SBI net banking.
