K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college if you really want to study.

detailed_review.Placements: So, in my college, 90% of students got placed last year. The average salary is 3 LPA and upto 10 LPA to 12 LPA. For core department, there are 5 to 7 companies that come to campus for recruitment. But IT companies, there is good number of companies that come for the recruitment. They provide more placement training at the beginning of 2nd year itself. It will be helpful if we utilise that. Training will also be good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel is so good, and maintenance is also good. Food is average. Any difficulty or problem with the electrical side, they take immediate action to solve the problem. Only food is not much better. They provide us with average food. They provide non-veg weekly for 4 days.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty members are so friendly with students. Some staffs are rude. It depends on their behaviour. Apart from this, the teaching is good. Students can understand easily, if not they take time to clarify the student's doubt. So, faculty members are good. Some faculty members are rude and target students for no reason.
detailed_review.Other: So, it's good to study at KRCE, making friends and enjoying my life in college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is strict and has good facilities, but the faculty and events need improvement.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70 percent of the students in the passed out batch are placed. The highest package offered is around 5 LPA the lowest is 2.5 LPA and the average is nearly 3 LPA. Some of the top recruiting companies included Infosys TCS Wipro and Capgemini. A good number of students also received internship opportunities through the college mainly in IT and service based companies. The top roles offered were mostly related to software development, testing and support.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is well maintained with clean classrooms well equipped labs and a library stocked with sufficient books. WiFi facilities are available across the campus especially in the labs and library. The hostel is decent and well maintained with clean and comfortable rooms. The food provided in the hostel mess is average but there is a canteen on campus for snacks. Medical facilities are available within the campus and students can participate in sports such as cricket volleyball and indoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are helpful, qualified, and possess strong knowledge of their subjects. They guide students effectively and provide support during exams and projects. The curriculum is updated according to university standards but still has room for more practical exposure. Semester exams are moderately difficult, but with regular preparation, students can easily clear them. The overall pass percentage is good, and most students complete their subjects on time.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest and the career opportunities it offers. The best aspects of the college are its disciplined environment and supportive faculty. The campus is clean and has a peaceful atmosphere. However, more campus placement opportunities and technical workshops would improve the experience. The college organizes some cultural and technical events, but I wish there were more extracurricular activities and festival celebrations. The campus is well connected by road, and transportation is easily available.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Facilities were good and excellent.

detailed_review.Placements: My college was good in academics and placements, and I was in a batch of B.Tech Computer Science and Business System Engineering students. The placement percentage of the number of students successfully placed in college, including the highest, the lowest, and the advantage of our college competition of the leading competitor of the specific university.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college has a good network, providing high-speed Wi-Fi connection and internet access across campus. There is modern equipment for hands-on learning in Science, engineering, and specialized research. Classrooms have digital boards, projectors, and comfortable seating to enhance learning. There is also a vast collection of books in libraries, journals, and research papers, often with online access to e-resources.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are very good and friendly to students, explaining doubts using clear methods. The teaching staff is well-qualified and experienced, with industry and research backgrounds. The curriculum offers a balanced mix of foundational subjects.
detailed_review.Other: Our college has good placements and connects with many software companies.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: An honest review about K. Ramakrishnan College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 50-25% of students are placed in our course. The highest package is nearly 12 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA for past students. Top companies like Zoho, TCS, and Wipro offered roles. The top roles offered in our course are HR and also software engineers, as well as developers at tribute companies, so it was a good role offered in our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: If you talk about the facilities and infrastructure, there are Wi-Fi connections all over our college campus and also facilitated classrooms and a library with thousands of books. If we talk about the quality of our hostel, it may be something average because the food was so low, and not many students studied in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are so kind and show respect. They help us in a good way, and also clarify all our questions. They are so helpful for us with all problems, and they treat us well and also treat us like their own children. If you talk about the semester exams, they are tough, not so much that you can easily score good marks. Also, you can get CA marks before the exams; they conducted so many mocks so that your semester exam will be quite easy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: A small review of K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering from my point of view.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of the people who passed out are placed. When we talk about internships, many people, including my brother, got internships at small startup companies. So, you can easily get an internship from this college. Roles like HR can also be obtained through these opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our classrooms were clean and neat. Also, most labs are available, and there are good libraries with a large number of books. When you talk about the hostel, there may be small food problems in our college, like the quality, but otherwise, the food was good. Maybe small issues happen sometimes. Medical facilities are available 24/7, and the canteen food was good.
detailed_review.Faculty: When we talk about the faculty, they are very helpful to us. Also, the exams are easy. They explain things in a simple way so we can understand the semester material. It isn’t very difficult to learn, and it is easy to pass. If the exam is conducted for 100 marks, then the passing percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: About this course, it was the most wonderful course I have ever seen because in CSE you only learn about computers, but in CSBS you can learn both business and computers. So, it was helpful for learning both business and computer software. I will recommend this to you guys if you are ready to learn both computer and business. The one thing I want the college to improve is the food in the hostel. It was not very bad, but it needs better discipline. That was the only problem, otherwise, everything was good.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Good college and environment .

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, we have good placement and training. Percentage of students got 69% of students placed successfully. The highest package offered is 12 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 3 to 5 LPA. The recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Amazon, Capgemini, etc. 64% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in our college are the best. In our department, Wi-Fi facilities are provided, and labs are well-equipped. Classrooms are clean, and libraries have many books where we need to give ID cards for books. The quality of food is good in the canteen and mess.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and qualified with master's degrees. Our teacher teaches in a unique way, with visual and interactive teachings. Course curriculum is relevant to MBA. They make students ready for industry. Pass percentage in our college is 68%. The semester exams are strictly conducted in our college.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Many students are friends of mine in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has good placement opportunities, with 50 to 80 students typically placed. The highest package offered is 12 LPA and the lowest ranges from 3 to 7 LPA. The course is engaging, and placement training is provided alongside the curriculum. Recruiting companies include Flipkart, GoDaddy, Oracle, and NTT Data. Our campus offers internship opportunities and 83 percent of students in our course secured internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in our college are very good. The college infrastructure is excellent, with a pleasant and well-lit environment. We have Wi-Fi access, well-equipped labs, and a library. Hostel facilities are also good, and the food is satisfactory.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are excellent. They are knowledgeable, hold good qualifications from top universities, and have extensive teaching experience. The teaching quality is good, and the curriculum is relevant to the MBA program, preparing students for the industry. The passing percentage is 85%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Golden days of my college life .

detailed_review.Placements: They will take on the new companies in the year of 2024, and more people are getting selected for those new companies, and they will also take on the repeated companies, and one major mistake is that some of the companies will expect 60% in both 12th and under 10th.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Courses are good in the college, and also campus life is too good and neat when compared to a hostel. In a hostel, the total control is taken by Zolo Stays, so it is very neat and clean. And they will provide free popcorn with theatre-type movies for everyone once a week, and also they cut the cake for the hostel students free of cost.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are too good and expected people in their core fields, and also every department has the certified staff, like in CSE, 8 staff members are certified Java trainers from the Wipro company, so they have good knowledge in programming languages, and they will clear the students doubts effectively with real-time examples.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the college environment and facilities .

detailed_review.Placements: The lowest package is 4 LPA, and the higher package is 10 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro, CTS, Zoho, Deltax, and so on. Software engineer, technical trainee, graphic designer, and so on are the top roles offered. Our college has started the placement-related training from the 1st year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a huge library. Each department has separate labs. Each floor has separate Wi-Fi, and classrooms have educom facilities. The college hostel has AC and non-AC facilities, and the mess food is moderate. Separate the canteen for vegetarians and non-vegetarians. Our college has a separate sports club, and they support the students to participate in various events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are highly qualified and help during the examination. We have 3 internal exams before the end semesters. Yes, this course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students ready for industry. The examination's difficulty level is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: We have cultural event "Talentia.". Lots of competitions for the next 2 days. Each department has separate clubs, and they will conduct intra- and intercollege events once a month.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: It is an okay college, but not that good.

detailed_review.Placements: I am one of the students of the first batch, which passed in the year 2024. The highest package for the CSE stream is INR 20 LPA, and the lowest is INR 2.2 LPA. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Accenture, CTS, Hexaware, and Capgemini. Nearly 75% of the students got internships in the previous academic year from the above-mentioned companies. My course offers two main roles, namely management and coding skills, in combination.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities available are Wi-Fi, labs, and computers. But they can improve some more. The library has a reasonable number of books. The quality of the rooms is okay. But the AC rooms are so good. But food is not that good. It is spicier in nature. They use ready-made parathas and chapatis.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the teachers are qualified. Teaching quality is not that bad. Yes, of course, the curriculum is related to our subject. Yes, it makes us industry-ready because, as CSBS, we also have management papers for industrial knowledge. The exams are quite difficult. But they always give us coaching and repetitive tests to improve our internals. So the pass percentage is always greater than 90%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is different from others and provides a good scope of knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: How is life at KRCE Trichy?

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered in our college is 10 LPA, and the average is around 3-4LPA, its all depends on the CGPA and our professional skills. There are so many company visit to recruit us. Ex: tcs, infoysys, zoho, etc. There will be placement training right from your second sem which will surely help you out in final year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and classrooms are non AC, and hostel rooms and foods are not that much worthy. Ill rate it around 6.5 to 10. canteen has absolutely tasty and catch foods, which is worth the hype krce. When it comes to sports, no sports quota will be considered here. But they will give you cash rewards if you won any prize. I ve got 25k for being selected for anna university women volleyball team 2023 and I had participated in all india south zone tournament which was held at Kerala on dec 2022. they will surely respect your talent and encourage you to lead towards your dream.
detailed_review.Faculty: I will definitely not rate it as excellent and all. To be honest it will be like a school, they will push you beyond your limits and make us stress too. They will conduct coaching class and provide bus in the evening. Teachers were not knowledgeable expect a few. The curriculum will surely prepare students industry ready.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fest will be conducted rarely. There is no ethnic day in our college. Yearly once they will conduct talentia and few other events. They will provide full scholarship for students who pursued their 6th grade to 12th grade in government school (7.5).

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Education is a good weapon for future.

detailed_review.Placements: K. Ramakrishnan College Of Engineering has a placement cell. It was very helpful to acquire jobs for students through on-campus drives. In the 7th semester students can apply for placements. Many multinational companies like TCS, CTS, etc. Come to the college and a maximum of 70% of students were placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus infrastructure is looking good. It was very clean and green with filled of trees. Our campus is maintained by the NSS Cubs. There are two blocks in our campus separately one for Engineering and other for Technology block. Wi-fi facilities are also provided in our classrooms and labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are completed their Master's Degree and are Ph.D.  holders. Faculty members are friendly to the students. For each student they assign a mentor to discuss about the projects and their academic performance. The Computer Science programs are high-demand programs that attract highly capable students (mini-Mumbai high school average required is 84%). In exam times the faculty members are giving more coaching like retest coaching after all the internal exams. So, students automatically passed in the exams easily.
detailed_review.Other: Our college conducts activities like Talentia, Food fest, Annual day, Cultural day. Also, some Industrial visits in Cochin, Bangalore, Ooty, Kodaikanal are conducted. In each department they conduct a department function like Workshop, Paper Presentation, and Games.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: KRCE placements and training review.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of the student is considered by the number of arrears. Students without any arrear are placed in companies offering high packages. Top  recruiting companies are TCS, CTS, WIPRO, and so on. TCS and WIPRO are the top package offering companies recorded in our courses. 70% of the students got internship from our courses.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The students are handled in a friendly way and are given opportunities to participate in the inter and intra college events. Hostels are very comfortable and well maintained at all times. The quality of food is very nice and we like the food prepared in the mess.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is humble and behave with us in a very friendly way. They help us  by teaching in a clear and understandable  manner. The semester exams, retests, model papers are all very easy to clear.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with this college because if you get good marks, they will give freedom.

detailed_review.Placements: Considering the placements, K Ramakrishnan College is the best that I can recommend but I chose the mechanical engineering department. In that course, core companies selected only a few students for campus interviews compared to the IT companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, they give a separate id and password for connecting to the Wi-Fi. The Wi-Fi speed is also good. On our campus, there are two colleges namely, engineering and technology. Technology college has a big library facility compared to the engineering blocks.
detailed_review.Faculty: They conducted approximately 4 or 5 internal tests before attending the semester exam. If we fail that exam, they tell us to come for night studies. It's like a school that's one thing every student hates in our college. But that is also good for our studies and we would get good marks in the semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: I wish that I would join the mechanical engineering department since my school days so I took that course. They support our extracurricular activities also. If get any prize in state or district or zone level matches, they will award cash prizes.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, faulty ratio, transportation facilities, and water facility for hostel.

detailed_review.Placements: Students who get above 85% in the board exam will be placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA, the lowest salary package offered is 3.6 LPA, and the average salary package for the department of computer science is 4 LPA. Top recruiters are Zoho, IBM, Infosys, TCS, CTS, HCL, Accenture, Cognizant, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Aspire System, Byju's, and some startup companies. Above 80% of students got internships from Amazon and Zoho. Those companies don't consider marks only they also need some technical knowledge. Top roles offered are human resource (HR), product manager, associate consultant, product development, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure and facilities available for the department of computer science and engineering are Wi-Fi free campus, smart classes, lots of systems available such as more than required, good library, Wi-Fi free hostel, good canteen, great medical facilities, well-maintained mess with good quality of food, and a good mentor for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are good and well-qualified teachers. They train us to become industry-ready. The question papers are easy to moderate. Sometimes, difficult question papers are also set by our exam cell officials. Adding 50% from internal and 50% from the semester, we have to score 50%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I would definitely recommend this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our batch has about 75% placement. The highest one is 10 LPA and the lowest is 2 LPA. Some of the top recruiting firms include Cognizant, Wipro, TCS, Zoho, and IBM. Many got internships from these companies. The roles offered are front-end, back-end developers, data engineers, and others too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available in every classroom. Labs are wonderful. The library was constructed with great infrastructure. The quality of the food is great. Weekly doctors arrive to check hostel students. The canteen provides both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food, while the mess also provides great food.
detailed_review.Faculty: We have lab classes twice a week. They also provide practical classes in the labs. Faculty members are so friendly. Students can meet with Hod to report issues or problems they are struggling with weekly. The pass percentage in our department is usually 65% to 75%. An IV occurs every year.
detailed_review.Other: The college was a lot of fun to be around. They give more importance to scholarships and other things.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a great college for placements and studies. They have to conducts many events and cultural.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are very good and better than any college in our locality. Many top recruitment companies come for campus hiring. In the previous year, many students got placed in companies like Wipro, Walmart, TCS, CTS, etc. Our college conducts many technical events to our standards.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Department infrastructure is excellent. But college medical facilities will have to improve. We have a tremendous library with all sorts of books. They need to improve the elevator facilities and medical requirements on our campus. Hostel cameras have to be monitored.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every teacher is a Ph.D. holder. There is no problem in teaching. The pass percentage is more than 70%. Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable in their field. Our teachers help with our projects and many students got patents for their projects. Industrial visits are often.
detailed_review.Other: They conduct fewer events and fests. In our course, there are many offers available for placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: All the students who join placements will get guaranteed job offers. Top recruiters are TCS, Wipro, Zoho, and many more. It is the best college for placements. The average salary package offered is 1 LPA, and the highest salary pacakge offered is 3 LPA. The top roles in our course are antenna design, VLSI.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college and hostel is good. All departments have separate laboratories and classrooms are vibrant and fine. Hostel mess food and canteen food are decent. It provides washing machine facilities to wash cloths. Wi-Fi facility is enabled in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are helpful and involved in guiding students on a good path. Teaching is effective. Semester exams are easy as students have more practice in cycle tests. This college surely makes students industry-ready by providing good knowledge and quality.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, this is the best college ever.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students got placed in top MNCs like Wipro, CTS, TCS, Accenture, Zoho etc. The highest package offered is 12 LPA. The lowest package is 2.5 LPA, and the average is 4 to 6 LPA. Nearly 70% of students got internships. The job roles offered are associate, program analyst, project engineer etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is Wi-Fi enabled. It has nearly 20 classrooms for each department. Our library is the most significant place in our college. Mess and canteen are always in good condition. The college gives more importance to sports and extracurricular activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum is fantastic. Our college always ranks among top 5 under Anna University. The pass percentage is 90%. Almost many students pass the exams in my batch with a good CGPA. Many tests are conducted for our practice.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good placements, friendly teachers and a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: About 95% of the students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 2 LPA. Top recruiters are Wipro, TCS, and Infosys. In our course, we can go for both hardware and software companies. Top roles offered are IC design, digital electronics, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very good compared to other campuses. The hostel is also good, and mess food is decent and eatable. Each department has separate labs, and facilities are available. The campus has gym facilities too, and our college has a library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are much involved and helpful in improving our knowledge. Teaching is more effective. We have more cycle tests and internals, so we can approach internals in an easy way. It made us feel hectic, but it made to survive in the industrial environment easily.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this college mainly for placement facilities, and once we are interested, we can get guaranteed placements. Talentia and Pongal celebrations are conducted in our college every year.

college_info.college_name: K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering Course Admissions: Eligibility & Selection Process

faqs.question: Which courses does KRCE - K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering offer?
faqs.answer: K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering offers BTech, BE, ME and MBA at the UG and PG level. Apart from the UG and PG courses, the college also offers doctorate-level courses. To get admission to KRCE, candidates must have a valid TANCET, GATE, and CEETA PG entrance exam scores. The college offers more than ten courses (including specialization) in Engineering & Business and Management streams.

faqs.question: Is K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering worth joining?
faqs.answer: The college has released the NIRF report 2024, incorporating the 2023 placement statistics. As per the report,  465 BTech and 15 MTech/ MBA students were placed in 2023. The median package offered to BTech students during K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering placements 2023 was INR 4.50 LPA. For MTech/ MBA courses, the 2023 median package stood at INR 3.50 LPA. The key highlights of KRCE placements 2023 and 2022 are tabulated below: Total students (MTech/ MBA) NOTE: The aforementioned details are fetched from the NIRF report 2024.

faqs.answer: In order to enroll for admission to various courses at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering, candidates must complete the last educational qualification set by the college. The institute offers courses at the UG and PG level. Students can check course-wise eligibility from the table presented below:

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for BTech course at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Students have to appear for TNEA counselling along with the pre-defined eligibility. In order to apply for the BTech course at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering, candidates must pass Class 12 with a 45% aggregate. For admission to the BTech course at KRCE, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria in the first place. The selection criteria for this course is merit-based + TNEA counselling. Candidates who still need to complete Class 12 are eligible for admission.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for BTech admission at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: For admission in a BTech programme at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering, it is crucial that the aspirant fulfills the course-specific eligibility criteria. Thus, only the asiprants who have passed Class 12 with at least 45% aggregate are eligible for admission. In addition, student should have passed the qualifying examination from a recognised board. Candidate must also hold the Class 12 mark sheet during application form filling and at the time of admission for verification purposes.

faqs.question: Is it worth joining K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering for MBA course?
faqs.answer: The college has released the NIRF report 2024, incorporating the 2023 placement statistics. As per the report,  15 students were placed in 2023. The median package offered during placements 2023 stood at INR 3.50 LPA. Check the details below: Total students NOTE1: The aforementioned details are fetched from the NIRF report 2024. NOTE 2: The data presented above is the collective placement stats for the courses M.Tech and MBA. Hence, it is not course-specific.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for MBA course at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Admission to MBA course is based on TANCET exam score. Aspirants also have to meet the eligibility criteria set by the college which is graduation with a 50% aggregate. Candidates are advise to keep the updated documents ready for the further document verification. Aspirants need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to M.Tech course at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: To get admission for M.Tech programme at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering, interested candidates should visit the official website to access the application form. Fill it out accurately and submit it with the required documents and application fee. The college evaluates applications based on criteria like GATE scores and CEETA PG. Candidate should also complete graduation with minimum 50% aggregate.

faqs.question: How many ME courses are offered at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: A total of four ME courses are offered at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering. Students can check the M.Tech specialisations below: Apart from this, aspirants should meet the last educational qualification set by the college. Candidates must pass graduation with a 50% aggregate.

faqs.question: How to apply online for various courses at K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering admission?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply online for UG and PG courses at KRCE . Below are the application steps to apply for courses at the K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering: Step one: Visit the official website, i.e.,  krce.ac.in Step two: Click on 'Apply Now' on the Home page. Step three: Register with the basic details such as mobile number, valid email ID etc. to generate login credentials. Step four: Login to fill out the application form. Step five: Upload the documents and pay the application fee. Step six: Submit the application form.

placement_faqs.question: Is K Ramakrishnan College of Engineering good or bad for placements?
placement_faqs.answer: The college has a decent placement record. Looking at the past three years' statistics, the number of BTech students placed has been fluctuating, whereas, an improving trend was observed in the number of MTech/ MBA students placed.
